1b1(rgyud): / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
1b2(rgyud): drug gagasaba'i ma gamed
1b3(rgyud): yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzus/ 
2a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
2a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'dis da bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
2a3(rgyud): drang srong gi ril dang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'chen po'i tshogs
2a4(rgyud): mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
2b1(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ gos chags bcos nas pus mos la btsugs te
2b2(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la sprul bdum
2b3(rgyud): chen po'i tsan+dan gyi snying po'i 'a/ khor lo zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen mo/ smon cing bgyi thams cad
2b4(rgyud): mngon par 'grub par bgyi mchis te/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos bdag
2b5(rgyud): gis bshad par gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus sems can
3a1(rgyud): / thams cad la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par 'tshal lags so// de ci'i slad du na
3a2(rgyud): na bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po
3a3(rgyud): dang yid bzhin gyi ljon shi dang bzhin du smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas so// de
3a4(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs da bang phyug la legs so legs sa
3a5(rgyud): zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ khyod kyis snying brtse ba'i phyir sems can gyi ched du 'di ltar zhus pas na/ khyod
3a6(rgyud): thogs pa med pa'i gzungs 'di bshad par gnang bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
3b1(rgyud): de ltar gnang ba dang / langs nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas slar stan la 'dug te/ sems rtse gcig tu 'khor 'dus pa dag
3b2(rgyud): la rnam par bltas nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sngags 'di smras so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ke te/ 
3b3(rgyud): shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra pa tri tsin+ta me Ni ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha ti/ badz+ra
3b4(rgyud): ba ra/ A ka rA yai hUM swA hA/ 'di ni// lus kyi sngags so// oM pad+mi/ tsin+ta ma/ Ni/ ma hA badz+ri b+ha ra hUM/ 'di ni
3b5(rgyud): snying po'i sngags so// oM b+ha ra ta pad+me hUM/ 'di ni snying gi snying po'i snga gse lags so// de'i tshe byang chub sem
3b6(rgyud): dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / sa chen po yang rnam pa drug du rab
3b7(rgyud): tu g.yos par gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi
4a1(rgyud): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i khang khyim rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal po dang / 
4a2(rgyud): bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang shin tu skrag cing 'jigs pa chen po skyes par gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal po'i gzhal med khang yang rab tu 'bar bar gyur// 
4a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang dngang zhing skrag pas gdong bkab ste sa la 'gyel bar gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i
4a4(rgyud): sgo thams cad phye nas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnam par thar to// lha'i bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to// de'i tshe lha rnams
4a5(rgyud): kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char ma ngon par phab par gyur/ lha'i rol mo
4a6(rgyud): rnams kyang bar snang la sgra sna tshogs phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i
4a7(rgyud): dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ rigs kyi bu khyod sems can la
4a8(rgyud): snying brtse ba'i phyir gzungs 'di bshad pa nyid kyis sems can rnams kyis phan yon chen po thob par 'gyur ba legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa
4b1(rgyud): brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi phyir rdzu/ 
4b2(rgyud): 'phrul gyi rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di'i cho ga shod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu/ 
4b3(rgyud): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gzhon nu gang la la zhig gis tshe 'di nyid la rnam par smin pa
4b4(rgyud): mngon du myong bar 'tshal na/ gdugs mtshan sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus kyis gzungs 'di mi ba spyad par bgyis te/ gdugs dang dus mi 'dam par gca
4b5(rgyud): yang rung mi gtsang yang rung ste/ g.yar ston du bzlas pa ra gyur na bgyi ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur lags so// ci yang rung ste/ don du bgyi zhing gnyer ba zhig mchis na
4b6(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ don brgya stong du ma 'grub par 'gyur bas/ rig sngags gzhan gang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di dang skrun par bzod pa gang yang ma
4b7(rgyud): mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'das pa dang / da ltar gyi las ngan pa dang / sgrib pa lci ba rnams rab tu 'joms paso// gang la la zhig gzungs 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na mnar ma
4b8(rgyud): mchis pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs dag kyang thar par 'gyur la/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur na/ las ngan pa dang / gdon
5a1(rgyud): bgegs dang / bron gzhan thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang dag rims na shin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / na / 
5a2(rgyud): padang / nyin mtshan du bro 'tshal ba'am/ rlung dang / 'khris pa dang / bad kan la sogs pas bro 'tshal ba dag la rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis par gyur na thams cad 'drang zhing
5a3(rgyud): sos par 'gyur lags so// gang zhig dug dang byang stems kyis phog par gyur tam/ ldog pa dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze nad dam/ phol mig gam/ rlung nad ngam/ smyos pa 'am/ klad pa
5a4(rgyud): bro 'tshal ba'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / mchu dang / lce dang / mi dra ba dang / kha dang / gdong dang / gtsug dang / klung rgyas dang / brang dang / rtsib legs dang / stong dang / lto ba dang / 
5a5(rgyud): rked pa dang / rgyab dang / rkang pa dang / lag pa la sogs pa tham sa cad bro 'tshal bar gyur na yang thams cad sos/ bar bgyid/ ji tsam du lus kyi bro nad ci mchis pa thams cad
5a6(rgyud): kyang sos par bgyid lags so// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bo na ya ka dang / bdud sdig can dang / 'dre gdon dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lag so// mtshon cha dang
5a7(rgyud): dmag tshogs dang / chab dang / zhugs dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / ser ba ma rungs pa dag gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// dgra dang / chom rkun dang / rgyal po ma rungs pa dang / 
5a8(rgyud): rkun po ma rungs pa dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid por mi lu'o glo bur du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan pa rmi bar mi 'gyur/ rtsangs pa dang / sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / srin bu gyi med
5b1(rgyud): dang / rkang ma dang / gcan zan gdug pa ma rungs pa dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / spyang gi dag gis kyang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lagaso// g.yul ngor 'thab pa'i cha thams cad du rgyal bar
5b2(rgyud): 'gyur lags so// gal te bla'i bgyi ba dag gis rtsod par gyur na yang 'dum par 'gyur te/ gzungs 'di lan gcig bzlas na gong du bstan pa de dag thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par
5b3(rgyud): 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhigs gdasus regazungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyod sa
5b4(rgyud): 'jigs shig/ ci zhig smon cing ci zhig yongs su gnyer bar byed/ thams cad khyod la sbyin no zhes bsgo bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyang sku mngon du
5b5(rgyud): ston par 'gyur/ mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bkod pa'i dngos po dag kyang nga mthong bar 'gyur 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi byang
5b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas
5b7(rgyud): ri bo Ta la yang mthong bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyi lus kyang yongasu dag par 'gyur bas rtag par rgyal po dang / blon po rnams kyis bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos
5b8(rgyud): byams shing bkur bar 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing pad+ma'i steng du skye bar 'gyur/ bkod pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rje su dran
6a1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ 'di nas mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba'i bar du nam yang ngan 'gro rnamasu mi ltung zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur lags te/ 'din
6a2(rgyud): sngags pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bgyi ba lag so// sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// / 
6a3(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po'i gzungs gsang ba'i cho ga bstan pa su yang rung ba gces pa'i don
6a4(rgyud): grub pa zhig mchis na/ thams cad rang zhi bar 'gyur lagaso// de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi nor dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gang lags pa'o// 
6a5(rgyud): de la 'jig rten pa'i nor ni gser dang / dngul la sogs pa/ 'i rin po che rnams so// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor ni bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi bkod pa rnam pa gnyis
6a6(rgyud): dang ldan zhing lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad yongs skyob pa dang / byams pa'i sems rgyas nas
6a7(rgyud): blo dang ldan pa rnams bde ba stsol ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel zhing mthu stobs rtags pa gang lags pa'o// gsang ba mdzod kyi spyod yul 'di ni gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o// gang
6a8(rgyud): la la zhig bdag gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dngos grub mchog thob par 'tshal na/ sems rtse gcig tu dus thams cad dang / gnas thams cad du gtsang yang rung mi gtsang
6b1(rgyud): yang rung ste/ rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na nongs pa ci yang ma mchis pas bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis nas/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
6b2(rgyud): phyug gi ming dang / yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi ming dang / gang zag de'i ming nas brjod de/ gal te rgyal po 'am/ rgyal bu 'am/ btsun mo'am/ sras sam/ rgyal po'i bu
6b3(rgyud): mi 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gdol pa 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gzhonanu ma'am/ mu stegs sna tshogs dag la sten
6b4(rgyud): cing mdza' bar 'tshal na/ de dag gi ming nas brjod de rtag/ par tho rangs kyi tshe bzlas pa'i grangs tshangs par ba dgyi'o// gal te dngos grub mchog gnyir zhing rgyal po la
6b5(rgyud): bsten par 'tshal na dgung zhag bdun gyi bar du rtag par tho rang sa kyi tshe lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na mjal bar 'gyur lags so// gal te btsun mo la bsten par 'tshal
6b6(rgyud): na lan dgu brgya bzlas par bgyi'o// rgyal bu la bsten par 'tshal na lan brgyad brgya bzlas par bgyi'o// slas dag mthong bar 'tshal na lan bdun brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i bu
6b7(rgyud): mo la bsten par 'tshal na lan drug brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// bram ze la bsten par 'tshal na lan lnga brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// rgyal rigs la bsten par 'tshal na lan bzhi brgya bzla bar bgyi
6b8(rgyud): dmangs rigs la ni sum brgya'o// gdol pa la ni nyis brgya'o// dge slong dang / dge slong ma la ni lan brgya'o// dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la ni lan dgu bcu'o// khye'u gzhon
7a1(rgyud): nu dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma la lan drug cu'o// 'di ni bsten cing 'ja' bar bgyi ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ste/ nor dang dran dang / rta dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor/ 
7a2(rgyud): par bgyid lags so// gang la la zhig snying du sdug cing mdza' ba dag ring po na mchi ba dang mjal bar 'tshal na yid la bsam pa bzhin du rlung bzhin du mchi bar 'gyur lags so// ci bgyi'o/ 
7a3(rgyud): 'tshal bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar gyur na don de dag 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'tshal na lan stong
7a4(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na de'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong zhing bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par bgyid lag so so// gal te lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na bzlas brjod
7a5(rgyud): lan khri bgyis na lus mngon sum du bstan nas/ de la dra rtse zhing pas bu la byams pa bzhin du sems kyi smon pa/ rnams stsol bar 'gyur lagaso// gal te sangs rgyas dang / 
7a6(rgyud): 'khor 'dus pa mang po mthong bar 'tshal na lan khri sum stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur lagaso// gal te gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis pa
7a7(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang rnams mngon sum du ston cing / so so nas rang rang gi sngags kyi mthu ci mchis pa gang zag de la stsal na yongs su srung bar bgyid de/ zhag
7a8(rgyud): bdun pa la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po rnams 'khor dang bcas te mchis na/ de'i smon pa rnams stsol bar bgyid do// bzlas
7b1(rgyud): brjod kyi cho ga gong du bstan pa bzhin du bgyis na smon pa rnams yong su rdzogs par bgyid de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las thams
7b2(rgyud): cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las thams cad byams shing mos par
7b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon yang sems can rnams
7b4(rgyud): la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ gang gis mthong ba dag byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman sbyar nas lus la thogs te 'gron mchog tu mngon par 'grub cing bsam pa thams cad yid
7b5(rgyud): bzhin du 'grub pa'i cho ga bstan pa/ gi'u wang dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum dang / ga bur dang // / gla rtsi dang / 'dza' ti ba la dang / li shi dang / ka ko la
7b6(rgyud): dang pad+ma dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / gser gyi gyi ma bag rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te/ brdungs nas sbrang rtsi dkar pos spras te/ snga ma'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas
7b7(rgyud): lus la bdugs sam/ gos la gdugs sam/ mig la bskus sam/ dpral ba la thig le bgyis sam/ lus la byugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / blon po
7b8(rgyud): rnams dang / dran rnams dang / skyes pa dang / bud med la sogs pa byams shing dga' ba dang / lam gyi chos la bkur zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed nas lus kyi zho sha dang / 
8a1(rgyud): nor rdzas dag phangs pa ma mchis par gtor rim gro bgyid par 'gyur te/ brjod kyis mi 'ang lagaso// ji ltar nyi zla thams cad kyis mthong bar mos pa bzhin du
8a2(rgyud): sgrub pa'i don rnams 'byor cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig sman 'di thogs par 'gyur na kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa rnams zhu byang nas bgegs thams cad las thar par 'gyur
8a3(rgyud): lags so// rgyal po'i mthus nan gyis 'phrog pa dang / chab kyis ded pa dang / zhugs kyis tshig pa dang / mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dug dang / 'ching ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
8a4(rgyud): cad las thar bar 'gyur lags so// bsam pa thag pa na sa sman a ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di bgyis na thams cadakyis byams shing dga' bar 'gyur lags so// sman 'dis
8a5(rgyud): bdugs pas bab tshol du g.yar khar stsal bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan dag/ la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman gyi cho ga zhes
8a6(rgyud): bgyi lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman a ka ta sbyar ba'i
8a7(rgyud): cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
8a8(rgyud): gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman khar mur ba'i cho ga bstan pa/ ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum zhob mo
8b1(rgyud): btags te/ giru wang dang bsres na gong du bstan pa'i sngags rnam pa gsum re rer yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te chab gcang mas sbyar nas ril bu che chung shing 'gro stong gi 'bras bucum du
8b2(rgyud): bgyis te/ yang sngags gong ma gsum lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grib ma la bskams te/ gdugs dang / rlung gis ma phog par bgyis nas/ ril bu re re la yang gong mi
8b3(rgyud): sngags rnam pa gsum lan bdun bdun gyis btang ste/ ril bu gcig khar mur nas rgyal po 'am/ blon po nye phan nam/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag la gtam bgyis par gyur na
8b4(rgyud): bkur sti bgyis nas nor dang / rin po che dag pangs dab ma mchis par ci dang ci 'tshal ba thams cad stsol bar 'gyur tshig tu smras 'tshal thams cad kyis yid ches shing
8b5(rgyud): nyan par 'gyur/ bsgo ba zhig mchis na yang tha ma sa cad nyan cing bgyid par 'gyur lags so// khar/ sman mur ba'i tshe rtag par sngags bzla 'tshal te/ spyan
8b6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du spos chab kyis dkyil 'kho
8b7(rgyud): gru bzhi chu zheng khru bzhes 'khor ba gcig bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rtsi shing gi me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ci 'byor pa bkram zhing / tsan+dan dkar po bsregs nas sman
8b8(rgyud): gyi ril bu snga ma blangs te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bzhag nas/ rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs shing / yol ba dang / bla re dkar po bris te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma dkar po
9a1(rgyud): bzhi yang bris te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyis lags pa'i rjes la snying po'i sngags dang / snying
9a2(rgyud): gi snying po'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bgyi'o// lus kyi sngags kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas tsan+dan dkar po bsregs te/ me tog gtor na de'i tshe smon pa thams cad
9a3(rgyud): kyang 'grub par 'gyur la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang na mchis pa'i sman blangs te lus la btags na phyogs gang du mchi yang rung te/ ci dang ci gnyer ba thams cad 'grub par
9a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ tshig tu smras pa thams cad kyis yid ches shinganyan par 'gyur/ don du sgrub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so// sems rtse gcig tu ma
9a5(rgyud): bgyis pa ni ma gtogs te/ 'di ni yid bzhin gyi 'khoralo las sman mur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
9a6(rgyud): yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las/ sman mur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
9a7(rgyud): gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir skye bo mang po thams cad kyis mthong na byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bstan pa/ sman shi ri ka ku shu dang / pad+ma leb rgan
9a8(rgyud): dang pad+ma sngon po dang / rgya mtsho'i chab kyi dbu ba dang / nya rkun ma nag po'i rus pa dang / bzlas dang / ka kun ban s+ya dang / gi hang dang / gur gum dang / rgya'i gur gum dang
9b1(rgyud): pi pi ling dang / na le sham dang / bca' sga rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te/ brdungs nas zhib mor btsags te sman snga ma srang cig mchis na gla rtsi dang / ga bur srang phyed srul
9b2(rgyud): nas zhib tu bdar te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzugs kyi mdun du sbyar ba bgyis lags pas/ snga ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum re re yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ sems
9b3(rgyud): can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas sman de dag byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa'i drung du bzhag par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la reg par
9b4(rgyud): bgyis nas khar ba'i thur mas blangs te mig tu stsal na 8/ mig dang / klad pa bro 'tshalo ba dang / ling rtog/ gis bsgribs pa thams cad dang / sprin dkar dang / mchi ma
9b5(rgyud): 'dzag pa dang / sprin dmar dang / long nad dang / klad pa/ bro 'tshal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur lags so// rtag par gdugs re bzhin du sman 'di mig tu stsal na mig nad
9b6(rgyud): thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// gdugs gnyis stsal na lus kyi bro nad thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gdugs gsum stsol na spro ba'i bro nang rnam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi
9b7(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// gdugs bzhi stsal na phyi nang gi sgrib pa thams cad kyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// gdugs lnga stsal na dgra dang 'thab pa na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// 
9b8(rgyud): gdugs drug stsal na sdig pa'i las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lci ba bzhi dang / 'tshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / byang stems thams cad rnam par 'joms shing / ngan
10a1(rgyud): 'gro rnams su nam yang ltung bar mi 'gyur lag so// gdugs bdun stsal na rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / skye bo mang po thams cad rje su 'brang zhing
10a2(rgyud): bkur sti bgyis nas yid ches shing byams par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du sprul na rang dbang chen po thob par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du stsal na rgyal po dang
10a3(rgyud): blon po chen po dag 'dza' bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bzhi'i bar du stsal na gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag lnga'i bar du stsal na lha
10a4(rgyud): ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag drug gi bar du stsal na nam mkha' lding dang / srin po'i mthu chen po
10a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya nga'i bar du yod/ su srung bar bgyid pas/ byang stems dang / 'dreg/ don rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// zhag bdun drags
10a6(rgyud): gyi bar du stsal na lha nag po chen po dang / 'dre srin brgyad rnams nye bar lhags nas rje su 'brang zhing g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag brgyad kyi bar du sprul na an t+yang nar
10a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag dgu'i bar du stsal na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin gyi khang khyim gyi sgo ring bye nas de ni ci
10a8(rgyud): mchis pa thams cad mthing bar 'gyur ro// 'byung zhing 'jug pa la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig gi bar du stsal na sngan zhugs ltar 'bar 'dzin
10b1(rgyud): pathams cad mngon sum du dgu' bar 'gyur bas/ tshe ring bar 'gyur 'tshal lam/ mthu chen po dang ldan par 'tshal na yang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun drug
10b2(rgyud): gnyis kyi bar du stsal na drang srong mang po rnams kyis rin po che'i gter rnams phye ste nye bar bstan nas yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur// zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum gyi bar
10b3(rgyud): du stsal na klu'i gzhal med khang rnams sgo rang bye nas lta ba dag la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du stsal na 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal
10b4(rgyud): med khang dag sgo rang bye bar 'gyur bas thams cad mthong / bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bco lnga'i bar du stsal na mtshan mo mun nag gi nang du yang gdugs bzhin du
10b5(rgyud): gsal bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu drug gi bar du stsal na sa'i 'og gi rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun
10b6(rgyud): phrag bcu bdun gyi bar du stsal na gling bzhi po rnamasu sems can dmyal ba'i sems can ji snyed mchis pa yang thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de'i mthu'i dbang gis sdug bsngal
10b7(rgyud): myong ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang thar par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bco brgyad kyi bar du stsal na gang zag de nyi ma lta bu'i mthu thob par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag
10b8(rgyud): bcu dgu'i bar du stsal na lag na rdo rje'i lus yang dag par nyid mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu'i bar du stsal na spyan ras gzigs
11a1(rgyud): dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid ngo do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi
11a2(rgyud): bar du stsal na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi sgo rnams rang bye nas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs
11a3(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// lo gcig gi bar du stsal na yong su dag pa'i mig lnga
11a4(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur lagaso// gang la la zhig spyod pa'i tshe dag 'di mngon par 'grub par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des bstan pa 'di la shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing
11a5(rgyud): sems can la snying brtse bar bgyi ste/ the tshom ma mchis na gong du bstan pa bzhin du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te the tsom 'tshal bar 'gyu
11a6(rgyud): na cho ga rnams grub par dka' ste/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi tsan+dan nor bu'i 'khor lo las mig sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi ba lag so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gcig
11a7(rgyud): dbang phyug gi sems kyi 'khor lo'i las mig gi sman gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
11a8(rgyud): dbang phyug gis gzhan yang sems tsAn+da la snying brtse ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i don thams cad grub par byed pa nyon mongs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa dang / las ngan pa thams cad rnam
11b1(rgyud): par 'joms pa/ ngagra thams cad 'dul ba/ bi na ya ka khro ba'i sems nye bar ni nas skye bo mang po la gnod pa mi byed cing / byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba/ sbyin sreg
11b2(rgyud): ho bkra shis kyi cho ga bstan pa/ dogs brkos te zhugs thab khru gang gru bzhi pa cig bgyis nas/ me tog man len tsa su dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / chab ma
11b3(rgyud): cha mnyam par bsres te/ a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / shing dri tsan so so nas srid du sor bcu gnyis zhing du sor gcig mchis pa btubs te/ thab tu sreg par bgyi zhing / sman nyung
11b4(rgyud): zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags btab ste/ zhugs dkyi nang du dor ba la stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms shing / tshe lo brgya nyi
11b5(rgyud): shu thub par 'gyur lags so// zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyu na chad pa ma mchis par hoM gyi cho ga bzhin bgyis na tshe'o// stong thub cing lus kyang yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// zhag bdun
11b6(rgyud): phrag gnyis kyi bar du cho ga bgyis na rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po nye phan dang / skye bo phal pa rnams kyang skyabasu mchis nas bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro// 
11b7(rgyud): zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du cho ga bzhin du bgyis na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dang / nyi zla'i lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa yang nye
11b8(rgyud): bar lhags nas yongs su srung bar 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes kyang dngos grub chen po stsol bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smon pa chen
12a1(rgyud): po rnams yongs su skang bar 'gyur lag so// gal te yul khams char dkon par gyur na/ yungs dkar dang / cha'amar la sngags 'dis btang ste
12a2(rgyud): gdugs gsum gyi bar du zhugs kyi nang du bsregs na char pa 'bab par 'gyur/ gal te char ches te mi khums na thab de'i thal ba blangs nas sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab te/ gnam du/ 
12a3(rgyud): gtor na char pa khums par 'gyur ro// gal te ser ba ma rungs pa babs sam/ rlung drag po blo bur du langs par gyur na yang thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ sprin mchis
12a4(rgyud): pa'i phyogs su gtor na zhi bar 'gyur lagaso// sngags 'di rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na mthu stobs mthu bo che dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas// lus 'di spangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams
12a5(rgyud): bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ mngon par rdzogs par 'cha/ nga rgya ba'i bar du skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rje su/ dran pa thob par 'gyur lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
12a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tsan+dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bdag gis bstan pa bzhin du dge slong sa
12a7(rgyud): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ skyes pa'am/ bud med gang la la zhig gis lan gcig 'chang bar bgyid na gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur bas the tshom gyi bsam
12a8(rgyud): pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o// yid la bsams pa'i don thams cad thob par 'gyur bas shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing the tshom bskyed par mi bgyid/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
12b1(rgyud): kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod snying rje chen pos yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi cho ga gya nom pa 'di yang dag par bshad de/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems
12b2(rgyud): can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar byas pa legs so leg so zhes bsngags pa brjod do// gang la la zhig gis sems bskyed de/ kha nas bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub thob
12b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de ltar yin mod kyi ngas bstan pa bzhin du sems can rnams la yang nas yang du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis rjes su bstan nas/ dngos grub thob par bya ba'i ched du lus
12b4(rgyud): nye bar ston la/ nga'i tshig dag 'gal bar ma byed cig dang / nga yang rjes su yi rang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di
12b5(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bskal/ pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas/ byams pa dang brtse ba 'i sems kyis sems can la rjes su ston cing / rtag par
12b6(rgyud): yongs su bsrung nas dngos grub stsal bar ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen cing dbang du gyur pa lags so// sems can rnams kyi slad du yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bshad pa lag
12b7(rgyud): pas gang la la zhig gis len cing 'chang ba dang / rtag par bdag nyid bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshangs par bgyis na smon pa rnams grub par 'gyur te/ bdag ni de ltar bcom ldan
12b8(rgyud): 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su bskyab par bgyid pa lags so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
13a1(rgyud): dbang phyug gis yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad rab tu dga' nas mngon par yid ches pas yang dag
13a2(rgyud): pabapar blangs te spong bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las/ sbyin sreg ha~M gyi cho ga sman sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// 
13a3(rgyud): 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbong phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzadathogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs
13a4(rgyud): so// zhu chen gyi mkhan po dang / lo tsha ba bco dam ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban+de chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe
13a5(rgyud): las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
13a6(rgyud): dbang phyug gi gzungs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa'i ngang las snying rje'i
13a7(rgyud): shugs kyis byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed nas/ pad+ma dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gdan la hrI 'phro 'du las zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ dang po gnyis thal mo sbyar ba/ g.yas
13a8(rgyud): 'og man bgrang phreng mu tig dkar po/ g.yon 'og ma na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ sku mdog dkar po zhabs rdzogs pa'i skyil krung bcas pa/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po
13b1(rgyud): che'i dbu rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ ma lha mo drug ma dang / yab nor bu rin po ches brten pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / sems ma rab tu mang pos bskor te 'di skad ces gsung so// ga kyi dru'am / 
13b2(rgyud): kyi bu mos sngags 'di lan gcig brjod dam dran zhing yid la byas sam/ bris nas lul bcangs sam/ mos shing gus par byas na mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba'i sdig bri
13b3(rgyud): las thams cad byang zhing / ngan song gsum dang / mi khom pa brgyad dang / sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi skye'o// mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / gcan zan gyis 'jigs pa
13b4(rgyud): thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// nad dang gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/  / zhes brjod pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi zhal
13b5(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur zhing / tshe 'phos nas kyang bde ba can du skye ste 'di la the tshom mam/ som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis ma za cig/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
13b6(rgyud): phyug gi gzungs rdzogs so// / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
13b7(rgyud): kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshalo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di brjod kyis rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha sa ne/ 
13b8(rgyud): ni ba sa ne ka ta ba ta ba ne /  dz+wa la dz+wa la ne/ tsa la tsa la ne/ purba yo ga sma ra pad+ma hastA ya swA hA// gang gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgya stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos
14a1(rgyud): nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po rdzog so// drug skad du/ 
14a2(rgyud): pad+ma ma ku Ta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
14a3(rgyud): lha'i gzhal mod khang na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje
14a4(rgyud): chen po'i sgo kun 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom nges par zhugs te/ 'od zer gyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtshe'i zhing gi rdul la reg pas rig ma thag tu bskan
14a5(rgyud): pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis la mchod nas/ 'od zer de bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub bo// nub ma thag tu thugs rje chen po phyag stong spyan stong dang
14a6(rgyud): ldan pa sku mdog gangs kyi rtse la nyi ma shar ba ltar dkar ba/ zhal bcu gcig gi rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po/ steng gi zhal ser ba/ g.yas ljang ku/ g.yon dmar ba/ steng gi gsum nog po// bcom
14a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi dbu ni byi ru bcag pa lta bur gyur te/ 'dzum pa mdzad nas thugs rje chen po'i bdag po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gzigaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
14a8(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thal mo sbyar nas/ gsol pa/ sku dang sngags dang las rnamaso dang / khyad par cho gi bstan par gyis/ zhes gsol ba btab nas/ btso
14b1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la leg so zhes bya ba byin nas bka' stsal pa/ sku ni rnam pa 'di lta ste// thugs rje dag pas chu shel te// mnyam par
14b2(rgyud): bzhengs pas 'gro don mdzad// chu shol mdog 'dra zhal gsum dkar// ljang ku'i mdog can nag po che// ser po de bzhin bcom ldan dmar// drang srong dag tu ri dgas rgyan// zhi ba 'dzu
14b3(rgyud): dang bzhad pa dang // khros pa'i zhal mnga' spyan gsum mdzes// bcu pa sems dpa'i rtags can te// bcu gcig bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag/ yon tan nor bu mu tig phreng // phrin
14b4(rgyud): las sna tshogs smad bkris pa// dang po'i phyag ni thal sbra dar te// g.yas pa rin chen phreng ba 'dzin// g.yon pa dri me du pad+ma 'dzin// g.yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa'o// g.yon pI/ 
14b5(rgyud): ril ba spyi blugs te// g.yas pa 'khor lo rab tu 'dzin// g.yon pa na ni mnga' gzhu ste// lhag ma mchog sbyin smra/ na ldano// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa
14b6(rgyud): mdzad de tsod pan gnyis nas rin po che rab tu 'phro ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs las byung ba'i pad+ma'i steng du rigs lnga 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ 
14b7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa dang / mi bskyod pa'o// khang bu brtsegs pa'i rin po che de'i nang du seng ge dang / rta dang / 
14b8(rgyud): bya dang / nam mkha' lding dang / glang po che'o// de dag ni cod pan las byung ba'o// yang yum gyi sku mdog sngon mo ste// pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i steng // tshad med bzhi ste phyag bzhis mdzes// sems dang/ 
15a1(rgyud): rgyun dang ldan pa yi// mnyam pa yi ni skyil bkrung bcas// yab ni sku mdog ser po ste// pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i steng // thal sbyar nor bu 'grang 'phreng 'dzin// rgyan rnam
15a2(rgyud): yongs su 'dzin pa'o// yang ni 'od zer rab bkye ste// zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i// nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma ni// gzhon nu ut+pal mchog sbyin mdzad// zla ba las skyes namakha'i mdog/ cung zad
15a3(rgyud): khros pas rdo rje can// dkar po gangs ltar dkar ba ste// nyi zla'i steng na pad+ma 'dzin// drag po gnyis dang hI yig las// gnyis med tshul gyis 'bras bu rdzogs// ha ya gribs khams gsum/ 
15a4(rgyud): sdud du khro gnyer can gyis phrin las mdzad// gshin rje gshed po gter 'dzin cing // khams gsum rnam rgyal bdud sde 'joms// 'khor lo dkar po dag pa'i steng // gru
15a5(rgyud): bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// dang por dkon mchog rab/ dad cing // tshad med bzhi ni yongs su rdzogs// byang chu ba yan lag rdzogs pa dang // chos kyi rang bzhin stong nyid do// 
15a6(rgyud): gleng gzhi dang ni sku bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas gsang sngags bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad gangs chen mtsho'i zhing
15a7(rgyud): khams thams cad du 'od bkye nas gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas yang gsungs pa/ oM hriHhUM twe aHna mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ne ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa nA ya/ byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA
15a8(rgyud): ga tA ya aR+sha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ ad+had b+h+yaHsamyaka saM bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ b+ho d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ 
15b1(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM d+hA ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hA ru/ in+d+ra baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku sum pa re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dza la ma pa na sa swAhA// sngags 'di rnams
15b2(rgyud): tonyon byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos lan cig brjod dam/ dran zhing yid la byas sam/ lus la bcangs na mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba'i las 'byang zhing sems can
15b3(rgyud): dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mi skye zhing / mi khom pa brgyad du sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro// gcan zan dang / srin po dang / mi ma yin pa dang / nang
15b4(rgyud): dang 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// oM rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pas kyang bsrung bar bya'o// oM a ku ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+harmA NaM/ A d+ya nud panan tata zhes pas gtor
15b5(rgyud): ma'i chus yi dgas la mchod par bya'o// oM AHhUM zhes pas so// de rnams srung ba'i sngags so// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ zhes pas so// 'dis ni rigs gsum gyi bdag
15b6(rgyud): bor 'gyur te/ phan yon ni 'di'o// chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi sku'i thugs rje chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta d+hU be pU dze me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA/ 
15b7(rgyud): ga ta puSh+pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma/ 
15b8(rgyud): ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ne wi d+ye pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta shap+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa~M ma yai hUM/ oM nam
16a1(rgyud): sa cha ga 'am la brA me g+hA sa mA sA ma seM// de nas chod pas yang dag sa cho/ s+ho sa skyes las d+hA byug dngas ng+ya su shAg/ 
16a2(rgyud): ldan pa'i// hrIHyig dkar po yang dag ldan// sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / las dang cho ga bstan pa'i phyir// dang po zhi ba'i las bsgru
16a3(rgyud): nasra yid du 'ong ba'i gnas drag tu// dkar po dag po gsal dus su// dri zhim chu yis legs byugs te// me tog dkar po dgra ma byas nas// khrus dang kha zas phyogs 'thun
16a4(rgyud): pa'i bde bI sten la nyer 'dug ste// bum pa dkar po tsa da nAni dkar// dris bkang gos kyis legs par bkri/ maN+Dal dbus su legs par bzhag/ hrIHlos byung ba'i
16a5(rgyud): sems dpa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog da/ re// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te// rgyus pa'i sku ni ma dun bsams nas// hrIHyi 'dro 'du gsal ba ni// bzlas
16a6(rgyud): pa rab tu gsal ba ste// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ no ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sa gA ra bai ro tsa na yai byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya aR+tha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+he ya/ na maHsarba ta thA/ 
16a7(rgyud): ga te b+h+yo/ aR+shad b+h+yaHsa myaka saM bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sratwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a mi ta b+he la che ge mo shIn+tiM ku ru swA h+ni// zhes bzlas pa
16a8(rgyud): bya'o// gru rnam por snang mdzad du mo de'i chu// gang dag legs par khrus byed pa// dri me thams cad yongase gnas// 'bras bu bde ba bde thob 'gyur// 'jigs pa kun las rnam grol nas
16b1(rgyud): myur du chu skyes mthong bar 'gyur// de nas rgyas bsgrub 'dod na// nags chal shin tu mtho bar ni// dri zhim chu yis legs byugs la// 'bras bur bcas pa'i me tog dgram// rgyun rnams yod/ 
16b2(rgyud): su btegs nas ni// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug s+ho// rin chen sna lnga 'bru sna lnga// rin chen ga pur blugs par bya// maN+Dal dbus su legs par bzhag/ hrIHlas byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku
16b3(rgyud): zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// rgya ni rnams rdzogs pa pad+me bsnams// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te// rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas// mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod
16b4(rgyud): hrI yi 'phro 'du gsal ba re bzlas// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ir+ya dzI na sA ga rau/ bai r-i tsa nA ya/ byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA/ da ga tA yaM/ aR+tha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te/ 
16b5(rgyud): b+h+r-i ar+Ya b+h+yaHsamyakr-i bud+d+ha b+h+yo/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rI yA/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru/ Ni kAM ya/ rat+na kun pr-iSh+TiM ku ru san+naM// bang mdzod stong pa'i
16b6(rgyud): thog bzhag no/ 'bru yis yongs su gangs par 'gyur// de nas dbang gis las byed ni// sdud par byed na chu klung 'gram// pa la shra dang a shwat+tha// me tog dmar po'i ril bu byas// bAse/ 
16b7(rgyud): gab dmar po'i nang du gzhug/ me tog dmar pos rab tu mchod// hrIHyig las byung sgrol me'i sku// ljang ku phyag na lcags kyu 'dzin// phyag stong sman yang de bzhin te// rgyas pa'i sku ni
16b8(rgyud): mdun bsams nas// mchod pa lnga yis mchod byas te// hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal bar bzlas// ne mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra/ bai ro tsa nAM ya/ byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ 
17a1(rgyud): ar+Ya te/ samyak+saM bud+d+ha b+hUHna maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ aR+YA b+h+yaHsamyakr-i bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a mo hA
17a2(rgyud): b+hasmi ku ru oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mo g+ha b+hasmi ku ru swAh+mA// rdzas kyi 'ang gus lus byugs na// byugs pa de yis khugs par 'gyur// de nas phrin las byed 'dod na// dur khrod shing gcig
17a3(rgyud): dag tu ni// ba yi lci baMs legs byugs nas// me tog sngon po nim pa yi// spras kyi tshem bu lnga steng 'gram// byang du 'dug ste las 'di brtsam// gcan zan steng du chu shal te// hrI/ yi yi ge la/ 
17a4(rgyud): byung ba'i// mdog dkar ral pa'i thor tshugs can// zhal ga cig spun ni gsum pa ste// ri dgas lpags pa 'dzin/ pa'o// drang srong khros pa'i cha byad can// phyag bzhi dang po
17a5(rgyud): mchog sbyin pa// g.yon na pad steng ral gri can// g.yas pa ltos 'gros rgyan pa'i mdung // rtse gsum dkar pos brgyan pa'o// g.yon na thod pa dkar po ste// dri zhim me tog
17a6(rgyud): dag gis bkang // rgyal po chen po rol pa ltar// cung zhig zur gyis gzigs pa'o// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin stong // bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas te// pad+ma'i 'dab ma legs
17a7(rgyud): zhugs pa'i// rgyas pa'i sku ni legs bsams nas// hrI yi 'phro 'du las byung ba'i// gsong sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra/ bai ro tsa
17a8(rgyud): nA ya/ bU ha rA dzA ya/ te thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa mr-ikra bud d+hA ya/ nam sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ aR+sha b+h+yaHsamyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rI yai/ bo d+hi satwA ya
17b1(rgyud): mahA sa twA ya/ man+ta ka ru Ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ka te ni ka te/ ka ta ka te ka ro ta ka ri ta bIr+ye swAn+na/ oM karma a mo g+ha badz+ri sa ha nI dA hU phaT// dri'am byug pa dag la ni// btab la lus la
17b2(rgyud): byug par bya// me tog sngon po mgo la gzhag/ maN+Dal chu yis lus la byug/ nyi shu rtsa lnga bzlas pas ni// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas bzhi ka sgrub 'dod na// bkra shwi
17b3(rgyud): dus su rdzogs dus su// ri bo yid 'ong gnas ngag tu// sa bzhi chag chag legs btab ste// maN+Dal legs byas me tog ni// dri zhim dkar pos yongs gtor te// gtsang zhing dag pa'i rdzas rnams
17b4(rgyud): dgram gtsang ma bram zes byas te bzhag/ khrus dang ku sha 'i steng gnas te// hI las byung ba'i chu skyes steng / chu skyes mdog 'dra zhal gsum yang // 'dzum zhing zhi ba'i
17b5(rgyud): cha byad can// ljang ku bzhad pa zhal gsum pa// nag po khro/ sa pa dmar ser skya// ser po'i zhal nas 'dzum pa ste// dmar po bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu// ri dgas lpags pas
17b6(rgyud): stong g.yogs can// sna tshogs sham thabs bsnams pa ste// zhabs gnyis mnyam por bzhengs pa las// g.yas g.yon dang po thal mo sbyar// bar ma bgrang phreng pad+ma bsnams// tha ma mchog
17b7(rgyud): sprin spyi blugs 'dzin// bum pa rnam snang lha mo ni// la se ma ge giR+She ste// nin+ti nang gi lha mo'i bdag/ zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// hrIHyi yi ge las byung ba'i// gsang sngags rgyal po
17b8(rgyud): bozlas par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na ya// byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+tha te/ samyakle bud d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo// a d+ha b+h+yaHsamyaka?/ 
18a1(rgyud): du b+h+yo/ nam Ar+yA ba la ka tA shwa rA ya/ badz+ras twA la/ mahAs twA sa/ mag+na pra kA ya/ d+yar+tha/ oM d+hA d+hA ra/ d+harad+hA ra/ d+hu rAd+hA ru/ in+d+ra Te rbe/ sa la rba ye b+h+ya/ 
18a2(rgyud): tsa le pra tsa le ku su ma~M ku sum pa re/ i lo mi li tsi ti/ dz+wa la ma pa nA ya~M swA hA// bum pa'i tshul legs bsgrubs nas// lus la byugs na 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga gsang sngags grub pa'i/ 
18a3(rgyud): le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas thabs ni rim pa dang // gro ga ra sa sam shing shun la// ra yi 'o mas bris pa'o// tshom bu lnga yi 'khor lo la// dbus su
18a4(rgyud): sku yi sa bon te// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa ste// shar du de ya/ dang bri bar bya// bzhi pa'i lnga pas dbus su mtshan// lho da ru de ni yang dag dgod// lnga pa'i dang po bzhi pa'i gsum/ 
18a5(rgyud): nub tu de ni yang dag bgod// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la// e yi rnam par sbyar ba ste// byang du de ni yang dgang gong // da bus su thugs kyi sa bon te// shin+tiM ku ru mtshams su'o// 
18a6(rgyud): swA hA dbus su dgod par bya// de ltar 'khor lo gsal bkod nas// dngul la mo dkar po'i ga pur gzhug/ thams cad las kun zhi bar 'gyur// yung ba'i chu yis legs par bri/ puSh+Ta
18a7(rgyud): ku ru mtshams su'o// kham por ser por legs par gzhug/ rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// pa la sha yis legs par bris// ba shi ku ru mtshams su dgod// kham
18a8(rgyud): por dmar por legs par gzhug/ dbang gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// tsan+dan dkar po dri zhim zhing // nim pa'i chu yis legs par bris// mA ra ya ni mtshams su dgod// lcugra
18b1(rgyud): sa mthong bar yang dag gzhug/ phrin las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// tsan+dan dkar po dri zhim zhing // zhi bas de ni me la sreg/ 'bras bu dmar po bcas pa'i shing // rlas/ 
18b2(rgyud): pas de ni me la'o// dbang ni ba la sha yi shing // de la bsregs na khugs par 'gyur// nim pa'i shing la tshar bcad pa'i// bsregs pas phrin las 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo'i
18b3(rgyud): le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas las kyi rim pa ni// dur ba'i rtsa dang 'bras kyi 'dab// til dang yungs kar ci tse la// gsang sngags bzlas na grub pa ni/ 
18b4(rgyud): nga la'i shing la legs bsregs nas// thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// ku sha star ba shug 'brum dang / nga / stag pa'i me tog dmar po dang // gsang sngags bzlas par
18b5(rgyud): rab byas nas// tsan+dan shing la legs bsregs nas/ rgyas par bya ba'i las 'grub cing // nus pa'i mchog ni tha ba par 'gyur// bA la sha yi shing ngag dang / khre dang
18b6(rgyud): ci rtse mo sran la// gsang sngags bzlas pa rab byas te// pad+ma ka yi shing la bsregs// nus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur// thams cad dbang du 'dus par 'gyur// gro dang so ba 'bras dang
18b7(rgyud): ni/ bra bo mon sran til nag po// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas te// kha ti ra yi shing la sreg/ nus pa ldan te las rnams ni// myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// pra ha kha tsha'i
18b8(rgyud): shing dag la// lo ma 'bras bur bcas pa dang // rdo rje'i shing la sngags bzlas nas// mya ngan 'tshang gi shing la bsregs// nus pa thob nas myur du ni// mi rnams thams cad dbang / 
19a1(rgyud): / du sdud// ldong ros pad+ma'i rtsab la// mu la ba tra'i shing dag la// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas// a ru ra'i shing la bsregs// 'khor lo'i 'og tu bcug pa'i sa/ 
19a2(rgyud): rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur// pa la sha yi shing dag la// ka ra bir 'bras ngag la// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas// 'dzam bu'i shing la rab bsregs nas// ral gri 'og
19a3(rgyud): tu bcug nas ni// yul dbang yang ni dbang du 'gyur// tshe rabs brgya ru lon pa'i rus// mtshon gyis bsnun pa'i rus pa dag/ gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas// skyer ba'i me la rab
19a4(rgyud): bsregs te// lcags kyu'i 'og tu rab bcug na// glang dbo dbang du 'gyur bar byed// ba le ti dang ta le sha/ kha ti ra dang d+ha ti ma// dur khrod shing la rab bsregs na
19a5(rgyud): stag la sogs pa dbang du 'du// nas dang 'bras dang so ba dang // sman dang rin chen sna tshogs dang // maN+Dal zla ma po legs byas te// rgyan rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs
19a6(rgyud): rgyas ni pad+ma chu shel las skyes pa'i// chu shel mdog dang 'dzum dang bcas// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas bzhugs// ku sha'i stan la shar du 'dug/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcas pa yis/ 
19a7(rgyud): byams pa'i sems kyis dbul bar bya'o// nad dang rims dang 'brum bu dang // shu ba g.yon pa me dpal dang // nad dang gdon dang thams cad bzlog/ mtshams med lnga dang mi dge lnga// 'bras
19a8(rgyud): bu sdug bsngal thams cad bzlog/ me'i las kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa la// maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la// tsan+dan dkar bag
19b1(rgyud): dris bsgos te// mchod yon me tog bkang ba dang // ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa yis// rgyal po lta bu'i gzugs la mchod// sdig pa thams cad de mdun du// bshags nas myur du skyabs su/ 
19b2(rgyud): 'gro grog dag gam shing shun la// rgyal po dag gi gzugs byas te// yig 'bru lnga yis btab pa yis// mtshon sna lnga yis rab tu bcing // byams pa'i sems kyi chu bo la
19b3(rgyud): bkur na rgyal po'i tshad las thar// oM hUM traM hri a sho na ha ri ma ka to// sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA// gcan zan 'jigs pa 'ong ba'i tshe// maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la// me tog
19b4(rgyud): dkar pos rab tu gtor// mchod pa lnga yis rgyal po mchod// sdig bshags myur du skyabs su 'gro// 'brusna lnga dadang rin chen lnga// tshon sna lnga yi phur ma la// byas pa lus
19b5(rgyud): la btags pa la// gcan zan su 'jigs thams cad la// myur ba nyid du grol bar 'gyur// chom rkun dag gis 'jigs pa la// rdo rje sngon po rdo rje can// mthing nags gnon
19b6(rgyud): phyag rgya can// mchod nas bdag nyid skyabs su 'gro/ ak+Sho b+h+yaHta ka ka ra Na ga ra kha ti ba// swa d+hi tsikra ta ya// ri ka tse tsa ta tin du dan+ta sa ra sa ra ka ra swA hA// sbrul gyi gdugs pas 'jigs
19b7(rgyud): pa la/ bal po se'u'i lcug ma la// bram ze'i gzugs kyi rgyan bsgoms nas// rin chen 'byung ldan bkur bsgoms te// spyi bor mu tig byi ru dang // me shel pad+ma ra ka dang // in+d+ra nI la
19b8(rgyud): dung g.yas 'khyil// gser dang dngul dang dur ba dang // rin chen rgyan dang 'bru snar bcas// ku sha gla rtsi tsan+dan dang // bal lu sbyor ba ut+pal// gur gum dri zhim lus byugs la// oM rat+na sa b+ha/ 
20a1(rgyud): laHsa ti bi sha sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA// lce 'bab pa yi 'jigs pa la// stag dang 'brug gi rus pa la// mkhar ba'i phye ma lcags phye dang // zangs phyer gan bye
20a2(rgyud): ma dang // gser gyi phye ma gro ba rab tum// snang ba mtha' yas bskur bsgoms te// byams pas phyogs mtshams kun tu bstan// dug rnams sna tshogs dud pas gdugs// oM a mr-i ta badz+raH
20a3(rgyud): la badz+ra dz+wa la/ gardza gardza/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra swA hA// me yi 'jigs pa dag la ni// 'brug rus sen da wa sha dang // til dang sa lu tsi tse dang // nas dang gro dang rgun 'brum gyi khang phrom
20a4(rgyud): dag la sngags btab ste// me yi phyogs su gtor ba bya// oM bai ro tsa na pra b+hA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra da swA hA// rna ba snang mdzad skur bsgoms la// me la gtor nas
20a5(rgyud): yis gsod// chu bo dag gi 'jigs pa la// mdze can pho mo'i thod pa yi// ra dang khyi dang phag gi khrag/ sa bdag sde brgyad gzugs dang bcas// nang du bcug ste chu bor dor// 
20a6(rgyud): don yod grub pa'i sku ru gsal// oM a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ oM ka bai tA ra Ni sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swAh+na// phyag stong sman yang de bzhin te// thugs rje chen po'i kha dog ni// so sor gsal zhing bsgoms
20a7(rgyud): par bya// byams pa kun la rab tu blta// 'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa kun srung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / sku gdung me tog dkar pos mchod// sa
20a8(rgyud): gzhi dri yis chag chag btab// snying po gzungs dang bcas pa'am// khru gang tshad kyi mchod rten la// legs par bstod cing mchod par bgyi// stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i// thugs
20b1(rgyud): rje'i gzugs kyi rten du shar// rdzu 'phrul tshad med pazhi dang ldan// byang chub phyogs ni yongs su rdzogs// dri med dung 'dra dkar po ste// rgyal chen bzhi yang de bzhin no// byang chub chen po'i mchod
20b2(rgyud): rten no// khri 'phang bcu gsum tog dang ldan// lha yi rol mo char du 'bab// chos sgra rgyun mi 'chad pa'i gter// rin chen lnga yi bdag nyid de// phur bus gdab cing yongs su bzung // 
20b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs che// de yi bsod nams rab bstan pa// mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu// nyon mongs dbang gyur sdig pa rnams// skad cig tsam gyis dag par 'gyur// 
20b4(rgyud): shin tu gtsang ba'i gnas dag ni// byams ldan snying rje can gyis byas// bram ze'i rigs las byung ba yi// 'dri mkhan snying rje can gyis byas// rang bsam rnam par dag pa
20b5(rgyud): yis/ mdun du bdar te mchod par bya// chad dang kha dog yongs dag gsal// yid du 'ong ba dag la'o// zas dang yid du 'ong ba yi// dkar gsum spags pa spangs/ 
20b6(rgyud): pa yi/ sha dang sgog pa la phug dang // zan dang chang ni shin tu spangs// shel phreng pad+ma'i snying po dang // bo d+hi tsi dang mu tig shis// g.yal dang sbrid pa mi tshigs rnams// nam yang chod par
20b7(rgyud): mi bya'o// yo byad dam tshig snyan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / las rnams sna tshogs sgrub byed pa/ po ti'am lugs ma ras ris la// brten nas bdag ni
20b8(rgyud): byams sems ldan// mu las 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni// dmar ser ut+pal po ti 'dzin// mnyam pa skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs// bum pa kha dog ser po ni// rin chen lnga dang
21a1(rgyud): 'bru snar bcas// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ra d+hu ru/ iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me/ man da re/ i li mi li/ 
21a2(rgyud): la ma pa na ya swA hA// lan bdun yongs su bzlas byas na// gti mug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur// ras ris mchod rten la rten nas// maN+Dal dri zhim me tog/ 
21a3(rgyud): dmar/ kar ra mngar gsum dag dang ni// 'bras dang til dkar yung dkar dang // pad+ma'i rtsab dkar po la// ril bu rgya shugs 'brum bu tsam// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ni// hrIHlas/ 
21a4(rgyud): byung ba'i sku mdog dkar// phyag na pad+ma mchog sbyin mdzad// sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs/ ga tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ 
21a5(rgyud): pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me man da re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swAhA// ril bu dag la sngags btab ste/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ 
21a6(rgyud): bza'// srid pa'i 'dod chags zhi gyur nas// rab tu bde ba thob par 'gyur// maN+Dal sngon po legs byas nas// ut+pal sngon po nim pa dang // a ka ru dang tsan+dan dang // dri yis
21a7(rgyud): chu yis bum pa dgang // phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can// sku mdog ljang sngon cung zhig khro// rdo rje dril bu phyag na bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra
21a8(rgyud): d+hi r-i d+ha ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ in+d+ra baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa la~M pra tsa le/ ku su ma~M ku su me mnang re/ i la~M mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA// hUM bskyed phyag na rdo rje ni// bum pa'i chu yis khrus byas/ 
21b1(rgyud): nas// zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// bzod pa chen po thob par 'gyur// dug rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i le'u ste brgyang ba'o// ras sam grog shing shun la/ 
21b2(rgyud): 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+ha ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes bya'o// bsrung ba lus la gdags byas nas// nad dang gdon dang rims dang ni// 'jigs
21b3(rgyud): ba'i nad dang gdon las thar// bde ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// skud bdag ni dkar po la// mdud pa dag ni rab byas te// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya rtsa brgyad ni legs
21b4(rgyud): bzlas nas// bsrung ba'i dam pa 'di byas na// srung ba/ yi ni dam pa 'dis// srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ba'o// mu tig rin chen byi ru gser// ga bur gur gum gla rtsi dang
21b5(rgyud): a ga ru dang du ru ska// phur ma snying dkar gdags par bya// tsan+dan gla rtsi gur gum dang // gu gul nag po bsregs pa'i phye// ba yi 'o mas 'degu bya// gnas gsum
21b6(rgyud): dag tu byugs pas ni// gdon dang nad kyis 'jigs kun las// byugs pas de ni srung bar 'gyur// srung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / ser ba yongasu
21b7(rgyud): srung ba ni// seng ldeng lhang ti'i phur bu la// gzungs sngags bzlas pa dbus su ni// hU~M las byung ba'i sku bskyed do// phyogs bzhir khro bo chen po ni// shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal ni
21b8(rgyud): sku mdog dkar po me dpung 'bar// rdo rje 'khor lo sngog mdzub mdzad// oM pradz+nyAn+d+ha kr-i ta ha na ha na hUM phaT/ lho ru gshin rje gshed bon// dmar po lag na ba tson 'dzin// oM ya man+ta kr-ita
22a1(rgyud): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ts+tsha phaT/ nub tu rta mgrin dmar po ni// me dpung rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin// oM ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ byang du khro gnyer can sku ni// ljang sngon ral gri 'dzin pa ste/ 
22a2(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha ka b+haM ku ti ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT// phyogs bzhir phur bu dag la ni// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// gcan zan dri ma yungs kar bsres// gsang sngags bzlas shing mkha' la
22a3(rgyud): gtor oM badz+ra kro d+hi hu lu hu lu// tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na hUM phaT// ser bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
22a4(rgyud): kyis 'od zer rab tu bkye ste// phyag stong dang spyan stong la 'od zer 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ dkar po dang / dmar po dang / nag po dang / ljang ku dang / ser po dang / 'od zer de dag
22a5(rgyud): gis 'gro ba rigs drug po de dag thams cad la khyab ste/ dbugs dbyung ba mdzad do// de nas rgyal chen bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang
22a6(rgyud): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od chen dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od
22a7(rgyud): gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom
22a8(rgyud): snang ba dang / 'og min la sogs pa'i lha de dag gis/ mchod pa'i sprin gyis char pab nas// lho'i bus tshigs su bcang bas bstod pa// spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i sku// phyag stong / 
22b1(rgyud): nyon mongs grol ba'i phyag/ spyan stong shes rab 'od gsal ste// 'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sku de mi snang bar gyur nas
22b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub por gyur to// de nas lha'i bus gsol pa// 'di la phan yon ci zhes zhus pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang zhig rgyud 'di yid byed na// nad
22b3(rgyud): dang rims dang gdon dang ni// rgyal po gcan zan 'jigs pa dang // 'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // mtshams me sdig pa mi ga kun// rab
22b4(rgyud): tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur// dmyal ba ngan song sdug bsngal/ dang // mi khom brgyad las rnam grol te// nyan dang / 'chang dang sgom par 'gyur// dri med nam mkha'i dkyil lta/ 
22b5(rgyud): bur// bcom ldan 'das kyang mthong bar 'gyur// zhe sa bka' stsal nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las
22b6(rgyud): langs te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas// legs leg so zhes bya ba gsungs nas/ stan la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag lnga stong dang / lha dang
22b7(rgyud): mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// / 
22b8(rgyud): paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang / lots+tsha ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @6// rgya gar skad du/ lo ke shwa ra kalpa/ bod skad du/ 'jig
23a1(rgyud): rten dbang phyug gis rtog pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// 
23a2(rgyud): dge 'dun la phyag 'tsha lo// 'jig rten mgon po'i rtog pa ni// mdor bsdus 'dir ni brjod bya ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rgyun chen po// 'dod pa'i don kun rab ster ba// dang por re shig rig pa 'dzin
23a3(rgyud): pas gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su// hUM gis dag par byas par nye bar 'dug cing pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings la// oM shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kau haM zhes brjod la// thams cad stong pa'i
23a4(rgyud): rnam par bsam par bya'o// de'i rjes la oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+hA dka ro mi/ de lta dar brjod la/ sna tshogs pad+ma mngab ma brgyad par bsgoms nas/ 
23a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o// zla ba'i steng du hrI/ yi sngags gyur pa las bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu bsgom par bya ste/ sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung
23a6(rgyud): gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis pa mdog dmar ba mtshan du ni gos dkar mo de la 'khyud pa/ pad+ma dmar po kha 'byed cing gar gyi tshul can khab kyi phyag rgyas kha 'byed par bsgoms la 'di brjod par bya
23a7(rgyud): ste/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di// 'dod chags skyon gyis mi gos shing // de bzhin sna tshogs bag chags skyon// khams gsum rnam par dag pa'o// dbu rgyan la 'od dpag tu med par bsgom
23a8(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas 'di brjod par bya ste// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya bkri ta badz+ra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko ha/ de ltar bsgoms nas phyogs brgyad du lha mo bas mo// oM bi lo ki ni/ a ba lo ki ni
23b1(rgyud): a ba lo ka ya swA hA// shar gyi mdab ma la ni rnam par 'jigs ma zhes bya ba'i lha mo pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa'o// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA// lho'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol/ 
23b2(rgyud): ma pa la sha'i 'dab ma lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM b+hu ri Ni ma hA tsakra brti ni hUM/ nub kyi mdab ma la b+hu ri Ni zhes bya ba'i lha mo ut+pa la sngon po lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM b+h+r-i ku TI
23b3(rgyud): tA re tu ta ma tA hUM// byang gi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can zhes bya ba'i lha mo pad+ma ser mo bsnams pa'o// oM ma hA shri ye ma Ni pad+me hUM/ 'di ni pad+ma'i gos can shar phyogs kyi mtshams su btsong lta
23b4(rgyud): bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM badz+ra pad+me shwa ra ma pad+me hUM/ lho phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o// oM bi shwa pad+me hUM/ 'di ni sna tshogs kyi pad+ma ste/ nub phyogs kyi
23b5(rgyud): mtshams su pad+ma nag po bsnams pa'o// oM bi shra bak+She hUM// 'di ni sna tshogs kyi zhal can te/ byang phyogs kyi mtsham su sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM pad+ma nin+ta shwa ra hUM
23b6(rgyud): ze 'bru'i dbus su 'dod chags chen po'i bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// de ltar gang sgom pa dang ldan zhing ting nge 'dzin la goms par byed na dngos grub bstan por 'gyur ro// 
23b7(rgyud): de yis sangs rgyas nyid dang 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad stor ro// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub cing // gzungs dang sa yang de bzhin no// 'jig rten kun gyi bde ston cing // so so rang nyid rjes su
23b8(rgyud): sgrub/ sangs rgyas nyid ni byang sems nyid// rang rgyal nyid kyang de bzhin no// yid 'ong sangs rgyas go 'angang ni// spyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dang ga
24a1(rgyud): bur bcas// tsan+dan dmar dang rab sbyar te// rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas kun gyi bcud len yin// sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni// bcud kyis len na
24a2(rgyud): bde ba yang // 'grub 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po yis// gzhon zhing nad med dam bde zhing // tshe dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // skal bzang ye shes bla na med// skye ba 'di la 'grub
24a3(rgyud): pa'o/ ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang // bsad dang bskrad pa la sogs pa// rengs dang phur bus gdab nyid dang // na mkha' 'gro ba de bzhin ni// 
24a4(rgyud): sa bcu'i dbang phyug thob 'gyur zhing // ting nge 'dzin la gan nges par 'gyur// de phyir ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// rdo derje dam tshig de yis ni// rig pa dang ni bcas pa'i mchog/ 
24a5(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon por 'grub par 'gyur// oM hriHpad+ma/ nin+te shwa ra hUM/ rtsa bo'i sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzla sa na nyin mo dang nub mo byas pa'i sdig pa nyams par 'gyur ro// 
24a6(rgyud): yang na lnga brgya bzlas brjod byas na nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// yang na stong bzlas brjod byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro// yang na stong phrag gnyis bzlas
24a7(rgyud): brjod byas na thams cad kyis mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong phrag gsum bzlas brjod byas na skal pa bzang ba dang // g.yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
24a8(rgyud): stong phrag bzhi bzlas brjod byas na dbul ba med par 'gyur ro// yang na stong phrag lnga bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad kyi snying 'khrug par byed do// stong phrag drug bzlas brjod byas na dgra
24b1(rgyud): thams cad med par 'gyur ro// stong phrag bdun bzlas brjod byas na bdud bzhi las mchog tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// stong phrag brgyad bzlas brjod byas na rig 'dzin ma grub par 'gyur ro// sto
24b2(rgyud): phrag dgu bzlas brjod byas na sbyin mo grub par 'gyur ro// khri cho gcig bzlas brjod byas na lha dang klu dang mi'i bu mo rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phrag nyi shu bzlas brjod byas na bar
24b3(rgyud): snang la 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor mi rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phra ga sum cu bzlas brjod byas na bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stong phrag bzhi bcu bzlas
24b4(rgyud): brjod byas na mkha' la spyod pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyu ro// / stong phrag lnga bcu bzlas brjod byas na ral gri'i rig pa/ 'dzin par 'gyuraro// stong phrag drug cu bzlas brjod byas
24b5(rgyud): na grub pa'i rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// stong phrag bdun cu bzlas nas gsum gyi bdag por 'gyuraro// stong phrag brgyad du bzlas na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// 
24b6(rgyud): 'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bcu bzlas brjod byas na rang dga'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// bzhi cha dang bcas pa'i 'bum
24b7(rgyud): phrag bzlas brjod byas na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro// bye ba phrag cig bzlas brjod byas na thams cad du rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i nus pa can spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta bu 'grub pa
24b8(rgyud): 'gyur zhing lus dang ngag dang yid kyang byin gyis rlob bo// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das gsung rdo rjes gsungs pa'o// oM pat+tA ri ba si ni bi rang hUM/ 'di ni gos dkar me'i sngags te
25a1(rgyud): lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa'i rigs kyi tshogs sreg par byed do// nub bdun gyi nang rol tu rgyal po blon po dang bcas pa mdun na 'don dang / skye 'gro'i tshogs/ 
25a2(rgyud): dang / btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyu ro// bzlas pa tsam gyis phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi bskul ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de lta bu'i rim pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas
25a3(rgyud): na gang yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nus pa mnyam zhing // dngosu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur ro// oM bi lo ki ni a ba lo kA ya swA hA/ 
25a4(rgyud): 'di'i sbyor ba ni stong phrag bcu bzlas brjod byas na me long dang // 'theb chen dang / na mkho' la sogs pa la gsol po bra dbab pa 'grub par 'gyuraro// gang sngon byung ba dang yang da
25a5(rgyud): ltar dang phyis 'ong ba de ston par byed do// yang na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par sngags par byas la/ nub mo nyal ba'i dus su song+ga 'chos nas mi smra bar nyal na
25a6(rgyud): dgos pa gang yin pa rmi lam du ston par byed do// de yang 'khrul pa med par ston no// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA// bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma 'di 'bum phrag gcig bzlas ni 'jig rten
25a7(rgyud): grub par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu mo dang / klu'i bu mo dang / mi'am ci'i bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / mi'i bu mo ste/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas gang 'dod pa de'i chos 'byung du gur gum dang
25a8(rgyud): rgya skyegs dang / rang byung gi me tog dang / byang chub kyi sems dang yang dag par ldan pas rtsibs drug pa shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo dmar po 'khor bzhin pa rnam par bris pa bsam la/ chos
25b1(rgyud): 'brung de sgrub pa pos ri sul chu ngogs gsang ba'i gnasu bsams par bya'o// de yang myong shing sgrub pa po'i steng du ltung ba'i rnam pa bsgom par bya'o// de bkug la rang la chu shing nor dang bcas pa
25b2(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur bar blta'o zhes bya'o// yang na lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / blon po dang skyes bu
25b3(rgyud): 'am gang 'dod pa de dmar por rnam par bsams la/ de'i snying dkar rdo rje lcags kyu 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug pa'i lcags kyus 'bigos bzhin pa dang / zhigs pas rked pa nas btsongs la
25b4(rgyud): 'gugs bzhin pa 'dod pas mos par gyur pas rab tu gsal mang por bsam par bya'o// bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa 'gu gus shing dbang du 'gyur ro zhes bya'o// oM b+hu ri Ni ma hA tsakra
25b5(rgyud): bir+d+ha ni hUM/ 'di'i sbyor ba ni dri chen dang / rdo rje chu la so// gas pas dkyil 'khor byas la ji ltar rnyed pa'i me/ tog gis mnyam par mchod la/ de na gnas pa'i sgrub
25b6(rgyud): ba pos gling ngam gling gzhan dang / grong khyer dang / grong dang / yul 'khor gyi rgyal por bsam zhing bzlas pa bya'o// de yis bdag po nyid du 'gyur zhing long spyod pa la longs spyad
25b7(rgyud): nas bde ba can gyis 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba thob par 'gyur ro// oM b+h+r-i ku TI tA re tu ta ma ta hUM/ lha mo khro gnyer can zhes bya ba 'di ni dgra'i rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs la/ dug dang
25b8(rgyud): tsha dang / ske tshe dang / khrag dang / chu bo'i 'gram gnyis kyi sa dang / dri chen rdo rje chus bsnos la gzugs brnyan byas la mi'i rus pa'i rang bzhin gyis phur bus tshogs dang gnang kun la btab la
26a1(rgyud): zong pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag ste/ dur khrod kyi me la gdung bar bya'o// zhag bdun du sbyor ba byas pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gal te sems la sdig pa med par gyur na nag nyi shuH
26a2(rgyud): gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyang 'chi bor 'gyur ro// oM ma hA shri ye ma Ni pad+me hUM/ lha mo 'di la dri dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / bsod snyoms kyis zas kyis so sor mchod la bzlas pa byas
26a3(rgyud): na thams cad du bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yul chos kyi rtsod pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mnyam par 'gyur ro// nor chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro// yang na
26a4(rgyud): pad+ma stong phrag bcu spyan sreg byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra pad+me shA ri ma ra pad+me ts+tsha/ rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma 'di yid kyis bzlas na dbang dgug pa la sogs pa byed do// 
26a5(rgyud): lan bdun mngon par bsngags te/ gtsung bud mdud na rang / srung zhing rims dang / lkog nang dang / nad thams cad/ dang / mtshon dang / mi dang / rkun po dang / seng ge dang / 
26a6(rgyud): glang po che dang / sbrul dang / 'ching ba dang / rgya mtsho dang / sha za'i nang stong phrag gcig bzlas pas zhi bar 'gyu ro// lan gcog gis las kyis brjed byed kyi gdon dang / zad byed dang / skyug
26a7(rgyud): ba dang / bri bar dka' ba dang / sgom par dka' ba'i gdug pa can gyi sems can thams cad nyams par byed do// 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na lus 'phel zhing skal pa bzang ba dang / lus gzhon zhong
26a8(rgyud): nad med par byed cing dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba nyams par byed do// yang na klu thab khung du bris la der dug dang / ske tshe dang tsha ba'i sbyin bsreg bya zhing / klu'i ming dang spel bas 'bum phrag gcig sbyin
26b1(rgyud): bsreg byas na char chen po bab nas mu ge med par 'gyur ro// oM bi shra pad+me hrI/ sna tshogs pad+ma 'di ni rmongs pa dang / rengs pa dang / mnan pa dang / pur bus gdab pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / 
26b2(rgyud): phur bu dang / mig 'phrul dang / ngo mtshar dang / mi mthong bar byed pa dang / phug du 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / lcags sgrog gcod pa dang / ril por dgug pa gang dang gang yin
26b3(rgyud): brgyud las bstan pa dang / rgyud gzhan dang yang dag par ldan pa'i las thams cad byed do// lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi dngos grub ste ro// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
26b4(rgyud): dbang phyug 'grub cing gang 'dod pa'i las thams cad ni 'grub pa ngar 'gyur ro zhes bya'o// oM bi shwa pad+me hUM/ sna tshog sa rdo rje zhes brjod pa'i lha mo 'dis ni ngag gi dngos grub ster
26b5(rgyud): tshig shad mkhan du byed cing gzhan gyi ngag rengs par byed do// rang nyid srung ba dang / gzhan yang srung bar 'gyur ro// / rang skal ba bzang zhing gzhon po yang skal ba bzang po'i rang
26b6(rgyud): don dang gzhan don byed do// ji ltar 'dir ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can gyi don la spro zhing brtson pa de bzhin du/ 'dir bcom ldan 'das dmyal ba dang / yi dgas
26b7(rgyud): dang byol song gi skye gnasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar byed do// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnams la ma nyid kyis srung ngo zhes thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
26b8(rgyud): pas gsungaso// de ltar rtog pa'i rgyal po bsdus pa rab tu bstan to// sems brtan rtog pa med pa yi// blo dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig spyod lam bstan pa yi// 
27a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun tu ji lta bar// de ltar 'dir ni rab sbyar nas// de nas rtag pa'i go 'phang 'grub// ji ltar 'dod par gnas byed cing / kun la long sto kun byed gyur jim/ 
27a2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i snying rjes spyod/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyo ba yis// 'dug pa'am ni las kyang rungs// 'chag pa'am ni gang dang de// rgod pa'am ni brjod pa'am/ gang de ji ltar don bzhin no// dkyil 'gro/ 
27a3(rgyud): du ni ma zhugs pa'am// sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa yang // rang mos lha yi rnal 'byor bdag/ bsod nams chung ba'am 'grub par 'gyur// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// thams
27a4(rgyud): cad mkhrapa nyid dang ni// thams cad rdo rje 'chang nyid kyang // skye rab 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// yang gsungs pa/ rnal rang 'byor dag ni gzugs brnyan gyi// bcos ma'i sku las 'gyur
27a5(rgyud): ba min/ byang chub sems chen la brtson na// rnal 'byor ngag ni de lta yin// khrag chen po dang ga pur bcas// / tsan+dan dmar dang bsres pa ni// tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa na
27a6(rgyud): kun las mchog gyur bcud le no// sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni// bcud kyi len ni sla ba ru// dpal rjes dpa'i tshe bzang dngong // nad med bde ba bzang po 'thob// grub pa'i mtshan nyid ji
27a7(rgyud): ltar gsungs// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin pa dang // gzungs dang sa dang de bzhin 'grub// bde ston thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // rang nyid so so rjesu 'grub// sang+yas tha~Md mnyam sbyor bas// sang+yas/ 
27a8(rgyud): thams cad nyi du gyur/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos nyid kyang // sangs rgyas kun ni rab grub 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa byed par 'dod cing sems yongs su dag pa med na de'i tshe
27b1(rgyud): zang sku'i sgrub pa pashad de/ bsnyen gnas dang ldan zhing bskyung bar gnas pa'i lnga bzos// tshon snam dris par ras gsar ba de yang rang rang gi kun tu khru ro'i tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa
27b2(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/ sna tshogs kyis pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/ ze 'dra'i dkyil du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu bcom ldan 'das mdog dmar ba mi bskyod pa'i
27b3(rgyud): dbu brgyan can/ zhal gsum pa/ zhal gyi gtso bo ni dmar ba ste/ 'dod chags chen po nyid kyi phyir ro// g.yas pa gnag pa ste zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi phyiraro// g.yon pa dkar ba ste
27b4(rgyud): gti mug nyid kyi phyiraro// phyag drug pa bya'o// g.yon pa'i phyag gcig gis gos dkar mo'i mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa dang pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa dang / g.yon pa gnyis
27b5(rgyud): kyis me tog gi gzhu bsnams pa'o// g.yas pa gsum du khab kyi phyag rgyas pad+ma kha 'byed pa dang / me tog/ gi mnga' dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// sems dpa'i
27b6(rgyud): skyil mo krung gis gnas par bya'o// shar gyi 'dab ma lo rnam par gzigs ma mdog dkar mo// pad+ma dmar po dang rdo rje phyag na bsnams pa'o// lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la lha mo sgrol ma
27b7(rgyud): ljang ku rgya skegs kyi shing gi lo ma dang / rin po che phyag na bsnams pa'o// nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la lhu ri ni ser mo ut+pal sngon po dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi
27b8(rgyud): mdab ma la khro gnyer can pad+ma dkar ser lta bu pad+ma ser po dang ral gri phyag na bsnams pa'o// shar gyi mtshams su pad+ma'i gos can ma gser lta bu'i mdog bcong lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// 
28a1(rgyud): lho phyogs kyi mtsham su rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma nam kha'i mdog can dkar po pad+ma dang shel gyi phreng ba bsnams pa'o// nub phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs kyi pad+ma ston ka'i
28a2(rgyud): zla ba lta bu dkar ser gyi mdog pad+ma nag po dang po ti phyag na bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi mtsham su sna tshogs rdo rje ma sna tshogs kyi mdog can du byas la/ sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang / sna tshogs kyi
28a3(rgyud): pad+ma bsnams pa'o// de ltar pad+ma la bkod cing bris la/ sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni mtshams su'o// dzaHhUM baM hoH'i yi ge las yang dag par byung ba'i lcags kyu dang
28a4(rgyud): zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu rnams ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su'o// / yang thang sku gzhan brjod par bya ste/ ston ka'i zla
28a5(rgyud): ba lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan 'das g.yas na sku da pa dang / dbyug pa dang / rtse gsum dang / mchog sbyin pa'i phyag can/ g.yon na pad+ma dang ril ba sI
28a6(rgyud): blugs dang / zhags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i dam tshig gi po ti bsnams pa'i phyag can/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs 'chang ba/ sbrul mchod phyir thogs pa/ ral po'i/ 
28a7(rgyud): cod pan la 'od dpag med bzhengs pa'am/ skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa dbu rgyan du byas pa'o// de yi g.yas phyogs kyi cha ru sgrub pa bo// mchod yon gyi snod dang bdug spos kyi
28a8(rgyud): snod lag pas bzung bar bya'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das phyag gnyis pa/ ri gro 'dzin la gnas shing seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ g.yon pas la gnas shing zhabs g.yas pa
28b1(rgyud): pad+ma'i steng gi gdan stengs su bzhugs pa'o// phyag re ren phreng ba bsnams par sems pa pos phreng ba'i 'og tu 'dren pa'i tshul 'dis bsam par bya ba ni sems pa lta bur gnas pa zhes bya'o// chog
28b2(rgyud): gzhin yang bcom ldan 'das do// ra shing dam ba phyag bcu ba ri dgas seng ge'i gdan la pad+ma'i steng du stsa la krung byed pas bzhugs pa/ g.yas na phreng ba bstams pa'o// seng ge
28b3(rgyud): glang po che dang / me deng / sbrul gyis 'jigs pa rnams las grol ba'i cha byang can no// g.yon ni pad+ma pa bo sdong bu gnyis pa steng du bo ta tsanarkun ma dang / lcags sgrog gis
28b4(rgyud): bcings pa dang / mchong nga thog chen po dang / dpas pa po rnams sgrol ba'i mabyung na ni// gnas de rgyud du sgrub ba po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan / 
28b5(rgyud): lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa sngon bzhin du langs pa 'am/ 'dug par bsam par bya'o// gzhan yang chog ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das sna
28b6(rgyud): tshogs kyi gzugs 'chang ba dbu bcu gsum pa spyi bo'i mgo bo ni ljang ku'i rta zhalo// yang na zhi ba sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zha'o// phyag brgya pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sna tshogs kyi mtshon cha
28b7(rgyud): bsnams pa'o// yang na zhal brgya pa phyag stong pa yang bya'o// kha cig tu rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas pa'am/ bzhengs pa yang bya'o// tsam pa lte bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan 'das so// 
28b8(rgyud): thang sku de kun gyi g.yas phyogs kyi bar du sgrub pa po me tog dang / mchod yon gyi snod dang bdug spos kyi snod lag pa na bzung bar bya'o// de rnams kyi dbul dbu rgyan 'od dpag med pa'am/ 
29a1(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten bri bar bya'o// 'di ni thang sku'i choga'o// zang sku'i mdun du rtsapa'i sngags ji lta ba 'dod pade bang+gA shing bsam gtan yang byas nas
29a2(rgyud): mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la// mchod yon snod dang / yongs su gang ba'i bdud rtsi lta bu'i zas dang / sgron mi'i zas la byas nas/ mchod yon byin te/ sngags gang 'dod pa de bzlas pa
29a3(rgyud): byas na de la gsungs pa'i dngos grub du 'gyuraro// gsang ba po ni sngags 'di nyid// kha cig la yang mi sbyin no// blo ldan sems can don brtson pa'i// sems brtan pa la sbyin par bya// mchod/ 
29a4(rgyud): rten las byed nyid la ni// blo ldan 'bad pas sbyin par bya// rang nyid dang ni nor dag gis// bla ma la rtag gus pa bya// rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor la// mchog tu gyur pa'i
29a5(rgyud): yon yang dbul// gang dang gang na btang dka' bo// mchon/ tu gyur pa 'dir ni sngags// chung ma sring mo dang yang ni/ bu mo dang ni cha mo dag/ bu mo rgyan kun brgyan par bya'o// glang
