29a6(rgyud): chen rta dang shing rta dang // phyugs dang grong khyer rgyal srid dang // yul 'khor rgyal srid ldan pa dang // rin chen sna tshogs dag kyang ni// gzhan yang rdo rje slob dpon dbul// rdo rje slob dpon
29a7(rgyud): dgyes gyur pa// thams cad rab sbyin dbul bar bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rngam+b+ha la dang / bod kyi lo d+hu ba dge slong
29a8(rgyud): ris bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/ !// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa man+ta b+ha dran ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs
29b1(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ril/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge/ 
29b2(rgyud): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing / 
29b3(rgyud): mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas
29b4(rgyud): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la da'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni
29b5(rgyud): bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bla ma'i 'od las blang sa pa kun tu bzang po'i gzungs yang dag par ston par/ 'tshal te/ gzungs de thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i
29b6(rgyud): theg pa pa rnams phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang sel to// longs spyod chen po phun
29b7(rgyud): sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 'dzin to// lus rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo// ngag rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo// sems rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo// pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho
29b8(rgyud): thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// gzungs rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mnyes par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
30a1(rgyud): gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob// rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob/ 
30a2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob// mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob
30a3(rgyud): sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob// phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob ste// bcom ldan 'das de la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i
30a4(rgyud): klugling gi bye ma snyed bdag la mngon sum du gyur to// bcom lda dan 'das des na bdag da ltar dran pa 'di lta bu dang ldan blo gros 'di lta bu dang ldan/ chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye
30a5(rgyud): shes 'di lta bu dang ldan zhing mthong ba dang thos pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i don mchis par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag thos pa don mchis/ gzungs 'di
30a6(rgyud): thos pa'i don mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad cing 'khor bzhi po de yang yongs su dgong du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dag pa de'i
30a7(rgyud): dus la bab par shes na smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor bzhi po 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
30a8(rgyud): dbang phyug gis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gzungs 'di smra so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub
30b1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ khag me khag me/ k+Shu/ kha be/ shro tra ba be/ g+hun
30b2(rgyud): kha be dzi hA kha be/ ga la ya kha be/ ma na kha bai sa ra kha be so ra kha be sa ra kha be/ shUn tra kha be/ a na mi tra kha bai/ a pra Ni hi ta kha be/ sa mAM d+hi kha be/ pA ra mi ta kha be/ bo d+hi kha
30b3(rgyud): sa ra sa ra sa ra/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ti/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/ d+harma a d+hiShI te/ ka la ka la ka la/ saM g+hA a d+hiSh+NI te/ na mo dA na ba tI nAM/ bud d+ha ko TI NAM/ a d+hiSh+ThA na du man/ tsa ta sra par sha do/ 
30b4(rgyud): A yur ba la tsa ngan du/ tad+ya thA/ su ra b+hi su ra b+hi/ ma dahA su ra b+hi/ mu ni mu ni/ mahA mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ mdahwe ma ti na na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa
30b5(rgyud): ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ sa mr-i dAn du nan/ sa man+ta b+ha dra d+ha ra NI swA hA// gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa
30b6(rgyud): gnyis po de dag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag ni gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to// gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di
30b7(rgyud): lags te/ nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro// phongs
30b8(rgyud): par gyur pa'i tshe lan bdun yid la bgyis na thar bar 'gyur ro// rims nang thams cad la rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// rlung gis zin na mar dang / 'bru me ral lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
31a1(rgyud): brjod bkris te bsku bar bgyi'o// son na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas te bca' bar bgyi'o// rna ba na na ras bal gyi sa bon 'bru mar dang lhan cig tu bskol ba/ 
31a2(rgyud): la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zangs kyi snod kyis rna bar blugs par bgyi'o// klang pan ba la 'bru ma ro// ljon pa la byab par bgyi'o// gdon gyis btab pa la// tshon srung sna lnga la/ 
31a3(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te mgul du gdag so// mkha 'gro ma'i gdon gyis btab na 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas te gshis thams cad du byugo/ nad thams cad la byab par bgyi'o// 'di ni sgrub
31a4(rgyud): pam mchis pa'i cho ga'o// dza ste sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzina'athob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / mi snang bar
31a5(rgyud): ba dang mig bsku ba dang / ldong ros la sogs pa sgrub par 'tshal/ na/ des sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang sku gzung gas kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor bgyis te bum pa gang ba brgya
31a6(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzhag la/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bros te/ me tog sna tshogs kyis chal bar bkang la/ tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dong / kun tu ru'i bdagu pas bdugs te/ mar me brgya
31a7(rgyud): brgyad bud cing mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ tshangs par spyod pa gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgos la gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis mtshams bcang bar bgyi'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya
31a8(rgyud): nam Ar+ya a ba lo ka te shwa rA ya/ bod+hi sa twA ya/ mahA sa tI la/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ti la~M ban+d+ha ma~M/ mi li binA mi/ tsal mo li banA mi/ sIm banA ma~M/ bdag gi mtshams les
31b1(rgyud): su yang 'da' bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te phyogs bcur mtshams bcad par bgyi'o// gang gis 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di dag kyang thog mar
31b2(rgyud): brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi l-i/ tsi le li/ e hi b+ha ga
31b3(rgyud): bAn Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya swA hA// 'di ni bdag gi snying po bshad pa ste/ nges bdag dgug par 'gyuraro// de'i 'og tu zla ba yar gyi ngos tshes brgyad nas bzungs te nya'i bar du lan
31b4(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi/ dus gsum du khrus bgyi/ dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyi'o// de nas tshes bco lnga la mchod pa
31b5(rgyud): chen po bgyis te bzlas brjod dpag tu ma mchis par bgyi'o// 'on tang nam gyi gung thun la 'phags pa spyan ras gzig sa dbang phyug gser gyi kha dog gi lus dang ldan pa// mtshan
31b6(rgyud): dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par rgyan pa/ lus las 'od zer bye ba stong 'byin cing mchi bar 'gyur ro// de la rog sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi zhing bstan par bgyis na/ mthong ma
31b7(rgyud): thag tu sa thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// lho phyogs su rin chen tog dang / nub
31b8(rgyud): phyogs su 'od dpag med dang / byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra mthong bar 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rag pa'i
32a1(rgyud): tshul gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa rnamasu skye bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom
32a2(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub
32a3(rgyud): sems dpa' de dag dang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi ngo / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
32a4(rgyud): 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stong ngo // / 'phags pa kun tu bzang ngopo zhes bya
32a5(rgyud): gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / da na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur
32a6(rgyud): cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya nI la kaN+Da nA ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ 
32a7(rgyud): 'phags pa nI la kaN+Tha zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
32a8(rgyud): dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tsha lo// btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshalo// 
32b1(rgyud): bdag nges par shes rab chen po'i mig thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// bdag nges par sems can thams cad yongs su skyob
32b2(rgyud): bar gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs
32b3(rgyud): dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can khyod la phyag
32b4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du shes rab chen po'i grur zhugs par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras ga/ zigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bdag
32b5(rgyud): nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur/ cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thu gas rje can khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bdog nges par rdzu 'phrul gyi
32b6(rgyud): rkang pa dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshalo// bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ri la 'jig
32b7(rgyud): par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje con khyod la phyag 'tshal// bdag nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'dug par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs
32b8(rgyud): dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig par gyur cig gang gi tshe bdag ral gri'i ri la mchi ba na ral gri'i ri de rang snyil zhing zhig par gyur cig
33a1(rgyud): gang gi che bdag me mamur gyimyi nang du mchi ban me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du mchi ba na sems can dmyal/ 
33a2(rgyud): ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stongs par gyur rog/ gang gi che bdag ga shin rdo'i 'jig rten du'o ben/ ya~M gas rnams rang tshim par gyur to// gang gi tshi dag ldam yin gyigan
33a3(rgyud): mchi na da dag gi sems ring dul bar gyur cig/ gang gi tshang dag dang 'gro rnams su mchi ba ni de dag ye shes chen por so bar gyur cig/ na mo rat+na tA yA ya/ nam A byas pa
33a4(rgyud): te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ man+ta/  rur+t+ti ka ya/ sarba ban d+ha na/ ts+tshe na ka rA ya/ sa/ rbapA pas mu drod+ho ShaNaka rA ya/ sarba bud+hi dr-i sha ma na ka
33a5(rgyud): yasarba i tu ba dra ba/ bi nA sha naM ka rI ya/ sar+b+ba b+ha ye Shu tAN+DA ya/ ta s+ya na maskr-i ta~M/ i de Ar+yas ba l-i ki te shwa rA ya/ ta ba nI la kar+N+Na/ na mAM pa ra ma hr-i da ya/ 
33a6(rgyud): a bar+d+ha yi Shu mi/ sarba aR+tha sA d+hi nAn/ shu b+ha tse ta na/ sarba bud d+ha nAm/ pA ba mA reg bi sho d+ha kaM/ tad+ya thA/ A lo kaM/ a lo ka/ A d+hi ba t+ti/ lo ka ti/ kran+taM/ e h+yaM hi ma hA bo d+hi satwe/ he
33a7(rgyud): ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ hr-i da ya oM h+ye hi Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya pa ra ma me traM tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka/ ku ru ku ruM/ kar+m+ma sa d+haM ya sAd+ha ya/ bai d+yan/ de hi de hi
33a8(rgyud): me a raM ga ma ga ma/ bi he ga ma/ sid d+ha ya~M gI shwa ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bIr+yan+te/ ma hA bIr+ya te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra NI shwa ra/ tsa la tsa la/ bi ma la mur+Ne/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ kr-iSh+Na
33b1(rgyud): na dzA nA ma ku TA/ A la kr-i ta/ sha rI ral ba/ pra lam+ba bi la ba/ ma hA sid d+ha shud d+hA d+hA ra/ bal ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ ma dA ma la/ tsa la tsa la/ ma hA la/ kr-iSh+Na bak+Sha kr-ilpA p+tA shA niH
33b2(rgyud): ta na/ he pad ma hAsta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ni shA tsa re shwa ra kr-iSh+Ta sarba kr-i ta yadz+nye ba bI ta/ e h+ye hi ma hA bi ra/ ma hA ba rA ha mu kha tri pu ra/ da ha ne shwa ra/ nA ra ya NA/ ru ba ba la be sha d+ha ri/ e h+ye hi nI la
33b3(rgyud): kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi ma hA hA la hA la/ bi Sha ni rdzi ta/ lo ka s+ya rA ga bi Sha bi nA sha na/ de Sha bi Sha bi nA sha nA/ mo hi bI Sha bi nA shwa na/ hu lu hu lu/ ma hA hu lu ha re/ mahA pad+ma nA b+ha/ sa ra sa ra/ si ros
33b4(rgyud): su ru su ru/ bud+d+ha/ br-i d+d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha yA mai ta/ dab nI la kaN+Tha e h+ye hi/ bI mas+thi ta/ ma hA di ha mu khaM/ !/ sa ha sa/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ ma hU TuT+Ta hA sa/ e h+ye hi b+ho b+ho ma hA
33b5(rgyud): sid d+ha/ yau gI shwa rA/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ pA tsa na/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bid+yAn/ sma ra sma ra tAm b+ha ga bo// lo ka nu bi lo ki stAM/ ta thA ga tan/ de hi de hi/ me dar/ sha na kA ma s+ya/ 
33b6(rgyud): da sha naM/ pra sAd+ha ya swAsAt+ma/ sida~M d+hA ya swA hA/ ma hA sid d+ha ya swAhA/ sid d+ha yo gai shwa rA ya swAhA/ nI la kad+d+hA ya sAn+d+he/ ba rA ha mu khA ya swAn+de/ siM he mu khA ya swAhA/ ma hA na ri si ha mu khA ya swA hA
33b7(rgyud): badz+ra hastA ya swA hA/ sid d+ha bi d+yA rA ya swA hA/ ma hA sid d+ha pi d+yA d+ha ra ya swA hA/ pad+ma hastA yaM swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba ti ta yadz+nyo ba bI tA ya swA hI/ ma hA mA la maM ku Ta d+ha ra ya swA hA/ tsakrA yu d+hi d+ha rA
33b8(rgyud): ya swA hA/ shaM kha shab+da ni rA nA dan ka rA ya swAhA/ ba~M d+ha na ka rA yai swAhA/ bA maskr-i ta kaMn+na de she kr-iSh+Na dzi nA ya swA hA/ byag+na tsarma Ni bA saM nA ya swAhA/ lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/ me hA yo gI shwa rA ya/ 
34a1(rgyud): m+b+ha/  mA A/  tsu nasaH/ nam rgyam pam tam /  / smangs / 
34a2(rgyud): kA ya/ sid d+hun+ta me man+ta pa dA ni swAhA// 'phags pa nI lat+tha'i gzungs rdzogs so// / bod skad du/ snying rjes mi bai shol ba zhes bya
34a3(rgyud): ba'i gzungs dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
34a4(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ gnod pa thams cad las thar par mdzad pa/ nang thams cad rab tu ni bar mdzad pa/ 'byung po thams cad nges par
34a5(rgyud): bzlog pa/ sems can mi khom pa brgyad du ltung ba rnams yang dag par sgrol ba la phyag 'tshalo// de la phyag 'tsha/ la nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
34a6(rgyud): bshad pa'i gzungs/ thugs rje chen po mo bshol ba zhes bya ba 'di brjod kyis/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba bdag la dgongasu gsol/ 'di lta ste/ oM dza ta dza ta/ dzi ti dzi ti/ dzu tra dzutra/ 
34a7(rgyud): ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dus pa rjes dgongs te gshegs su gsol/ tsata
34a8(rgyud): ta/ tsi ti tsi ti/ tsu tra tsu t+ya/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sprin lam gyi sprin du rjes su dgongs te thugs rje chen po mngar ba myur du gshegs su gsol/ ra la ra la/ ril ma
34b1(rgyud): ru lu ru lu/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzhi la bzhengasu gsol/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ e hi e/ 
34b2(rgyud): hi bud d+ha bud d+ha/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pas bzhengs su gsol/ bzhengasu gsol/ byams pa chen pos 'byung po thams cad bzlog du/ 
34b3(rgyud): gsol/ thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyis bdag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hun/ ma tha mtha/ bram tha bra ma tha/ bzhengasu gsol/ bzhengs su
34b4(rgyud): gsol/ chur gshegs tshur gshegs/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ las sbyang du gsol/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya swAh+mA/ ma hA pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ pad+ma
34b5(rgyud): A sa nA ya swAhA/ shwe ta madz+nyA u pa bi tA ya swA hA/ ki ri ta ne/ swAh+ma/ shu la ne swA hA/ tsakra Ne swA hA/ badz+ra Ne sA hA// ti Ni tri ya swAhA/ tr-i Na tre ye pra ha ru pA ya swA hA/ A/ 
34b6(rgyud): kA shA ya swA hA/ shi shi ni swA hAM/ pra tsa pa ta ye swA hA/ ya ma ye swA h+ma/ ye me b+hung ya swA hA/ aN+Da dze b+h+yo b+hU te b+h+yaHswA hA/ dzi ra yu dze b+h+yo b+hU te b+h+yaHswA hA/ saM sre da tshe b+h+yo b+hu te b+hu tA oM ba ba tu ke b+h+yo byA/ 
34b7(rgyud): te b+h+yaHbi ti ka b+h+yo byA d+hi b+h+yaHsA hA/ bai d+ha ti ki b+h+yo byA d+hi b+h+yaHswAhA/ Sh+paSh+Te kaM b+h+yo bya d+hi b+hAHsA hI/ sa ni na ba hau ke b+h+r-i byA d+hi b+h+re sA hA sarba byA d+hi b+h+yaHswA hAM/ b+hu me an+ta ri Shi tsAr+ye b+h+r-i byA d+hi b+h+r-iHsI hA/ 'di lta ste
34b8(rgyud): traTo tra Ta/ tInr-i tAn+da/ tru Tu tru Tu/ bdog 'jigs pa thams cad dang / 'che ba thams cad las srungs shog swA hA// gras gr-i sa/ mtha mtha/ pra mtho bri ma tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha nga
35a1(rgyud): bcab \u0f7f/ na ma AR+sha ba loka te shwa ra A ba ti swAH// snying rjes mi bshol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs sa// 
35a2(rgyud): gar skad du/ siM ha nA da tan trA nA ma/ bod skad du/ seng ge sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gsung gi lha la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na
35a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dbang phyug tu bsgyur te rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs so// de nas gsang ba'i bdage bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
35a4(rgyud): dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang lam rnams ji ltar spyang / e ma ho sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i mchog spyan daras gzigs seng ge sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ de yis smon lam
35a5(rgyud): sbyang ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tsho gso bsag/ sa par yid la byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'o/ dbang phyug langs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras/ 
35a6(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka TaM ke Te ka ro Te/ ka ro ka Ta/ 
35a7(rgyud): bIr+ye swAhUM/ oM AHhri/ saM ha nAd hUM/ bruM oM dz+r-IM kha~M hUM/ oM IHhUM/ oM ba le ni b+hU/ dzA dzI ba puSh+pe d+hU be hUM/ sarba a mr-i ta hUM/ oM ba ta li/ ma hA ba ta li/ hUM hUM hUM dzaHswAhA/ oM bak+Sha
35a8(rgyud): bak+Sha / sa ma ya tiSh+Tha dza hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ta pra te hUM phaT/ sr-i ti kar hU~M phaTaM/ oM ba ru Na.A gan+d+ha ya A gats+tsha ya/ mahA nA ga ki sa ti siR+She b+hur phu phu phuHswA hA/ oM b+haM ga~M bai ti shwe te s+yA ta sam
35b1(rgyud): ba ti sa ra ma ti sid d+ha swA hA/ oM AHhrIHhUM swA hA/ phuHhrIHoM si ha nA da hUM phaT phaT/ nA ga du ba la mA ra ya phaT/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM a big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita hU~M/ oM ag+na ye a ti byA/ a b+hi
35b2(rgyud): sa ma ya ya sha/ ma hA kr-i ye ha bya/ ka bya/ ma hA ni ya swA hA/ oM b+ha ga ag+ni ye/ shan taM ku ru swA hA/ AHhrIHsiM ha nA da badz+ra tsakra brti lo ki ka bruM bruM br-i/ lo kot+ta ra Ni si ha nA da bruM bruM br-i hUMn
35b3(rgyud): hUM ni sa ha nA da bruM bruM bruM hUM hUM hUM swA hA// gsang ba'i bdag po 'di ni maN+Dal gyi bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// bsad pa dang / phyir ldog pa dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / zhi ba'i las yin te/ nang par/ 
35b4(rgyud): ba'i lci ba se la me lhung bas maN+Dal byas te/ mngar gsu dam lag pa'i mthil du mnyes pas klu'i zhe sdang zhi bar 'gyurapa ra ro// 'di ni klu'i sde dpon zhes bya ste/ seng ge'i steng du zla ba la
35b5(rgyud): rgyal po rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs// g.yas na thod/ mtshan rtse gsum la// drag po'i rgyal rigs dbang du bsdu/ sa// pad+ma'i rtsil thod pa ni// phrin las bzhi ldan ku mu da// shes
35b6(rgyud): rab sbyor ba'i ral grir bcas// dka' thub ldan pa'i sku de la// rig sngags rnam par rgyan pa po// gsum dang lnga ni mdun du 'bying // rtse mor 'od dpag med pas rgyan// seng ge'i cha las byung ba yin/ 
35b7(rgyud): 'dam skyes dmar po'i lo ma gnyis// pad+ma bzhi la sngags bzhi ldan// rang lus 'og nas thal mo sbyor// sku la 'dud cing 'phrin las byed// rdo rje'i gdan la mi bskyod pa'i// thugs kha nas ni
35b8(rgyud): sngags 'od 'don// spro ba gsum du ldan pa'i sngags// nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bya'o// gsang ba'i bdag po rgyud da'i sa smod pa'i sems can de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
36a1(rgyud): la spyo ba yin no// gas 'i dag pa rnya tan pa dang / sems pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bam la mos pa'i sems can dgal
36a2(rgyud): bzhi'i lha dang / sum gsum mo lnga dang / tshangs pa'i budang / sa chen rnams kyis bsgru bdang / bsgrub pa dang / swA dang / kuts+tsharnaMs drang ba byed de// de bas nas rgyug panas
36a3(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bu la mas srung ba bzhin du srung bar 'gyur ro// bdud kyi bar du gtsang bar mi nus so// gdog 'bris nas nub phyogs bde ba can du pad+ma las skye ba
36a4(rgyud): 'gyu ro// mngal gyi sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyuro// de 'dir me dang chu'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyuraro// 'dir ni mngo tsam smos zang kyi/ de ma yin pa gang 'dod pa
36a5(rgyud): thams cad bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang rgyud 'di la gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la mi byed na/ de la lha'i bu dang
36a6(rgyud): klu'i bu khyed rnams kyis srung bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag rab tu dga' nas tshul bzhin du khas blang bar byas// de
36a7(rgyud): nis gzhan sdang ba'i phyir bdags da/ ra bo la lan du mar bsngags na par chad thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// seng ge sgra'i rlung ces bya ba rdzog so/ rgya gar gyi mkhanan
36a8(rgyud): baN+Di ta pa dA kI ra dang / bod kyi la tsA pa 'gas drug pa ltas btsas kyis nus shing bskur te gtan la phab pa'o// // rgyag dang du/ margyab log ta
36b1(rgyud): ya si ha nA da nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i gzungs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus/ 
36b2(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pi brang ri bo Ta le'i rtse mon/ rin po che'i khang bzangs rin po che dang / mu tig dang / nor bu dpag med kyis spras pa/ 
36b3(rgyud): 'od kyis stong gsum khyab pa/ me tog dri zhom po sna tshogs kyis/ kun nas brgyan pa sa phyogs ngan byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang / nyan thos chen po
36b4(rgyud): sha ra dwa ti'i bu la sogs pa dge slong rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor zhing / bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gdan pa di shams pa la bzhugs so// 'khor der byang chub sems
36b5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'dus te/ 'dug par gyur pa de rang gi stan las langs te/ bla go/ sa phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas
36b6(rgyud): la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ces bgyi/ 
36b7(rgyud): ba 'khor dang btsun mo dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa las rgyal po de mdze dang / phol mig dang dbugs mi bde ba snying nad 'bar ba byung ste/ de ji ltar bsal bar bgyi/ bcom
36b8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal sngon 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na 'jam dpal khyed nyid byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po zhes
37a1(rgyud): bya ba yin la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis
37a2(rgyud): stong gsum du sems can gyi don la gshegs pa la seng ge dkar po gcig dbang du bsdus te chibs pa byas/ sku la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri/ 
37a3(rgyud): dang pad+ma dang ut+pal thogs nas phyin pa la/ rgya mtsho chen po la rgal ba'i dus su seng+ge bzhag nas khur res byas shing byon pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' bre rab chen po khyod nyid ni grogs/ 
37a4(rgyud): la phan pa'i sems kyis rang gi ral gris rang bkumo// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog gi bsam pa la steng 'og bar snang gi klu dang / lha la sogs pas bsad dam
37a5(rgyud): snyam nas btung ba'i snod bram ze'i thod pa lag na thogs/ hA shU la rtse gsum pa lag na thogs/ seng+ge dkar po la/ zhon/ mya ngan du ral pa thod du bcings nas steng gi lha la
37a6(rgyud): bsdigs te/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas// rang gi grogs pos spangs nas cig pu lus/ lha rnams kun gyis nyes na chad pa'i las// grong khyer 'joms shing lha rnam
37a7(rgyud): 'gums par bgyid// ces smras te lha rnams la tri shU la gdengs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / khams gsuM gyi lha/ 
37a8(rgyud): dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/ lho'i me tog pad+ma dang / ku mr-i da dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / tsam pa ka la sogs pa phul te thod pa bkang ngo // de nas bar snang gi lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
37b1(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / grul bum dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa la bsdigs pa/ tri shU la gdengs nas/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas/ rang gi grogs po spangs nas
37b2(rgyud): gcig pu lus// sde brgyad tshogs kyis nyes na chad pa'i las// grong khyer 'joms shing sde brgyad 'gums par bgyid// ces smras te/ sde brgyad la tr-i shU la gdengs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po
37b3(rgyud): gtsug na rin chen dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags zangs ris dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo can dang / 
37b4(rgyud): grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pa dang / nam mkha' lding / dgi rgyal po gser mig can la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang bcas pa dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste sing+ga la rin po che'i
37b5(rgyud): rgyun bu lo// de nas so'i 'og na gnas pa'i klu la bsdigs te/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas// 8gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig pu lus// klu tshogs rnams
37b6(rgyud): kyis nyes na chad pa'i las// grong khyer 'joms shing klu rnams 'gums par bgyid// ces smras te/ rgya mtsho chen po tri shU las bkrugs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na dang
37b7(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ lha dang / lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'bum phrag drug g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa 'dus
37b8(rgyud): ti/ dga' ba'i mdangs phyung nas klu'i rgyal po ba ru na sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas phyag 'tshal/ bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can// khyod la bdag ni skyabasu mchi
38a1(rgyud): klu rnams kun gyi mgon mdzod cig/ nyams na klu'i gshed ma mdzod/ ces smras nas tri shU lan gsum bkris// kha byang chub sems dpa' la bsgyur/ phuH phuHzhes brjod
38a2(rgyud): cing gus pas kha nas khrag 'byin cing gnaso// klu'i rgyal po gzhan rnams kyang thal mo sbyar nas/ bskor ba lan gsum gsum byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can/ khyod la bdag cag sgrubs
38a3(rgyud): mchi'o// klu rnas thang skyab su zung // nyams na klu'i gshed mi mdzod// klu chen po brgyad sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas tshangs skud la 'khris so// klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyang bdag cag ni bran bgyid do// 
38a4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa nyan no zhes smras nas klu rnams so so'i gnas su dengs so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpe' de ni snying rje klu 'dul zhes bya'o// snying nad sel ba zhes bya'o// 'ja/ 
38a5(rgyud): dpal de ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen bo de 'jam dpal smra ba'i sang+ge khyod nyid yino// de'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje mchog de ni nga lta'i 'phags
38a6(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra klu'i ded dpon chen po 'di nyid yin no// 'jam dpal ngas rgyal po chen po de'i don du thugs rje chen po'i sngags brjod par bya'o// yid la zung cig/ na mo
38a7(rgyud): rat+na traM yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA yai/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM A ka Te bi ka Ta ni ka Te/ ka Ta ka Ti ka ro Te/ tsi ti dz+wa la ka ro ti bIr+ye swAhA// gzung / 
38a8(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcus gsungs la/ da ltar nga nyid kyis brjod pa'o// 'di'i cho ga ni mi dgos pas las thams cad 'grub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sman ras gzigs dbang phyug
38b1(rgyud): sing+ge sgra'i sku lugs ma 'am/ bris sku'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba sa lam lhung bas so sor ma 'dres par maN+Dal brgyad byas te/ maN+Dal re re la me tog chom bu lnga lnga bkram te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / 
38b2(rgyud): spos dang / phreng ba dang / phye ma rnams kyis mchod nas/ maN+Dal re re la gzungs lan bcu gsum bcu gsum gyi bar du bzlas la lci ba de bsdus te/ lci ba lhag ma las bsngags shing nad pa la byugs
38b3(rgyud): na nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// lha dang klu la sogs pa'i dug gi nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la grub par ma gyur na/ 'jam dpal thugs rje chen po nyid kyis
38b4(rgyud): mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa yin no// 'jam dpal thugs rje chen po nyid kyis dam bcas pa'i tshig go/ jam dpal rgyal po chen po'i gnod pa ni gzungs 'dis snying nad
38b5(rgyud): 'bar ba las grol nas skye ba phyi ma la bde ba can gyi zhing kham su skye bar 'gyu ro// 'jam dpal nyon cig/ sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la sogs pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu
38b6(rgyud): bcu rtsa dgus snying po 'di gsungs so// oM AHhriHsi ha nA da hUM phaT/ nga ltar nga nyid kyis brjod de/ rig sngags kyi snying po 'di lan gcig brjod pas bsdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur ro// srid pa
38b7(rgyud): nyams ngar 'gro mi 'gyur// lus la mtshon gyis tshugs mi 'gyur// dgra dang chom pos mi tshugs cing // klu la sogs pas 'tshe mi 'gyur// rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// bud med lus su
38b8(rgyud): mi 'gyur zhing // rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// shi nas bde ba can du 'gro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad
39a1(rgyud): sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung gis kyang gsang sngags 'di gsungs la/ da ltar shAkya thub pa ngas kyang brjod pa ste// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ha ya grI ba ya/ na mong/ 
39a2(rgyud): ke shwa rA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hrIHku lu yu lu nI la kaN+Tha/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ mA ra mA ra ya/ hA hA hA hA/ badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gr-i ba hIHhUM phaT/ 'jam dpal gzungs 'di 'phags
39a3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid pad+ma ha ya grI ba'i sngags yin te/ lan cig klog par byed pa'i mi// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing // ngan song sgo rnams gcod par 'gyur// klu sogs
39a4(rgyud): gdon gyis 'tshe mi 'gyur// byang dang dug las grol 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas kun gyis gsung yin no// bye ba grangs med ma thu las byung // de yi yon tan dpag tu med// lan gcig bklag/ 
39a5(rgyud): na sdig pa sel// lan gnyis bklags pas dpal dang ldan/ gsum gyis tshe rnams ring bar 'gyur// 'bum phrag/ bcu yis zhal mthong 'gyur// pad+ma can gyi zhing der 'gro// 
39a6(rgyud): 'jam dpal mi gzhan dag la ni// khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa dang // rlung dang grang ba las gyur pa dang / klu rgyal rigs kyis zin pa dang / klu bram ze'i rigs kyis zin pa dang / klu gdol pa
39a7(rgyud): dang dmangs rigs kyis zin pa ni snying mi dga' ba dang / snying na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lto rgyab du na ba dang / klang kor du na ba dang / gzhogs phyedu na pa dang / ma zhu ba dang / spros pa dang / 
39a8(rgyud): zhagrum gyis btab pa dang / sbrum pa lta bur na pa dang / srog chags sun pa dang / tshigs dang sha khol bur na ba dang / za khu can dang / lung pakroklo can dang / rul khol dun pa dang / 'dres pad/ 
39b1(rgyud): zha ba dang / yig mi bde ba dang / thor ba lta bu'i nang dang / sman can dang / dasu chu can dang / 'bras dang / me dpal dang / ldog pa dang / gag pa dang / chu thig can dang / grang ljang lhung
39b2(rgyud): dang / tsha cag tsag la sogs pa'i mdze rigs can dang / bol mig dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / bdud dang / tshangs pa dang / gshin rje dang / brag srin dang / sems 'khrug gi gdo
39b3(rgyud): dang / thab gzho ba dang / mtsho sman dang / klu la sogs pas zin pa dang / gnod sprin dang / 'byung po dang / log 'dren dang / sha za'i gdon rnams kyis zin pa dang / nang sna tshogs
39b4(rgyud): 'byung ste/ de yang mi dge ba las sdug bsngal 'byung ba yino// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sa/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal nyin cig
39b5(rgyud): snying po gzungs kyi cho ga 'di// dang po thugs rje chen po la// gu sa shing dang de'i sems bskyed nas// snum pa'i sa la dkyi la 'khor bya// lci la brir bcas byugs nas ni// tshon rtsi kha
39b6(rgyud): dog sna lnga yis// dkyil 'khor pad+ma lta bur bri// bum pa gang ba lnga dag kyang // phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru bzhag/ gang ba'i gtor ma lnga yang bshams// seng ldeng phur bu lnga yang dgod// dar
39b7(rgyud): gyis dkris pa'i mnga' bzhi dgod// tshen skung lnga yi dra ba bre// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sing+ge sgra la phyag 'tshalo// khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das ma
39b8(rgyud): gos dkar mo la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po ba ru na la phyag 'tshalo// A hrIHhri ba ta na/ yi ge drug pa'i sngags 'ad ni// brjod
40a1(rgyud): pas sdig pa sdug bsngal sel swAhA// sangs rgyas mchod la brtson par bya// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdug dang / 
40a2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phye ma dang / rgyan thams cad kyis mchod nas/ seng ldeng rgya shug me btang la// tshon skud bcang zhing 'bru rnams sreg/ rma bya rmag shang lcug ma yis// klu yi
40a3(rgyud): dug rnams sel bar byed// hrIHnA ga le le/ nA ga dum ba le le/ nA ga phud phud / ha le he laM/ hA la hA la/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ nag khrol khrol shig shig swA hA// klu dang / log 'dren thams cad
40a4(rgyud): kyi yid kyi dug dang / mthong ba'i dug dang / bcings pa'i du dag dang / kha rlangs kyi dug dang / reg pa'i dug dang / dug thams cad phyir phud cig swA hA// dug 'dir ma 'dug cig/ 
40a5(rgyud): sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song shig/ 'dzin pa'i nang du songashig/ me'i nang du song shig/ chu'i nang du song shig/ zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/ 'jam dpal 'di dag ni de bzhin
40a6(rgyud): gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o// hri b+h+rUMHoM hUM khaM/ rigs lngas dbang bskur ba'o// rdo rje srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// bkra shis lha mo dpal dang ldan// bsnyen gnas la ni gnas/ 
40a7(rgyud): gyur nas// dkon mchog rjes dran sems bskyed nas// bum chu dag pas las sgrib sel// lus ngag sems kyis dag pa thob// pha rol phyin drug gnas gyur cing // sangs rgyas sems can
40a8(rgyud): mkhyen par gyur// ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon du 'gyur// bu mo gzhon nus bkal pa yi// skud pa dkar po sum sgril la// bzlas brjod nyi shu brgyad byas nas// mgul du btags na nad las
40b1(rgyud): grol// nang la phan pa'i sman rnams la gzungs sngags bzlas shing btab gyur na// nad rnams kun las grol bar 'gyur// tshul gzungs sngags mang bzlas na// klu nang khong du sel bar 'gyur// 
40b2(rgyud): lo tog za ba kha bcing na// byems dang thal bas sel// ha cang char pa ches pa na// lha la phul ba'i snying pa la// kham phor sar pa'i nang du yang // me tog gtsang ma blangs nas ni// bsregs na
40b3(rgyud): char pa 'chad par 'gyur// ser ba drag po 'ong ba na// thal chen nyungs dkar bzlas brjod kyis// ser ba nya lcib lcug ma dang // ldum po btags te btsugs gyur na// ser ba 'chad par
40b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin// lha klu dri za la sogs pa'i// gdon ni gno dra par gyur pa la// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste// sman sbyar chus ni gang ba la/ 
40b5(rgyud): bzlas brjod brgya ni brtsa brgyad bzlas// slob ma gos zas dkar po sbyar// dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhug/ bum pa'i chu yis bkru bar bya// nad dang gnod pa kun las
40b6(rgyud): thar Sha klu sogs gdon rnams dpag med kyis// glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// bus pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa las// gi wang gis ni srung 'khor bri// yung dkar dag dang bcas te gdags/ 
40b7(rgyud): byis pa gdon dang nad las thar// lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na// thu ba g.yas pa'i gos kyi grwa ra/ bzlas brjod bdun byas mdud pa bor// song na bde zhing don yang 'grub// rta la
40b8(rgyud): sogs pa'i byugs rnams la// chu dang yungs dkar bcas pa la// bzlas nas gtor na bde bar 'gyur// mi nang phyugs nang thams cad la// yungs kar dang ni bum pa'i chus// bkru shing
41a1(rgyud): btags na mi nad zhi// a smA ri yi gzungs sel ltar// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ byang chub sem
41a2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal rgyal po 'di'i khong na klu'i dug gis gang nas 'dug ste/ 'di ni klu'i rgyal po ba ru na 'di yis klu thams cad la dbang byed pa yin pas 'dis dbyung bar bya'o// 
41a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshalo// klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na la phyag 'tshal// klu'i rgyal po tak+Sha ka la phyag 'tshalo// klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la phyag 'tshalo// 
41a4(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po pad+ma la phyag 'tshalo// klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po la phyag 'tshalo// klu'i rgyal po dung skyong la phyag 'tshalo/ 8/ klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan la phyag 'tshalo// klu'i rgyal/ 
41a5(rgyud): po dga' bo la phyag 'tshalo// klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas la/ phyag 'tshal lo// oM ba ru NA ya swAhA/ oM A/ nan+tA ya swA hA/ oM bA su kA ya swAhA/ oM tak+Sha kA ya
41a6(rgyud): swA hA/ oM karko Ta ya swA hA/ oM pad+mA ya swA hA/ oM ma hA pad+mA ya swAhA/ oM shaM kha bA lA ya swAhA/ oM ku li kA ya swAhA// kr-i yi gzugs ni mang po yang // dkar gsum mngar
41a7(rgyud): gsum 'bras zan la// legs byas kha dog bsgyur byas la// me tog spos dang byug pa dang / mar me zhal zas sgra snyan dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan me tog phreng // tshangs
41a8(rgyud): pa'i skud pas mnyes par bya// rtsa ba lo ma sdong bu dang // me tog 'bras bu smin gyis mchod// rma bya gzungs mo me long gis// rgyal po khong gi dug thon cig/ rin chen rmag shad mchod
41b1(rgyud): pa'i rten// mi ldog pa yi rdzas su chongs// bum pa gter gyis gang ba mdzes// srog chags yid 'ong gzugs kyi mchod// zhi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// klu'i rgyal po 'jog po yis/ 
41b2(rgyud): zin kyang skad cig gcig la thon// 'jam dpal 'di gzhan gyi mthu ma yin te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i mthu'o// stobs so// byin gyis brlabs so// thugs rje
41b3(rgyud): dang ldan pa 'di'i yon tan brjod kyis mi lang yang bdag gis cha shas tsam zhig brjod na/ oM bcom ldan 'das/ bye ba byas shing byed pa byas// khur bor bdag don rjesu brnyes/ 
41b4(rgyud): srid par yongs su sbyong bzang // yang dag bka' las rnam par grol// sems dpa' dbang bsgyur thams cad kyi// mchog tu pha rol phyin thob pa// srid las rgal zhing tshogs
41b5(rgyud): gnyis rdzogs// AHgzhan la phan brtson thugs rtse/ can// sems can kun la mchog tu byams// kham sa gsum kun gyi gnyen cig pu// mtha' yas sems
41b6(rgyud): can sgrol la mkhas// hrIH'gro ba nyam thag kun tu skyob// dri ma gsum spangs pha rol phyin// mngon shes drug brnyes n+ya gro bu// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis/ 
41b7(rgyud): ngag dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes// sku mdog shel gyi kha dog 'dra// gangs ri nyi shar lta bur mtshon// sku tshad tshe la 'od zer 'bar// rigs lnga sangs rgyas sku la 'phro
41b8(rgyud): dbu skra thor tshugs gyen la rjes// dbul 'od dpag med pa bzhugs// klu rnams thams cad 'dul mdzad pa// rtse gsum sbrul gyis rab tu bkris// rigs gsum mgon po'i byin
42a1(rgyud): rlabs 'dzin// dug gsum rtsang nas gcod la bstod// skyon gyis mgos pad+ma bsnams// shes rab phun sum ral gri 'bar// nyon mongs dag pa bram ze'i mgo
42a2(rgyud): me tog dri zhim tshogs kyi bkang // klu rnams kun nas dbang bsdus pas// sbrul gyi tshang skud mdzes la bstod// siM ha/ pad+ma bdag gi gdan la bzhugs// bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon
42a3(rgyud): mdzad pa// seng ge dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs// 'dod pa'i don rnams sgrub pa'i phyir// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// ba spu nyag ma re re yang // sems can kun gyi mchog tu
42a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ phyag 'tshal thugs rje can la bstod// dam chos nga rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba// lha mo sgrol ma rjesu 'brang // 'jigs pa brgyad skyob sku mdog ldang // gnod pa sel
42a5(rgyud): ba mi 'jigs sbyin// ut+pal thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// btud de sprul pa mang po 'gyed// hUM gos dkar ma ni bka' bzhin byed// yid bzhin 'khor lo bde bar bskor
42a6(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don yod sdug bsngal zhi// 'jigs pa brgyad po sel la bstod// phaT/ ha ya grI ba khro bo'i sku// 'phags pa rta mgrin bdud bzhi 'joms// kro d+ha mgrin ston gdug pa 'dul
42a7(rgyud): klu bdud 'dul mdzad hUM gis bstod// nA nam mkha' klu rgyal ba ru Na// chu lha ston pa'i zhal mthong zhing // bstan la rab dga' klu rnams 'dul// sa dang po yi bden pa mthong
42a8(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin// klu rgyal byang chub sems la bstod// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te/ ka taM ka ri swAhA// gang gis bstod cing bzlos pa/ 
42b1(rgyud): de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyuraro// gsang sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro// bskal pa
42b2(rgyud): stong gi bar du ngan song du mi skye'o// bud med lus su mi skye'o// su zhig nang bar langs nas chu dri zhim pos khrus byas te gtsang sbra la gnas nas/ thugs rje chen po seng ge sgra'i spyan sngar gzungs 'di/ 
42b3(rgyud): klog gam/ 'dri 'am/ 'chang ngam/ klog du 'jug gam/ kha don du bston nas snying po dang / gzungs sngags zlos na ni de'i lus la mdze dang / shu ba dang / phol mig dong / 'bras dang
42b4(rgyud): bas ljags dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / lhog pa dang / gag pa dang / spos pa dang / dmu chu dang / skem da ba dang / mkhal ma rdol ba dang / don snod du 'dus pa dang / 
42b5(rgyud): byad kyi dkyil 'khor la nad sna tshogs 'dus pa dang / glo ba/ na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / rlung mkhris bang kan 'dus pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyuraro// 'jam
42b6(rgyud): dpal gzungs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// su zhig gam rgyal po des gzungs 'di glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par/ 
42b7(rgyud): byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po yul 'khor dang bcas pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang du glegs bam
42b8(rgyud): 'di 'chang na/ dpal nag po chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na dang / klu chen po brgyad rnams slad bzhin 'brang zhing / dpag tshad stong tshun chad du slar rgol
43a1(rgyud): ba dang / lU dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / gdon ma lus pa thams cad dang / log par 'dren pa dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyuraro// ma
43a2(rgyud): nyes pa dang / bri nyes pa dang / sngags nor ba dang / phyag brgya nor ba dang / bshad nyes pa dang / mnyan pa nor ba yang gzungs 'di bklags pas dag par 'gyuraro// gzungs 'od sul srung
43a3(rgyud): ba byas pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa byas pa dang / bsnyung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su byas pa de la mtshon dang / drug dang / dbyig drugu dang / byang dang / gshing ma dang / rims
43a4(rgyud): dang gnod pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin par 'chibs mo nugangs so// gnod par byed pa char gcod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang
43a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa'a'angam dpal dang / can thos chen po 'a ti'i bu dang / ldedang mi dang / sngam yin da par bcas pa'i 'jig rten mi sa te/ bcom ldan 'das
43a6(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sang+ge sgra zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// 
43a7(rgyud): kha tshol yul dur khrod 'dris karang byung gi mchod rten rngar/ dngos grub rnyes pa'i rje btsun mo rdo rje sems ma dang / sgyu bsgyur gyi lon+d+ra 'gar shes rab 'byung gnas zhes bya bas bsgyur tsang zhus te
43a8(rgyud): gtan la bab pa'o// na mo ratA tra yA sa/ nam Ar+ya ba lo ka te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa tI ya/ ma hAs twA ya/ mahAkA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya Sh+TA/ oM a kaT/ 
43b1(rgyud): bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka Te ka Te/ ka ro Te/ ka ro Te/ bIr+ye swA hA// bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci bas la ma lhung bas so sor maN+Dal brgyad byas la/ maN+Dal re re la lan bcu gsum rgya/ 
43b2(rgyud): bar du bzlas la/ lci ba lhag ma la sngags bzlas te/ nad pa la nye bar byugs na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te nyi ma bdun nam/ bcu gsum 'am nyi shu rtsa gcig gis
43b3(rgyud): 'grub ste/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa ni ma yin no// de ltar ma grub na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro// seng ge sgra'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan pos
43b4(rgyud): gi dbang phyug dang / glog skya shes rab brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o// 6// rgyag dar ska du Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kan/ bod skadu'aphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 
43b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
43b6(rgyud): dbang phyug gi pho brang ri bo Ta la'i rtse mo na me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa/ dzam bu na da'i gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kun tu 'bar ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs
43b7(rgyud): te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
43b8(rgyud): skyong ba dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bcom ldan 'das la bsti steng du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod cing bkur stir byas te/ yongs su/ 
44a1(rgyud): bskor nas mdun du byas pa la chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge bdon bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs
44a2(rgyud): su byang ba/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su gsal ba tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas byang
44a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa kye bcom ldan 'das/ bya ba byas shing byed la mkhas// khur bor bdag don rjes su
44a4(rgyud): brnyes/ srid pa sbyor ba yongs su zad// yang dag bka' la rnam grol sems// shes rab shin tu rnam par grol // klu chen po ni cang sheso// sems la dbang sgyur thams
44a5(rgyud): cad kyis// mchog tu pha rol phyin pa thob// ye shes tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs// srid pa'i dgon pa/ rab tu rgal// gzhan la phan pa mdzad la brtson// thugs
44a6(rgyud): rje dang ni 'brel pa'i thugs// skye dgu kun la mchog tu byams// bde bar brtson pa byams las byung // mtha' yas sems can grol la mkhas// bde bar gshegs pa nyid las skyes// 
44a7(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyi bka'// khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig pu// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med// dri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs// rigs pa gsum gyi pha rol phyin/ 
44a8(rgyud): mngon par shes pa drug kyang brnyes// n+ya grong ni lta bur zlum// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus kyang // sku ni rnam pa kun
44b1(rgyud): tu brgyan// sku mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra// sku tshang che la kar sham po// nag gisar gzhon nu ltar// cung zad dmar pa 'dra ba'i mdog/ dbu yi thor tshugs dag dang ldan// thor chug/ 
44b2(rgyud): mang pos nye bar g.yogs// dbu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs// 'od zer dag ni rnam par 'phro// 'od 'phro 'dom gang rab tu 'bar// gser gyi ri 'dra grags pas khyab// gzi brjid
44b3(rgyud): dag kyang rab tu che// shar gyi ri la 'char ba yi// nyi mo'i gtsug tor dag dang ldan// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba'i sa// se ral khar ni sku phyed rgyan// sa dag la ni rab tu mkhas// pha
44b4(rgyud): rol phyin pa bcu rnams spyod// tshul khrims ma nyams la pa med// thon ka seng+ge'i ral pa 'dra// sku ni 'ja ma zhing ldeng dag can// gzigs shing gshegs pa khyu mchog
44b5(rgyud): 'dra/ g.yas su 'khyil po'i dung yang 'dra// dpral ba zla ba/ bkram pa 'dra// dpral ba'i dbyibs kyi rgya yang che// / smin mtshams par yang yong ma chad// shangs kyi dbyibs
44b6(rgyud): kyang cung zad mtho// mgur kyang bum pa'i mgrin pa 'dra// dpung pa dag kyang rab tu zlum// phyag sor rnams kyi tshigs kyang ring // sor mo 'jam zhing cung zad dmar// phyag sor rnams kyi
44b7(rgyud): bar 'brel ba// phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil rnams la// 'khor lo dag gis rab tu brgyan// ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra bar mdzes// sku mdangs 'jam zhing shangs kyang rgyas// gsung ni tshangs bI
44b8(rgyud): dbyangs ltar snyan// yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur// blta na sdug cing mdangs dga' ba// pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma 'dra// pad+ma dag las kun tu skyes// pad+ma dag gis gdan la bzhugs
45a1(rgyud): phyag na pad+ma bzang po bsnams// ril ba spyi blugs phyag na bsnams// khri snyan sa le'i lpags pa banabs// dbyug pa dang ni bgrang phreng 'dzin// bkra shis ngag gis/ 
45a2(rgyud): gtsang mar gyur// snga nas gsung zhing gsong por gsungs// bdud rtsi'i char ni rab tu 'bebs// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra// sems can thams cad dga' bar mdzad// bzang po snang
45a3(rgyud): ba'i ljon shing ltar// sems can kun gyi gsos su 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa lags// bde bar gshegs pa'i cha lugs mnga'// bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin
45a4(rgyud): ba spu nyag ma re re yang // sems can rnams kyi gtso bor gyur// bsod nams mdzad cing dge ba mdzad// ba shol ba med cing nges par mdzad// rab tu drag pa'i brtson
45a5(rgyud): 'grus can// 'khor ba dag las rab tu rgal// dam/ chos rgyal mtshan mnga' gsol ba// yid bzhin 'a/ khor lo dge ba sbyor// don yod zhags pa sdug bsngal
45a6(rgyud): 'dren/ ha ya grI ba bdud bzhi 'joms// kro d+ha mgrin sngon gdug pa sel// lha mo sgrol ma rjesu 'brang // khro gnyer can ni bka' bzhin byed// rgyal ba can ni tshul dang
45a7(rgyud): ldan// mthu chen ldan zhing dran dang ldan// yon tan ldan zhing byems dang ldan// shes rab ldan zhing dpal dang ldan// tshul khrims ldan zhing don dang ldan// don rnams kun ni rig pa po// tha
45a8(rgyud): tshom thams cad gcod pa po// chos rnams thams cad smra ba bo// 'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa po// zhal bzeng zla ba nya 'dra// sku smad rin chen kun gyis rgyan// gser gyi mchod sdong 'dra/ 
45b1(rgyud): bar gnas// 'od zer nyi ma stong pas lhag/ tshangs pa la sogs phyag bgyis pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad kyis gang zhig bstod pa byed pa de mtshams
45b2(rgyud): med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyis sgrib pa yongs su byung bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong gi
45b3(rgyud): bar du yang ngan 'gror mi skye'o// mnar med par mi 'gro'o// su zhig nang par langs nas klog gamo/ klog tu 'jug gam/ kha ton du 'don na mi de'i lus la mdze dang / shu ba dang / glen pa
45b4(rgyud): dang / dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// skyes so cog tu skye ba dran par 'gyu dar ro// lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe
45b5(rgyud): na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// gar skyes kyang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na
45b6(rgyud): yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' bar 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro// gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro// bstod pa 'dis bstod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
45b7(rgyud): 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed mchod pa byas par 'gyur// rnam par smin pa yang de dang 'dra bas na bye brag med do// rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel rin po che za ma tog ces bya
45b8(rgyud): ba'aphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya nA ma
46a1(rgyud): aSh+Ta sha ta ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
46a2(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa sprin ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri gru 'dzin gyi rtse mo me tog dri zhim po sna
46a3(rgyud): tshogs bkram pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser kha dog bzang po ltar snang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs snang ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
46a4(rgyud): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bcom ldan 'das la sti
46a5(rgyud): stang du byas// bla mar byas/ ri mor byas te/ mchod/ cing rjod nas/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis pa ltas nas chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar
46a6(rgyud): dge ba bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas tshangs pa la sogs
46a7(rgyud): pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa mdzad pa/ mdzad rgyu mdzad pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gis don rjes su brnyes pa/ srid par
46a8(rgyud): kun tu sbyor ba yongs su bsal ba/ yang dag pa'i mkhyen pas thugs shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang mkhyen pa/ glang po che chen po dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu
46b1(rgyud): byon pa ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba gzhan la sman pa// thugs rje dang 'brel pa'i thugs mnga' ba// skye dgu la mchog tu mnyes gshin pa// bde bar/ 
46b2(rgyud): rab tu stsol bar mdzad pa// byams pas zhugs pa/ sems can mtha' yas pa sgrol ba la mkhas pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po// srid pa gsum gyi rtsa lag gicig pu// 'dod chags
46b3(rgyud): mi mnga' ba/ zhe sdang mi mnga' ba/ gti mug mi mnga' ba/ dri ma gsum spangs pa/ rig pa gsum gyi pha rol du gshegs pa/ mngon par shes pa drug brnyes pa/ shing n+ya gro ltar chu
46b4(rgyud): zheng gang pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mang dab/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/ lpag das pa srab cing mdog ser ba// sku ring rgyu bzang zhing dkar ba
46b5(rgyud): sku shing gi me tog sar pa dang / dmar reng lta bu'i dbu thor chu gas mnga' ba// lcang le 'khyil ba mang pos dbu khyed/ sa pa/ 'od dpag med kyis 'od zer btang ba/ 'bar ba'i
46b6(rgyud): 'od 'dom gang gis gser gyi ri bo ltar snyan par grags pa// gzi brjid rgya che ba/ gzugs 'char ka'i ri lta bu gtsug tor mnga' ba/ nor bu rab tu 'bar ba/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ skul
46b7(rgyud): se ral du thogs pa/ sa rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i zhabs dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims ma nyams pa/ tshul khrims ma zhig pa/ seng ge ltar thong ka phel ka che ba
46b8(rgyud): sku 'jam zhing mdzes pa/ gzigs pa dang gshegs thabs khyu mchog gi dbang po 'dra ba/ mkhur ba g.yas su 'khyil ba/ phral ba che zhing zla ba kham pa 'dra la thig le mnga' ba/ phyag
47a1(rgyud): pus mor sleb pa/ smin ma par ma chad pa/ shangs mtho ba/ mgur bum pa'i mgrin pa 'dra ba/ phyag sor mo dang tshig ring ba/ sen mo 'jam zhing zangs kyi
47a2(rgyud): mdog 'dra ba/ phyag dra bas 'brel pa/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los rgyan pa/ ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra ba/ sku 'jam zhing rgyas pa/ tshangs pa ltar dbyangs zab pa/ yid du mchi ba/ 
47a3(rgyud): sdug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ nyams dga' bar bgyid pa/ 'od pad+ma 'dra ba/ pad+ma las 'khrungs pa/ pad+ma las byung ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag na pad+ma mnga' ba/ phyag na
47a4(rgyud): ril ba'i spyi blugs bsnams pa/ ri dgas nag po'i lpags pa banabs pa/ phyag mkhar bsnams pa/ bgrang ba'i nor bu bsnams pa/ gtsang ba srungs pa/ gsong / 
47a5(rgyud): por gsungs pa/ bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa/ yid pa bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu/ blta na sdug pa'i shing 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad mos pa mdzad pa/ dga' bar mdzad pa
47a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i cha byad mnga' ba/ bde bar gshegs pa'i ring srel 'dzin pa/ spu re re skyes pa/ sems can gyi snying po
47a7(rgyud): bsod nams mdzad pa/ dge ba mdzad pa/ nges par mdzad pa/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba/ 'khor ba las shin tu 'das pa/ dam pa'i chos la rgyal tshab du dbang bskur ba/ sgrol ma
47a8(rgyud): zhabs drung na gnas pa/ khro gnyer can bka' bzhin bgyid pa/ rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang
47b1(rgyud): ldan pa/ zhi ba dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ skal ba dang ldan pa/ don dang ldan pa/ don rnams thug su chud pa/ the tshom rnams gcod pa/ chos rnams gsungs pa/ 
47b2(rgyud): 'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas pa sku rkang pa'i phyogs rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu/ sku nyi ma stong pas lhag
47b3(rgyud): par mdzes pa/ tshangs pa'i dbang po la sogs pas phyag bgyis pa lag so// gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa sgrub pa byed/ 
47b4(rgyud): pa de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam par byang b.ro// 'gyu ro// dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs por 'a/ gyur ro// de la gsang sngags thams cad grub par 'gyu ro// 
47b5(rgyud): bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyu ra ro// mtshams med par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// su zhig nang bar langs nas 'don tam/ klog gam/ kha don
47b6(rgyud): byed na de'i lus la mdze dang / rkang shu dang lung ba dang / mi bde ba mi 'byung zhing nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs so cog tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang 'dra ba
47b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs so cog tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu
47b8(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur/ dpa' bar 'gyur/ skad snyan par 'gyur/ bskal pa bzang por 'gyur ro// bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med par
48a1(rgyud): 'gyur/ tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// bstod pa sgrub pa 'dis bstod pa byas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi bye ma snyed dag la
48a2(rgyud): mchod pa byas par 'gyur te/ rnam par smin pa mtshungs shing bye brag med par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring
48a3(rgyud): bsrel gyi za ma tog zhes bya ba rdzogs so// 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ru rtsir ang ga yaSh+Ta nA ma d+ha ra nI/ bod skad du
48a4(rgyud): 'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes pa ces bya ba'i gzungs/ 8sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams ca da la phyag 'tshalo// na mo bi pu la bi ma na su pra tiSh+Thi te a/ 
48a5(rgyud): sang khA ya/ sUr+ya sha ta sa ha sra a ti re ka te dza / pra b+ha/ a ba b+ha si ta mun+ta ye ma hA ma Ni mu tra kut+kA la/ a lam kA ra d+ha ri Ne b+ha ga bA te pad+ma pA Na ye/ sarba lo ka a pa
48a6(rgyud): ya sha ma nA ya/ bi bi d+ha khu kha sa ma bA sha a biSh+Ta/ sarba satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swA hA/ ma hA a lo ka ka ra Na ta ma sti mi ra pa ta la bi nA sha ka/ rA ga dwe Sha ma hA mo ha/ 
48a7(rgyud): dz+wa la sha ma ke/ sha sa ka rak+Sha ka/ sarba a pa ya durga ti pra sha ma ka/ sarba satwa sa ma shA sa na ka ra/ sarba A shA ba ri pU ra ka/ sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+ha na ka ra/ he he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ 
48a8(rgyud): ra ba radA ya kA/ pad+ma a lo ka sa b+ha ta/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ dza Ta mu ku TA/ a lang kr-i te shi ra/ ma Ni ka na ka rA dze/ sha ta badz+ra bai DUr+ya a lang kre ta sha rI ra a mi tA b+ha dzi na ka ma la a/ 
48b1(rgyud): la kr-i ta/ pra b+ha ra Na rA dzA na sha ta sa ha sra A b+hi la sha ti kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/ bi na sha ya/ bi nA sha ya/ ma hA yAM tra kle sha ka ba TA a ba/ 
48b2(rgyud): ba d+ha bi bo d+hi satwa sa ra tsa raka pra ma thA na/ bu ru Sha pad+ma/ pu ru Sha nA ga/ pu ru Sha sA ga ra/ pu ru Sha si ha/ bi ha bi ra/ bau ra dza/ su dan ta pa ri bri ta/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra/ 
48b3(rgyud): shA sa ya pra shA sa ya/ pra d+ha na sa ya pra d+ha na ya/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bi d+hi ri bi d+hi ri/ bai ri bi ri/ bi bi ri bi bi ri/ tsi ri tsi re/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ 
48b4(rgyud): mu tsa mu tsa/ d+hun d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na d+hu ru d+hu ru/ gA ya gA ya/ gA d+ha ya gAng+ga ya/ ha sa ha sa/ pra ha sa pra ha sa/ nA nA bidi d+ha k+She sha bA sa nA/ ha ra ha ra/ saM ha ra sa ha ra/ d+hu ru Ti d+hu ru/ 
48b5(rgyud): TiHma hA mat+tA/ a laM kA ra Na/ sha ta pra se ka/ a ba b+ha si tA ma hA bi Sha sha ma ka/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba rang swA hA/ bcom
48b6(rgyud): ldan 'das lag na pad+ma'i lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs byang chub sems dpa'i khang bzang dam pa rdo rje chen pos bgegs par gsungs pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin byed
48b7(rgyud): ma'i bu dang / mi 'am ci dang / lha ma yin chen pos bstod pa/ re ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed pa 'di/ sgrib pa chen pos bsgribs pa gang la la zhig nyan tam/ 'chang ngam
48b8(rgyud): 'don tam/ klog gam/ mthong nas legs par rtogs par byed na/ de'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// nang par langs nas lan cig 'don na/ 
49a1(rgyud): lag na pad+ma phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// yid la gang dag 'dod pa'i dgos pa bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyu ro// gcig pu rab tu dben par 'dug ste/ sangs/ 
49a2(rgyud): rgyas yid la bya ba mngon du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma rjes su dran par byas la lan bdun brjod na/ dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi yid du
49a3(rgyud): 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de'i ngan 'gro thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ro// yud tsam zhig 'chag cing 'dug la yid la brjod na/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar bsags pa'i las byang bar
49a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'khor los bsgyur ba stong gis bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs tsho rabs su yang pad+ma'i rigs chen por skye bar 'gyuraro// 
49a5(rgyud): skye bo khyad par du 'phags pas bskur bar 'gyur ro// me tog dri zhim pos snyim pa bkang ste/ 'phags pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan bdun brjod na
49a6(rgyud): yon tan chen po stong thob par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po'i chos nyid snang ba de la skye bar 'gyur/ dam pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi gdeng du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na/ 
49a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das zhal rtag tu bzhad pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing / chos snang ba'i gsal ba dang po dri ma med par byed pa zhes bya ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshe
49a8(rgyud): 'di nyid la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur ro// sems mnyam par gzhag bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// ji ltar
49b1(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zang par byed par 'dod na/ ches bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba la bsnyung ba byas la gos dkar po bgos te/ ring srel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku/ 
49b2(rgyud): gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor bskus la/ dkyil 'khor de dang / bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags
49b3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzogs dbang phyug la dri zhim po'i bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos kyis sti stang byas te/ de nyid du 'dug la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ des sdig pa thams cad
49b4(rgyud): dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa byed pa yang sdigab byung zhing shin tu yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang lha ngan pa dang / shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus dang / ngag/ 
49b5(rgyud): dang yid kyi spod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin ga/ shigs pa rnams kyis rtag par rgyun tu ting 'dzin gyi stobs dang / dbang bskur ba'i stobs dang / sa dang / 
49b6(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin po'i stobs dang / ye shes khyad par can gyi stobs sgrub par mdzad do// gnam la gyen du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na char 'bab bo// sa la bltas te bzlas brjod byas na/ lo tog
49b7(rgyud): thams cad legs par 'gyur ro// 'bab chu dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu'i shul du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na chu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la lag pas byab cing bzlas brjod
49b8(rgyud): byas na sos par 'gyur ro// dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na dran pa rnyed par 'gyu ro// bkres pa dang / bsgom pa'i gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na phyid par 'gyur ro// mi
50a1(rgyud): ngas chen po byung na ras la bris te/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags na/ dpag tshad chun chad mtshams bcad pa dang / bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa/ 
50a2(rgyud): lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+rA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur
50a3(rgyud): cing nus to gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a b+ha ya prad nA ma a ba rA dzi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis
50a4(rgyud): thub pa/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgya ngas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyaga'atshalo// grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// sangs rgyas
50a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tsho lo// dge 'dun la/ phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa sman ras
50a6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal las grol bar mdzad pal phyag 'tshal la
50a7(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi bcings pa gcod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'jigs pa med pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
50a8(rgyud): dbang phyug gi gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po brjod par bya'o// las kun byed pa dge ba ste/ 'byung po kun gyi 'jigs pa med// bdud rtsi'i las ni bdud rtsi 'byung // 'di ni las kun byed pa yin
50b1(rgyud): dgra kun 'jigs par byed pa ste// brjod dang de bzhin 'thab pa dang // gzhan yang dgras ni 'khor ba dang // rtsod pa'i nang du rtsod byed dang // rtag tu dgra dang phrad pa dang // rmugs par byed cing / 
50b2(rgyud): rengs par byed// rmongs par byed cing sdig pa sel// dug dang me ni dengs par byed// rims dang nyes sdig thams cad sel// chom rkun dang ni chu dang sbrul// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad sel/ 
50b3(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub 'dren pa dang // chos kun rab tu ston pa ste// 'di ni rig sngags mthu stobs can// gzhan gyis mi thub srin po 'joms// gang
50b4(rgyud): tshe rig sngags 'di 'chang ba// de nas 'di g.yo bar 'gyur// 2dgas med ldan pa zhes bya ba'i// rig sngags rgyal po bla na med// 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa ste// 'jig
50b5(rgyud): rten gsum po kun gyis mchod// de nas 'jigs pa med pa/ ra spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran par byas nas/ rang gi snying po
50b6(rgyud): gzhan gyi mi thub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs po 'di smras so// oM ta ri ta ra/ tA re tA re/ mo ri kaM/ tsan+d+ra pra b+he/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ tsau ri tsi ri/ sUr+ya kan te/ 
50b7(rgyud): he ma pra b+he/ bud+d+ha bu d+d+ha/ bo d+ha ni/ sarba pA pa pra sha ma ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ bi Sha pra sha ma ni/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ sarba bi d+hi rAn ma kri ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru
50b8(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta b+hA Shi ta/ pa ra ba ra/ bi ri bi ri/ bu ru pu ru/ badz+nyA ba ra mi ta/ a nudz+nyA te/ Sha Ta pA ra mi ta/ pa ri bA re/ ga ga na/ d+hi ba lo ko ba ma/ ta thA ga taM/ ba shaM ta
51a1(rgyud): pra ti ka ri/ shu b+ha ka ri/ ba bi tra/ mngag la d+hA ri Ni/ sarba de ba ta a d+hiSh+Thi te sarba ma ho ra ga a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sarba kin na ra a d+hiSh+NI te/ sarba yak+Sha
51a2(rgyud): rak+Sha sa/ a d+hiSh+Ti d+he pra sA d+ha b+ha Shi te/ in+d+ra b+ha Shi tetsa tur ma hA rA dza b+ha Shi tAM/ tsan+da sUr+ya b+ha Shi te/ oM ti ri ti ri/ tsan+d+ra kA ri ni/ ki li ki li/ sarba sha truM bi nA sha ni hUM phaT/ 
51a3(rgyud): swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa sprin ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la
51a4(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so// mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi kham das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ de bzhin gshegs
51a5(rgyud): po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dbang
51a6(rgyud): phyug 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de las bdag gis 'di dag thos so// de las gzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sems can thams cad la yang bsnyad do// mi
51a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa sbyin pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / 'khor ba 'jig
51a8(rgyud): dang / gsor thub dang / 'od srung dang / shAkya thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni/ bdag bsrung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / gnyi ga srung ba dang / 
51b1(rgyud): grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba dang / srog skyong ba dang / tshe sbyin pa dang / lag pa rengs par byed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 
51b2(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ ngag thams cad bzlog pa 'ching ba thams cad grol bar byed pa// thams cad du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// shud d+ha
51b3(rgyud): muk+te pra b+hA swa re/ shA te bad bA ra bA si ni/ sarba duSh+TA na dzaM b+ha ya mai/ staM b+ha ya mi/ mo ha yA mi/ oM swAh+ma/ sa bi tre swAhA/ shwe te swAh+ma/ shA te pa ta pra bi te swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ ta re ra re/ ta ri/ 
51b4(rgyud): Ni rak+Sha rak+ShaM/ sarba ka li/ ka la ha/ bi gra ha/ bi b+ha ta duHsa bA na/ b+ha ye b+h+yaHswAhA// rtag tu le lo med par ni// gang zhig gzungs 'di 'chang byed pa// de la lha tshogs thams cad
51b5(rgyud): kyang / dus kun tu ni srung bar byed// de ni 'jigs par 'a// gyur pa med// de ni rtag srung lhan ner 'jug/ ji ltar/ nyi ma sa steng na// gzi brjid grags 'chang lhan ne bzhin// de
51b6(rgyud): la bshed byed byang stems dang // srul po dag gis mi tshugs te// de la dpal yon 'jug par 'gyur// kha dog dang ni tshe yang 'phel// 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa
51b7(rgyud): sbyin pa ces bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 
51b8(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems
52a1(rgyud): dpa' chen po snying rten po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ dza ya ba hi ne/ dza yoH/ 
52a2(rgyud): ta riHka la ka la/ ma la ma la/ tsa la tsa la/ k+Shi na k+Shi na/ sarba karma/ A bo ra Na ni/ me sarba dz+nyA ni a d+hiSh+To te swA hA// na mo b+ha ga ba ti ha sa pra b+ha d+ha/ sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ke ta tsak+Sha/ shro tra g+h+ra/ 
52a3(rgyud): Na dzi hra kA ya ma no bi dA dz+nyA na bi sho d+ha ni swAhA// pu ru pu ru/ su ru su ru/ pu rA pu rA/ pra pu rA pra puM rA/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ d+harma d+hA tu garbe swAhA/ a b+ha ba sAhA/ sirba d+harma a baM/ 
52a4(rgyud): bo d+ha na swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i tshe ngag ni 'di yin te/ lan cig brjod pas kyang bskal pa steng gi bar du las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ 
52a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par thob paragyur ro// bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyang kyi/ sa phyogs par 'gyur ro// tshe rjes nas 'khor los bsgyur
52a6(rgyud): nga'i rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas stong mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dag tu skyo bar 'gyur ro// nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum nyi shu rtsar ra/ 
52a7(rgyud): brjod na ci 'dod pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi mdog can yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yul rnams la yang
52a8(rgyud): mi phyed pa'i sems dad pa can du 'gyur te// de la sogs pa phan yon tshad med pa dag 'byung ngo // stong 'gyur ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// 
52b1(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki ni/ kha lo ki mi tra/ 
52b2(rgyud): b+hA lo ka ni/ dzi ba ha pa ri sho d+ha ni/ d+hi da ni ya ga me/ A shA pa ri sho d+ha ni/ sarba satwa ma no ra the/ kA ya sid d+he shru ti d+ha ra NI smr-i to d+ha na swA hA/ cho ga zhag bdun gyi bar du shing a ba marga'i so shing la
52b3(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te nang re zhing zos na/ nyin gcig la sho lo ka brgya brgya lobs so// zla ba drug go bar du byas na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sho lo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs
52b4(rgyud): so// dkon ma cho ga gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dang Ta sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan
52b5(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ kha li kha li ba li te swAhA// gdong 'khru ba'i tshe chu khyor gang la sngags 'dis lan gsum mam bdun bzlas te 'thungs na
52b6(rgyud): nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo ka brgya lobs par 'gyur te/ sngon lobs pa rnams kyang brjed par mi 'gyur ro// sho lo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so// 
52b7(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// bI re bI re
52b8(rgyud): ma hI te dze te dza ma ti d+hA ra NI/ shru ta d+hA ra Ni/ dza yan ti bi dza yan ti ma ti d+ha NI swA hA// sman bram hi zho gnyis zhib tu btags te/ 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig/ 
53a1(rgyud): bzlas te zhag bdun gyi bar du 'thungs na/ gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am/ bstan bcos kyang rung ste/ thos pa
53a2(rgyud): nyin zhag gcig la sho lo ka stong longs par 'gyur ro// sho lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 
53a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ tri shA tri shu la shA khi/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ A dz+nyA ba ya ti/ ba re na bu ha la/ mring
53a4(rgyud): d+hA tu swA hA// cho ga ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang bya/ ngag gi zhabs drung du dkyil 'khor byas te/ ci 'byor/ depas mchod pa byas la/ tshu la sngags kyis btab te bzhag
53a5(rgyud): nas nang bar chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te dro ra kha zas 'o ma dang spags te zos na zhag bdun lon na nyi na gcig kyang sho lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro// yid ches
53a6(rgyud): pa'i rtags yod do// sho l-i ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas
53a7(rgyud): kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ ka btsa
53a8(rgyud): kat+ta la la te swAhA// tshul len bdun bzlas te gdong bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyuraro// de'i cho ga le 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar chu bzhag la lan bdun badz+ra
53b1(rgyud): brjod byas te 'thungs la/ dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang spags te bza' ba lta bur zhag bdun gyi bar du byas na nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo ka stong longs par 'gyur ro// sho lo ka stong lobs/ 
53b2(rgyud): pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
53b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ smr-i ti ma ti ma ti/ te dzA bi d+yA/ hU ru me ha ra hu ru kr-iSh+Na hu ru mai swAhA// shu dag dkar po la sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas te zos na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyun
53b4(rgyud): mi brjed pa'i gzungs rdzog so// 6// rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ dbod skad du/ shes rab skyed pa ces bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rat+naH
53b5(rgyud): yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ spe la te/ sA laM te/ ma ni te swA hA// rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te khyor tshul lan/ 
53b6(rgyud): gsum bzlas te/ 'thungs na zhag bdun nas thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shes rab skyed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lots+tsha ba ban+de klu'i
53b7(rgyud): dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan bi bid+yA kA ra si ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de de btsan+d+ras zhus te gtan la phab pa// @6// rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni nA ma~M d+hA ra NI/ 
53b8(rgyud): bod skad du/ shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ni ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ e bi ba bi ba/ 
54a1(rgyud): pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni/ dza ra dza ra/ meng+ga bar d+ha ni/ d+hi ra d+hi ri/ bud d+hi bar d+ha ni swAhA// rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ nang re zhing rtsab mo khyor gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig/ 
54a2(rgyud): bzlas te/ zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thung na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang
54a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ smr-i ti ma ti ma ti/ te dza bi drA/ hu ru me hu ru hu ru me/ kr-iSh+Na hu ru me swAhA// shu dag/ 
54a4(rgyud): nag po la sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// 
54a5(rgyud): // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na/ sa/ a lo ka na/ bud d+hak+She tra san daR+shan byA ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs
54a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs/ sems can la gzigs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa
54a7(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/ lha'i nor bu rin po che dpal
54a8(rgyud): gyi snying po dang / me tog rgyas pa dang / lha'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang / dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ sems can thams
54b1(rgyud): cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang snying rje chen po'i shes pa la gnas pa thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / skye ba gnyis
54b2(rgyud): dang skye ba gsum dang / skye ba bcu dang / skye ba nyi shu dang / skye ba sum cu dang / skye ba brgya'i bar dag gis thogs pa/ thams cad kyang sa brgyad pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas pa sha stag ste/ 
54b3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / dri med tog dang / nor dpal dang / glog gi tog dang / dri med 'od dang / tsan+dan dang bdud rtsi tog la sogs pa byang chub
54b4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun brgya dang / dge ba sbyin dang / dge bsnyen ma thams cad kyang lung bstan pa dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tha
54b5(rgyud): dad pa nas 'dus pa lnga stong dang / lha dang / klu dang / ga/ nod sbyin dang dri za thams cad kyang sngon gyi sangs rgyas la nga snyen bkur byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul mtho
54b6(rgyud): ba brgyad stong dang / gnod sbyin mo chen mo thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes thob pa/ lung bstan pa thob pa/ phyir mi ldog pa/ dpe med ma dang / dri med 'od dang / 'od can ma
54b7(rgyud): dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / dung can ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin mo chen mo brgyad cu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul
