105b2(rgyud): gi mu khyud la ta re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ oM dang ha'i bar du rak+Sha/ \u0f7fshin+tiM ku ru zhes pa ni steng gi 'khor lo la'o// 'og gi 'khor lo ni sngags bzlos pas so// phyi'i dbyangs yig kyang bzlog par shes par bya'o// 
105b3(rgyud): dbus su ni oM dang he'i bar du rak+Sha/ shAn+tiM ku ru bri bar bya'o// zhi ba chen po'i 'khrul 'khor gyi srung ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de nas phrin las bzhi'i las
105b4(rgyud): so so'i 'khor lo ni zhi ba ni kham pa la ge'u kha sbyor byas tedamer bsregs la kha dog dkar po byug par bya'o// de'i na dang du 'khor lo le ce dgu pa bris te/ sngags dgod pa ni oM
105b5(rgyud): tA re tut+tA re tu re zhes bya ba re mig brgyad la'o// ru ru/ a~M ru ru ru ru/ tA ru ru/ ru ru re ru ru/ ru ru tuta ru ru/ ru ru/ tA ru ru/ ru ru/ re ru ru/ ru ru/ tu ru ru/ ru ru/ re ru ru zhes
105b6(rgyud): bri'o// dbus su ni ku ru shAn+tiM ku ru zhes bris te ga'u sbyar te/ dbus su srad bu dkar po dang ldan pa'i ga'ur maN+Dal thog tu bzhag la/ me tog dkar pos mchod cing mchod pa rnam pa
105b7(rgyud): lnga yang dbul te dus gsum du mchod na zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas zhi ba chen po'i las bya ba ni kham pa la
105b8(rgyud): ga'u kha sbyar byas te tsan+dan dmar pos snag tsha byas la 'khor lo phyi nang bcas pa'i le tse dgu pa bri bar bya'o// sngags dgod pa ni swa shAn+tiM ku ru hoHzhes bya ba dbus su bri'o// mu khyud nangs
106a1(rgyud): la ni/ a a zhes bya bar brgyad dgod par bya'o// mu khyud phyi ma ni a oM a/ a tA a/ a re A/ a tung A/ a tA A/ a re A/ a tu A/ a ra/ 
106a2(rgyud): A/ zhes bya bar bri bar bya'o// me tog gi phreng bas bcings te maN+Dal gyi steng du dus bzhir mchod cing zhag bdun du sngags ma nor bar bzlas na zhi ba chen po'i las grub par 'gyur ro// zhi ba chen hU~M
106a3(rgyud): le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// de nas rgyas pa'i las bya ba ni gur gum 'am/ g+hi tang gis gro ga la 'khor lo'i phyi nang dang ldan pa'i le ce dgu pa bris te dbus su
106a4(rgyud): sarba paSh+TiM ku ru oM a zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o// le tse nang ma brgyad la oM brgyad bri bar bya'o// le tse phyi ma brgyad la oM oM au// oM tA oM/ oM re oM/ oM tud oM/ oM tA/ 
106a5(rgyud): oM/ oM re oM/ oM tu oM/ oM re oM zhes bya ba bris nas/ kham pa'i ga'ur bcug ste me tog ser po na ga puSh+pa'i me tog dang mchod pa lngas dus bzhir zla ba rgyas nas
106a6(rgyud): bzung nas zhag bdun du mchod na tshe dang bsod nams thams cad rgyas par 'grub bo// rgyas pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// de nas dbang du bsdu bar 'dod na kan da ka'i shun
106a7(rgyud): pa dang seng ldeng gi shun pa dang / mjo mo shing gi shun pa bskus pa'i khu bas gsegab bam/ ga'u la 'khor lo bro ba ni la tsi dgu pa'o// sngags dgod pa ni dbus su a sA tsa a mo g+ha ar+tha
106a8(rgyud): ha zhes pa bri'o// le tsa brgyad pa la ni a oM a/ a tA a/ a re a/ a tud a/ a tA a/ a re a/ a tu a/ a ri a/ zhes bris nas thod pa kha sbyor du bcug nas skud bsngo/ 
106b1(rgyud): bos bkris nas me tog dmar po dang / mchod pa lngas dus bzhir bla ba kham pa'i dus su mchod na thams cad dbang du 'du'o// dbang drag gi 'khor lo lo le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// 
106b2(rgyud): de nas dbang du 'du bar byed pa ni srin lag gi khrag dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / kan da ka'i khu ba rnams kyis bris te dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / mi sha'i gos la 'khor lo rtse dgu pa dri'o// dbus su a
106b3(rgyud): mo g+ha hIHha zhes bya ba dri'o// rtsibs brgyad la oM daM oM/ tA ba tA re ta re/ tuta ta tuta/ tA a tA/ re mo re/ tug+ha tu re tsI/ re zhes bya ba bri'o// ga'ur srin mgo dmar po dang / 'khor lo
106b4(rgyud): bral nas gtsang bar 'gram chur 'gram du sbas na 'bye zhing de dbang du 'gyur// dbye zhing dbang du bsdu ba'i 'khor lo'i la 'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// de nas bskang/ 
106b5(rgyud): par 'dod na dug dang khrag dang / rams rnams sbyar te dur khA dkyis ras la 'khor lo gnyis bris te le tse dgu pa'i drung su ha sa u tsa ha ha ha bri bar bya'o// le tse brgyad la ha oM ha/ 
106b6(rgyud): tA ha ha ra ha/ ha tutaha/ ha tA ha/ ha re ha/ ha tu ha/ ha re ha/ zhes pa bris te/ kha sbyar ka ba lar bcug ste skud pa sngon pos bcings te dur khrod du sbas na bskrang bar 'gyuraro// bslang ba'i
106b7(rgyud): le'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas dbye ba'i 'khor lo ni dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / bya rog dang 'ug pa'i khrag dang / dug mnyam por bsres pa'i snag tshas 'khor lo
106b8(rgyud): phyi nang dang bcas pa le ce dgu pa bris te dbus su phaT swA he ba da ta ha phaT ces bya bar dri'o// le tse nang ma brgyad la phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT ces pa dri'o// le tse phyi ma brgyad la phaT
107a1(rgyud): oM phaT/ phaT tA phaT/ phaT re phaT/ phaT tuta phaT/ phaT tA phaT/ phaT re phaT/ phaT tu phaT/ phaT re phaT/ zhes bya ba bris te/ bya rog dang / 'ug pa'i sgo ngar bcug ste brag dang
107a2(rgyud): chu 'thab sar sgong sbas na 'bye bar 'gyur ro// dbye ba'i 'khor lolo le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// de nas bsad pa'i 'khor lo ni dug dang / khrag dang / ske che rnams mnyam par
107a3(rgyud): sbyar bas le tse dgu pa'i 'khor lo phyi nang dang bcas pa bris te dbus su hUM sA mA ra ya hA pha ces bya ba bri'o// le tse nang ma la hUM phaT hUM/ phaT hUM phaT/ hUM phaT hUM/ phaT hUM phaT/ hUM phaT hUM/ phaT hUM phaT/ 
107a4(rgyud): hUM phaT hUM/ phaT hUM phaT ces bya ba bri'o// le tse phyi ma la hUM oM phaT/ hUM tA phaT/ hUM re phaT/ hUM tuta phaT/ hUM tA phaT/ hUM raM phaT/ hU~M hUM phaT/ hUM re phaT/ ces bya ba bris te rabs chad/ 
107a5(rgyud): pho mo'i thod pa la bris te sngags mang du bzlas nas dur khrod/ du smras na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// bsad pa'i 'khor lo'i le sti sum pa'o// myos pa'i 'khor lo na da ru ra'i chus
107a6(rgyud): ras sam/ shog shog la le tshe dgu pa phyi nang dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo bris te dbus su ha ha de ba tad ta ha ha zhes pa bri'o// le tse nang ma la hA hA hA hU hA h+ma hA hA bri bar bya'o// phyi ma brgyad la ni hA i
107a7(rgyud): hwAHs+yAt+ta hA/ hA re hA/ hU tutah+Na/ h+yA tAh+Na/ hA re h+na/ hA tuh+ma/ hA re h+na/ zhes bya ba bris te rtsi'i ga'ur bcug nas bzlas pa ci nas myur bar byas te lam rgya gram du dong dang bcas par sbas te du ras
107a8(rgyud): spungs na myos par 'gyu ro// gson mar sbrang rtsi/ 'o mas ling ga bkrus na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// myos byed kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas mnan pa'i 'khor lo ni g.yam pa
107b1(rgyud): lal tse dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris te/ lung ba'i chus le ce dgu pa la dbus sugs swa b+ha ya stA b+hA ya g+hA ha zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o// la ci brgyad pa lag yog/ ga tAg/ ga reg/ gtung ga/ ga tA ga// 
107b2(rgyud): reg/ ga tug/ ga re ga/ zhes bya ba bris te/ 'khor lo sbyar nas lam rgya gram du smras na 'gul mi shes par 'gyuraro// mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// 
107b3(rgyud): de nas mnan pa chen po ni yung ba'i khu bas snag tsha byas te kham pa'i ga'u'i nang du phyi nang le tso dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris la sngags dgod pa ni dbu su rgas staM b+ha ya/ rga ha zhes bya ba bri'o// nang ma la/ ha ha ha ha/ 
107b4(rgyud): ha ha ha ha zhes bya ba brgyad bri'o// de'i phyi rol gyi li tse dgu la ni rga oM rga/ rga tAn/ rga re rga/ rga tud rga/ rga tAn/ narma/ rga tun/ rgare na// zhes bya ba bris te sgrub pa 'phags mal
107b5(rgyud): dgra gang nas 'ong ba'i phyogasu sbas na srung bar 'gyur zhing dgra 'i sgor sbas na mnan par 'gyuraro// dgra mnan pa'i 'khor la 'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas rig sngags
107b6(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba gnon par byed pa'i 'khor lo ni yung ba'i khu bas g.yam pa 'am/ lhang tsher ba gnyis gang yang rung ba la 'khor lo bris te le tse dgu pa la phyi nang dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// sngags dgod pa ni
107b7(rgyud): dbus su ni wa sa sta b+hA ya sta~M b+hA ya hA/ 'khor lo na ma la/ wa la wa wA/ wa wa wa wa/ zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o// phyi ma la wa oM wa/ wa k+ShaH/ wa ra Ta/ wa Sh+Tab na/ wa tA la/ wa ra na/ 
107b8(rgyud): tuwa wa re wa/ zhes bya ba bris te/ phan tshun g.yas g.yon du 'khor lo re re sbas na mnan par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi sbyor ba mnan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas
108a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sa byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dang lha gan dus/ matog ma da dang / drA dang / gsung la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la gta / 
108a2(rgyud): gyi chom mo'i sgra du ma yang bsgrags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ dam tshig kyang gling gis 'grub par 'gyur zhes nus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ so sor
108a3(rgyud): sdom gnas te/ lha'i 'khor lo dang ldan pas// srog chags dag ni bsang bsrung // ma byin ba dag mi blang zhing // bud me mi bsnyen skang mi bya// brdzun ni rnam pa kun tu spang // myos gyur dgas
108a4(rgyud): sha dag dang // rku shing rnam pa rtag tu spang // mo rnams thams cad kun la ni// chags pa'i sems kun spang ba/ ste// ma bzhin du ni kun la ni// phan pa'i sems kyis kun
108a5(rgyud): la bskur// dam tshig sdom pa gnas pa yi// las rnam sa kun la mthu yod 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso// dam tshig dang sdom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu
108a6(rgyud): rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu la sogs pa'i 'khor dpag
108a7(rgyud): tu med pa dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa rje su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rgyud las sna tshog
108a8(rgyud): bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shri mi tra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// 
108b1(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ra b+ha dra nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka/ bod skad du/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// dpal
108b2(rgyud): ldan yid 'ong po Ta la// sna tshogs khams kyis rnam par spras// sna tshogs ljon pas bkram pa ste// skye gnyis du ma sgra 'byin pa// 'bab chu sna tshogs ku co che// ri dgas sna tshogs 'khrugs
108b3(rgyud): pa ste/ me tog sna tshogs rigs rnams kyis// kun tu dri yis bkang ba ste// sna tshogs yid 'ongs 'bras bur ldan// rkang pa drug pa klu yi sgra// mi 'am ci yis klu snyan len// glang chen smon
108b4(rgyud): pas yang dag khengs// rigs 'dzin pa'i tshogs rnams dang // dri za rnams kyang glu len pa// thub pa 'dod chags bra la rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhan dang
108b5(rgyud): sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams dang ni// 'phags ma sgrol so// gas lha mo rnams// rigs pa'i rgyal mo stong rnams kyis// rtag tu legs par ston pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po tshogs
108b6(rgyud): gzhan dang // rta mgrin la sogs kyis bskor ba// sems can kun la phan par brtson// bcom ldan 'das ni spyan ras gzigs// bzhugs te de phyir dpal dang ldan pad+ma'i snying po thub pa'i
108b7(rgyud): gdan// dka' thub chen po dang ldan pa// byams pa dang ni snying rje ldan// lha yi 'khor ni chen po la// chos gsung po ni yang dag bzhugs// de ru nyer 'dug yang dag langs// phyag na rdo rje stobs
108b8(rgyud): po che// mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pas// spyan ras gzigs la zhus pa ste// rkun po sbrul dang seng ge dang // glang po stag dang chu 'jigs pas// zhi mdzad thub pas sems can rnams// 'khor
109a1(rgyud): pa'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams// 'khor ba'i zhags pas bcings pa rnams// chags sdang gti mug dri ma las// gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba// de gsungs bdag
109a2(rgyud): la thub chen po// de skad zhus nas bcom ldan 'das// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad gsungs// dpal ldan de ni spyan ras gzigs// phyag na rdo rje rab rtogs byed// snyan pa'i tshig ni 'di skad
109a3(rgyud): gsungs// nyon cig gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po// skyob pa 'od dpag med pa yis// smon lam stobs kyis byung ba ste// nga yis 'jig rten ma ru shes// snying rje tshe dang ldan pa yis// 'gro ba 'don
109a4(rgyud): par brtson pa mo// nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba// zla ba nya 'dra byed kyi 'ong // lnga bcas mi dang lha min dang // mi rnams thams cang gsal bar byed// 'jig rten gsum po g.yo bar byed/ 
109a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin srin po 'jigs par byed// phyag na ut+pal sngon phra ste// ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes brjod ma// bar snang / du ni 'bar bar gnas// 'gro ba yang dag gzung don du// mtshon
109a6(rgyud): gyis bskal ba byung ba dang // 'jigs pa sna tshogs 'khrugs don du// rgyal ba rnams kyi bdag bskyed de// ming rnams dran pa nyid kyis ni// sems can thams cad bdag gis srung // sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i rgya
109a7(rgyud): mtsho las// sems can thams cad bdag gis bsgral// des na bdag la 'jig rten du// rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis sgrol mar bsgrags// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol
109a8(rgyud): gsung cig mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' ba'i// sdig pa spong byed bsod nams dang // bkra shos grags pa 'phel bar byed
109b1(rgyud): gter dang nor rnams 'phel byed nyid// nad rnams thams cad brlag par byed// dpal dang shis pa 'jog par byed// nad med tshe ni 'phel bar byed// sems can rnams la byams bsgoms la// de dag
109b2(rgyud): sgrogs shig thub chen po// spyan ras gzigs dbang rab tu bzhad// mchog rnams rab tu rnams gzigs nas// 'di lta bu yi byams pa spro// phyag ni g.yas pas phyag thab mdzad// bsod nams
109b3(rgyud): mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// de gsungs shes rab shin tu che// leg so legaso dka' thub che// sems can kun la gcig tu brtse// bskal pa chen po mi rnams nyon// mi rnams gang zhig 'di sgrogs
109b4(rgyud): pa/ nor gyi dbang phyug yang dag 'gyur// nad rnams thams cad yang dag grol// dbang phyug kun dang yang dag ldan// dus dmin 'chi ba nges par bsregs// 'chi ba bde ba can 'gro ba// 
109b5(rgyud): rnams bdag gis bshad par bya// lha yi dge 'dun bdag la nyon// 'di la rje su yi ring gis// legs par bsdams bar 'gyur la bstod// oM dge ba can ni gzi brjid che// 'jig
109b6(rgyud): rten gso byed snyan pa che// dbyangs can ma ni spyan yangs ma// shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma// gso byed ma dang rgyas 'debs ma// swA hA/ oM gyis rnam par 'dod gzugs ma// sems can kun la/ 
109b7(rgyud): phan par brtson// g.yul las sgrol byed rgyal ba mo// lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin// 'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma// rdza rnga dung can rgyas pa mo// rig pa'i rgyal mo tshig snyan ma// zla ba'i gdong can
109b8(rgyud): dkar mo che// mi pham gos ni ser mo can// sgyu ma chen mo dkar mo che// stobs po che la pha rol phyin// rtsub mo chen mo gtum chen mo// sdang ba'i sems kyis brlag byed ma// rab tu zhi bzhi pa'i gzugs
110a1(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba 'bar ba'i 'od// glog gi phreng brgyal mtshan can// ral gri 'khor lo gzhu thogs mtshon// 'chol byed rengs byed nag mo ni// mtshan mo nag mo mtshan spyod ma/ 
110a2(rgyud): srung byed rmongs byed zhi ba mo// mdzes ma dge ma 'dra ba'i lding // tshangs pa mo dang rig byed ma// gsang ba mo ni brag phug gnas// bkra shis don byed zhi ba mo// skyes nas rig byed yid mgyogs ma// thod pa
110a3(rgyud): can ni shugs chen mo// tshangs ma bden ma gzhan mi rgyal// ded dpon chen mo snying rje gnas// chud zos pa la la rab ston// mchog ster ster byed ston pa mo// bud med gzugs la dpag med gnon// ri khrod
110a4(rgyud): ma dang rnal 'byor ma// grub ma gtum ma bdud rtsi ma// des ma nor ma bsod nams ma// skal chen skal bzang mdzes ston mu// mthar byed 'jig byed 'jigs byed ma// drag dang brtul zhug
110a5(rgyud): chen mo ma// 'gro la gcig tu phan par brtson// skyabs byed/ gus la gsong po ma// ngag gi dbang phyug zhi phra ma// rtag ma kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma// don kun sgrub byed bzang mo ma/ 
110a6(rgyud): gsang byed gso byed nor sten ma// mi 'jigs bsod nams gau ta ma// spyan ras gzigs dbang bdag nyid skyes// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// phan par byed par grags pa ste// mchog tu rmad
110a7(rgyud): byung gsang ba'o// lha yul na yang rnyed dka' ba// skal bzang skal ba dang ldan byed// dug ni thams cad nyams byed la// nad ni thams cad zhi byed ma// sems can kun la bde ster ma// blo ldan gang / 
110a8(rgyud): zhig lan gsum klog/ mnyam gzhag gtsang sbra byas pa yis// des ni dus mi rung ba ru// rgyal srid dpal yang thob par 'gyur// rtag tu sdug pa'ang bde bar 'gyur// bkren pa phyug por 'gyur ba'o// 
110b1(rgyud): rmongs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur// yid gzhungs 'gyur ba the tshom med// bcings pa bcings las grol bar 'gyur// tha snyad las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur// dgra bo bshes por 'gyur ba ste// rwa can dang ni
110b2(rgyud): mche ba can// dog pa'i mthab mo rgyal dka' dang // sna tshogs 'jigs pa 'khrugs pa las// mtshan ni 'di rnams dran pa yis// 'jigs pa kun las sgrol bar byed// dus min 'chi las sgrol
110b3(rgyud): bar byed// skyes bu snyan pa thob par byed/ mi ni skye ba don dang bcas// de gcig pu yi phan yon gyis// gang zhig 'di ni sngar langs nas// skyes bu gang zhig sgrogs byed pa// de yi dus ring tshe dang ldan
110b4(rgyud): mi ni dpal gyis dga' 'gyur te// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za dang ni lus srul po// 'byung po gshed byed sri/ na po dang // ma mo rtsub pa'i sems ldan pa// gnod sbyin mo
110b5(rgyud): dang yi dgas byed// smyo byed dang ni gdon chen rnams// grwa ba gnon dang ni brjed byed dang // sha za la sogs pa rnams dang // ro langs la sogs sna tshogs rnams// bskul byed
110b6(rgyud): gzhan sems sdang ba rnams// grib ma yang ni 'gom mi 'gyur// ji ltar slar ni mchod par 'gyur// sdang ba'i sems can 'ching bar 'gyur// nad la sogs pas thebs mi 'gyur// phyag dang
110b7(rgyud): longs spyod yon tan ldan// bu dang tsha bo 'phel bar 'gyur// blo ldan skye ba dran par 'gyur// rigs dang ldan zhing mthong dgar 'gyur// gzi brjid ldan zhing tshig gsal ba// bstan bcos thams
110b8(rgyud): cad rig par 'gyur// dge ba shes bsnyen bkur yang dag bsten// byang chub sems kyis rgyan pa dang // gang dang gang du skyes pa der// rtag tu sangs rgyas kyis mi spong // dpal ldan 'phags pa
111a1(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// !// rgya gar skad du/ tA/ 
111a2(rgyud): rade bI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kan/ bod skad du/ lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ba'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang / na bza' dang / sham thabs kyi
111a3(rgyud): gshal kas 'jig rten gyi khams chen po'i bla re byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas lha mo sgrol mas de'i tshe sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i gzungs kyis mchog brjod pa// oM trai lo kya bi dza ya/ a tsit+ta tra
111a4(rgyud): ya a nir tsidza tA ya/ su dza ya/ bi dza ya/ ma hA dza ya/ dza ya/ dza ya dza ya/ he he/ sma ra sma ra/ ba ra bar/ ba ra dam hA de gi bi las/ bi las/ bi las/ badz+ra a mo takaraH
111a5(rgyud): dza ya de bi hIn+ti/ ki na ki na bi laM ba se/ sma ra sma re/ ma ya/ pradz+nyA a ni ba ta/ badz+ra ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bI gi ni hUM hUM/ s+phu ta s+phu ta/ s+pho ta s+pho ta/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ d+hun d+hu/ 
111a6(rgyud): na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hun/ kam+ba kam+ba/ kam+ba ya/ su ra bi gan d+ha/ a ti si ta/ mu khe ha la nga ba la/ saM ga rA dzA na bi ma bi gau/ bi nA sha ya bi nAM sha ya/ he b+ha ga ba ti/ san trA sa ya/ bi ga nan/ 
111a7(rgyud): lA ya/ asma ka asma ka/ mA da ni mA da ni/ saM bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ha ra ha ra/ hi ri hi ri/ hu ru hu ru/ bi ta ra ka ba ra dza/ ha he/ tro tA ya haM hi/ san tri tA ya/ san tro ya/ man+ta man+ta/ man+da maR+Sha/ tsa ra
111a8(rgyud): tsa ra sa tsa ra saM tsa ra/ be ga be ga be ga ba ti/ na mon mo na maHswA hA// de nas lha dang lha min tshogs// srin po gnod sbyin mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams dang // 'byung po dri ba log 'dran
111b1(rgyud): rnams// 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i mchog/ gsang sngags chen po 'di thos nas// skrag cing mgo bo smang gyur te// lag pa chen po yongs spyod nas// gang gis 'di nas sa gsum 'di// mtshan dag
111b2(rgyud): khyab par bya ba'i phyir// 'dod pa'i lha yi dag bzlog pa// sgrol ma spyan yangs phyag 'tshalo// spyan ras gzigs kyis gzigs smras pa// che ba nyid kyis grags pa'o// spyan yangs khyod ni sems can
111b3(rgyud): rnams// phan bzhed slad du 'byung ba lags// de nas dbang phyug la sogs pa// lha dang lha min 'dus kun dang // rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po dang // de bzhin rig sngags 'chang ba rnams// bla gos
111b4(rgyud): phrag pa gcig gzar te// bskor ba mchog ni byas nas kyang // pus mAM lha nga sa steng du// btsugs nas tshig ni 'dis dang smras// sgrol ma 'od 'bar de la ni// phyag 'tshal phyag
111b5(rgyud): 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yis// dpe med ming ni brjod par bgyi// bkra shis rnam rgyal da/ pal bzang ba// skye dgu'i dbang phyug mngon shes myur// dbang
111b6(rgyud): phyug rab dga' 'jigs la drag/ rgod bag med cing dreg pa med// pad+ma'i spyan dang pad+ma'i zhal// pad+ma'i lte ba rab gtsang sbyin// spyan bzang spun ni yangs pa ste// sngo ba ut+pal sngon po'i 'od // skyob
111b7(rgyud): pa skyabs 'os bde ba sbyin// de bzhin stobs sbyin gzugs sbyin pa// mgon po mgon mdzad drag mo ste// dkon mchog gsum po rgyal mdzad ma// sgros dmar sen mo dmar ba ste// sman rtsa
111b8(rgyud): dmar pos gzigs par mdzad// dga' mdzod dga' stobs pad+ma lags// pad+ma'i mdog can pad mdog dgyes// 'jig rten gsum 'dul zhi ba ste// 'jigs pa'i cha lugs stobs
112a1(rgyud): mo che/ 'dul du 'jug ma 'dul mdzad ma// bstod ldan mi mchog dam pa lags// rab gsal 'dul ba rdo rje can// rnam par rgyal ba 'od gsal ba// byang chub
112a2(rgyud): rdul med dri ma med// zla ba lha mchog rnams kyi rje// sred bya dang ni sred bya'i bar// rgyu zhing gshegs la 'od zer mdzes// chu lce g.yul 'gyed 'gying bag can// skyes mchog rang bzhin yod/ 
112a3(rgyud): 'phros rgyas// gtsug pud gsum po lto tshil gsum// spyan gsum dri ma gsum sel ba// srid pa sel mdzad khong dge ba// tshig ldan ma yang de bzhin grags// rgyal ba sbyin pa bsod nam/ 
112a4(rgyud): sbyin// sdig pa 'joms ma 'jigs pa med// nor sbyin mdog sbyin zhi ba ma// gzugs bzang byal bzang num bzang // rgyu 'phrul sgyu 'phrul ldan zhing 'dul// dul ba srung
112a5(rgyud): rdul sel ba// phreng ba thogs ma rgyags mdzad ma// rnyog sa pa sbyin ma dregs spong ma// drag mo lags te gzing ste ngam// dkar mo zhi mjed bdeb mo// skye dgu'i bdag mo tshangs
112a6(rgyud): par ldan// tshangs sprin dbang phyug dam pa lags// zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i zhal// zla ba'i gzi ni 'phrog par mdzad// nyi ma'i gzi 'phrog dgyes pa mo// yid 'ong bzang zhing zhi ma mo// bde ma bde
112a7(rgyud): ldan mu dang stegs// bkra shis bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma// nor spel bsod nams rnam par rgyal// 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser dngul 'od// 'jigs pa sel ba 'jigs med sbyin// sgrol
112a8(rgyud): ma lags te zla ba'i zhal// sems can kun la med mi 'gyur// mchod gnas phyag gnas dga' mdzad ma// cha lugs sngo ba cha lugs bzang // rgyan dmar rgyan du thogs pa ste// na bza'ags
112b1(rgyud): banabs gang ga ma// dkar mo 'bar ba rnam par gzigs// gi'u wang gi thig le spos// 'khor ldan rdo rje chu lha nyid// dkyil 'khor mchog mnga' 'jigs mdzad ma// tshems dkar bzhad cing chems dkar
112b2(rgyud): 'dzums dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub 'khor thogs// do shal 'bar ba'i chun po can// 'od dpag bzang ldan zhal bzang ma// grogs ni nim pa'i lo ma thogs// nor bu'i cod pan nor bu 'chang // nor bu'i
112b3(rgyud): rgyan rnams rgyan du thogs// nor bu'i 'od zer snang ba can// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba// 'bar ba'i mdog mngar rdo rje can// skyes pa bud med sad par mdzad// zhi ba dbyig thogs mche
112b4(rgyud): ba can// tshangs pa'i zhugs can rlung dang ldan// bud med lags she mkha' las gshegs// lha mo mchog gi 'od 'bro ma// 'od dang ldan pa 'dod pas 'dul// 'dod pa'i khro bo rab 'joms ma
112b5(rgyud): drag po thor tshugs gtsug bud can// tshangs pa tshangs pa'i ga sungs ldan rgyal// ping ka'i skad 'dra bag bzang ma/ 'jig rten dbang phyug rigs mchog skyes// dbyig pa'i shing
112b6(rgyud): la rdo rje thogs// drag mo rin chen 'od kyis brgyan// gshegs na snyan cha dri med g.yo// gshin rje ba yi yid la 'jug/ rig sngags 'chang ma gzugs 'chang ma// stobs lnga stobs dang ldan pa
112b7(rgyud): mdzad/ stobs dang stobs med mnga' ba ste// shes rab mtshon gyis gcod par mdzad// sgyu stsal lags te sgyu stsal ldan// de bzhin brjod dang smra ba lags// steng nas khyams dang khyams bcwadz+ra/ 
112b8(rgyud): tshul ba tsam pa ka yi chun pos gsal// ser mo can pa legs pa'i rten// drag mo phyag na chun po thogs// bskal pa bzang mo gshal ka can// de bzhin shin tu shas cher dgyes// rigs mtsha
113a1(rgyud): shin tu stobs dang ldan// rdo rje khro bo dga' mdzad ma// bde ldan blo ldan rdo rje'i thogs// blo mdzad shes rab bskyed par mdzad// lha mo lam me cod pan can// lha rnams
113a2(rgyud): kun la tshul lhag ma// sred med bu mo sdig pa sel// bkra shis ngo tsha shes dang dgyes// rab tu dga' ma grogs na dga'// spong tshul dga' la dga' dang ldan// dga' ma dga' bar mdzad pa ste/ 
113a3(rgyud): chos rnams kun gyis legs pa'i rten// sangs rgyas sprul pa sprul mdzad ma// nga rgyal sel bar mdzad pa ste// las dang nyon mongs rab 'joms shing // 'dod pa'i sde rnams rab 'joms ma
113a4(rgyud): shes pa bcu mnga' sangs rgyas pa// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sa bcu dag la mnga' brnyes pa// stobs rnams bcu pos cher gsal ma// rdo rje gcod pan rdo rje 'chang // rdo
113a5(rgyud): rje phra mo lha min sel// dus kyi rdo rje rab tu rgyags// rdo rje lcag sa kyu bde ba dpal// rdo rje zhags pa zhags pa bzang // sgeg mo rdo rje phyag na bsnams// yid 'ong yid la tshim par
113a6(rgyud): mdzad// pha rol bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma// tshim mdzad shas cher bde ba ste// rol cing gar thabs ston par mdzad// chos can ha la ha la'i 'od// chos sprin rnam par gzigs pa lags
113a7(rgyud): khyod ni rdo rje 'phro ba dang // bdud rtsi rdo rjer brjod pa ste// rdo rje 'bar ba stobs mo che// lha mo chen mo khyod phyag 'tshal// bdag cag rnams kyis bstod pa yis// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'di
113a8(rgyud): brjodasakye kye bcom ldan mchog nyid ni// smra ba rnams kyi mchog lags gsungs// de nas zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'bar la 'phro bar ldan pa yi// lha mo sgrol ma brjid bag can// 'dzum
113b1(rgyud): bzhin du ni rab smras pa// dbang phyug chen po la sogs kun// nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis// thams cad rtag tu 'thun par ni// stobs bcu dag la brtson bgyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mu/ 
113b2(rgyud): chen yang // dus kun du ni bsrung bar gyis// zhi ba'i lam la dmigs pas ni// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi bzad cing // 'jigs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa// rgal dka' khyed kyis rgal bar gyis
113b3(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer la// dmigs nas brtson te 'jug par gyis// de nas nyi 'od 'bar ba yi// phreng ba lta bu mdzes pa'i zhal// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug gi sgra// 'dra ba'i tshig
113b4(rgyud): ni bka' stsal pa// kye ma rig sngags sgrol ma'i mchogadamun pa sel bar byed pa dang // mthu stobs rgya chen bskyed dbyed pa// sgrib pa thams cad gcod byed pa// tshogs rnam/ 
113b5(rgyud): skyed pa'i gzi brjid kyis// dag par byas pa ma yin pas// shas cher dga' bar byed pa yi// gzungs 'di thos pa mi 'gyuraro// sngon chad sangs rgyas brtson byas pa'i// brtan
113b6(rgyud): po gzi brjid dag rnams la// dam tshig chen po rig sngags kyi// dam tshig 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur// nyon mongs mtha' dag rab 'joms shing // sdig pa thams cad sel byed pa// sems
113b7(rgyud): can thams cad rab 'byed pa'o// gzungs sngags rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa// su zhig mnyam par gzhag pa yis// nyan tam 'chang ngam klog byed na// rang byung gis ni gsungs pa bzhin// de yi don kun/ 
113b8(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing // sems can kun las lhag pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten dag tu chos shes la// 'dzud pa'i de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs// su zhig meng/ 
114a1(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad 'di // 'don cing sgrol ma zla ba'i zhal// de bzhin stong byed de dag ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur// de yi don kyang 'grub 'gyur zhing // rgyal po
114a2(rgyud): rnams dang stobs chen mi// gzhan yang sems can bgrang ba gang // thams cad de yis dbang du 'gyur// lha mo sgrol ma zhal bzang ba'i// ming brgya rtsa brgyad grags pa'ang // 'jig rten dag na rgyag
114a3(rgyud): ba dang // nyon mongs mi rigs kun sel ba'o// de nas bdud ris gyen du g.yos pa'i ri bo 'khrug byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri bo mchog dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' ba// 'od gsal lha dang mi
114a4(rgyud): rnams legs par sang bar mdzad pa po// rgyal sras thu bo rnam ngas kyis khyad par stobs kyis brten pa yis// gsung rab rtag tu tshogs chen brda sprod la// don chen grags shing phan phyir
114a5(rgyud): zhugs pa gang // rab des chos de dang ni sdud byed dang // de/ bzhin khyad par sems pa'i rims sel bas// bzod/ med nyon mongs sel ba dang // zhi ba'i yid ni bskyed pa'i tshig
114a6(rgyud): rgyal ba mchog gis bka' stsal nas// gzhes par gyur te ma gsungs bzhugs// de nas sgrol mchog lha mos gtsor gyur dga' bar byed cing yid 'phrog la dga' ba rgya chen skyed cing tshe dang
114a7(rgyud): sbyin bstan pa'i tshig thos pas// lha tshogs lha min tshogs bcas mtha' dag dga' ba rgyas shing rmad byung nas// rab tu dga' zhing spyi bos thal mo sbyar te smra bzhi par gyur// sgrol ma'i mchog
114a8(rgyud): tsos bya ba'i gzungs te lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// !// rgya gar skad du/ b+ha Ta tA rA aSh+Ta sha da ka/ 
114b1(rgyud): nA ma/ bod skad du/ rje btsun sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa ces bya ba/ rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan dge ma gzi chen ma// 'jig rten ma ma grags chen mo// dbyangs
114b2(rgyud): can sman ni skyes rings la// blo dpal shes rab 'phel mdzad ma// swA hA brtan phyir rgyas sbyin zhing // 'dod pa'i gzugs can yi ge oM// sems can kun la phan brtson zhing // g.yul las/ 
114b3(rgyud): sgrol bar mdzad pa mo// lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin// 'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma// rje chen dung gi sgra sgrogs shing // rig sngags rgyal mo snyan smra mo// zla ba'i zhal can dkar mo che// mi thub
114b4(rgyud): na bza' ser mo bsnams// sgyu 'phrul chen mo dkar mo ne da// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa mo// drag mo chen mo gtum pa che// gdug pa'i sems can 'dul ba mo// rab tu
114b5(rgyud): zhi zhing zhi ba'i sku// rnam rgyal 'bar ba'i 'od ldan ma// glog phreng rdo rje 'khor lo dang // gzhu dang mda' yi phyag mtshan man// nag mo gnod dang sdom byed cing // mtshan mo nag mo
114b6(rgyud): mtshan spyod ma// srung mdzad rmongs mdzad zhi mdzad ma// mdzes ma dge ma 'gro lding ma// bram ze mo ste rigs byed yum// zab mo'i phug na bzhugs pa mo// zhi ba bkra shis ri khrod ma// rig
114b7(rgyud): ba bskyed cing yid ltar mgyogs// thod pa can te shugs chen zhing // gzhan gyis mi thub dus bden ma// ded dpon snying rjes gnon pa mo// lam brgyad ston par mdzad ma ste/ 
114b8(rgyud): mchog sbyin ston mdzad bstan chos ldan// ma pham bud med gzugs kyis gnon// grub pa rnal 'byor ri khrod ma// gtum mo bdud rtsi rtag pa mo// nor ldan bsod nams skal ba che/ 
115a1(rgyud): bskal bzang mthong na dga' ba mo// mthar byed skrag byed 'jigs pa mo// shin tu drag cing cher 'bar ma// 'gro la cig tu phan brtson zhing // skyabs 'os mos la
115a2(rgyud): byams pa mo// tshig gi dbang phyug phra ba mo// rtag par kun tu 'dod sprin la// don kun grub pa bzang mo ste// sbas ma ma ma nor sprin ma// 'jigs byed bsod nams go'u ta ma// dpal ldan
115a3(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug yum// sgrol ma yonan mtha' yas shing // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad ma// ming ni brgya dang brgyad po 'di// tho rangs langs te gang zhig klog/ sgrol mas
115a4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don thams cad// phun sum tshogs pa thob pa dar byed// 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ rdzogs so// / 
115a5(rgyud): kha che'i paN+Di ta bud d+ha A ka ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba ga ru chos kyi shes rab kyis// kha che'i dpe la bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 
115a6(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ b+ho d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tuta tA re tu re sarba
115a7(rgyud): duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta na ma ma kr-i te dzaM b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya me ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta staM b+ha ni tA re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// 
115a8(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA swa pra tI dz+nyA na ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa ces bya ba'i gzungs// 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// 
115b1(rgyud): nas sgrol ma rang gi dam bcas pa'i gzungs smras pa/ tad+ya thA.oM tA re tA re yai/ hU hUM nU/ sa ma ya s+thi te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sarba b+ha ra Na/ bi b+hu Shi te/ pad+ma ni pad+ma/ ma hA bang+ga/ 
115b2(rgyud): a sa na s+thi te/ ha sa ha sa/ trai lo kya bar ngi/ sarba de ba dan pa/ pU dzi te sma rA hI/ bI ga ba te tA re/ s+pha rA hi/ b+ha ga ban ta/ ta thA ga tA s+ya/ pu ra tas ma yaM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ 
115b3(rgyud): ma hA satwA a ba lo ki te/ ma Ni ka ni ka/ bi tsi tra b+ha ra Ne/ oM bi laM kA ya/ che ge mo/ b+ha ga bAn te/ tA re/ hI hI hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di yid kyis dran pa tsam gyis
115b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub tham das cad thob par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// dkar po'i ches brgyad dam bco lnga la 'phags ma smos
115b5(rgyud): ma la mchod pa chen po byas te sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong gi 'de tsam du bzlas par bya'o// gang 'dod pa de sbyin no// mchog thams cad ster ro// ma byin na bdag gis mtshams
115b6(rgyud): med pa lnga byas so// gzhan yang phan yon dpag tu meng ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje mchog gi rgyud las btus// 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// 
115b7(rgyud): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ya sho ba ti d+hA rA NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal/ 
115b8(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa re ma hA dz+wa re/ du khe ma khe su ban ne/ ma hA saM pan ne/ saM bta ti/ ma hA saM pa ta ti/ 
116a1(rgyud): ka se ma hA ka se/ kats+tsha dz+wa ra muka te si swA hA// skud pa'am chu la lan gsum bsngags na rims las thar par 'gyu ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba 'o// 
116a2(rgyud): ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi lo mi li/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ Ir+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA swA hA// gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa'im
116a3(rgyud): skud pa dmar po la lan gsum bsngags te mdud pa gsum bor la bcings na bar du gcod bzhi par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA
116a4(rgyud): satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ki l-i ki li/ tsi li tsi li/ ni gI Shi su hA// 'bru mar la lan gsum bsngags te bskus na snyun 'tsho'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nu ma Ar+ya be lo ki ti
116a5(rgyud): shwa re ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sa ra/ si raM/ bi sa re/ bi sa re/ sa ra Ne/ sha ni swAhA// shi ba'i rna bar lan gsum bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro// 
116a6(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ni si ri ni si re/ ka li ni ma re/ ka la ri tsi rI/ bi tsi la swAhA// lA ba dang / lkog ma
116a7(rgyud): lha gor dang / lce'i kyi ba na ba dang / gdon nad thams cad la 'jime pa la lan gsum du bsngags te bskus na phan no// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ badz+ra pA Ni d+ha ma/ 
116a8(rgyud): oM oM kA ra pra b+ha be/ b+ha ga ba ti bud+d+he/ pra ti bud d+he/ shud d+he shan ti ki r-i/ ha na he na/ ma me bA ba maM/ da had ha/ ma ma be bA / pa tsa pa tsi/ ma ma pA pa kan/ oM ai De/ gras/ 
116b1(rgyud): gras ri te De ri te De/ shan ti ka ri ye swA hA// shu b+ha ka ri ye swA hA/ shu b+ha ka ri ye swA hA/ k+She ma ka ri ye swAhA// rims nad kyis btab pa la khyab pa byas na rims nang sos par 'gyur ro// 
116b2(rgyud): sman la sngags kyis btab te blung na/ nad pa sos par 'gyur ro// zas la sngags kyis btab te zos na dug mi gnod par 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bu mos bka'
116b3(rgyud): pa'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te bcings na thar par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// 
116b4(rgyud): // rgya gar skad du/ Ur+d+ha dza TA ma hA kalpa ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba~M kur+b+ba Na pa Ta la bi sa rA b+ha ga ba tI Ar+ye tA rA mu la kalpan+ta ma/ bod skad du/ ral pa gyen rjes kyi rtog pa chen po/ byung
116b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa le'u radra/ 'byams las bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol/ ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
116b6(rgyud): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma'i gru'i steng gi na mkha'i mthil na rab tu bzhugs te/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam
116b7(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la bkra
116b8(rgyud): stsal pa/ lha'i bu khyed rnams nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi smad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spod pa ting nge 'dzin
117a1(rgyud): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa dang / che dang / 
117a2(rgyud): nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi gzhi/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i ched du bshad kyis/ de
117a3(rgyud): legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig/ ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes so// de nas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams thal mo sbyar ba btung nas 'di
117a4(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa 'u sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par so sor thob par byed pa// rdo rje'i gdon gnon par byed pa// 
117a5(rgyud): bdud 'dul bar byed pa// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bya/ nga ba/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung bar byed pa/ lha dang mi rnams su skye bar byed pa
117a6(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dbul ba dang nod kyis btab pa thams cad kyi nang sel bar byed pa nyid dang /  jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rog snga/ 
117a7(rgyud): dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa zil gyis mi non pa nyid dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gsung du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad don med/ 
117a8(rgyud): par gsungs par byed pa ma logs na/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i sems dang / bdag cag dang / sems can thams cad la rjesu brtse banye bar bdud nas de gsung dugs la/ 
117b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas rnam par dag pa'i yul la 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba
117b2(rgyud): rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas me tog lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun tu
117b3(rgyud): bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor ba nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
117b4(rgyud): gyi khams mtha' yas pa 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char gang ga'i klung brgya stong phrag gis bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rte/ na gyi khams las 'das pa na/ bde ba can zhes
117b5(rgyud): bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rjes su zhugs te/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs pa der bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
117b6(rgyud): dbang phyug kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa la so sor gnas pa rnams kyi thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa de 'od zer gyi snang ba mthong bas
117b7(rgyud): cung zad rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal to// kye rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'di ni bdag cag rnams kun tu bskul bar byed pa'i
117b8(rgyud): 'od zer 'dir 'ongs pa yin par khyed cag gis shes par gyis shig/ de nas yang sems dpa' chen po de rnams spyan 'dzum pa sman gdangs nas/ 'di'i 'od zer gyi snang
118a1(rgyud): pa gang yin pa der mngon par phyogs te gnas so de nas kun tu bskul bar byed pa'i 'od zer des bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chen po kun tu snang bas kun tu snang bar
118a2(rgyud): byas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi ye shes kyi spyi bor nub par gyur
118a3(rgyud): tog de nas sems dpa' chen po de stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal te
118a4(rgyud): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dang gongasu gsol bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
118a5(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya/ thub pa gang na ba der song ste bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi/ khams de dang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la
118a6(rgyud): lta ba dang / phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rtog pa dang
118a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga dang / bzlas pa dang / rig pa'i dbang bskur ba thams cad khyad par du bstan pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'tshalo// 
118a8(rgyud): de skad gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa
118b1(rgyud): chen po gang da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na song cig/ nga'i tshig gis kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ reg par gan/ 
118b2(rgyud): sam zhes smod par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal
118b3(rgyud): to/ sems dpa' chen po gang ga'i klung brgya stong phrag gang ga'i bye ma la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi rigs
118b4(rgyud): dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa dang / gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya dang / ras ras kyi cho ga dang / sbyin srog dang / 
118b5(rgyud): bzlas pa'i nges pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bye/ da ba sems can thams cad kun nas dga' bar bye// da pa rin po che snang ba'i le'u rab 'byom/ 'das pa dang / 
118b6(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i ye shes rnams kyis rang gi rig sngags dang / gsang sngags la 'jug par byed pa ston pa/ mthar thug par zin pa dang / nang gis dus dang ldan pa dang
118b7(rgyud): dam tshig rab 'byam gyi le'u dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa mtha' dag ma lus par bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags
118b8(rgyud): pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzhugs pa dang / spyod pa mthar thug pa gsungs pa dang ldan pa dag gsungs pa la yang 'di la
119a1(rgyud): rjes su yi rang ba kho na'o// sems dpa' chen po/ da lta nga'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song shig/ shAkya thub pa'i drung du de la mngon du phyogs pas dam pa'i chos kyi
119a2(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di nyon la khyod kyang smra bar 'gyur ro// 'di la yang rtsa ba'i rig sngags su 'gyur ba ni// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te samyakr-i bud d+hA ya/ 
119a3(rgyud): na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba t+yaM Ar+ya tA rA yaM/ b+ho d+hi satwA yai/ tad+ya thA/ tA re ri dzu ka d+harma ni t+ya te/ tA raM tut+tA re/ shAn+ta d+harma ni t+ya ta/ tA re
119a4(rgyud): a na b+hi lA pya/ d+harma nir+ya te/ tut+tA re tu re tu re hi ni/ trasani tra sa ni/ o ha ni/ mo ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ dpra b+he/ tsan+ta pra be hi li hi l-i/ tsi li tsi li/ be ma ga sA
119a5(rgyud): mi ni/ kur+t+ti kud+d+hi ma hA kur+dz+dza/ d+ha ra d+hi ra/ d+ha na pa ni tA ra/ ru hu ru/ ku ru ku ru a haM sA ya/ tsin+ta yA mi tsin+ti d+hi ma ku ru sAd+d+ha ya swA hA// 'di ni sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi 'phags
119a6(rgyud): ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa de yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis gsungs shing / gsung bar 'gyur ba te/ khyod kyis kyang da lta smra bar 'gyur ro// mi mjed kyi 'jig
119a7(rgyud): rten gyi khams dri rgyas pas rnam par phye ba'i mthar shAkya thub pa byon te/ shAkya thub pas rje su gnang ba'o// 'di la mchog gi snying por 'gyur ba yang / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo/ 
119a8(rgyud): te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// 'di la nye ba'i snying po yang / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA naM/ oM ku ru kul+le swA hA// de nas byang chub
119b1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa byang chub kyi snying po kun tu thob par byed pa
119b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi bkod pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi rnams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka'i mthar thug pa'i thams
119b3(rgyud): cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kun tu gang bar gyur to// rgyal ba'i sras po legs so legs so// gang
119b4(rgyud): khyod kyi ting 'dzin khyad par 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pas bcu
119b5(rgyud): la rab tu bzhugs pa rnams kyis kyang snyoms par 'jug par mi nusaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams
119b6(rgyud): kyis thabs cig byams pa dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mchog gi snying po mchog gsang ba don thams cad sgrub par byed pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang / 
119b7(rgyud): pa'i sems can thams cad kyis las thams cad byed ma/ rig sngags gzhan rnams kyis kyang rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i khyad par gyis sgrub par byed pa dang 'thun pa'i rig sngags
119b8(rgyud): gsung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yu da tsam zhig ci yang mi gsung bar gyur to// thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la sangs
120a1(rgyud): rgyas kyi spyan gyis kun tu gzigs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dgongs pa byams pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems kyis rig sngags gsung bar gyur to// 
120a2(rgyud): na maHsarba bud d+hA nA~M/ oM gI 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dang
120a3(rgyud): ting 'dzin de las langs nas 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs ldan pa zhes bya ba de lag pa bskum pa la brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa dang se gol tog pa tsam gyis kyang mig 'byed 'dzums
120a4(rgyud): pa skad cig tsam gyis tingange 'dzin rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mgyog/ nges pa'i blo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa nyid ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te mi mdzod kyi 'jig
120a5(rgyud): rten gyi khams su 'ongs nas kyang slar 'khod de/ steng gi na mkha'i mthil du nor bu rin po che chen po la so sor/ 'khod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po slar 'khod nas thams cad
120a6(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'ong zer chen po'i kun tu snang bas kun tu snang bar byas nas rin po che'i snang ba'i bdag po'i rgyan gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
120a7(rgyud): bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che du mas rnam par phye ba dang / rin
120a8(rgyud): po che'i gdugs du mas dpag tshad brgya stong phrag tu khyab po dang / lha'i gos dang / dar gyi rgyan gyis mdzes par spras pa dang / lha'i me tog dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / phreng
120b1(rgyud): ba dang / rin po che g.yer kha'i dra ba bcings pa/ sgra snyan pa 'khrol ba 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' so sor gnas par byed pa/ lha'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i
120b2(rgyud): char 'bebs par byed pa/ mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i las ngo mtshar smad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // de
120b3(rgyud): nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams dga' ba dang bcas pa spu zing zhes byed do// lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu g.yos pa dang ldan pa mthong nas skrag cing / snying 'dar te 'on te 'byo
120b4(rgyud): pa yongs su nyams sam ci zhes phan tshun ring thabs su skad mthon pos smra bar brtson zhing / 'di skad ces smras// bcom ldan 'das yongs su skyobs shig/ shAkya thub pa
120b5(rgyud): yongs su skyobs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor la bka' stsal to// ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ 'di ni byang chub
120b6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas me tog can lta bu nas nga nyid lta ba dang phyag 'tshal zhing
120b7(rgyud): bsnyen bkur bar 'dod de/ don chen po spyod pa dang / rig sngags kyi tshig dang / chos kyi tshig rmad du byung ba yang nges par bstan pa'i phyir 'ongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
120b8(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par bltas te zhabs gnyis la btud nas yi ge'i tshig rab tu smras pa 'di rnams kyis
121a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mkhyen khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// spyod pa'i don kun sgrub pabo// 
121a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal skyes bu gtso khyod la// don med thams cad bzlog pa'o// phyag 'tshal skyes bu seng ge khyod// ngan song thams cad 'joms pa po// dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// bsod nan/ 
121a3(rgyud): dri ni mtha' yas pa// phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad dkar khyod// srid gsum 'dam ni rnam spong ba// phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad+ma khyod// sdug bsngal thams cad rnam grol byed// thad grol khyod phyag 'o
121a4(rgyud): gdung ba thams cad legs 'dul byed// zhi ba khyod la phyag 'a tsha lo// sngags kyi spong don sgrub pa po// thams cad khyed la phyag 'tshalo// bkra shis kun gyis bkra shis pa/ 
121a5(rgyud): bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos rnams thams cad kun tu rtogs// sangs rgyas dam tshig khyod phyag 'a tshal// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// spros pa med pa rnam
121a6(rgyud): pa ni// yang dag rjes 'jug ston pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod phyag 'tshal// shes dang shes bya'i dngos po kun// legs par byas shing yang dag thos// theg gsum lam dang mya nga 'das la/ 
121a7(rgyud): rab tu gnas 'jug rab gnas pa// kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// zhes yi ge'i tshig rab tu smras pa 'di rnams kyis bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mngon par bstod nas/ 
121a8(rgyud): 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di nas gang ga'i klung brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char kun nas me tog ldan zhes bya ba'i
121b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gyur pa der/ bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/ 
121b2(rgyud): rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ tshe dpag tu med pa bzhug
121b3(rgyud): te/ de chos ston par mdzad pa ni/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongasu byang ba'i tshangs par spyod pa/ yang dag
121b4(rgyud): par ston par mdzad cing de 'di ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par mdzad do// rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi don gyi spyod pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod / 
121b5(rgyud): lam gsum gyi spyod pa'i rjesu 'jug pa'i lam dang / skyob pa/ dang / gnas dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / bde ba dang / shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu yongasu
121b6(rgyud): mthar gtugs pas sems can thams cad la ston te// bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mdzad pas rje su gnang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs drung dang / nye ba 'dir 'ongs te bcom ldan 'das
121b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ bsnyun mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes yongs su 'dri bar byed/ 
121b8(rgyud): 'di skad ces kyang gsungs// gang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i snying ma'i dus gang du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku de yang chos ston par mdzad cing rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i skye bo la lam gsum gyi byad
122a1(rgyud): grol dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye ba rnyed par mdzad pa de ni ngo mtshar ro// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i brtson 'grus kyis gang du skal ba med pa'i sems can gyi
122a2(rgyud): tshogs srid pa gsum yang dag par 'joms pa'i lam du mthar thug par 'jug par byed gtan du grub pa dang / bde ba'i rje su 'thun pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god
122a3(rgyud): par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar ro// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen gyis bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
122a4(rgyud): rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa/ ra 'phrul pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi rnam 'phrul du shes pa/ ra 'dod pa'am/ thugs kyi spad pa spyod pa la rab tu 'jug
122a5(rgyud): pa'i sgrub pa dang / sems dpa' shes par 'dod pa'am/ mtha 'dag nges par ston pa ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag rnams kyis kyang brjod par yong ga la nus// gang
122a6(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sgrub pa sdus pa dang / so so ba ma lus pa'i ngo bo 'dus ma byas chos nyid du lta bar bya ste/ mthong bas spang bar bya ba spong ba dang / 
122a7(rgyud): ring por mi thogs par spyod pa smra bar 'dod pa'am// yon+tan ston par 'dod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen gyis// bdag gis ni ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems
122a8(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sprul te/ rin po che chen po pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta bzhin du bzhugs so// 
122b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtam gyis rje su 'brangs pa'i de
122b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i gtam gyis mthar gyi dri ba sngon du 'gro bas phan tshun chos bstan pa'i mthar rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa'i don du nye bar tshogs pa rnams la tshangs pa/ 
122b3(rgyud): dbyangs dang / ka la bing ka dang / ku ta ra dang / bi ta ras bsgrubs pa'i rnga bo che'i dbyangs su grags pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spun
122b4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dang / 'i chen po khyod legs par 'ongs sam/ sems dpachen po'i spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin
122b5(rgyud): rlabs sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad do/ na yang dag par thob par byed pa dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig thams cad dang / gsang ba'i
122b6(rgyud): dbang bskur ba dang bcas pa dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / rtog pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang dbang phyug dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 
122b7(rgyud): sgrub thabs thams cad kyi cho ga'i rgyud dang / shes pa dang shes bya dus kyi mthar nub pa dang / rgyal srid dang / zhi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba mdor bsdus pa las/ sems
122b8(rgyud): can thams cad kyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rang gi yon tan 'byung ba/ gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mthar 'jug par byed pa/ sems can gzhan dga' ba
123a1(rgyud): byed pa mi snang ba dang na mkhar 'gro bar byed pa/ rkang pa rab tu brgyus pa/ yid gzhungs par byed po/ 'chugs par byed pa/ sa 'og tu rab tu 'jug par byed pa
123a2(rgyud): mngon par spyod par byed pa/ don thams cad thob pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo dang / ci bgyi dang / sha za dang / 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ byis pa dang
123a3(rgyud): rgan po dang / lang tsho ji ltar gnas bzhin du gnas par byed pa ste/ mdor bsdus na las thams cad byed pa/ yid kyi shing rta thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/ rgyas pa can dang / zhi ba can gyis
123a4(rgyud): las rab tu byed pa/ ji lta ji ltar las rab tu sbyar bar bya bzhi ngan pa/ de lta de ltar bsgrub par bya bzhin pa/ byang chub sem sa dpa'i sde snod dang ldan pa phal po che rtog pa chen po rin po
123a5(rgyud): che'i le'u rab 'byams ngas rjesu gnang / sangs rgyas tham sa cad kyis gsungs pa/ dag pa'i sems can rigasngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don// chos kyi mdzod
123a6(rgyud): skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyed dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i ched du/ lha dang mi rnams dang / sems can thams cad la ston cig/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman/ 
123a7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kun tu bskul bar byed pa rgyan bkod pa'i 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs
123a8(rgyud): ma thag tu dag pa'i sems can du ma gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'od zer gyi snang bas ji srid 'og min gyi srid pa nas ji srid mnar
123b1(rgyud): med pa'i dmyal ba chen po bar gyi sems can gang la la sdug bsngal gyi shin tu gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'gro ba rnams zhi ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / 
123b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par bskul nas slar yang 'od zer de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi
123b3(rgyud): bor nub par gyur to// 'di la gzhan shar phyogs la sogs pa rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang yin pa der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bskul ba'i 'od zer des rlung gi
123b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yang dag par bskul bas sgrub pa 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nyid kyi snang ba dri kun tu ga dasal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
123b5(rgyud): sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po
123b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sa lI dbang po d+hal+lo zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu/ 
123b7(rgyud): med pa rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+Ya'i snang ba'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po
123b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor ba mtha' yas shing mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnamasu de bzhin gshegs
124a1(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sgrol ma'i glu'i tshal na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
124a2(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa nges par ston
124a3(rgyud): pa'i tshig gi don gyi le'u rab 'byam gsungs pa de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams 'dzum pa yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs rnams su/ 
124a4(rgyud): phyogs bral rnams su zhes pas/ steng dang / 'og dang da/ thad ka thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu snang bar byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
124a5(rgyud): rnams su thams cad du yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad dpa' bkod par byas te byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yo ngas su bskor ba dang bcas pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcwa pa
124a6(rgyud): mdun du bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phral pa byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid chen po nyid lta bar 'dod pa/ mchog gi rig pa'i rjesu spod pa sgrub
124a7(rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi le'u rab 'byam de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa yang gsal bar byed 'dod pas so sor 'khod par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ lag bzong dang / 
124a8(rgyud): rin chen bzang po dang / brtul zhugs bzang po dang / spyan bzang po dang / dga' ba dazang po dang / chos bzang po dang / dngos grub 'char bzang dang / thams cad 'phags dang / chos
124b1(rgyud): 'phags dang / rin chen 'phags dang / rin chen dpal dang / lhun po'i dpal dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal dang / 'od byed dpal dang / rab snang dpal dang / snang ba'i dpal dang / don thams cad
124b2(rgyud): kyi dpal dang / lag na thams cad rin chen dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / lag na rin chen dang / lag na lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang / 
124b3(rgyud): ye shes snying po dang / don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snying po dang / chos 'phags snying po dang / mchod sbyin tog dang / tog bzang po dang / mtha' yas tog dang / 'od zer tog dang / dri me
124b4(rgyud): tog dang / ma lus tog dang / na mkha'i tog dang / rin che na tog dang / 'brug sgra dbyangs dang / jo bo che'i nga ro'irgyal po dang / mtha' yas gsal ba'i ye shes rgyal po dang / 
124b5(rgyud): mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel ba'i sel ba'i rgya la po dang / rnam par g.yeng ba thams cad 'jom pa'i/ rgyal po dang / spyod pa thams cad phul du byung ba'i ye shes kyi
124b6(rgyud): rgyal po dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po dang / phul du byung ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / rnam par sel ba'i rgyal po dang / mi g.yo ba'i rgyal po dang / nyi ma'i rgyal po dang / thams cad gsal
124b7(rgyud): ba yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / rang bzhin yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / dngos po med par yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / phyogs lhag pa'i rgyal po dang / rang gi
124b8(rgyud): dngos po med par snang ba dang / bsod nams snang ba dang / kun tu lta ba'i snang ba dang / 'od dpag med dang / dpag yod snang ba dang / spyan bzang snang ba dang / legs 'byung snang ba dang / mtha' yas

141b7(rgyud): kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chang ba de sred kyi bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol du song la bsrungs shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / khro ba'i rgyal po chen po'i bka' mnos nas/ rnam
141b8(rgyud): par 'gyur ba chen po'i gzugs yongs su brtags te sems can thams cad bsrung bar bya ba'i don dang / brtag par bya ba'i don du bkod pa chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du khro bo'i rgyal
142a1(rgyud): po sgrol mas non pa khro bo brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba phyogs bzhi kun nas de ltar steng dang 'og dang thang kar sgra drag po 'don bzhin pas rab tu gnas par
142a2(rgyud): gyur to// de nas sems can de rnams zhi ba nyid kyi yid dang ldan pas yang dag par 'jug pa'i bka' las mi 'da' bar gyur te/ sgra 'di lta bu yang thos par gyur to// gang dam tshig
142a3(rgyud): 'di 'da' bar byed pa 'di dag ni ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyang de yin no// de nas yang byang chub
142a4(rgyud): sems dpa' de rang gi rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi// spyod pa'i don du chos kyi tshig gsungs pa chos gcig/ gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gsang sngag
142a5(rgyud): 'grub par gyur to// gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'o// chos gnyis po dag la rab
142a6(rgyud): tu gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gnyis po dag gang zhe na byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sems can
142a7(rgyud): thams cad la mnyam pa nyid do// chos gsum rnams kyi rang gi gsang sngags kyi spong ba'i don nges par brtan pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sems can
142a8(rgyud): yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba nyid dang / rang gi gsang sngags yongs su mi gting ba nyid ngo // chos bzhi yang dag par ldan na/ 
142b1(rgyud): sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rang gi gsang sngags rdzogs pa yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang / gzhan gyi gsang
142b2(rgyud): sngags nye bar gcod pa min pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gnas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po sgom pa'i sems te chos bzhi po 'di dag dang yang dag
142b3(rgyud): par ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// chos lngas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la yang dag par 'jug cing gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa yongs su rdzog
142b4(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i yul bsten pa nyid dang / bas mtha'i dgon pa bste/ na ba nyid dang / sems can gzhon la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang / 
142b5(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang / tshul khrim/ sa dang / thos pa dang / spyod pa la gnas par byed/ pa nyid de/ chos lnga po 'di dag gis sngags kyi spyod pa'i don
142b6(rgyud): gyi dngos grub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos drug ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i dngos grub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ drug gang zhe na/ dkon mchog gsum
142b7(rgyud): la dad pa nye bar gcod pa med pa nyid dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab mo tshig gi don mi 'dor ba nyid dang / skyo ba med pa'i sems nyid kyis gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don yongs su
142b8(rgyud): chol zhing dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi spong ba nyid de/ chos drug po 'di ni rig sngags kyi spyod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub la yang dag par kun tu 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 
143a1(rgyud): chos bdun rnams ni/ rig sngags grub pa'i cho ga dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa la rjesu 'jug par byed pa nyid du 'gyur te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 
143a2(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul zab mo sgom pa dang / zlos pa dang / nyan pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'dri bor byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pas dus gsum
143a3(rgyud): du ston pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / smra bcad dang / dka' thub la ma thog pa dang / blo gros dang / dran pa dang / shes rab dang / brtan pa dang du
143a4(rgyud): lon par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang theg pa chen po'i chos zab mo'i tshul la yang dag par rab tu 'jug pa'i tshul dang / rang gi gsang sngags dang
143a5(rgyud): sngags dgug pa dang / srung ba dang / sgrub pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / dga' ba chen
143a6(rgyud): po yongs su sgoms par byed pa las dang / sems can gyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang dag par 'jug pa/ gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa thams
143a7(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol ba las dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med pa las te chos bdun po 'di rnams ni rig
143a8(rgyud): sngags dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos brgyad ni rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyis dngos grub yang dag par 'jug pa nyid du
143b1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu la dad pas ngo mtshar bar sems par 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i 'bras bu rdzu 'phrul dang rnam pa
143b2(rgyud): 'phrul pa the tshom med pa las dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa las bla ma la gus pa las dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang gi sngags dang rgyu dang spod
143b3(rgyud): pa nye bar bstan pa mi slu bar 'dzin cing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba las dang / dngos grub kyi zhing gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa rmi lam du mthong ba ston pa la mkhas pa nyid dadong
143b4(rgyud): ser sna dang / gnyid dang / rmugs pa mtha' dag dang bral par byed pa/ rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag
143b5(rgyud): nyid 'bul bar byed pa las dang / mdor bsdus na dge 'i rtsa ba la ngoms mi shes pa'i go cha bgos te bgegs thams cad rab tu sel bar byed pa las dang / byang chub kyi rgyud/ 
143b6(rgyud): gnon par byed pa dang / longs spyod chen po dang / dbang che bar grags pa bdag nyid so sor 'dod pa dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la yang dag par 'grogs pa las dang dge ba'i
143b7(rgyud): gshes gnyen dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang yang dag par 'grogs par byed pa ste/ chos brgyad po 'di ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub la
143b8(rgyud): yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing dkon mchog gsum la lhag par mos pa mchog tu tshul khrimaso 'chal pa la yang skye ba med
144a1(rgyud): pa'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pas yid sngags kyi le'u rab 'byams mtha' yas shing rmang du byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun
144a2(rgyud): pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// de las gzhan du rtogs par bya ba ma yin no// rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid gyur pas nyams sad pa'i rgyur yang bsgrub par bya ba yin no// de
144a3(rgyud): nas yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rnams 'di skad
144a4(rgyud): brjod par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa sna tshogs pa 'i don bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i chos
144a5(rgyud): ston cig legs so// legs so// e ma byang chub sems/ dpa' chen po rnams sna tshogs pa'i chos ston pa'i rje su 'jug par byed pa gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dag pa legs par gsung so// 
144a6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di 'dzin par 'gyuraro// yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang / g.yul du yang thog mar glang po che'i steng du 'jog par 'gyur ba dang / me tog dang
144a7(rgyud): bdug pa dang / dri dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchod par 'gyur ba de la bdag cag mtshungs par brtag par bgyi/ phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo dag dbang du bgyi/ pha rol gyi dmag dadung
144a8(rgyud): ngag 'jig cing bzlog par bgyi/ glegs bam du bris nas rang gi khyim du 'jom par 'gyur ba'i/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po chen po'am/ rgyal mo tshon mo'am / 
144b1(rgyud): slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ srung ba chen po dang longs spyod chen po dang / che ring por 'gyur ba dang / nad med pa dang / rtag tu longs spyod 'phel ba
144b2(rgyud): nyid kyang bgyi'o// de skad smras nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur to// theg pa chen po'i rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa nges par bston pa las
144b3(rgyud): ral pa gyen rjes kyi rtog pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam 'phrul gyi le'u rab 'byams las/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags mo sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa las
144b4(rgyud): 'dus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
144b5(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing kun tu lta bar zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
144b6(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
144b7(rgyud): du mas yongs su bskor ba'i 'od zer phyung ste sems can gyi khams thams cad kun nas snang bar bya bar byas nas sngar nyid du 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po kun tu snang bar byas nas
144b8(rgyud): 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes dag pa'i sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po'i dam
145a1(rgyud): tshig la rjes su 'jug pa las bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byams kyi spyod pa sgrub pa sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du gyur pa khyed kyis tshogs
145a2(rgyud): gang du sems can rnams yang dag par rjes su zhugs nas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub yang dag par thob pa dang ldan pa khyod smros shig/ 
145a3(rgyud): smros shig/ gsang ba'i bdag po gnod sbyin dbang pos de skad smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog tu gsang ba'i
145a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud gsungs pa/ rig sngags tham das cad yang dag par bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdzu'/ phul rnam par ston par byed cing lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas so/ 
145a5(rgyud): mo'i rtse mos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la ston par byed cing / sor mo'i rtse mo der rig pa'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nges par phyung ste phyung nas kyang thams cad
145a6(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de snang ba chen pos kun tu snang bar byas nas gnas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
145a7(rgyud): gis khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i snying po las thams cad pa/ dpa' bo gcig pa spyan drangs pa dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / zhi ba tson dang / rgyas pa can dang / 
145a8(rgyud): mngon spyod can dang / mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / rkang pa rab tu rgyu ba dang / dgug pa dang / rnam par sdang ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dri dang dra
145b1(rgyud): ba dang / mar me thams cad rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis rab tu sbyin par byed de/ mdor na ji ltar sbyar ba de bzhin/ de lta de ltar sgrub par bya ba bzhin pa ni yi ge gsum zhes bya ba brtson 'grus
145b2(rgyud): chen pos don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i khro bo rgyal po chen po'o// de gang zhe na/ oM AHhU~M 'di ni khro ba chen po de snying po las thams cad pa ste dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / gsang sngags
145b3(rgyud): spong ba thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nges par bstan te bgegs thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman ras
145b4(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas pa btegs nas khro bo 'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyu das bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ gang la la
145b5(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas pa/ 'i byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shing mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams dam tshig la lhag par gan
145b6(rgyud): par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po de bskor nas btang bar gyur to// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang ma thag du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ngag tu
145b7(rgyud): song nas skad cig tsam gyis gdug sems can gyi sems can rdzu 'phrul chen po de rnams tshar bcad cing bkug nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dag pa'i sems can la yang dag par
145b8(rgyud): bcug ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par byas nas sems can bdug pa rnams kyi spyi bor kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs par gyur nas gnas par gyur to// de nas byang chub
146a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas sems can khyed cag thams cad
146a2(rgyud): nyon cig/ gang yang nga'i dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed pa de la khro bo'i rgyal pos tshar gcod par 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dam tshig ni 'da'
146a3(rgyud): bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi don gyi tshig gsang chen ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin nges par
146a4(rgyud): bstan bar chad bar byed do// de legs par nyon la leg sa par yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// na maM rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hU ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ 
146a5(rgyud): aR+tha te samyak+Sha bud d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rAH/ bo d+hi satwA ya ma hA satwA ya/ na mo b+ha ga bat+yai Ar+yA tA rA ye/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+yathA/ 
146a6(rgyud): ri dzu ka d+har+m+ma nir+yA te/ ta re tut+ta re/ shAn+ta d+harma nir+ya ti/ tA re a na bI lI bya d+harma nir+yA te tut+tA re tu re hi ne/ tA sa ni/ bi tA sa ni/ o hi na/ me he ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ prab+h+re/ 
146a7(rgyud): tsan+d+ra pra b+he hi li hi li/ bi le bi laM/ be ga gI ma~M ni/ kur+t+ti ma hA kur+t+ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha na pa ta~M/ tA ro hu ru hu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ a ha~M/ ya ya/ tsin+ta yA mi/ tsit+ta ta mi ku ru swAhU~M// grogs
146a8(rgyud): bo dge 'di ni nga'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rig sngags las thams cad byed ma/ srid pa gsum gyi nye bar gcod pa/ ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog par byed ma'o// phyag rgya
146b1(rgyud): yang 'dir rtsa ba'i rig sngags shes pa rnam par grags pa de la rab tu sbyar bar 'gyur ro// 'dir mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde 'thob par byed pa/ 
146b2(rgyud): zhi ba thams cad byed pa/ sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ rang nyid nga'i grogs po byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir mchog tu/ 
146b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i rig sngags kyi ngo bos nye bar gnas pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ gang dang gang dran pa nyid kyis las thams cad mthar byed pa/ 'jigs pa chen po/ 
146b4(rgyud): rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed pa ste/ bzlas pas lha mo ngas kyang ci dgos de gang zhe na/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya
146b5(rgyud): tA re tut+tA re swA hA/ phyag rgya yang 'dir ut+pa la zhes rnam bar grags pa longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel/ bar byed pa'o// 'dir nye ba'i snying por gyur pa yang mchog
146b6(rgyud): tu dpal dang ldan pa'i dag byed chen po ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA/ oM ku ru kul+le swA hA// phyag rgya yang 'dir pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes rnam par grags par
146b7(rgyud): 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed ma'o// 'dir mchog gi snying por gyur pa yang / na ma sarba bud d+hA naM/ oM gI/ 'di ni snying po'i mchog te mdor bsdu na bya ba
146b8(rgyud): thams cad la yon tan chen po rgyas pa ste/ yon tan mur thug par brjod pa ni dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang ma nus so// phyag rgya yang 'dir brtson
147a1(rgyud): 'grus chen po zhes rnam par grags pa bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dir spyan drang ba'i rig sngagasu gyur pa yang / na maHsarba
147a2(rgyud): bud d+hA nAM au he he b+ha ga ba ti bi shwa rU pi Ni sarba ba la/ b+hA Shi ta/ bra bo d+hi na A yA ni/ b+ha ga ba ti/ kr-i Da ut+pa la d+hi ni/ mai ma shud+d+ha ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ a
147a3(rgyud): pra ti haM te/ shA sa na hUM/ mA bi lam+ba ku ru ku ru phaT swA hA// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma spyan drang ba'i rig sngags te/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
147a4(rgyud): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /  dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
147a5(rgyud): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sha za dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi yang yin no// tsan+dan gyi/ chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te phyogs bzhi
147a6(rgyud): dang / de bzhin du steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thams cad du gtor bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma dang / 'jig rten dang / 
147a7(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags 'di yin te/ 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// na maHsarba bud d+ha nA/ a pra tiH
147a8(rgyud): ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hu ma bA si ni/ ma mArtsi Sha hUM/ tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ bdug pa'i rig sngags te/ tsan+dan dang / gur gum dang / ga pur gcig du byas nas
147b1(rgyud): bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad byon pa rnams spos kyi bdug pas yid tshim nas khugs par 'gyur ro// 'a
147b2(rgyud): phyag rgyar gyur pa yang pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes grags pa sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed cing zhi ba ste/ spyan drong ba'i rig sngags la yang phyag rgya pad+ma'i phreng ba bzang po 'di nyid do// sangs
147b3(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad byon pa la yang mchod yon dbul bar bya ste/ ga pur dang / tsan+dan dang / gur gum chu dang sbyar nas/ 
147b4(rgyud): dzA ti'i me tog dang / mA li ka gsar pa dang / 'byar gyi me tog dang / pun nA ka dang / ba ku li dang / rgya spos rnams te 'di dag gang yang rung ba'i me tog gam/ dus
147b5(rgyud): ji lta ba'i me tog gam/ dri bzang po'i me tog rnams dang ba sres nas sngags 'dis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA
147b6(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ he he ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ bi shwa rU pa d+hA ra Ni ar+d+he pra ti ts+tsha sa ma ya sa ma ya ma nu smA ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha de bo ta d+hiSh+Ta na/ ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya pra be she ye/ sarba bud+d+ha/ ai nu kaM bek+Sha
