147b7(rgyud): gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ am+ba ri bi tsA ri Ni/ swA hA/ phyag rgya 'dir gang ba zhes grags te sems can thams cad kyis rje su 'jug cing brtan pa'o// 'dir dri'i rig sngags su gyur pa yang / 
147b8(rgyud): na ma sarba bud d+hA nA/ na maHsa man+ta g+han+d+ha a ba b+ha Shi te shri ye ta thA ga tA ya tad+ya thA gan+d+he gan+d+he hU de gan+d+ha ma nor me pra tIn+na pra tIts+tsha daM/ gan+d+he sa ma nA nu tsA ri Ne swA hA/ 'dir
148a1(rgyud): phyag rgyar 'gyur ba yang lo ma zhes bya ba bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dir me tog gi sngags su gyur pa yang / na maHsarba/ 
148a2(rgyud): bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ na maHsaM ku su mi ta rAdz+nyA s+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku su me ku su me ku su mA d+ho ku su mA sU ra ba saM/ ku su mA ba ti swA hA/ 
148a3(rgyud): bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyis sngar bshad pa'i bdug pas bdugs par bya'o// rmad byung bsam mi khyab pa'i sku// sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas nas// yang dag rdzogs sangs
148a4(rgyud): / rgyas gsungs pa'i// gtor ma'i rig sngags rab 'a chad byed// na maHsarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA/ nA a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga ba ti ma hA satwe
148a5(rgyud): sarba bud d+ha a ba lo ki te/ mA bi laM ba oM dam pa la gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM hUM sarba ra ra Ta phaT swA hA/ lha ba shos 'dis dbul bar bya ste/ 'byung po thams cad
148a6(rgyud): pa'i gtor mar 'gyuraro// 'dir yang phyag rgya ni dbyug pa ste/ gdug pa thams cad bzlog par byed pa'o// ne maHsarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA a pra ti ha ta sha sa na nAM/ sarba ta mo
148a7(rgyud): an+ta kA ra bi t+ye si tA nA/ na maHsa man+ta dz+yo ti gan+d+ha a ba b+ha sa pri yA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga bAn dz+yo te rasmai sha ta sa ha sre/ pra ti maN+Di ta sha rA raM/ bi ku ra ba bi ku
148a8(rgyud): ba ma hA bo d+hi satwa man+ta dz+wa lo t+yo ta mU d+hi/ khur+Na khud+ha/ a ba lo ki ya/ a ba lo ka yaM/ maN+Da la~M sarba satwa ne swA hA// mar me'i rig sngags te/ 'dis mar me dbul bar bya'o// dag
148b1(rgyud): rgyu ni kha bye ba zhes sems can thams cad rnam par snang bar byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha tA shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya hUM bi bo d+ha ka ha ra kr-iH
148b2(rgyud): bi ga swA hA/ me'i bya ba byed pa'i rig sngags su 'gyur ro// 'dir yang phyag rgya ni/ kha sbyar zhes pa'i 'jig rten grags// sems can kun 'od kyi gsal byed// byang chub sems
148b3(rgyud): dpa' blo ldan dang // thub pa mchog gis sngon gsungs pa'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag
148b4(rgyud): na rdo rje la smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngags kyi tshig 'a di ni/ gsang chen dang bcas shing mchod tu gsang ba yin te// bu khyod la phan drag po'i mtha'// mi bzad pa'i
148b5(rgyud): rigs su grags// sngags rnams thams cad gang kha na// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrub bya'o// spyi bo gdu bu zhes grags pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang / 
148b6(rgyud): de ni nges par gzhig don du// rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod// na maHsar+b+ba bud d+ha bo d+hi sitwA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa na nAM/ oM ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kAr+ya dza b+ha/ 
148b7(rgyud): dze b+ha/ sarba da ha da ha/ sarba badz+ra bi nA sha ka/ mUr+d+ha DA ka dzI ban+d+ha ta ka rA ma hA bi tri ta rA bi ne be tsa pa tsa sarba duSh+TAM ma hA ga Ne pi ti dzI ban+te ta ka ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ sarba gra hA/ Sha Da mu/ 
148b8(rgyud): kha Tha Da b+hu dza Sha Ta tsa ra Na ru tra mA na ya prah+me t+ye de ba na na yAM mI ba lam bi mA pa la ba b+hU Sha hrI maN+Dal mad+h+ye pra be sha ya sa ma nu sma ra hU~M hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po di/ 
149a1(rgyud): ni mchog tu gsang ba brtson 'grus chen po sgrol ma'i yan lag zhal drug pa zhes bya ba khro bo'i rgyal po chen po thams cad rnam par 'joms pa po ste/ 'di bklags
149a2(rgyud): ba tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na/ ma rungs pa'i bgegs rnams lta ci smos 'di bklags pa tsam gyis srung ba chen
149a3(rgyud): po byas par 'gyur ro// 'dir phyag rgya yang rigs chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur te bgegs rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyi snying po ni// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i/ 
149a4(rgyud): tA na na hUM sarba sha tru stam+b+ha ya phaT phaT swA hA// sngags 'dis dag thams cad gzer chen po'i nad dang / yang rims nyin cig pas zin par 'gyur ro// rtag tu
149a5(rgyud): bzlas pas ji srid snang bar byams pa nyid du mi 'gyur/ yang na snying rje'i sems thob par mi 'gyur te/ bzlas pa zin gyi bar du grol bar mi 'gyur zhing 'ching bar mi
149a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa la bya'i// zhi ba'i sems yod pa gzhan la ma yin no// phyag rgya mdung chen po yang sbyar bar bya'o// 'dir nye ba'i
149a7(rgyud): snying por gyur pa yang / oM hriHkA la rU pe hUM khaM swA hA/ snga ma'i mdung chen yang sbar bar bya'o// gdug pa thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur ro// mchog gi
149a8(rgyud): snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba ni hU~M 'di ni las thams cad byed pa ste/ phyag rgya mdung chen po yang sbyar bar bya'o// phung grol
149b1(rgyud): thams cad bzlog par byed pa 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed pa ste/ mdor na khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni las thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas
149b2(rgyud): bas grub pa'i dus su yang / khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags su gyur pa yang / na moHsarba bud d+ha nA/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA
149b3(rgyud): dza ya dza ya/ su dza ya/ ma hA ku ru Ni ka bi shwa rU bi ni/ gats+tsha gats+tsha swa ba nA/ sarba bud+d+he swa bi sardza ya/ sa pa ri bA ra/ swa b+ha bA nA tsA nu pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma nu sma ra
149b4(rgyud): sarbAr+tha sa me sid+d+hi tu bi d+h+ya sa da ma no ra thi tsa me dab ri pU ra ya swA hA// 'di ni gshegs su gso dal ba'i sngags te las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// phyag
149b5(rgyud): rgya bzang po'i gdan zhes grags pa ste/ 'dis ga ngan yang sbyin par bya'o// yid kyis lan bdu na bzlas pas thams cad gshegasu gsol lo// 'jig
149b6(rgyud): rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang / sngags rnams nyid la yang sngags kyi dngos grub dang / dam tshig dang / bzlas pa dang / dus dang / nges pa
149b7(rgyud): sdom pa rnams la yang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos slar yang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams la kun tu gzigs te/ 'khor gyi
149b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po la rang gi rig pa'i tshogs sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam gsungs par gyur to// na maHsarba bud+d+hA naM/ a pra ti ha ta ga ti nI oM ni Ti swA hA// 'di ni 'phags
150a1(rgyud): ma sgrol ma'i rje su spyod pa'i skra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa/ las thams cad ba ste dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'i snying po dug gi las thams cad la kun tu
150a2(rgyud): sbyar ro// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA na/ a pra ti ha to shA sa nA nAM/ oM ni TaM/ 'di ni nye bar spong pa'i skra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa las thams cad pa ste/ phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes pa gshe
150a3(rgyud): los thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta sha sa nA nAM/ oM ni/ rig pa 'di ni sdong bu can zhes bya ba spyod pa'i dge ba'i las thams cad byeng ba ste/ phyag
150a4(rgyud): rgya ni bzang po'i gdan gyis gnod sbyin mo rnams dgug da bar bya ba la sbyar ro// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+d+rAr+b+bA ta rU bi nAM/ oM Sh+TaM swA hA// mkho' 'gro ma kun
150a5(rgyud): 'joms pa yi// phyag rgya sbubs can yang dag sbyar/ byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yi// rig sngags thod po cang zhes bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi pad+ma nyid// rab
150a6(rgyud): bsngags lha yi gzugs can ma// na maHsa mon+ta bud+d+hA nA/ a pra ti he ta ga ti/ tsA ra NaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM be ra de swA hA// phyag rgya ut+pa la nyid ni// dpal gyi bdag nyid spun la sbyar/ 
150a7(rgyud): gzugs mang 'chang ba'i lha mo ni// myur du longs spyod rab sgrub pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ a tsin+tar+b+ba ta rU pi Ni oM su ri swA hA// phyag rgya mdung dang yang dag ldan// rims
150a8(rgyud): rnams thams cad rnam 'joms pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bobud+d+hA nA/ a tsin+d+rad+hA ta ru pi Ne A~M tu re swA hA// bsam po'i sgrol ma ldan pa zhes// rab sngags las rnams thams cad pa// dbyug
150b1(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// bgegs rnams 'joms byed ma la sbyar// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA na/ a tsi t+yad+b+ha ta rU bi NA/ tad+ya thA/ oM bai lo ki ni swAhA// rig pa snang ldan zhes bya/ 
150b2(rgyud): ba 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed// bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa// pad+ma phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ a tsi t+yad+b+ha te rU pi Na/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi nyA/ 
150b3(rgyud): bi sha sa b+ha be bi shwa rU pi Na ka ha ka ha A bi sha A bi sha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ru ru tiSh+Tha swA hA// rig pa brtson 'grus chen mo ni// 'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa ste// snying po phyag rgya
150b4(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid// sems can thams cad 'bebs shing nga/ dge/ sna tshogs zhes bya yang dag bsgrags// nam/ da sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM tsin+d+rad+b+ha ta rU pi Na/ tad+ya thA/ oM
150b5(rgyud): te zlabasu swAhA/ badz+ra'i gdan gyis rnam par dgod/ las rnams thams cad byeng bar// nam sa ma/ bud+d+hanA~M/ a pra tiH ti ga ting+ga ta ra Na/ tad+yaH/ 
150b6(rgyud): shri rig pa 'di ni dpal mo che// 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste// phyag rgya kha sbyor ldan pa yi// rgyal srid chen po rab sbyin byed// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ sarba satwa b+ha ya
150b7(rgyud): pra dA yi kA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a dzi te ku mA ra rU pi NI/ oM hi A gats+tsha ma ma ka ra yaM ku ru swA hA// mi thub ma zhes rnam grags ma// gzhon nu bdud rtsi las byung ba// gang ba'i phyag rgyar ldan
150b8(rgyud): ba yis// dgra rnams thams cad bzlog par byed// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ a tsin+nad+hA ta rU pi NaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ye swA hA/ bi dza ye swA hA/ a dzi te swA hA// sring mo bzhi zhes rnam
151a1(rgyud): grags pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rjes 'gro ba// sa rnams mtha' dag yongs rgyu zhing // sems can rjes su 'dzin byed pa// mang po te bu ru zhes gras
151a2(rgyud): 'di rnams kyis ni rjes su spyod// gru'i bzhon pa mnyam non nas// rgya mtsho la ni nges par gnas// khu tshur byig rgyus rnam par dgod// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed/ 
151a3(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA na/ lo kA gra d+hi pa tI nA/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku mA ri ma hA ku ma ri kri Da kr-i Da/ ma hA rak+Sha saM bo d+hi satwA nu dz+nyA ta ma yU ra sa ne sA sha/ sa ra shu sA ni rak+ta gI ra
151a4(rgyud): gan+d+ha nu le ba na pri yai pr-i yaM/ kha kha khA hi khA haM hU nr-i t+ya rak+ta puSh+pa ru ti mur+t+ta sa ma nu sma ra b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma ya b+hU ma ya hu lu hu lu mI bi la/ sarba karma Ni me ku ru ku ru
151a5(rgyud): bi tsi tra rU pa d+hA ri Ni/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ hUM hUM sarbe'u d+hA nu dz+nyA te swA hA// sems can rjes su 'dzin byed pa/ 'i// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa na// sa rnams
151a6(rgyud): ma lus kun nas ni// rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// sems can kun la phan don dang // gdug pa'i sems can bzlog byed pa// bdag gi rig pa rtag tu grag/ rtag tu
151a7(rgyud): srung bar yongasu grags// srung ba ltos 'gro de nyid kyi// 'jig rten mtshan mas legs par mtshan// snying rjes thugs ni brlan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' de nas
151a8(rgyud): gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// byis pa rnams la phan don du// gang las sems can spong gsungs pa// 'gro ba rnams la rnam spyod ldan// phyag rgya dbyug/ 
151b1(rgyud): pa'i srog shing ldan// bdag nyid chen pos sbyar nas ni// tshangs pa la sogs 'gugs byed na// mi rnams 'bras bu smos ci dgos// gzhon nu'i sems su ma lus pa'i// rtog pa 'di/ 
151b2(rgyud): ni bsdus nas su// srin po rnams su grags pa yi// rig sngags 'di ni yang dag bstan// sems can rjes bzung 'dod pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar bshad// yig gsum
151b3(rgyud): zhes bya'i snying po 'di// rig sngags 'di ni yang dag bshad// sems can kun la phan don du// nye bar longs spyod 'gugs pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya dbyug pa'i srog shing ni// rnam
151b4(rgyud): bkod las rnams thams cad pa'o// oM hUM dzaHrigasngags 'di ni mdor bsdus nas// mi rnams 'bras bu byed pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ sa man+to d+yo ti ta mUr+t+ta
151b5(rgyud): nAM/ a bi kri ta gra ha hUM phaT swAhA// nye ba'i snying po 'di/ yang ni// phyag rgya dgra ste yang dag ldan// de bzhin 'byung po 'gugs par byed// de bzhin gza' dang ma mo ben+de/ 
151b6(rgyud): thams cad phyag rgya sa rgyas btab pa// bkod na 'bras bu bcos par 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni rnam skrag byed// bdug pa zhugs pa rnam par grol// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'phagram
151b7(rgyud): sgrol ma'i pheM nya mo chen mo las thams cad pa ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba rjes su spong pa las thams cad pa ste bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed do// 'byung po thams cad skrag
151b8(rgyud): par byed pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad rdzogs par byed do// namaHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta sha sa
152a1(rgyud): nAnA/ tad+ya trA/ oM prad+d+ha sa prah+ma bAn+d+ha/ bar+ya se shin+ta ku ru sa rbA// sngags 'di mangs pa chen po ste// byang chub sems dpas bshad ba yin// 'byung pon pa
152a2(rgyud): rab tu thob// skad cig nyid la bsil bar 'gyur// phyag rgya pad+ma yang dag ldan// myur du dge legs thob par 'gyur// mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams la// srid srung gi ni rig byed 'dod
152a3(rgyud): 'di ni mdor bsdus brjod pa ste// cho ga 'di ni mdor bsdus pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga ru Da ba ha na tsakra pI na tsa tur b+hu dza hU~M hUM/ 
152a4(rgyud): sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ bo d+hi satwa a dz+nyA ba ya ti swAhA// byang chub sems dpas bka' stsalaM bas// zhi ba'i don de ni myur du byed// 'byung po rnams ni rnam 'jig byed// khyab
152a5(rgyud): 'jug gzugs kyis lus can yin// phyag rgya'i 'ja ra lor yang dag ldan// brtan pa'i don ni yang dag bya // gang 'di khyab 'jug rgyud du ni// cho ga rgyas par bstan
152a6(rgyud): pa de la sems can kun gyi sgrub byed de// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA ma he/ shwa ra b+hu tA d+hi ba ti biM ShaH
152a7(rgyud): d+h+wad+ha dza pra laM ba dza Ta mu ku Ta d+hA ri NI/ si ta b+hasma d+ha sa ra ta/ mUrti sa e phaT phaT b+ho d+hi satwa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// sngags 'di bdag gis
152a8(rgyud): rab tu brjod// mdung gi phyag rgya mnyam par ldan// 'byung ba thams cad rnams 'jig pa// 'di yang bstan pa'i cho ga 'di// sems can sa stengs gnas pa la// sngon ni zhi ba'i/ 
152b1(rgyud): rgyud du bstan// yon tan sna tshogs rgya chen pa// zhi ba'i rgyud kyis kyang brjod do// na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sha ku ni ba tata bak+Shi Na/ sha ka kha
152b2(rgyud): kha khA hi khA hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM tiSh+Tha bo d+hi satwA A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA// sngags 'di brtson 'grus chen po ste// nam mkha' lding zhes rnam par grags// gdul dka' 'dul ba
152b3(rgyud): rnams kyi mchog/ gdengs ka can gyis gdug rnams 'joms// phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan// phung khrol mi bzad bcas pa 'joms// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dug rnams ni/ 
152b4(rgyud): gso bar byed par the tsom med// gdul bya'i sems na na la brtsi bas// byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa dka'// nam mkha' lding gi gzugs kyi spyod// 'dab chag
152b5(rgyud): rgyal po 'od chen ldan// ji srid na mkha' lding rgyud du/ bstan pa'i cho ga rgyas de rnams// sems can kun la phan pa'i rgyud// bdag gis kyang ni brjod pa yin// 
152b6(rgyud): mkha' lding mngon par brjod rgyud du// khro bo'i rgyal po ma bstan na// gdengs can dug ni gzhom pa'i phyir// 'dab chags gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu// ji srid 'jig rten pa'i
152b7(rgyud): sngags// de rnams cho ga dper brjod pa// gdul bya'i sems can don du ni// de lta de ltar rnam par spong // gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang // rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang
152b8(rgyud): de rnams cho ga rab 'byam 'dir// snga ma kho nar gsungs pas yin// ji ltar ma ma rnam mang po// byis pa 'bad pas srung byed pa// de bzhin byis mtha'i blo can la// nga ni rig sngag
153a1(rgyud): gzugs kyi rgyu// stobs bcu ldan pas sngon gsungs pa// da lta'angang yi bstan pa yin// sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa// rtogs pas rab gsungs 'od chen
153a2(rgyud): bo/ rgyal ba mchog gis gang gsungs pa// stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras kyis gsungs// rmad byung bsam mi khyab gzugs can// spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o// de nas
153a3(rgyud): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la kun tu gzigs nas
153a4(rgyud): dam tshig thams cad yang dag par bskul bar byed pa zhe/ sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ga dang du ting 'dzin la gnas pas sems can ma lus pa'i sgrub
153a5(rgyud): pa'i spyod pa'i yid sems can thams cad la rab tu gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan
153a6(rgyud): pa'i 'khor chen po gnas rnam par bkra ba'i phyag na rin po che'i snying po rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad
153a7(rgyud): dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sa bcu dang ldan pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang / dkyil/ 
153a8(rgyud): 'khor de bri ba'am 'drir 'jug par mi nus na/ so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de'i dam tshig
153b1(rgyud): sgrub pa'i gnas la gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos
153b2(rgyud): thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rgyal tshab du mngon par dbang bskur zhing dam tshig thob pa thams cad dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang / zag pa dang ba
153b3(rgyud): pa dang zag pa med pa'i sems can thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu
153b4(rgyud): 'thun pa dang / ting 'dzin gyi khyad par gyis thug sa las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa bdag nyid kyi sa yang dag par shes por gyur to// so so'i skye bo
153b5(rgyud): thams cad kyis de yid kyis dmigs par mi nus na/ bri ba 'am 'drir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
153b6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig la rjesu rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can de rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag nyon cig/ 'di ni de bzhin
153b7(rgyud): goshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang 'da' bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig yin na/ sems can rnams dang / 'phags pa gzhan rnams kyang lta
153b8(rgyud): smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos phyag na rdo rje gsang ba pa'i bdag po la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras mi las 'das pa'i dam tshig yid las byung ba ni/ 
154a1(rgyud): nges par bstan to// mi rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang dag du sems can rnams yang dag par zhugs nas/ 
154a2(rgyud): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig pa dang / sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bar bshad par bya'o// de nas yang gsang ba ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes
154a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gang da lta dus la bab par shes na gsungs shig gsungs shig/ shAkya seng ge
154a4(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon// yongs su mya ngan 'das pa na// mi rnams mchog gi sangs rgyas zhing / sems can sa stengs khyod dkyil 'khor// mthong ba tsam gyis 'dzi/ 
154a5(rgyud): rten na// sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu skye// mi shes chog nyams pa'am// dam tshig bdag por man+t+ra/ ran// tshangs pa bdag nyid chen pos kyang // rig sdug
154a6(rgyud): dngos grub mi 'gyur ro// sngags la mngon par mi brtson dang // dam tshig bstan pa mi mthong na// rnam pa du mar 'bad byas kyang // rig pa'i dngos grub mi 'gyur ro// dam
154a7(rgyud): tshig sbyor ba nyams pa na// brgya byin gyis kyang rab 'bad las// rig pa'i dngos grub mi 'gyur na// sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos// dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes// 
154a8(rgyud): spyod po'i las rnams sgrub pa de/ 'jig rten pa dang 'phags pa'i sngags// bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du// rab zhugs/ 
154b1(rgyud): las rnams thams cad byed// byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa la// de yi rig pa'i dngos grub rtag/ de nas yang gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes// sems dpa' chen po de/ 
154b2(rgyud): la gsol ba btab par gyur to// kye kye sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs so// 
154b3(rgyud): dang po re shig cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam/ nag pa can nam/ sa ga can gyi zla ba'i dkar po'i phyogs la rab tu bsngags pa'i nyi ma dang / gza' bzang po bltas te/ rgyu skar
154b4(rgyud): dge ba dang yang dag par ldan pa dkar po'i phyogs kyi ches gracig dang / zla ba nya ba'am/ dus gzhan la dbyar gyi zla ba spangs te/ snga dro sa rab tu gnas par bya'o// grong
154b5(rgyud): khyer chen po la rten pa'am/ gang du dkyil 'khor gyi sgo ba dpon rang nyid gnas par te/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa/ 'am/ chu klung la brten pa'am/ rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang
154b6(rgyud): nye bar grong khyer chen po'i byang shar gyi phyogs kyi char ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song nas/ nyi ma bdun nam/ zla phyed du mtha' gcig tu bsnyung ba
154b7(rgyud): 'am nye bar gnas nas so sor gnas par bya'o// gang gnas de rnams su yang gtsang ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / thal ba dang / sol ba dang / phub me dang / 
154b8(rgyud): thod pa dang / rus pa dang / rus pa gnas pa dang bral ba/ shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sa phyogs su/ srog chags med pa'i chu la/ ba byung lnga dang bsres pa'i tsan+dan dang / 
155a1(rgyud): gzur dang / gur gum gyi chus khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa stong drag brgyad kyis mngon par bsngags pa des bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya chen po
155a2(rgyud): yang dag par ldan pas/ sa phyogs de la phyogs bzhi rnams su mngon par gtor zhing steng dang 'og dang thad ka dang phyogs bral rnams su yang kun nas gtor bar bya'o// de nas
155a3(rgyud): sa phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir / khru bcu drug gam/ khru bcu gnyis sam/ khru brgyad bya ste/ de la chen po ni khru bcu drug go// bar ma ni khru bcu gnyis so// chung ngu ni khru
155a4(rgyud): brgyad do// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum po 'od/ thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa yin// rgyal sring 'dod phyir chen po ste// bar ma longs spyod 'phel ba
155a5(rgyud): byed chung ngu sngags kyi dam tshig ni// las rnams kun byed zhi ba yin// de la yid la 'dod pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// de la sde phyogs der khru
155a6(rgyud): gnyis tsam brkos la// der rdo ba dang / sol ba dang / thal ba dang / rus pa dang / skra la sogs pa dang / srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs pa gal te mthong na sa'i phyogs
155a7(rgyud): gzhan du brko bar bya'o// gnod pa med pa dang / nye bar 'tshe ba med pa der 'gyur ro// ri'i rtse mo dang / rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung chen po chu ngog sa rnams su yang gang rab tu 'bad
155a8(rgyud): pa chen pos shin tu so sor brtags te shin tu gtsang zhing srog chags med par byas nas bri bar byas so// sa'i phyogs der slar yang srog chags med pa'i chul ba'i rnam lnga bsres
155b1(rgyud): bas chu klung gi 'gram gyis gtsang ma'am/ grog 'khar gyis gang du srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o// bkang nas kyang legs par brdungs te kun nas mnyam par byas la rnga
155b2(rgyud): ltar 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum bya'o// seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po nyid kyis lon bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas phyogs gzhi rnams su gdab par
155b3(rgyud): bya'o// tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khro ba'i rgyal pos lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas kun nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i rnam par dkri bar bya'o// de bzhin du dbus kyi gnas su
155b4(rgyud): nang du yang zur bzhi'i rnam par bya'o// dbus kyi nad na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rna ba'i rig pa'am/ rtsa ba'i snying po stong phrag brgyad
155b5(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsug tor bcings te khro bo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs bsrungs nas bdag nyid bsrung bar byas te/ bzlas
155b6(rgyud): pa byed bzhin du phyi rol du byung ste/ dkyil 'khor la g.yas su bskor ba byas nas kha shar du phyogs te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
155b7(rgyud): thams cad yid la byas te dkyil 'khor de kun nas gru bzhi'i rnam par dkri bar bya'o// de nyid kyi phyi rol tu zhag gcig bsnyung bar gnas pas rab tu gnas par bya'o// de la 'dir
155b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi sngon spyad pa rnams byas te/ rang gi rig pa dang / sngags dang rgyud la mkhas pa'i mkhan pos sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir theg pa chen po la
156a1(rgyud): lhag par mos pas zhag gcig bsrung bar gnas pas grogs bzang po dang yang dag par ldan pa bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba mthong bas
156a2(rgyud): tshon lnga'i bye ma zhib po 'bar bas legs par sbyar ba byas nas/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang snying pos mngon par bsngags pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor dbus su gdab par bya'o// pha rol du yang
156a3(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba dang / rta babs bzhis rgyan pa dang / chu shing gi sdong bu 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g.yur za zhing kun nas 'bras bu'i tshogs rnams kyis rab tu 'phyang
156a4(rgyud): bzhin pa dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / dung gi sgra dnges par sgrogs pa'i sa phyogs su bsgrags par bya'o// / ngos bzhir rjes su 'thun pa'i bar du bsngags pa'i sgra chos
156a5(rgyud): mnyan par bya'o// phyogs bzhi rnams su theg pa chen po 'i mdo sde'i glegs bam bklag par bya'o// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 
156a6(rgyud): 'phag pazla ba sgron ma'i ting 'dzin nub phyog su'o// 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa byang phyog su so 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa shar phyogs su'o// de ltar glegs bam klog pa po med na mdo sde bzhi po klog par
156a7(rgyud): rtogs pa'i gang zag chos smra ba po la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas tsan ngan dang / ga pur dang / gur gum rnam
156a8(rgyud): par bsres pa'i me tog dkar po dri zhim pa la rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor de thams cad du gcal du dgram par bya'o// mngon par bkram nas phyi rol du byung ste/ zhag bdun
156b1(rgyud): gyi bar du 'dod pa'i kha zas bsten pa gnyis sam/ gsum/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong nye bar gnas pa bsten pa la gnas pa'i ri mo mkhas pa de grogs sam/ sa
156b2(rgyud): ma des khas blangs pa rab tu gzhug par bya'o// gang rtsa ba'i rig pa nyid kyis gtsug tor bcing ba byas nas/ de nas gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
156b3(rgyud): go 'phangs rnam par bkra zhing / 'bar la mdzes pa'i zangs kyi phye ma zhib mo so sor bzung nas longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chen po rnams
156b4(rgyud): 'dir gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid las nges par byang chub la gzhol ba yin na/ snga rigs sgrub par byed pa lta ci smos// shAkya skyes mchog mya
156b5(rgyud): ngan 'das// sems can bsod nams chung rnams la// // 'di lta'i longs spyod ga la yod// cho ga 'di ni dri stan par bya// byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen ldan/ 
156b6(rgyud): skye bo bkren pa gzigs nas ni// nyung zhing mdor bsdus dkyil 'khor ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin// 'bras sa lu dang thug po che'i phye ma shin tu zhib mo tshon sna lnga pa
156b7(rgyud): 'bar bas/ dkar po dang / ser po dang / dam re bo dang / nag po dang / ljang ku'i kha dog tu kha bsgyur la/ sngar bzhag pa'i phyi ma dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis blangs nas
156b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te rtsa ba'i rig pas phye ma la phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o// gzhon zhi ba sgrub pa'i slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol lho shar gyi phyogs
157a1(rgyud): mas kyi tshog sang bas meb babya'o// khru gnyis kyi chang la dbangs khrug cam khor khor lug tu bad+hA'i pi ba'i rnam par shing bal shi ma shing rnams kyis ma
157a2(rgyud): tu sbar te/ shing dpal 'bras kyi lam shing mtho gang tsam gyi tshang la rlan dang bcas pa/ zho dang sbrang rtswa dang / maral btags pa rnams kyis rtsa ba'i snying pos sam/ d+yagaH
157a3(rgyud): dang rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis me lha spyan drang bar bya'o// spyan drangs nas kyang sngar brjod pa'i yi ge gcig pa nyid kyis rig pa'am/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'i snying pos slar yang brgya rtsa brgyad
157a4(rgyud): sbyin bsregs bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gtsug tor gtsang zhing yo byad tshogs par bya sa nas bdag nyid dang ri mo mkhan ches mkhas pa'am slob ma
157a5(rgyud): byeng du gzhug go/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rna mas yid la byas nas sngar brjod pa'i bdug pa'i rig pas
157a6(rgyud): sreg go/ thal mor sbyar ba byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
157a7(rgyud): phyug la phyag byas nas phye mo blangs te/ gzugs kyi rnam par bya zhing/ ri mo mkhan mkhas pas rdzogs par bya'o// cho ga 'di dag gis dang po kho na ro re shig/ sangs
157a8(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rnam pa thams cad kyis mchog dang ldan pa rin po che seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas na chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa kun tu
157b1(rgyud): bri'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis kun tu bris nas rjes su sgrub pa pos bdag nyid srung ba'i cho ga dang rig pa byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/ 
157b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang steng dang 'og tu gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas nas me thab dang nye bar song nas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang sbra dang / srung ba'i tshe
157b3(rgyud): ga byas te rtsa ba'i rig pas gur gum dang bsres pa'i mar gyi bsregs blugs stong phrag brgyad sprin bsreg bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste de nyid du bzlas pa byed cing de nyid
157b4(rgyud): du gnas par bya'o// yungs kar dkar po la khro bo'i rgyal dbo sgrol mas non pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon pa dar bsngags te/ mngon par bsngags nas khaM phor kha sbyor
157b5(rgyud): du bzhag par bya'o// bgegs kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzug sa rnams du ma dang / nga ro drag po dang / rlung dang char dang / yul ngan gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba
157b6(rgyud): 'ongs pa mthong na/ khros pas yungs kar gyi sreg blugs lan bdun sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas bgegs rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur ro// mi'i bgegs la ni lan lnga chang ba nas sbyin
157b7(rgyud): sreg byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba 'am/ nus pa med par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skad cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ro// 
157b8(rgyud): de nas rjes su sgrub pa pos de nyid du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pas bzlas pa byed cing gnas par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis
158a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs g.yas kyi gzhogs su rang sangs rgyas gnyis pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa skyil krung gis nye bar
158a2(rgyud): bzhugs par bya'o// de'i 'og tu nyan thos chen po gnyis chos nyan par bya'o// de rnams kyis 'ang g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan tham
158a3(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan pa ston ka'i sprin gyi mdog ltar dkar ba pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa phyag g.yon pas pad+ma bsnams nas g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o// de yang g.yas su bcom
158a4(rgyud): ldan 'das ma gos dkar mo phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/  phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phya ga 'tshal bzhin pa pad+mo'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa
158a5(rgyud): ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba dar la dkar po'i na bza' bsnams pa dar la'i stong gtso/ gas bla gos bsnams pa/ thal ba nag po'i thig le
158a6(rgyud): gsum byas pa'o// de bzhin du brtan pa dang / khro gnyer can ma yang / ring rang gi gdan la rang rang gi spyod lam du gnas shing nye bar bzhigs pa yang bya'o// de rnams kyi g.yas/ 
158a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ma dang / gtsug tor rgyal mo yang bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bu
158a8(rgyud): drug bya ba la/ 'di lta ste/ kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / na mkha'i mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song spong dang / byams pa phyag/ 
158b1(rgyud): na rnga yab thogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lta bzhin pa dang / dri ma med pa'i blo gros dang / dri ma med pa'i tog dang / nor bzang dang / zla 'od dang / dri ma med par
158b2(rgyud): grags pa dang / nad thams cad gso bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / 'jig rten 'gro ba dang / blo gros chen po dang / mngon par 'dzin pa
158b3(rgyud): zhes pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcu drug po 'di rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sku dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtso bo dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo
158b4(rgyud): dang / pad+ma'i rigs gzugs dang / phyag rgya rnams lu dang las ji ltar bshad pa bzhin dang / gnas ji lta ba de bzhin du bri'o// mtha'i gnas su yang gru bzhi'i rnam par
158b5(rgyud): gnas bzhag par bya'o// pad+ma'i me tog legs par bya/ sa pa dang / rig pa'i lha gang gis dran pa yang ga nas de rnams su bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan
158b6(rgyud): 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yas kyi gzhog su rang sangs rgyas na mkha' dang / yongs su zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ngo // de bzhin du shar du kha bltas pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i
158b7(rgyud): sgo rnams bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su rang sangs rgyas tsan+dan dang / grub pa zhes pa gzhan gnyis kyang kun tu bri'o// de rnams kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen
158b8(rgyud): be 'od srung chen po dang / ka t+ya na dang gnyis kun tu bri'o// de rnams kyi yang gzhog su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes ut+pa la ltar sngo bsangs su snang ba rab tu zhi ba'i gzugs rgyan thams
159a1(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas rnga yab thogs pa / g.yon pas khro ba'i spyi bor gzhag pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje lngag/ 
159a2(rgyud): sgrogs dang / dpung bzang dang / rdo rje sde rnams cha byad ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du bgegs rnams 'joms pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal po dang / rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas
159a3(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / gzugs dang phyag rgya la sogs pa rnams ji ltar dran pa bzhin du bri'o// de rnams kyis yang g.yon du gru bzhi'i rnam par rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bri bar bya'o// bris nas
159a4(rgyud): kyang gnas gang du rig pa'i tshogs ma dran pa de rnams gnas 'dir bzhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o// de rnamasad kyi steng du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / bcom ldan 'das
159a5(rgyud): ma ma mA ki kun tu bri ste rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rab tu/ zhi ba'i las so// de rnams kyi yang steng du gtsug/ tor gyi rgyal po brgyad kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs
159a6(rgyud): pab phyag rgya bcings pa rang rang gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su kun tu bri ste/ gser mdog dbang po rab tu zhi brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa de bzhin gshegs
159a7(rgyud): pa'i sku gzugs la cung zad blta ba sbyin pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / gtsug tor gdugs dkar po dang
159a8(rgyud): rgyal po'i gtsug tor dang / pad+ma'i gtsug tor dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid phung po dang / gtsug tor mthon po zhes pa ste/ gtsug tor brgyad po 'di
159b1(rgyud): rnams kun tu dri'o// 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bya ste/ g.yas phyogs su ni 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes bya ba rab tu zhi ba'i lus ral pa'i cong/ 
159b2(rgyud): pan 'chang ba phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pas phreng ba 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin cing sgo la mngon du phyogs pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang bcas pa kun
159b3(rgyud): tu bri'o// 'jug pa'i sgo'i g.yon phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma rgyal ba los rgyal ba bri bar bya ste/ rab tu zhi ba'i lus ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ phyag
159b4(rgyud): g.yon dbyug gu dang / ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa/  phyag g.yas pas bgrang phreng bzung nas mchog sbyin pas da rab tu sbyin par byed pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer can
159b5(rgyud): 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa kun tu dri'o// se ge'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyis 'khor lo kun nas 'obaraba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa de'i 'og tu rin po che'i gzhal
159b6(rgyud): yas khang de la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ha cang mi skem/ ha cang mi sbom pa'i lus su gnas pa rab tu zhi ba'i sku/ gzugs mdzes shing cung zad 'dzum
159b7(rgyud): pa'i bzhin/ phyag g.yon pas ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas dpral 'bras bsnams pa/ byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan
159b8(rgyud): 'chang ba/ mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa byas pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs banabs pa/ dar gyi na bzas smad g.yogs pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs
160a1(rgyud): pa pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ khro bo'i rgyal por gyur pa/ sgrol mas non pa la gzigs par gyur pa/ dkyil 'khor du 'ju
160a2(rgyud): ba'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa/ lta na sdug pa thams cad du srin mor la gcig pa byas pa'i gzugs 'chang ba kun tu bri'o// de'i g.yas phyogs kyi gzhogs su pad+ma'i 'og tu khro boche
160a3(rgyud): rgyal po'i sgrol mas non pa bri ste/ rnam par 'gyur ba chen po'i gzugs can kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ bka' so sor bzhes bzhin pa/ byang chub sems
160a4(rgyud): dpa' chen por gyur pa la blta ba kun nas bri'o// g.yo dan gyi gzhog su pad+ma'i 'og tu gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' lnga bri bar bya ste/ 
160a5(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu dul ba dang / dag pa dang / mun pa sel byed dang / kun tu snang ba zhes pa/ de rnams thams cad kyang gnas
160a6(rgyud): gtsang ma'i gnas na 'dug pa/ rin po che 'bar ba du ma'i rdo'i mthil dang 'dra ba/ kun nas 'bar ba rnam par bkra ba'i me tog rnams kyis btsal du bkram pa gzugs
160a7(rgyud): mdzes pa kun tu dri'o// phyi rol gyi khor yug du gru bzhir rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa rnam par bkra ba'i tshon sna lngas gsal ba/ shin tu drang ba'i me dma' bas nang gi dkyil 'khor
160a8(rgyud): bya'o// shar gyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo'i dbus su me tog gi rgyal po'i dbang po pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
160b1(rgyud): shin tu chung tsam du bya ste/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ phyag mchog sbyin pa rab tu sbyin pa/ sku'i gtsug tor la bzhugs pa'o// de'i g.yas su gtsug
160b2(rgyud): tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// g.yon du gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan ma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bri
160b3(rgyud): bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i g.ya su bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
160b4(rgyud): skur bya ste/ phyag mchog sbyin pas rab tu sbyin pa pa pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'o// de'i yang g.yas
160b5(rgyud): su lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis 'jug pa'i gnas su pad+ma'i phyag rgya bya'o// bcom ldan 'das me tog kun nas rgyas pa'i rgyal po de
160b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon du gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri ste kun nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'o// de yang g.yon du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi sku rin po
160b7(rgyud): che'i ri la nye bar bzhugs pa chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa bai DUr+ya sngon po dang / mar gang dang / pad+ma rA ga rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'bar ba'i 'od 'byin pa/ kun nas kun
160b8(rgyud): tu 'od gsal 'bri'o// de'i yang g.yon du rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'khrugs pa kun tu bri'o// de'i yang g.yon du chos kyi 'khor lo
161a1(rgyud): phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba bri'o// de'i yang g.yon du ril ba spyi blugs dang bgrang phreng dang bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o// sgo'i gnas su rdo rje rtsegasu
161a2(rgyud): ba gnyis ka nas kun nas 'bar bar bri'o// bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go 'og tu phyag rgya chen po dbyug pa can dang / ut+pa la'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'di
161a3(rgyud): dag phan tshun ma 'byar bar kun tu bri'o// dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa kun tu bris pa'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de yang tshon sna lngas 'bar ba rnam par bkra zhing lta na sdug pa/ zur bzhis
161a4(rgyud): rnam par mdzes pa/ rta bebs bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs de bzhir ro// nang gi dkyil 'khor las khru gnyis tsam gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su tshangs pa chen po pra
161a5(rgyud): bar bya ste/ gdong bzhi pa gos dkar du bgos pa/ stod g.yogs gos dkar po canamachod phyir thogs pa dkar po can/ gser gyi mdog
161a6(rgyud): ral po'i cod pan 'chang ba/ g.yon na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs thogs pa/ phyag na rdo rje'o// de'i yang gas su 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ lus dar la'i gos bgos
161a7(rgyud): pa da la'i stod g.yogs can bzhin rab tu zhi ba/ ral po'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug pa phyag g.yas mchog
161a8(rgyud): sbyin pa'o// de'i yang g.yas su 'og min pa'i lha'i bu bya ste rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i lus/ sems bsam gtan gnas padar li'i gos bgos
161b1(rgyud): pa da la'i stod g.yogs can skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can no// de'i rims pas dga' ldan dang / 'phrul
161b2(rgyud): dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'thab bral dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams bri bar bya ste/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs
161b3(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin no// brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris te/ rtag myos dang / phreng thogs dang / lag na gnod thogs dang / pi wang gnyi pa dang / sa bla bo'i lha'i bu
161b4(rgyud): rnams go rims ji lta ba dang / cha byad ji lta ba bzhin bri da bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong dang / gya nom snang dang / 
161b5(rgyud): dge chung dang / bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnaM sa cha byad dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs dang / de bzhin/ 
161b6(rgyud): ya byang gi phyogs su yang ngo // nub kyi phyogs su de rnams kyi 'og tu phreng gnyis la brten nas bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur te/ 
161b7(rgyud): phyogs bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o// byang phyogs su 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos su nor sbyin gter dang nye bar gnas pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ cod pan
161b8(rgyud): cung zad bcom pa gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can no// de'i g.yas su nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dag bri'o// de bzhin du rim gyis gno
162a1(rgyud): sbyin ma chen mo 'phrog ma bri ste/ gzhon nu dga' byed pang na 'dug pa/ dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog bzhin pa bri'o// lngas rtsen dmar ser
162a2(rgyud): 'jigs su rung ba'ang bri ste/ de rnams kyi nye log su gnod sbyin rnams kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du rim gyis nub kyi phyogs su lha lag na nags pa thogs pa dang / klu
162a3(rgyud): dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang // 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du phreng gnyis pa la brten nas go rims
162a4(rgyud): bzhin du gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / drang srong dang / grub pa dang / yi dgas dang / sha za
162a5(rgyud): dang na mkha' lding dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs ba dang / sman dang nor bu rin po che'i bye brag dang / ri bo dang / chu bo dang / gling rnams go rims
162a6(rgyud): bzhin du gtso bor grags pa dang / mchog tu gtso bo thams cad kyang bri bar bya'o// lho phyogasu gshin rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// shar gyi phyogs
162a7(rgyud): su me lha kun 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blug dang / bgrang phreng lag na thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ gos dkar po bgos pa
162a8(rgyud): dar pa'i stong g.yogs can/ mchod byer thogs dkar po can/ gser gyi mdog thol ba'i thig le gsum byas pa/ sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang / mtshon cha dang / cha byad dang / dbyings
162b1(rgyud): dang / kha dog de yang phreng gnyis pa la brten nas bri bar bya'o// thams cad nas 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dka' bzlog gi bdag po khyu mchog la zhon pa/ lag pa g.yas
162b2(rgyud): rtse gsum thogs pa'o// lha mo dka' bzlog ma yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// smin drug gi bu'ang rma bya la zhon ga/ lag na mdung thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ 
162b3(rgyud): gdong drug pa lus dmar por snang ba gos ser po bgos shing stong g.yogs gos ser po can/ phyag g.yon pas dril bu thogs nas ba dan dmar po thogs pa'o// go rims bzhin
162b4(rgyud): du b+h+r-i gi ri ti shin tu ring ba'i rnam pa dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po dang / ma mo bdun po rgyan dang / cha byad
162b5(rgyud): dang / dbyibs ji lta bzhin du mngon par bri'o// nor lha brgyad dang / drang srong bdun dang / khyab 'jug phya ga bzhi pa/ phyag na 'khor lo dang / be con dang / dung
162b6(rgyud): dang / ral gri thogs pa/ na mkha' lding gi gzhon pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// gza' brgyad dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / gangs steng gi dkyil 'khor lo rab tu
162b7(rgyud): rgyu ba'i nye ba'i gza' brgyad kyang bri'o// go rims bzhin du/ dkar po dang / nag po'i tshes bco lnga dang / khyim bcu gnyis dang / dus drug dang / zla ba bcu gnyis/ lo
162b8(rgyud): tshigs dang / sring mo bzhi gru la zhon dang / lnga pi mang po chu la gnas pa rnams te/ mdor na/ phyag rgya rnams su rnam par gzhag par bya'o// lha rnams go rims bzhin du
163a1(rgyud): phreng gnyis su bya'o// mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum par yang / dkyil 'khor gsum la brten nas mngon par bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor
163a2(rgyud): gsum po rnamasu'ang gru bzhir rnam par gzhug par bya'o// 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das so// mdor bsdus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' thams cad kyi gtso bo ni nges
163a3(rgyud): par mngon par bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yas su nges par bri bar bya'o// rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ni g.yon du nges
163a4(rgyud): par bri bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ga do tso bo 'phags pa kun tu bzang po yang nges par bri bar bya'o// // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nges par bri bar bya'o// 
163a5(rgyud): lhag ma rnams ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag/ rgya rnams su nges par bri bar bya'o// 'di dag ni/ nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil ba la yang / shar gyi/ 
163a6(rgyud): phyogs su mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lha'i phyogs su 'od gsal ba'o// 'og min dang gzugs can min pa rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam
163a7(rgyud): par ro// 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched mi gsal ba'i lha rnams ni ma yin no// byang gi phyogs su brgya byin lha'i rgyal po dang / rab 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan
163a8(rgyud): dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'od chung la sogs bI lha'i bu rnams lha'i rgyal po re re nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar rnam
163b1(rgyud): par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su mngon par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gsum par yang byang gi phyogs su 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan dka' thub zlog pa dang brtsa
163b2(rgyud): pa nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// sgo gnyis pa'i nye logs su gzhon nu smin drug gi bu rma bya'i gdan la/ log na mdung thung thogs pa/ lus dmar por snang ba/ gos ser
163b3(rgyud): bo'i stong g.yogs bgos pa/ phyag g.yas na dril bu dang ba dan dmar po thogs pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog bzhin pa'o// shar gyi phyogs
163b4(rgyud): su na mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi gzugs can dang / da drang srong mArka NA nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// lU dag ma rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnamasu yang ngo / 
163b5(rgyud): lho shar du gzhon nu bzhi dang / gzhon nu ming po dang / lhan cig pa gru'i bzhon pa la kun tu gnas pa chu gter chen po la yongasu rgyu bar byed pa// me lha'i rgyal po yang nges
163b6(rgyud): pabar mngon par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho'i phyogs su lo ka'i grong gi srin po bdag po shin tu 'jigs su rung ba ste der shing pi tsu marta la brten nas gnas pa dang / rmugs 'dzin chu'i
163b7(rgyud): dbang po zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma phyag rgya rnamasu yang rnam par bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du lho nub
163b8(rgyud): kyi phyogasu klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo nges par bri bar bya ste/ gza'i gtso bo nyi ma yang ngo // nub kyi phyogasu thub pa ser skya zhes bya ba drang srong mchog dang / mu stegs
164a1(rgyud): can gcer bu pa'i khyu mchog/ gcer bu'i gzugasu go rims bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su rnam par bzhag par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyog su gnod
164a2(rgyud): sprin gyi rgyal po nor sprin dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ste 'di rnams nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma dbyibs ji ltar kun tu gnas
164a3(rgyud): bopo bzhin du go rims bzhin phyag rgya rnams su yang mngon par bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa mngon par bri'o zhes pa phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor bzhi par ri mo lngas spras pa phyag rgya'i
164a4(rgyud): phreng bas mdzes par byas bgrub ni dang rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis rnam par brgyan pa/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa 'di lta ste/ 'jug
164a5(rgyud): pa'i sgor phyag rgyar gyur pa ni ut+pal sngon por bri'o// g.yas dang g.yon du ni pad+ma dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / dung dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / be con dang
164a6(rgyud): 'khor lo dang / swasta ka dang / bum pa dang / nya dang / dung dang / gdub skor dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / zhags pa dang / dril bu dang / gri dang / theb
164a7(rgyud): dang / gzhu dang / lcags mda' ste 'di rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshon tsha'i mchog gi phyag rgyas khor yug du grwa bzhir phreng bas khyab par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir phyag rgya
164a8(rgyud): chen po bzhi bzhag par bya ste/ byang phyogasu dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i rnam pa can byas nas rdo rje gnyis ka nas rtse mo gsum pa'i rnam pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// shar phyogasu kyi
164b1(rgyud): 'khor gru gsum pa'i rnam pa can kun nas 'bar ba can bzhag par bya'o// lce'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gzhu'i rnam pa can byas nas lhung bzed kun nas 'bar ba can bzhag par bya'o// 
164b2(rgyud): nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i rnam pa can byas nas ut+pa la sngon po rang gi sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang ldan pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// / phyogs bral rnams su phyag bzhir 'gyur/ 
164b3(rgyud): nub byang gi phyogasu dkyil 'khor zlum po'i rnam pa byas nas zhags pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// lho nub kyi phyogasu dkyil 'khor ring po'i rnam pa byas nas dbyug pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// lho/ 
164b4(rgyud): shar gyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'i rnam pa ca/ na byas nas dgra sta kun nas 'bar ba'o// byang shar ragyi phyogasu ral gri kun nas 'bar ba bzhag par bya'o// thams
164b5(rgyud): cad nas mngon par bris nas steng dang 'og dang thad kar phyag rgya gsum phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang nye bar phye ma nyid kyi bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ gos dang / bsil yab dang / 
164b6(rgyud): lham kun nas 'bar ba de rnams mngon par bri bar bya'o// zhes so// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pas// sems can phan don 'dod pa yi// dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di rnams kyis// 
164b7(rgyud): mdor bsdus 'dir ni bstan pa yin// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi sa dang po nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya ste/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang / yan lag thams cad
164b8(rgyud): mdzes pa'i bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang rje rigs dang dmangs rigs byang chub tu sems bskyed pa theg pa chen po'i theg pa pa/ theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i ngang tshul
165a1(rgyud): can gyi sems dpa' chen po dang cing dge ba'i chos can dang / rgyal srid chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang / long spong
165a2(rgyud): chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / bzang zhing dul la tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma sdom pa la gnas pa/ gso sbyong lo nye
165a3(rgyud): bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po la zhe mi sdang ba dang / phyogs chen po dang / rigs dang ldan pa dang / rang bzhin gyis chos spod pa/ nyin dang mtshan du
165a4(rgyud): bsnyung bar gnas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ sku dri zhim da ba dang / khrus gsum byas pa/ mi smra bar gyur pa/ de'i nyin mo ga pur dang / gur gum dang / ma la yi'i can
165a5(rgyud): ngan dro zhim pos dri zhim par byas pa/ rtag tu nye reg bya sa pa dang ldan pa/ ku shi'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ srung ba'i cho ga byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / 
165a6(rgyud): bden pa dang ldan pa dang / rgyal bar dgongs pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du ha cang yang mi nye ha cang mi ring bar bzhag par bya'o// gtsang zhing gtsang sbra byas pa ji srid cig nas brgyad la
165a7(rgyud): sogs pa'i bar rnams te/ gzhan rnams ni ma yin no// de rnams kyang phan tshun kun tu chags pa/ rgyal rigs spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dang / de rnams kyi bu
165a8(rgyud): gzhon nu ma rnams grong pa'i chos ma shes pa ste bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal byis pa'i skye bo rab tu sad par byed pa/ gzhon nu'i skye
165b1(rgyud): bo dga' bar byed pas so// de nas ches thog mar de lta bu'i grong ba'i chos mi shes pa rab tu gzhug par bya/ rgyal po chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang / tshe dang nad med pa dang / dbang phyug
165b2(rgyud): dang longs spyod chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang / khyad par du yang tshul khrims dang ldan pas rig pa'i dngos grub nges par gnas pa'i phyir ro// de ltar sngar bzhag pa byas nas grogs bzang po dang / 
165b3(rgyud): ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis ga bur gyi bdug pa bsregs te/ rgyab kyi phyogs pa yin par phyi rol tu 'byung bar bya ste/ byung nas kyang ji ltar bde ba'i chu shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa/ srog
165b4(rgyud): chags med pa/ rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgya mngon par ba/ zlas pa phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab pa'i chus khyu das byas nas/ nye reg byas te gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i
165b5(rgyud): gtsang mas/ me thab du song nas/ ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste byang shar du mngon par phyogs pas ga pur dang gur gum tsan+dan dang bsres pa'i mar gyi bsregs blugs/ 
165b6(rgyud): stong phrag brgyad sprin bsreg bya'o// sngar brjod pa'i cho gas sman drangs pa dang / gshegs su gsolo// slar yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas bum pa gang
165b7(rgyud): pa brgyad gtsang mo'i gos dang ldan pa shing sa ha ka'i yal 'dab dang 'bras bus rnam par brgyan pa gser dang dngul dang rin po che dang / 'bru nang du bcug pa/ de lta bu bcom ldan 'das
165b8(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la so sor dbul bar bya'o// gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la'o// gsum pa ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la'o// bzhi pa ni byang chub sems
166a1(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la'o// lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la'o// drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o// 
166a2(rgyud): bdun pa dang brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khang du bzhag par bya ste/ gcig pa ni sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur par yong su bsngos nas bzhag par bya'o// de nas snga
166a3(rgyud): brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis bdug pa bsreg cing ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas slar yang slar yang spyan drang bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'jas
166a4(rgyud): pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / spyan ras gzi dgas dbang phyug kyang sngar brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis spyan drang
166a5(rgyud): bar bya'o// de bzhin du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / mar me dang / lha bshos kyang sngor bstan pa/ nyid kyi las kyis lha bshos thams cad kyis thams cad
166a6(rgyud): du go rim du bya'o// mar me smos pa nyid kyis mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa thams cad la lha bshos smos pas sa lu'i zan no// 
166a7(rgyud): dang / sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa/ 'o thug khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyar ba'i mar la bcos pa'i snum khur gyis mya ngan med pa 'khyil pa dang / khaN+Da la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin
166a8(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams dbul bar bya'o// phyi rol gang ba dang / tsan+dan gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi dang 'om/ 'o thug bcos pa'i bza' ba rnams rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang // 'phags
166b1(rgyud): danyan pos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / 'phags pa'i lha rnams la me tog dri zhim po rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o// la ducan dang / gar+b+ha d+ha khyad par dang / s+yA
166b2(rgyud): yo byad rnams lha thams cad dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sems can thams cad la dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du snu ma dang / rgya spos kyi me tog dang / pun+du ga la sogs
166b3(rgyud): pa rnams sngar nges par bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'phags pa dang // 'dag
166b4(rgyud): pa ma yin pa'i lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o// khyad pa ru du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sna ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i rig la pad+ma dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje'i rig
166b5(rgyud): la ut+pal dang / gzhan rnams la tha mal pa'i sngags/ kyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs lag pur/ gyi bdug pa'o// pad+ma'i rigs la tsan don no// de bzhin
166b6(rgyud): du gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje can nyid kyi gu gul du shes par bya'o// sngags gzhan thams cad la bdug pa tha mal pa dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa rnams ni thams cad la/ mar gyi mar me
166b7(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa min pa'i sngags rnams la/ dri zhim til mar dbul du gzhug/ cho ga'i go roms bzhin du ni// bdug pa mthong ba'i rgyu yis so// de bzhin kho nar
166b8(rgyud): brjod pa'i dri// sngags rnams kun la rtag par de'o// de bzhin gshegs la gang brjod dang // phyag na rdo rje gang brjod pa// rang rang gi ni rgyud rnams su// sngags spyod don du sgrub
167a1(rgyud): pa bos// 'dir ni cho ga lta bar bya// kun nas rjes su 'jug pa'o zhes pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sngar cho ga mthong bas spyan drang / mchod pa dang / 
167a2(rgyud): bdug pa la sogs pa dang / lha ba shos rab tu dbul ba rjes su 'jug pa'i bya ba byas nas/ de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog mkhas shing skyen pas/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma
167a3(rgyud): sha med pa thams cad dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / dung gi sgra'i sgra dbyangs nges par sgrogs pas/ bdug pa dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / phreng bas rnam par spras pa phyogs bzhi rnams
167a4(rgyud): dang phyogs bral rnams dang steng dang 'og dang thad kadams cad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor la bskor ba byas nas 'bru dang po thams cad pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtor bar bya'o// 
167a5(rgyud): de nas khrus byas nas slar yang zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa'i 'bras sa lu dang / thug po che'i sbyin sreg rtsa ba'i rig pa'am snying pos stong phrag brgyad bya/ 
167a6(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas nas kyang sngar bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems dpa' chen po la srung ba'i cho ga rnams byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis slob ma nyid khas blangs
167a7(rgyud): po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gso sbyong byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid kyis lus dngos grub kyi don du phul ba/ sems
167a8(rgyud): can thams cad kyi nye bar longs spyod pa thun mongs par gyur pa bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gnon par byed pa/ dge ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob/ 
167b1(rgyud): bar 'dod pa rnams la dkyil 'khor bstan pa nyid las sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa'i skye bo rnams kyang skad cig de la grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas
167b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gos ma nyams pa thags pas btags ma thag pa/ skra dang bral ba/ rtsa ba'i rig pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa/ dri zhim po'i tsan+dan dang / 
167b3(rgyud): gur gum gyis bgos pa'i dar gyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyi gdong g.yogs nas thog ma nas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub pa pos rab tu 'jug par bya'o// rgyal po'i bu sI/ 
167b4(rgyud): bo nas dbang bskur ba 'am/ rgyal rigs kyi bu 'am/ gzhan yang spro ba chen po rgyal srid chen po 'dod pa yang rab ba tu gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis par gnas po/ 
167b5(rgyud): gdong g.yogs nas dri bzang po'i me tog tsan+dan dang gur gu ma dag gis rnam par bsres pa byin te/ shin tu ga tsang sbra byas pa'i lag pa dag gis me tog 'thor du gzhug
167b6(rgyud): par bya'o// gang du de'i me tog babs pa de la de'i rig pa'i sngags sbyin par bya'o// skye ba gzhan rnams su de nyid dang 'di rje su 'brel pa'o zhes kun tu grags pa yin zhing / de nyid 'di'i dge
167b7(rgyud): ba'i bshes gnyen dang byang chub kyi snying po gnon par byed pa dang / byang chub chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o// 
167b8(rgyud): de nyid 'di'i bsgrub par bya ba dang / longs spyod chen po dang / rgyal srid chen po dang // dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag dang 'grogs pa 'di'i mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o// skye ba
168a1(rgyud): 'di nyid du sgrub pa gang dang ldan pa lhag par spyod pa las/ las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rim gyis de lta bu la sogs pa ji srid
168a2(rgyud): brgyad po rnams de srid de gzhan rnams ni ma yin no zhes so// sgrub par 'dod pa gzhan yang ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sdig pa zad pa'i don du dam tshig tsam du 'gyur zhes pa'o// dkyil 'khor
168a3(rgyud): gyi slob dpon gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin na dang po re shig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ha cang mi ring / ha cang mi nye ba'i byang shar gyi phyogs kyi cha'i sa phyogs rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byin
168a4(rgyud): gyis brlabs shing sngags kyis dag par byas nas de nas ngargyal po mngon par dbang bskur ba de bzhin du sems bzhin pas mtha' gcig tu sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge
168a5(rgyud): 'dun la mngon par dang ba'i dad pa dang / spro ba chen po dang nga ldan pa byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba/ theg/ pa chen po la zhugs pa/ dkon mchog gsum la bsnyen
168a6(rgyud): bkur byed pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba med cing ma smad pa/ skye bo 'di nyid la rig pa dang / sngags sgrub par 'dod pa/ bsam pa bzang zhing / sngags kyi spong ba la spro ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ dge/ 
168a7(rgyud): mtshan 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can/ sad pa'i rgyur yang rig pa'i don la rnam rtog med cing der gtad pa'i yid can de lta bu la sogs pa lnga ji srid par mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// lhag
168a8(rgyud): ma rnams spang bar bya'o zhes so// shes rab can dang spyod pa la ma rmongs pa'i khyad par las te/ gzhan rnams bsten par bya ba ma yin no// de nas rgyal po thams cad dbang bskur bzhin
168b1(rgyud): du yo byad thams cad bsogs te/ slob dpon dang mkhan po mnyes par bya'o// de nas bla re bres te rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang gdugs dkar po mgo bor 'dzin bzhin pa dang / rnga yab
168b2(rgyud): dkar po g.yo ba bzhin pa dang / bkur sti chen pos dung dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga'i dga' ba'i sgra nges par sgrogs pa dang / rgyal ba'i sgra dang / bkra shis kyi tshig su bcad pas
168b3(rgyud): mngon par bsngags pa dang / bde legs kyi tshigasu bcad pa rgyal bas gsungs pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod bzhin pas bskor ba dang / bkra shis de byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub
168b4(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad ce sa brjod par bya'o// slob dpon sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod pa mngon
168b5(rgyud): par sgrub pa yang dag par rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'jig/ rten pa thams cad las 'das pa'i gsang chen rnam pa 'thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang dag par rje su 'jug pa
168b6(rgyud): dang chos kyi rgyal srid thams cad kyis sangs rgyas nyid mngon par rtogs par 'dod pa dang / mdor bsdus nas brjod na sangs rgyas nyid 'byung ba'i phyir bdag nyid spro bar bgyi'o zhes
168b7(rgyud): / de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste shar du mngon par phyogs pas dkyil 'khor mthong zhing rtogs pa la dang po re shig rig pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba byin nas/ phyag rgya chen
168b8(rgyud): bo rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa dang / sngags dag gang gnas pa/ gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi ha gis bri bar bya'o// bris nas tsan+dan dang gur gum dag gis lag pad
169a1(rgyud): dang kham phor kha sbyar bkrus nas de nas gro ga'i 'dab ma kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' sem/ 
169a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du bzhag par bya'o// de nas der nye bar 'dug ste rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad snga ma nyid du brjod par bya'o// de nas der ku
169a3(rgyud): sha'i khres lo nye bar 'dug pa mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang ba sgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs nas smib
169a4(rgyud): dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas shing spyi bor mngon par dbang nga bskur bya'o// slob ma ji ltar 'dod pa'i chus spyi bo nas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes so// de nas de la
169a5(rgyud): kham phor kha sbyor de de'i ched du sbyin par bya'o// mar me la klog tu gzhug par bya'o// gal te des bcom ljon 'ang/ sa rig pa 'am sngags gzung ba nyid yin par gyur na bkla
169a6(rgyud): pa nyid las kyang las kyang las byed do// rnam pa gzhan du na rim gyis 'bad pas bsgrubs pas byed par 'gyur ro// gzhon rnams ni sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par byed do// de nas
169a7(rgyud): sngags yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dang po bsgrub pa kho nas 'grub par byed do// zhes pa rnam par rtog pa med pa laso// de kho na sngar bris pa slob dpon gyi sgrub pa gsum gyis nges
169a8(rgyud): par 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'bad pa med par ro// de bzhin du thog mar rig pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis par mngon par dbang bskur ba ni/ dkyil 'khor
169b1(rgyud): gnyis par/ dkyil 'khor thams cad lha dang / lha thams cad la gang rab tu bstabs pa'i bum pa gang ba des snga ma'i cho ga gang yin pa ji lta ba de nyid kyis spyi bor mngon
169b2(rgyud): par dbang bskur bar byas na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rje su gnang bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / 
169b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya sgrub pa la yang lhag par 'dod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis slob dpon du mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin no// dkyil
169b4(rgyud): 'khor gsum par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams ca/ da la phul ba'i bum pa gang ba cho ga de nyid kyis spyi bor mdo na par dbang bskur bar bya'o// khyed la sangs rgyas byang
169b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyi sa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i sngags rnams dang / dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang / 
169b6(rgyud): nye bar ston pa dang / rgyud dang rgyud kyi phyag rgya dang smad pa nges par ston pa dang / rang gi cho ga nges par ston par rje su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// skye ba 'di nyid dam gang phyi ma gzhan dang gzhan/ 
169b7(rgyud): rnamasu sangs rgyas nyid nges par thob bo// de bzhin du rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang sngar nges par bstan pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das la lngar phul ba'i bum
169b8(rgyud): pa gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba'i bum pa gang bas de bzhin kho nar mngon par dbang bskur ro// de bzhin du yang khyod la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang
170a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi 'drung po thams cad kyis mi rmugs pa dang / lus can thams cad kyis mi thub cing rnam par rgya
170a2(rgyud): pabadang / khyod sngags thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bsgrubs shig ces rjes su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sems can lnga po nyid re re la ji ltar
170a3(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o// de nas de dag rim gyis dkyil 'khor du bcug nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul te/ dkyil 'khor la
170a4(rgyud): bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gshig so su gsol bar dbya'o// de nas nyi ma gzhan la rim gyis rig pa dang gdasang sngags kyi spyod pa rnams la bslab par bya zhing / rnam
170a5(rgyud): par sbyar bar bya'o// skad cig de nyid la song nas sngar brten pa ra phul ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po la sngar phul ba'i chu bum pa gang ba blangs nas/ dkyil 'khor du
170a6(rgyud): zhugs pa de rnams la chu khyor ba gsum shar du mngon par phyogs par byas nas 'thung du gzhug par bya'o// 'di skad brjod par bya ste// kye byang chub sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i dam
170a7(rgyud): tshig gang gis 'bar byed pa bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gang du'am/ der yang rigs dman pa gang gis dkyil 'khor du 'ongs pa de rnams kyang dkyil
170a8(rgyud): 'khor gyis slob dpon gyis snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas grogs byed pa'i lag par gos dkar po gtsang ma mgo bor bcings pa gzhan gyis sam gos kun tu g.yogs te gnas pa/ 
170b1(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas rigs dman pa rnams kyis me tog gtor bar bya'o// de nas grogs byed pa de rnams kyis kyang / rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis khrus
170b2(rgyud): bya'o// de rnams kyis yang dam tshig tsam de 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa yang grub par 'gyur ro// de sngar byas pa'i me'i bya ba'i gnasu song nas rtse mo ma nyams pa'i ku sha rnams kyis so// 
170b3(rgyud): der yang me thab rnam pa gsum du brjod do// zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod do// zhi ba'i don du pad+ma'i rnam pa'o// yang na tshim par byed pas dbang du byed pa yang ngo // mngon spyod
170b4(rgyud): la zur gsum mo// de la me'i bya ba'i cho ga thams cad la ku sha dgram por 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams ca/ dad la phyag bya ba byas nas/ shar gyi rtse mor me'i bya ba bzhog
170b5(rgyud): par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ phyi nas me'i bya ba mdzad pa rnams la phyag byas nas lho'i rtse mor ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
170b6(rgyud): phyag byas nas/ byang gi rtse mor sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin du yang bya ba rnams grogs byed pas gnas pa'i ngang tshul can gyis me'i bya ba ku sha rnams kyis so// thog mar rtse ba'i rig paso// 
170b7(rgyud): thog mar zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar lo btags pa'i 'bras yos kyi sbyin bsreg nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin par bya'o// zhi ba'i don du snying pos mar gyis so// rgyas pa'i don du shing a pa marga
170b8(rgyud): gsum gyi sbyin sreg go// mngon spyod la ka Ta ke yis so// mo'i bya ba'i cho ga 'di yang thams cad du thun mong ba'i sgrub pa rnams la yang ngo // dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nye bar spyod pa
171a1(rgyud): rnams su yang ngo // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi gnas gtsang mas gtso bo'i lha nyid bstan nas/ me'i cho ga'i bya ba byas te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// 
171a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa rnams la/ de nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas mchod yon no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
171a3(rgyud): rnams dang / gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha'i khyad par rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyang gsan du gsol/ gang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga las
171a4(rgyud): 'das par yang rung ste/ gus par byed pa dang / gzhan yang gang cung zad bdag nyid nyams par bya ba de dag da/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu gnas
171a5(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul dang ma bral bar thob par gyur cig/ myur du bde ba dang ldan pa thob
171a6(rgyud): pabar gyur cig/ de skad ces brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams thams cad la/ mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o// sbyin pa
171a7(rgyud): la rab tu chags pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa dang / mdor na lung dang rig pa dang gsang sngags sangs
171a8(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa rnams blta bar bya/ byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon
171b1(rgyud): gyis byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa de rnams thams cad la dri bzang po'i me tog gis mchod yon phul nas samade nas yid kyis mchod yon phul nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas gats+tshag r+b+ha zhes pa
171b2(rgyud): dang swAhA zhes pa kho na bzlas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas gyen du nges par bltas pas gshegasu gsol bar bya'o zhes pa'o// 
171b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rab 'byams kyi le'u ste gnyis pa rdzog so// 
171b4(rgyud): de nas sems dpa' chen po de slar yang thad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas lha'i bu rnam ngas thams cad la smras par gyur te/ khyed rnams nyon
171b5(rgyud): cig/ mchog gi grub pa mchog tu gsang ba sgrub thabs tham sa cad kyi cho ga rig pa'i las thams cad byed pa dang / rig pa'i las bzang po byed pa chen po nyid dang / don chen po/ 
171b6(rgyud): byed pa phung khrol thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ mchog tu bkra shis pa thams cad kun nas bkra shis pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs
171b7(rgyud): pa bdag gi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par gyur pa/ las phran tshegs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo las chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub
171b8(rgyud): byed pa'i sgrol ma gang zhe na/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ku ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tA re tata tA re tu re swAhA/ 
172a1(rgyud): grogs po dag 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma las chen po thams cad byed pa las phran tshegs thams cad bklags pas grub pa/ mchog tu gsang ba shin tu
172a2(rgyud): gsang ba mchog tu grub pa gzhan gyis rab tu sbyar ba'i las thams cad 'jig pa byed pa'i rig pa 'di yang dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs su gyur te/ 'phags ma sgrol
172a3(rgyud): mas las chen po thams cad mdor bsdus pa dang / las phran tshegs thams cad la yang nye bar sbyar bar bya zhing / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis cho ga dang sgrub thabs rnams la
172a4(rgyud): yang ngo // nyin mtshan gang du'am der yang rung ste/ ga datsang ma'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o// bdag nyid nyes pa da med pa dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi sa gcig pus dang po/ 
172a5(rgyud): re shig grub bzhi mnyam pa sgo bzhi pa khru bzhi'i tshad dngaldan pa'i dbus pad+ma'i phyag rgya de'i g.yas su ut+pa la sngon po dang / dbyug pa'i phyag rgya dang / ril ba spyi blug
172a6(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya g.yon du rdo rje rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya dang / gos dkar mo'i phyag rgya dang / rta mgrin dang dpal chen me'i phyag rgya'o// shar sgor pad+ma/ byang du ut+pa la/ lho ru rdo rje/ nub
172a7(rgyud): tu 'jug pa'i rim pa las 'das par/ steng du 'khyil pa'i rnam pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o// de'i 'og tu phyi nas me'i bya ba byas nas sngar brjod pa'i cho gas mchod pa la sogs pa byas
172a8(rgyud): te dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o// de la rgyal srid 'dod pas hat+tha'i shing du'o// longs spyod 'dod pas rang gi khyim gyi'o// rta 'dod pas rta'i bres su'o// glang po che 'dod pas rma/ 
172b1(rgyud): po che'i bres su'o// bu 'dod pas po de rtsi'i shing gi drung du'o// tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa la tshangs pas bsgyangs pa ru'o// klus zin pa la klu shing dang nye ba ru'o// mkha'agro mas/ 
172b2(rgyud): zin pa la lam bzhi mdo ru'o// gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la ba Ta'i shing gi drung du'o// srul pos zin pa la khron pa'i drung du'o// gzhan rnams kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gang du'ang / 
172b3(rgyud): de ru yang nyes pa med do// grogs po dag mdor bsdus na/ rig pa 'di ni dkyil 'khor dang / las thams cad pa ste/ las thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// gsang chen 'di
172b4(rgyud): dang lhan cig rab tu sbyar bar bya ste dkyil 'khor 'di ni saM dmas can rnams la phan par 'dod pa'i 'bras bus yo dad pa'o// longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar
172b5(rgyud): byed pa sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig bsgrub pa po rnams la phan pa'i don gyi phyir 'byor pa thams cad mngon paraphel bar byed pa ste/ mdor na phyi ma'i lus can 'bru
172b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa rab tu grogs so// de nas dkyil 'khor chen por gyur pa gang thob nas dpal med pa 'joms par byed cing zhi bar byed/ nad dang dgra
172b7(rgyud): 'phrog pa de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang stobs sgrub par byed pa mthong zhing thos nas de nas cho ga la rab tu dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de rnams
172b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub tu bdag gis lung ston par the tshom med do// gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi 'dren pa de rnams kyang rjes
173a1(rgyud): su yi rang bar 'gyur ro// sa steng dkyil 'khor smra ba ni// zhi ba'i las rnams thams cad byed// bkren pa rnams kyis phan pa thob// sems can
173a2(rgyud): mgon med sdug bsngal can// rnams kyis dkyil 'khor rab sbyar bya// in+d+ra nI la sogs phye mas// dkyil 'khor yang dag kun tu bri// in+d+ra nI la sogs med na// sa lu'i phye
173a3(rgyud): mas yang dge bri// sa lu'i phye ma sogs med na// so phag phye mo sogs kyis bri// so phag phye ma sogs med na// bye ma rnams kyis yang dag bri// de ltar yon tan kun bsdus pa'i/ 
173a4(rgyud): sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba// 'jig rten mgon dpo'i yang dag bka'// byang chub sems dpa' sa gsu rangs pa yin zheso// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang ldan
173a5(rgyud): pa theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen rjes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las sgrub tha sa kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rab 'byams kyi
173a6(rgyud): le'u ste gsum pa rdzogs so// / de nas sems dpa' chen pos slar yang dkyil 'khor chen po de la kun tu gzigs nas dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yang dag
173a7(rgyud): 'phags pa dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs shing mngon par yid rang bar gyur pa/ mchog gi sgrub pa'i cho ga ras ris
173a8(rgyud): kyis cho ga gsungs so// dang po re shig dge ba'i nyi ma la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i ras bral blangs nas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag pas ras bal byed du gzhug par bya'o// de nas ras bal de
173b1(rgyud): la lhag par gnas par bya ste rtsa ba'i rig pa dnga' bo tshan gyis nyos pa'i dog pa blangs nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang /

173b3(rgyud): sngags kyi dngas grub lhag par gnas par mdzod cig/ de'i dus su rbab ce ha dang / rngab che dang / drung dang / bi wang dang / gling bu dang / mkhar rdza dang / rnga mur dza'i slabs pa
