202b5(rgyud): rnam lngas bkrus nas mngon par gsang gtor byas te snga ma bzhin du sbyong ba'i sngags sam/ yi ge gcig pa'i sngags sam/ sngags gzhan gang yang rung ba brgya
202b6(rgyud): rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir gsungs pa ma gtogs pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rig pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji ltar mngon par dga' bas bdag nyid srung
202b7(rgyud): zhing grogs po yongasu bskyab par byas pa/ shin tu gsang thub cing sngags dang rgyud shes pa/ sngar bstan pa'i gnas su bris sku zhal nub tu bstan la bzhag ste bdag nyid sngar
202b8(rgyud): bzhin du'o// bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas gtso bor ga pur gyi bdug pa bsregs te sngar bstan pa'i mtshon cha dang yo byad dang sems can gyi khyad pa rnams sngar bstan pa'i bcos
203a1(rgyud): mar byas la/ yang ngo slab na pa'i mtshan mo rdzas de rnams gang rung blangs te mtshan mdza srid du bzlas pa byas na nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi che bar skabs 'dir bris srul/ 
203a2(rgyud): 'od zer gyi phreng ba chen po kun tu mthong ngo // gal te sgrub pa po gzhon pa'i khyad par blangs par gyur na/ de la zhon nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te rgyan gyi khyad par ram
203a3(rgyud): mtshon cha'i khyad par blangs pa 'am/ bcang bas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'gro zhing / lha'i lus can nyi ma shar ba dang mtshungs pa 'od zer
203a4(rgyud): chen po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa klog ltar gsal ba'i sku/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/ ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag
203a5(rgyud): khrig brgya stong phrag du mes yongs su bskor lha'i nor bu rin po che'i gzhal yas khang na spyod pa/ sngar yongs su brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzhon pa gang gis grub pa de nyi
203a6(rgyud): mthu chen por 'gyur te/ de nyid 'di'i bzhon pa dang / de nyid 'di grogs po ste/ gzhan gyi sngogs kyi dngos grub bzlog par gyur pa bdag gi sngags kyi dngos grub kun tu sbyar bar
203a7(rgyud): byas pa/ byams pa'i bdag nyid can/ phan par 'dod pa rtag tu rjes su bcings pa/ de nyid 'di'i mtshon cha dang / rgyan dang / rin po che'i bye brag dang / stan dang / mal cha dang / sems
203a8(rgyud): can la sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di'i srung ba dang / bslab pa dang / sra ba chen po rtag tu rjes su 'brel par 'gyur ro// mthu chen po dang brtson 'grus chen po dang / lus chen por
203b1(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mngon sum du mthong zhing / legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste spyi bor blugs nas ji srid byang chub snying po rjes thob kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad de/ stobs
203b2(rgyud): bcu po rnams nges par kun nas thob ste mchod pa'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// sems can rnams kyis tshal gyis mi non pa dang / 'byung po thams cad kyis mi rmugs par 'gyur ro// 
203b3(rgyud): yang dag pa'i mtha'i rigs rgyun mi gcod pa dang / sa thob par yang 'gyur ro// stobs bcu dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid du nges pa dang ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro// mdor bsdus nal/ 
203b4(rgyud): mchog thams cad dang / gnas mchog la gnas pas dngas ris mchog gi spyan sngar mchod pa mchog lam ngon par dga' bas las mtshig gzhan nyid bya'o// rig pa
203b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa nyid na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sem sa dpa'i rje su 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sa rje su thob par byed pa nyid dang / lus 'di nyid
203b6(rgyud): kyis 'jig rten kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang / stobs bcu'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'phags pa byams pa mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang / chos bsta/ 
203b7(rgyud): pa don yod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas gdung rgyun mi gcod pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu gnon cing rje su thob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos
203b8(rgyud): kyi sprin rnam par 'byor pa la rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang / nyon mongs pa'i yongasu gdung ba med cing bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun gyis rab tu zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dang / 'jig rten rjes su
204a1(rgyud): 'dzin pa la rab tu 'gyus nan tan byed ba nyid tu phy-i dang / de bzhin gzugs pa'i chos kyichu la srung shing khye dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung don dang/ 
204a2(rgyud): par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rab tu sgom pa nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs
204a3(rgyud): rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos bdag nyid chen po rnams 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir/ rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ sngags kyi mtha' rab 'byam dang ldan pa ras ris
204a4(rgyud): thu bo spyan snga dang nye bar 'dug nas 'jig rten pa dang / 'ji dag rten las 'das pa thams cad sngags kyi cho ga dang / rgyud thams cad du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lam ste/ mdo
204a5(rgyud): na 'dir rtog pa gzhan du gsung ba'i las rnams kyis kyang sa ris kyi rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ myur du/ de rnams kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ gang ngas bstan pa de
204a6(rgyud): ngag gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sde snod pal po che the ga pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa
204a7(rgyud): gyen rjes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ ras ris mchog gi sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya
204a8(rgyud): thub pa slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub thebs par me
204b1(rgyud): yod do// de mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya yis// legs par yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
204b2(rgyud): gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ston pa 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa/ bdag cag la thugs
204b3(rgyud): brtse ba'i don dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas gang de'i dus la bab par dgongs na de gsung du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
204b4(rgyud): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa/ 'a chen po nyon cig/ dang po re shig tshul khrims dang brtul zhug
204b5(rgyud): dang gtsang sbra'i kun tu spyod pa dang / nges par sdom pa dang nga / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / bsam gtan dang / cho ga dang / gang du rab tu gnas pa ste/ sems can thams cad
204b6(rgyud): kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu dang bcas shing don med par mi 'gyur ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i dngos grub grub par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ de ngas bshad kyis sems
204b7(rgyud): dpa'i chen po nyon cig dang po re shig rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa dang po nyid du yang dag par blangs te/ dang po re shig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis/ 
204b8(rgyud): nye bar bstan pa'i dam tshig la yang dag par rjes su 'jug par bya'o// khyod kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/ sngar nges par bstan pa gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/ 
205a1(rgyud): slob dpon du dbang bskur ba thob pa/ khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho ga shes pa/ mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ chos dang ldan pa/ bden par smra ba/ spro ba che ba/ byas pa gzo
205a2(rgyud): ba brtan pa/ sems bzang ba/ ha cang mi rgan cing ha cang mi gzhon pa/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti thams cad la 'dod pa med pa/ tshangs par spyod pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ rnyed pa tsam gyis/ 
205a3(rgyud): sam longs spong rgyur ram/ rjes su chags pa'i rgyur yang brdzun mi smra na/ shin tu chung ngu tsam nyid dang / rnyed pa dang / rmongs pa'i rnam pa lta smos/ dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / 
205a4(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du snying brtse ba dang ldan pa dang / sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / sngar sprad pa byas pa khyo dad kyis gsang ba'i rig pa dang / sngags rjes su zlos pa dang / 
205a5(rgyud): rig pa sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du yang / dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten shes pa/ yang dag par rjes su 'dzin par byed pa/ 'bras bu dang ldan zhing mkha
205a6(rgyud): pa/ legs pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ mi 'jigs shing mi gnod la/ chags pa med pa/ dpa' ba/ brtson 'grus brtan pa/ nad med pa ste/ nad gang gis la su mi rung ba'i ngang tshul
205a7(rgyud): can dang / rigs che zhing mtho bar rab tu skyes pa zhes pa/ yon tan 'di rnams dang ldan pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur te/ sgrub pa po yang de dang 'dra ba 'am/ yan lag
205a8(rgyud): cung zad ma rdzogs pa'o// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la mchod pa byas nas 'di'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
205b1(rgyud): rig pa dang sngags dang bcom ldan 'das ma de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la rje su 'jug par 'tshal na bdag cag la rje su brtse ba'i don dang / phan pa'i thugs bskyed nas de slob dpon gyis
205b2(rgyud): gsung du gsol// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma ji lta ba bzhin rim gyis brtags nas bzhugs par bya zhing sngar bzhin du mngon par dbang
205b3(rgyud): bskur ba byin nas rig pa dang sngags byin la rim pa ji lta bar dam tshig bstan par bya'o// gsang chen dang / phyag rgya dang / rgyud dang / sngags dang las rnams kyang dus ring mo nyid nas
205b4(rgyud): yongs su btags te/ bsam pa shes nas rgyud dang sngags la sogs pa dang / las rnams thams cad ba snyan par bya'o// gzhan du ma yin no zhes pa'i cho ga 'di rang
205b5(rgyud): tu bsgrags so// de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi slo ba dpon la ji ltar nus pas gang gis slob dpon dgyes/ pa'am bdag nyid dang longs spyod kyang dbul bar bya'o// de
205b6(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag par bya'o// bu bzhin du bskyang bar bya'o// ma bzhin longs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o// de nas sgrub po des rig pa dang sngag
205b7(rgyud): gang yang rung ba zhig bzung nas mtha' gcig tu song ste/ sngar bstan pa'i gnas rgya cher gong ma bzhin du sbyar bas rig pa la sogs pa de rnams nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su
205b8(rgyud): gsol ba dang / mar me dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma dang / lha bshos ngag dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i cho ga nyid kyis rgyas par byas te spyan drangs nas gdan phul ba thun
206a1(rgyud): mtshams gsum du khrus gsum bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes te nyi ma so so la bzlas pa bya'o// de la thun 'tshams kyi dus zhes bya ba ni mtshan mer
206a2(rgyud): mtha' nas brtsams te ji srid nyi ma 'char ba'i dus tsam gyi bar 'di la dang por bshad do// nyi ma gung ni nyi ma shar ba'i mthar dus tsam gyi tshad kyi mtshams nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor na mkha' la
206a3(rgyud): yang dag par brten pa ni cho ga shes pas gung gi thun 'tsham su shes par bya'o// nub pa'i dus su yang lhag ma bzhi cha tsam thun mtshams gsum par brjod par bya'o// slob dpon mkhas
206a4(rgyud): pa shes nyen can// tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang da gra ldan// chen po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang // kun na su brtson 'grus brtan pa ni// sngags dang rgyud sogs yang
206a5(rgyud): ngag ldan// bya ba kun la blo gros byang // phra zhing mkhas// la tshang shes pa// chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin// spro ba che zhing gzi brjid ldan// 'jig rten chos la ltos
206a6(rgyud): pa med// thub pa mchog gi chos la dang // 'jig rten pa rnams dor ba dang // bzlas pa byas shing rnam dben byas// sngon du bsnyen pa rjes brten pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gsang
206a7(rgyud): sngags shes// de las gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams mthong // sangs rgyas kyis gsungs gsang sngags dang // 'jig rten pa yi rab sbyor shes// srung ba byas shing mthu brtan pa// gcang
206a8(rgyud): sgra'i kun spyod la rtag dga'// sangs rgyas nye bstan lam la ni// kun nas rjes su 'jug pa dang // gsang sngags rgyal bas gsungs pa yin// gsang sngags zlos la rtag tu brtson// 
206b1(rgyud): rtag tu mthong chos 'bras bu dang // 'jig rten pha rol de bzhin nyid// sdig pa kun la 'jigs pa dang // phra mo tsam la'ang de bzhin no// gtsang zhing mkhas la le lo med// yid gzhungs
206b2(rgyud): lta na sdug pa dang // stobs bcu pas bshang sngags gang dang // de bzhin kho nar rgyal sras dang // 'jig rten pa yi sngags gang nyid// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag la'ang // de la rtag tu ngal bar byas
206b3(rgyud): gzhung dang bstan bcos don 'dzin pa// nad med nus pa med min pa// rga dang nang ni rnam par spangs// de bzhin shes nyen can sngags grub// kun nas myur du byed pa dang // mtha' yi ring min
206b4(rgyud): zhing de bzhin// tshangs par spyod cing shes rab che// khyad par du ni shes pa dang // gcig tu 'du 'dzi med pa dang // / dpa' zhing dbang bskur thob pa dang // de 'dir byang chub pha rol
206b5(rgyud): son// srid pa zhi bar byed la brtson// de bzhin nyid du rig sngags byas// mthu chen 'jig rten shes pa dang // 'gro ba sems can rjes sems pa// dpa' nyid dang ni rab tu ldan
206b6(rgyud): sbyin dang 'byung po phan la dga'// de bzhin khyad 'phags slob dpon la// rtag tu gsil ba gdab par bya// des ni dkyil 'khor bris pa yi// sngags kyi dngos grub ster bar byed// de nyid kyis
206b7(rgyud): ni dbang bskur gyis// 'bras bu chen po sbyin par 'gyur// dngos grub 'dod pa'i slob mas kyang // thub pa bzhin du rtag tu mchod// de yi gsungs ni mi 'gom pa// slob mas 'bad pas
206b8(rgyud): bya ba yin// ji ltar 'byor cing bdog pa yi// longs spyod de la dbul bar bya// nyung ngu tsam mam mang yang rung // gang gis mnyes par 'gyur ba dang // lus ni 'tshe ba'i rgyu yi phyir// pha la
207a1(rgyud): nor ni ster ba ltar// de bzhin slob ma chos shes pas// slob dpon la ni nor dbul bya// mtha'i dbang phyug dngos grub thob// tshe dang de bzhin nang med dang // rgyas pa'i 'gro
207a2(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// slob mas bla ma de mchod na// de yi sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur// lam dang cho ga nyer mthong dang // bsnyen pa las kyang brten pa las// de bzhin ri mor byas mchod las/ 
207a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par 'gyur// de bzhin rgyal mchog sras rnams dang // lha rnams thams cad dgyes par 'gyur// bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur na/ bla ma sngag rnams mthong ba yi/ 
207a4(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur// sgrub pos sngo// na dang thog mar ni// dam tshig la ni rjes 'jug bya// dam na rnams de dag mnyam yang rung // gal te ches mchog
207a5(rgyud): gyur pa yang // rmongs pa'am lhag par khri ba yis// rte ga tu bla ma brnyas mi bya// des kyang rgyud 'dir de la ni// man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya// gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub
207a6(rgyud): byin pa 'dis ni ser sna byas pa min// sngar bstan slob ma de la ni// man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya// gang che sngags kyi dngos grub byin// lus can zhen pa 'phel byed pa'i// mig ni gang la yod
207a7(rgyud): gyur pa/ de nyid slob ma nyid bya'o// slob dpon 'am ni slob ma'i rgyur// phan tshun rje su 'jug byed pa// gang du zhen pa'i rgyun skyong ba// 'jam po'i rgyun ni 'dzin pa ste// de la sngags ni sbyin par
207a8(rgyud): byang slob dpon de bzhin slob ma ni// slob ma bla mar mthong ba la// rtag tu spro bar 'gyur ba'am// gnyis kas dngos grub yang dag 'byor// de la rtag tu lam nyid dang // sngags kyi spyod/ 
207b1(rgyud): ba rjes bstan bya// gnyis kas pa dang bur shes pas// sngags ni 'bras bcas rjes 'jug pa// brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob// rtag tu slob mas bla ma ni// rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar// 
207b2(rgyud): bya bu ni bdag nyid chen po rnams// sangs rgyas chos rgyun mi 'chang 'gyur// de med mgon med de rnams la// ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags rnams sbyin// sems can bkren dang ma ning/ 
207b3(rgyud): la'ang / thams cad la ni khyad par du// sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags// tha ma mchog dang bar ma la// dus rnams kun tu bya ba'o// yongs su thob pa'i chos rnams la// rje su gzung ba'i/ 
207b4(rgyud): rgyun bya'o// 'gro ba blo gros nges pa yi// 'dod pa rnams la' du rab sbyin bya// de phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags// slob ma nyid kyis blang bar bya// de nyid kyis ni nyer bstan pas// lam
207b5(rgyud): nyid yin no gzhan du min// dngos grub 'dod pas gang de la// / pha ni pha rol song ba na// pa bzhin mgo bos phyag byas te// de nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro// de nas 'dir ni song nas ni// 
207b6(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas// slong mo slong ba'i rjes 'jug cing // smra ba bcad de dus gsum bzlas// ngo ltar bstan pa nyid du 'gyur// ji lta'i lam la rab 'jug pa// de
207b7(rgyud): tshe rnam 'gyur de gcod pa// khang stong dang ni dgon pa che// ri bo che dang chu klung ngogs// gtsang dang ba lang gnas mtsho chen// rnam dben skye bo spangs pa bsten// lha khang dang ni shing drung dang / 
207b8(rgyud): mtshan gcig ri ni mthon po dang // rgya mtsho che 'gram nyams dga' dang // chu gling ngam ni gling rnams dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sngar bstan pa'i// yul rnam sna tshogs yid 'ong ba// 'di
208a1(rgyud): rnams las kyang phyogs gzhan du// mnyam par bzhag pas sngags bzlas bya// grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni// sngags don nges pa'i rtog ge ba// ltas ni rnam
208a2(rgyud): pa de nyid shes// dpa' zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba// snying stobs ldan zhing bzod pa can// dad dang tshul khrims phun tshogs ldan// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i yul 'dir ni// rab bsngags
208a3(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang ldan pa// bzod dang ldan pa'i grogs po yis// 'bad pa med pa'i nyin gyis ni// las rnams rgyal ba 'grub par 'gyur// tho rangs mal nas langs nas ni// 'bab chu
208a4(rgyud): mtsho chen las byung ba'i// srog chags med cing dri ma med8 // chu de nyid la khrus byas nas// sa dang ba byung phye ma yi// / sngags shes lus ni dril phyis bya// de nas sngags kyis
208a5(rgyud): sbyang byas pa'i// chu nyid shin tu dri med la// zlos po brtse na pas khrus bya'o// ha cang yun rings khrus mi bya// de na sa langs la lag pa dag/ sa dag gis kyang bkru bar bya/ 
208a6(rgyud): bdun dang bdun dang yang lan bdun// nyi shu rtsa gcig nye reg bya// yang der song shing kun tu spang // so sbyangs nas ni dor bar bya// de nas skyob la phyag byas shing // 'jig rten mgon la phyag
208a7(rgyud): byas nas// sngags rig mchod pa yid 'ong bya// bya ba sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis// yang dog yang du yang dag bstod// de bzhin dri zhim me tog gis// ston pa skyob la mchod yon dbul
208a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams la mgos phyag byas// de tshe slob mar gyur pa rnams// 'jig rten mgon po de rnams kyi// sman snga nyid du sdig pa bshags// bdag nyid dag kyang phul byas nas// 
208b1(rgyud): ras ris spyan sngar 'khod bar bya// ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'jug/ sngags rig gnyis ka 'dug nas ni// mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin te// der ni bgrang phreng nyid kyis ni// rab tu 'bad
208b2(rgyud): pas bzlas pa bya// de tshe sngags gzhan mi bzlas so// cho ga dman pa yang spang zhing // ha cang mchog kyang de bzhin no// bar ma bar ma'i las dag la// brtul zhugs can dag sngags
208b3(rgyud): bzlas bya// ha cang mthon po spang bar bya// gal te tshig ni dman pa'ang min// bar ma bar ma'i las rnams la// rab tu sngags par rgyal bas gsungs// ha cang mtho min dma' ba
208b4(rgyud): min bar mar rtag tu bzlas pa bya// sngon gyi sangs rma das thams cad kyis// tshig ni dpal dang ldan par gsu dngas// gzhan gyi drung du mi bzlas shing // gzhan gyi las
208b5(rgyud): lam rtag tu gsang // bdag nyid rig pa'i yul du bzla sa// sngags ni bar ma de bzhin du// bzlas pas rab tu 'byor par 'gyur// sngags ni legs par thos pa 'gal
208b6(rgyud): dngos grub 'bring po 'dod pa nyid// sngags ni dge bar bzlas par bya// de phyir skye bo dang bral bar// sngags kyi de nyid don legs thos// tshogs dang bral zhing rnam dben par// zlos pa
208b7(rgyud): pos ni sngags bzlas bya// mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang // de yi phyed kyi phyed nyid kyi// skya reng dmar po'i dus tsam ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba na// thun ni dang por re bzhin du// thub
208b8(rgyud): ba'i skyes mchog gis gsungaso// dus kyi tshad ni bzhi yin te// bar mar yongs su bsgrags pa yin// de nas nyi ma phyed nub na// sngags kyis bzlas pade tshe btang // sngags zlos por/ 
209a1(rgyud): bde yi tshe// mchod yon phul nas gshegs su gsol// brtul zhugs can gyi rnam gzhan spangs// de che bor ba'i dug lhag na// thub pa'i bstan la/ 
209a2(rgyud): dge ba bya// shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs// dam pa'i chos ni klog pa dang // sa bcu pa yi glegs bam ni// mchod dang klog pa rtag tu'o// de nas dus la bab gyur na// rang
209a3(rgyud): sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang // thub pa skyes mchog phyag byas nas// de nas 'tsho ba la 'gro zhing // de bzhin dus su spong bapar ldan// dus su za zhing dbang por thul// sgrub bo
209a4(rgyud): chos dang ldan pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang brtson// grong gzhan du ni 'jug pa na// mi smra gtsang sgra spyod la dga'// sems can rtag tu chos ldan pa'i// 
209a5(rgyud): khyim du bsod snyoms dag la 'jug/ zlos po srog cha/ gas med pa'i chu// chos par grub pa gtsang mar ra dong // yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs// sangs rgyas
209a6(rgyud): bstan la rab tu dang // de lta'i khyim du rtag tu ni// bsod snyoms don du slong mo blang // dper na brtson pas go bgos te// nyam nga'i yul du rab tu 'jug/ rtag tu dgra ni
209a7(rgyud): 'joms par byed// dgra rnams kyis gzhom mi nus pa// de bzhin sngags pa slongs mos 'tsho// rtag tu grong du 'jug pa na// de bzhin chags par 'os pa yi// gzugs sgra
209a8(rgyud): mthong nas mi dge ba// 'dod chags zhi ba'i don gyi phyir// mi sdug dge ba bsgom par bya// lang tsho'i rnam pas rgyan pa yi// bud med lus ni mthong nas kyang // smad cing rul ba'i
209b1(rgyud): lus rnams ni// srin bus zos shing dur khrod gnas// lus kyi mi rtag sdug bsngal ba// mi gtsang dri mi zhim par sgom// gang la byis pa rmongs pa yi// 'gro ba lnga por 'gro zhing 'khor
209b2(rgyud): las kyi sras bus brgyus pa ni// yun rings dus su mya ngan byed// mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pa ni// dmus longs sdug bsngal rgyu can no// gang du blo ni phyin ci log/ chags pas skye ba
209b3(rgyud): phongs par 'gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs las lam gyis// rnam pa du mar chags gyur pa// ring nas khyogs kyis 'gro ba ni// 'gro dang 'ong ba spyod par byed// rtag pa nyid phyir rjes
209b4(rgyud): chags pa// 'dzin pa'i kun tu spyod pa spong // gang da du sems can mi dge dga'// lam du yun ring rgyu bar/ byed// zo tshun khyud mo'i rnam pa bzhin// srid pa'i man
209b5(rgyud): chung 'byung ba rnams// 'gro ba de rnams mi bzad pa'i// sdug bsngal chu bos kun tu g.yengs// de bzhin bud ming sdug bsngal gyi// rtsa ba 'ba' zhig yin pa ru// sangs
209b6(rgyud): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang // thub pa rnams kyis gsungs pa yin// srid pa'i rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa'i// mtsho chen 'di dag bskam pa
209b7(rgyud): dka' bud med sems kyis bslus pa yi// sems can gnas gang bying ba de// dmyal ba dud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang // yi dgas 'jig rten lha ma yin de bzhin mi yi
209b8(rgyud): 'jig rten nyid // lha yi 'gro bar 'gro bar bya// rtag tu kun nas yongs su 'khor// bud med chags pas bslus pa ni// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btson ra yi// 'dam rdza
210a1(rgyud): chen por bying bar 'gyur// bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi// ro la chags pa'i ce spang bzhin// gang la sems can rtag dga' ba// mi bzang
210a2(rgyud): sdug bsngal bzod par byed// dkar po chos la nges par nyams// sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu gnas// srid pa'i mtsho yi sdug bsngal nyid// thams cad bzlog pa da
210a3(rgyud): yin/ sngags bzlos pa la dga' zhing brtson// dbang cher grags shing yid dang ldan// gzi brjid ldan zhing sngags thub pa// der rnams la ni sdug bsngal med// yang dag sdom
210a4(rgyud): dang tshangs bden shes// bla ma lha la mchod pa byed// ma dang pha la gus pa rnams// gsum po rnams la sdug pa sngal med// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang // gzhan gyi
210a5(rgyud): don la rjes su bsnyen// bud med lus la 'byung po'i gzug sa// de bzhin 'bras dang zug rngu dang // blo ngan phung po'i lcu gas kyus zin// 'khor ba las ni mi 'da' ba// rtag tu bud
210a6(rgyud): med chags gyur pa// de la dngos grub yod pa min// de la mchog 'gro yod ma yin// 'gro ba 'bring yang yod ma yin// dngos grub chung ngu'ang yod ma yin// 'dir ni zlos po khrims 'chal na
210a7(rgyud): tshul khrims 'chal la thub dbang gis// sngags kyi dngos grub ma bstan no// mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yi// lam yang med cing phyogs dang bral// 'dir ni byis pa smad pa la// sngag
210a8(rgyud): grub pa ni ga la yod// skye bo tshul 'chal 'di la ni// de la bad 'gro'ang yod ma yin// bde ba nyid la gzhol ba'ang med// de bzhin rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags// grub par
210b1(rgyud): 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// ta la'i shing gi mgo bo ni// gang tshe bcad na slar yang ni// sngon po nyid du mi 'gyur zhing // myu gu slar yang nam zhig 'gyur// de bzhin sngags grub rmongs pa/ 
210b2(rgyud): ni tshul khrims 'chal zhing sdig pa'i las// rtag tu slar yang bud med chags// mi dge'i grogs dang phrad pa la// sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub// de bas gang tshe zlos pa pos// bde ba
210b3(rgyud): gshegs pas spangs pa yi// bud med nyes pa rnams spyad de// gang gi dngos grub bsgrub bya ste// byis pa bud med la rmongs pa// gzhan gyi grub par ma bstan no// de nas dang
210b4(rgyud): por blo ldan pa// gtsang zhing 'du 'dzi med la dga'/ rigs ldan brtan zhing dbe' ba dang // sems bzang nga ldan zhing mthong na dga'// chos dang chos min rnams
210b5(rgyud): dpyod shes// de rnams grub pa rnyed mi dka'// de ltar sngags shes zhugs pa ni// grong du bsod snyoms phyir du 'jug/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin song nas// sngar
210b6(rgyud): ni brtag pa'i gnas dag tu// mkhas pas dag pa'i blos bza' ba// bza' ba phyogs su bzhag nas ni// phyi rol song nas rkang pa bkru// de nas slar yang gnas de ru// srog
210b7(rgyud): chags med pa'i chu rnams kyis// dang po 'dren pa nyid yin te// gnyis pa la ni lag g.yon gyi// rked pa man chad dris phyis bya// kun tu g.yas pa slar byin nas// lag pa
210b8(rgyud): sa yis bkru bar bya// sngar bzhag pa yi dag pa dang // gtsang ma rnams kyi bdun nyid du// bza' zhing dag chus gtsang sbrar byas// ser skya'i ba las byung ba yi// ba yi lci ba
211a1(rgyud): ser po dag/ gtsang zhing dri me sdong brang la// srog chags med pa'i chus sbyar te// dang por skyon 'thung ba yi// mchogal pa la 'khor bya ba yin/ 
211a2(rgyud): khyad par khru gang tsam du'o// gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la// gsum pa rigs kyi lha mo la// gang zhig sngags pa bzlos pa pa// slar yang rtag tu bya ba yin// bzhi pa sems
211a3(rgyud): can thams cad kyi// nye bar longs spyod don du grags// g.yas su 'jig rten mgon po yi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtag tu bya// dkon mchog gsum gyi ched du ni// dkyil 'khor de ni/ 
211a4(rgyud): gru bzhi pa'o// gnyis pa rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras// dkyil 'khor bdun po 'di dag ni// kun nas gru bzhi pa ru'o// khru/ 
211a5(rgyud): gang 'am ni khru phyed rung // nyin re zhing yang bya ba'o// zlos pos de tshe sbas pa'i phyogs// sdig pa 'arje mas byed nyin re bzhin// de nas sngags pa thub pa langs/ 
211a6(rgyud): lag gnyis 'bad pas bkrus nas ni// gtsang mas chu yis nye reg bya// dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi// dri ma med pa'i gtsang ma ni// 'bad bas gtsang ma'i snod du blang
211a7(rgyud): mtsho chen dang ni 'bab chu'am// chu mig chu bo la gnas pa// gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung ba yi// sems can gtsang ma lag gis bcus// sngags pas slar ying nyi
211a8(rgyud): byas gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang // de nas khal reg bya zhing // de bzhin nyid dun pa'i rgyun/ mig dang sA yi bu ga nga // sku ba lta ba'i phyogs sa bya// 
211b1(rgyud): spyod pas lan lnga'am bdun// cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya// gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs// zlos po gtsang mar gyur nas ni// bsod snyoms snod ni blangs nas su// chu yis
211b2(rgyud): nang du 'gro bar bya// gang du chu bo rab gnas pa// de bzhin dma' bar gyur pa dang // chu klung rab tu 'bab la sogs// mi yi 'jig rten rjes bzung rgyu re// de bzhin rtag tu sngags
211b3(rgyud): bzlas bya// de nyid phyir na thub pa'i gtses// brtson 'grus chen pos 'di gsungs so// mtshan ni 'od srung zhes bya bas// sngon gyi de ches steng nger// sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po
211b4(rgyud): 'dir/ 'byung po rnams la legs don du// sngags ni ra/ ba tu gsungs pa yin// sdug bsngal gyur pa'i 'jig rten kun// dbul zhing skyo la sha thang ba// mchog
211b5(rgyud): tu nyon mongs gyur pa rnams// 'di rnams don du gsungs pa yin// 'byung po rnams la legs pa nyid/ slar yang kun tu bsten pa rnams// 'byung po kun gyi zas
211b6(rgyud): don du// gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsungs// nga yis gsang sngags 'di brjod kyi// byang sems la bsten thams cad dang // nyan thos rnams ni mnyan par gyis// nad kyis zin
211b7(rgyud): pa 'joms byed cing // bkres pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang // gang yang sems can skom pa dang // sdug bsngal thams cad ni don dang // 'byor pa 'dod rnams mnyan par gyis// 
211b8(rgyud): 'od srung 'od ni chen po la// thub pa'i gtso bos de skad gsungs// nyon mongs rnams ni yid 'gun sa// khyab bdag de la gsol ba 'debs// chos kyi rgyal po thub pa che/ cho
212a1(rgyud): mkhyen gsang sngags bshad dru gsol// dam tshig mchog la ra gnas pal// sems can rnams la rjes brda mdzad// de nad gso nas thub pas
212a2(rgyud): sngags mchog rgyas par gsung bar byed// ka la bing ka sgra dbyangs dang // rnga bo che dang sprin gyi sgra// tshangs dbyangs brtson 'grus chen po dang // tshangs pa'i sras gang rgyal
212a3(rgyud): mchog gis// gang yang cung zad 'dir 'ongs pa// rkang med pa dang rkang mangs dang // rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa// 'byung po'i tshigs rnams kun nyon cig/ mdor na sems can
212a4(rgyud): don kun tu// bde 'byung sngags ni bshad par bya// 'das dang / ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// sems can la sogs 'di dar lhag pa// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// 'byor
212a5(rgyud): pa 'dod pa rnams nyon cig/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha na/ a pra ti ha ta sha sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga ga ne/ ga ga na/ gan+do A nA ya/ sarba la hu la hu/ sa ma ya ma nu
212a6(rgyud): sma ra/ a kaR+Sha Ne/ mA bi lam+ba/ ya the pi taM saM bA dA yaM swA hA// bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de skad ces gsungs nas// cang mi gsung bar gyur to// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
212a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'od srung gis// rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'ding rgya cher gsungs pa'i bar skabs 'dir na mkha' thams cad chen po la 'os pa'i zas kyi sprin gyis yongs su gang bar gyur to// 
212a8(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rnamakha'i mthil thams cad zas kyi sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs par snang bar gyur to// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
212b1(rgyud): mngon par 'dod pa'i don du blangs par bkru bar bya// slar yang de nas langs nas ni// gtsug lag khang ngam gnas su 'gro// gang sus sngon ni yang dag bsten// gang du gnas bde
212b2(rgyud): 'gro bya// song nas zlos pos phyogs de ru// lhung bzed de ni bzhag par bya// de nas myur du nye reg bya// de bzhin slar yang lhung bzed blang // lhung bzengs la lo ma 'am// dngul lam de bzhin
212b3(rgyud): gser nyid dang // zang sam shing shun dag kyang rung // ston pa la ni lha bshos dbul// ston la lha bshos phul nas ni// slar yang rang rig sngags rgyal la'o// 'gron po gcig ni 'a
212b4(rgyud): gyur dang // sdug bsngal can la'ang ci nus sbyin// bshos nyi// da kyang ni thams cad du// kun nas nges par bza' ba nyid// ha cang mang po sbyin mi bya// sngags shes 'dir
212b5(rgyud): ni gdung mi bya// kun nas rig pa ldan par bya// lto ba'i tshadam bzhag nas ni// gzhan pa'i zan ni rtag tu'o// bkres dang skom pas nyon pa yis// sngags don sgrub pa
212b6(rgyud): mi nus te// ha cang nyung dang mang zos na// sngags don bsnyen par mi nus so// de nyid phyir na rgyal dbang gis// sems can zas kyis gnaso zhes// lus can kun la gsungs pa yin// gang
212b7(rgyud): gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang // lha dang lha moni dri za dang // klu dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci// srin po yi dgas sha za dang // 'byung po skar ma gza' dag ni// gang zhig zas la mi ltos pa// de na
212b8(rgyud): 'ga' yang yong ma yin// rtag tu kha zas rag pa ni// khams kyi zas zhes grags pa'o// sems can phra mo'i zas can spang // de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni// bsam gtan/ 
213a1(rgyud): zas can rtag par ni// gzugs ni spyod cing g.yo ba ste// gzugs med nyid kyi lha rnams kyang // ting 'dzin 'bras bu za ba'o// srid babar ma'i sems
213a2(rgyud): can yang // dri za bar ni rab tu grags// de bzhin 'dod khams sems can rnams// zas ni rnam pa sna tshogs za// 'dod dang ldan pa'i lha dang mi// khams kyi zas ni za bar byed// de
213a3(rgyud): nyid phyir na thub dbang gis// sems can zas kyis gnas pa zhes// chos kyi rgyu ru bstan pa yin// gang de rnams ni rab tu grags// zlos po rtag tu brtson pa ni// zas kyi tshod ni rig par bya// 
213a4(rgyud): gang phyir rig pa bsnyen pa ni// zas 'di la ni rab tu gnas// / kun spyod ma nA ra dag pa dang // dge zhing tshangs pa dar spyod pa dang // zas kyi chod kyang shes pa la// de yi dngos
213a5(rgyud): grub rnyed mi bka'// dper na khur ni drang ba'i rgyur/ shing rta yun rings gnas don du// shing rta'i mgo ni sku bar byed// de bzhin sngags pa sngags rig pas
213a6(rgyud): zas ni gnas pa'i ched du spyang // lus ni gso ba'i don du ni// zlos po rtag tu gso bar bya// sngags rnams sgrub pa'i don phyir dang // byang chub tshogs kyi rgyu yi phyir// zas thams cad/ 
213a7(rgyud): dang / ji ltar mngon par srid pa'i bza' ba de// de rnams su char 'bab par gyur to// ji ltar mngon par sred po'i bza' ba de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba bkres pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don
213a8(rgyud): dang / skom pa rnams kyis btung ba// yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu bo'i rgyun lta bu btung bar bya ba yang yid la 'dod pa bzhin du der bab par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang ska
213b1(rgyud): cig de la bkres pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang // skom pa thams cad bsal bar byas par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang ngo mtshar thob cing tshim pa thob nas bcom
213b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das 'od
213b3(rgyud): srung kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la yongasu bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ngas kyang de'i tshe rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang / 
213b4(rgyud): bkres pa dang / skom pa gsal ba'i don gyi phyir dang / khya dad par du sngags bzlos pa po thams cad kyi phyir gsu ngas pa la mngon par rjes su yi rangango // dang po re shig zlos pa pos
213b5(rgyud): sngags 'di bsgrub par bya'o// gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar mi spro na ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pa bya// de nas dkar gsum bza' ba'am
213b6(rgyud): 'o ma btung ba'i// ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris par ma sngar bzhin du bzhag nas mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma dang lha bshos rgya chen po byas nas/ yang dag par rdzogs
213b7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing rnams kyi me sbar nas u dum pa ra'i yam shing la zho dang spra rtsi dang mar la btags pa rlan dang / 
213b8(rgyud): bcas pa'am// dpal 'bras kyi yam shing kyang rung ste stong phrag brgyad du sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sprin nag po chen po dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'ong bar 'gyur
214a1(rgyud): te 'jigs par mi bya// langs na 'gro bar yang mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying pos bdag nyid bsrung bar bya zhing // 
214a2(rgyud): 'khor bcing ba dang / grogs rnams kyang sngar bzhin bsrung bar bya'o// de nas rlung nag po'i dkyil 'khor mi snang bar 'gyur te/ bud med kyang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 
214a3(rgyud): 'od kyi phreng ba dang ldan pas phyogs rnams kyang kun tu snang bar byed bzhin pa// sgrib pa po'i mdun du 'dug ste/ kye kye sems dpa' chen po longs shig/ grub pa yin no zhes so// de nas
214a4(rgyud): sgrub pa pos sna ma'i me tog dang bsres pa'i dri chus mchod yon dbul lo// de nas de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyuraro// nyi ma de nas bdag nyid ngam 'di'i grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga la deng
214a5(rgyud): nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba rnams rab tu ster ba byed do// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang kun tu s+thi na par byed do// de nas sgrub pa pos mchod yon phul nas gshegs
214a6(rgyud): su gsol bar bya'o// ras ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ras ris blangs te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas de nas ri'i rtse mo 'am/ mi med pa'i
214a7(rgyud): gnas su 'gro bar bya'o// der bdag nyid ngam/ grogs pas phyag dar byas nas dgram par bya ba rnams bkram la gnas der na mkha' la 'gro po la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o// de nas
214a8(rgyud): sgrub pa pos sngar bzhin du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste ras ris par ma sngar bzhin du bzhugs su gsol nas seng ldeng gi shing gi me sbar la thun gsum du pad+ma dkar po'i me tog no dang
214b1(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa rnams kyis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'am snying po'am nye ba'i snying pos las chen po thams cad kyi ched du'am yi ge gcig pa'i ched du stong phrag
214b2(rgyud): brgyad du sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma sngon gsum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing / 'dod pa'i mchog gnang bar byed do// nam
214b3(rgyud): mkha' lo 'gro ba'am/ mi snang ba'am byang chub sems dpa'i sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam/ tshe ring ba nyid dam/ rgyal srid chen po dang / long spyod chen
214b4(rgyud): po nyid kyi ched dam/ rgyal po chen po mnyes pa nyid dam/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rjes su rnam par spyod pa nyid dam/ mdor na yid la 'dod pa de thams cad
214b5(rgyud): gnang bar bye'o// gang blangs kyang rung ste/ de mthun par gnang bar byed/ cing / grub pa'i rjes rnams thad kyang thob bo// son chen po 'gugs par byed pa'am/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar zhus pa de thams
214b6(rgyud): cad mdzad do// las kyi nyes pa rab tu spags pa yang yang dag par spong bar byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsungaso// las kyi cho ga gzhan pa bar ma'i sgrub thabasu
214b7(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni// dang po re shig khyad par gyi gnas sam gtsang ma'i phyogs sam chu klung ngam/ chu gling gi 'gram du sngar bzhin du thams cad byas nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par ban
214b8(rgyud): la/ bdag nyid kha shar du phyogs pas gnas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ rgyas pas gong bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste thun gsum du 'bum phrag drug bzlas por bya'o// bzlas
215a1(rgyud): pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang // dong ka'i me tog tsan+dan dkar po dang bsres pa'am gur gum dang bsres pas snga ma de bzhin kho nar me sbar nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin
215a2(rgyud): bsreg bya'o// sbyin sreg gi mthar ras ris 'gul na blon po nyid do// ras ris la 'od kyi snang ba byung na 'od las rgyal srid ngo // ras ris kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs na rgyal po chen
215a3(rgyud): bopo bzhi'i rigs kyi rgyal srid do// ras ris la me byung na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid brgya byin nyid do// ras ris ston par byed pa byung na byang chub sems dpa' gsum gyi dbang
215a4(rgyud): phyug nyid do// ras ris kyi phyag spyi bor reg na mngon par shes pra lnga dang / sa bdun rje su thob pa dang / stobs bcu de nges pa nyid rim gyis thob par byed pa nyid do// de nas sgrub pa pos
215a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi so gsungs pa'i sngags pa sgrub te bkres pa dang skom pa phyir gzhil ba'i don rjes su thob pa de nyid kyis dang / cho ga de nyid kyi yo byad kyis
215a6(rgyud): rig pa'i spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i chos la yang dag par nan tan bya'i gzhan du grub par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar rim gyis sngags kyi spod pa la rje su 'jug cing mdor na nan
215a7(rgyud): tan nges por sgrub par byed// rdzas dang sman dang yo byad kyi khyad par dang / nor bu rin po che rnams ji ltar sngar nges par bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par byed do// sngags shes sngags ni bzlos
215a8(rgyud): pa po'ang // cho ga bshad pa la sems pa/ sngags po de tshe de phyogasu// gtsang ma'i 'gro bas zas kyang ni// zos nas ying ni dga' ba dang // dbang po yongasu rdzogs pa dang // lhung bzed lhag
215b1(rgyud): ma rtag tu blangs te// sems bzang chu bo gtsang mar 'gro/ mtha' gcig tu ni bor nas ni// brtul zhugs can gyis dud 'gro sbyin// dud 'gro rnams la 'thun byin nas// 'bang bas lhung bzed bkrub/ 
215b2(rgyud): byed// lhag ma lhung bzed bya ba ni// sbrum med zas dang dri bral gang // lhung bzed lhag mar thub pas gsungs// gang du slong ba'i snod du ni// de ru zan ni mi bza' ste// der ni bza' ba 'bras bu dang / 
215b3(rgyud): rdzas rnams rtag tu bza' mi bya// pad 'dab kyis kyang ma yin te// ut+pal las byung bas sam// dri bzang ldan rnams spangs pa te// sngags pas der ni mi bza'o// gang yang sngags pas ku
215b4(rgyud): mu daH/ sla k+Sha u dum pa ra las byung // ba Ti'i 'dab ma dang dayang ni// tsher ma'i yal ga'i ri khrod byung // a mA'i/ 'dab ma ru'ang min// de bzhin sA Ta la las byung // sa la'i 'dab
215b5(rgyud): ma shi ri Sha// byang chub shing las byung ba dang // gang du bcom ldan 'das rgyas ni// shAkya seng ge bzhugs pa yi/ shing de 'bang bas spang bar bya// shing de yi ni yal ga dang // nag
215b6(rgyud): ge sar shing la'ang min// gang du nam yang bza' mi bya// mkhas pas de kun cis kyang spang // thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil po ni// rmongs pas nam yang 'gom mi bya// sngags pa dam tshig nyams
215b7(rgyud): par 'gyur// zas ni lo ma de rnams las// gzhan pa'i lo ma rnams su bza'// sa byung zangs su nges bstan dang // de bzhin gser dang dngul las byung // shel dang rdo ba las byung ba// de
215b8(rgyud): bzhin bza' ba blangs nas ni// rtag tu sngags pas der ni bza'// lo ma'i rgyab du mi bza' ste// de bzhin lag pa'i mthil du'ang min// stobs bcu pa yi sras rnams dang // rang rgyal ba ser
216a1(rgyud): lta bu gang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos gtso// lo ma gzhan dang lha ba shos 'byung // blos pos de rnams snang bar bya// yig rkang pas kyang mi 'gog/ 
216a2(rgyud): tshogs bza' ba snum khur dang // de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams// sngags pas 'bad pas drang bar bya// rgya dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos skyes bu mchog/ dkon
216a3(rgyud): mchog gsum la phul ba yi// lha bshos thams cad nyid dang ni// zlos pos rtag tu spang bar bya// chung ngu tsam yang lus can la// sngags rnams de yis mi 'grub ste// kun nas bkra
216a4(rgyud): shes thams cad dang // rtag tu dpal ni smos ci dgos// rgyal ba can dang zhi ba can// lha bshos gtor ma za bye/ du pa// de tshe de yi kun mi 'grub// gtsang zhing mkhas la tshul
216a5(rgyud): khrims ldan// snying rje snying rje'i las can dang // gtsang sbra 'i spyod pa la dga' ba// rig sngags kun tu sgrub par/ byed// sems can gzhan la byin pa'i zas// zlos pos de
216a6(rgyud): ni bza' mi bya// gzhan gyis rab tu ma btags pa'i// zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o// rang la byin pas kha ze sa ni// cung zad tsam yang blang bar bya// sngags shes de ltar 'jug pa ni// de
216a7(rgyud): yis dngos grub sdig pa'i dgra// yongs su rdzogs par byed par gnas// zlos pos cho ga 'di yis ni// bza' ba len pa'i brtul zhugs can// thub pa rnams kyis legs par sngag
216a8(rgyud): sngags rnams thams cad sgrub pa la// mdor na cho ga mthong ba yis// bza' ba kun dang las rnams la'o// de nas gzhan yang rab 'chang byed// sngags ni thams cad sbyong bar byed// de
216b1(rgyud): nas zlos pos nye reg bya// de tshe sngags 'di brjod par bya// de tshe sngags pas lan bdun du// lus sbyong byed pa bzlas byas nas// 'byung po'i tshogs dang lha rnams 'dir// de don rgyas pa mnyan
216b2(rgyud): bar gyis// lus kun nye reg byas nas su// thub pas sngags 'di brjod par bya// na maHsarba bud d+ha nAM/ A pra ti ha ta shA sa nA na// tad+ya thA/ oM sarba kil+li Sha/ nA sha ni/ nA sha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta
216b3(rgyud): pra yuk+taM/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM dzaHswA hA// sngags 'dis bslab pa'i zas gzhan gang yang rung ba yongs su spod pa na sngags lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas yongs su longs spong
216b4(rgyud): bapar bya'o// zos nas snga ma bzhin du nye reg byas te spyi bo las dgas pa'i lus thams cad du byug nas de nos ngal ba so bar bya'o// ngal sos nas yud tsam phyed dam thun gcig/ 
216b5(rgyud): la'o// de nas ras ris dang / sangs rgyas thams cod la ma ngon par phyag byas nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi gleg bam pa klag par bya'o// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
216b6(rgyud): dang // 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'phags pa sa bcu pa dang / 'phags pa gser 'dod dam pa dang / 'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang / 'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs te/ 
216b7(rgyud): 'di rnams las gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o// nyi ma'i dus kyi tshad bzhi cha tsam du'o// de nas yongs su zhi nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bklag par bya ste glegs bam brtul
216b8(rgyud): nas gos gtsang ma bgos te dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas de nas khrus kyi ched du chu klung gi 'gram mam mtsho bran chen por 'jug pas song nas/ srog chags med pa'i sa blangs te lan bdun
217a1(rgyud): mngon par bsngags par byas nas rig pa 'dis chul gdab bo// gang zhe na/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha na a pra ti ha ta shA nA/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba duSh+Ta staM b+ha ya ts+tsha/ 
217a2(rgyud): nA dI bar d+hA ri Ne/ sa ma ya ma nu smA ra phaT phaT swA hA// 'dis srung ba byas nas phyogs rnams bcing ba dang / grogs rnams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / kha bcing ba dang / gdug pa dang / 
217a3(rgyud): tu bdug pa rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang / bgegs bcing ba las yang srad bu la lan bdun bzlas nas rked pa'i phyogasu bcings pas thams cad yongasu 'chags pa dang / bzlas
217a4(rgyud): nga'i dus thams cad dang / khrus kyi dus thams cad dang / ga/ dug pa'i bgegs rnam par gzhom pa dang / rab tu zhi ba/ de'i don du sngags 'di stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o// 
217a5(rgyud): nas las thams cad byed do// pad+ma'i gdan la phyag rgya che na po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o// las rnams thams nga du thams cad kyi rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyuraro// de nas sgrub
217a6(rgyud): pa pos sa las byung ba'i phye ma la sogs pa rnams blangs nas ji ltar bde bar khrus bya zhing srog chags med pa'i chus khrus byas te/ thams cad du las thams cad la srog chags med pa
217a7(rgyud): nyid kyis bya'o// de nas khrus byas nas sa'i rang bzhin nam gzhan dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i dri dang / yo byad kyi khyad par gyis rje su byug par bya'o// chu'i nang du mchil ma dang / bshang ba dang gci
217a8(rgyud): pa la sogs pa yang dor bar mi bya'o// rtse bar yang mi bya'o// snying rje dang ldan pas bdag dang sems can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya ste/ bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / sdug bsnga/ 
217b1(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal nye bar 'gags pa dang tshor bas mngon par non pa dang / chu rlabs bzhin du mngon par 'byung ba'i rab tu sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'di ltar
217b2(rgyud): sgrub pa dang bral ba sngags shes pas gang de bzhin du dug dang / gcod pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jigs pa la sogs rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi phung po nye bar
217b3(rgyud): 'gogs par bya bzhin pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thebs po gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong zhing gnas med pa dang skyob pa med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / shin tu dman pa'i yid can gyi bdas
217b4(rgyud): nyid du brtags nas sgom pa po mgrin pa nub tsam gyi chu na dganas pa 'am/ lte ba tsam du gnas pa'i chu de nyid kyi nang du sems rtse gcig tu nye bar bzung bar bya'o// dang po re shig/ 
217b5(rgyud): pad+ma chen po'i 'dab ma la me tog chen po dang ldan pa pad+ma chen po'i lo mas nye bar mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin las byung ba'i sdong bu dang / 
217b6(rgyud): rin po che ma da ka las grub pa'i pad+ma'i ge sar dang / shel las byas pa'i sdong po legs par kha phye ba dang / de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang pad+ma rA ga'i me tog rnams kyis mdzes
217b7(rgyud): pa'o// de'i steng du seng ge'i khri rin po che du mas nye bar mdzes pa ras bcos bu zung gis bkab pa'o// de'i steng su bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya ste/ chos ste/ 
217b8(rgyud): bar mdzad cing bzhugapa gyi mdog tu snang ba kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan pa tshang chen po na mkha' lta bu mchog tu bris bzhin po/ skyil mo
218a1(rgyud): krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa/ g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ pad+ma chen po'i gdan la bzhugs pa
218a2(rgyud): rnga yab bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gra na 'khod de/ lus dmar ser gur gum btags pa'i kha dog lta bu'o// g.yon du 'phags pa mthu chen po thob ston ka'i spri
218a3(rgyud): ltar dkar ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brgyad la/ 'phags pa byams pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'
218a4(rgyud): mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / 'phags pa phyag/ dan rdo rje dang / nor bzang zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bcu
218a5(rgyud): po 'di rnams kyi g.yas su rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsam pa ra bya ste/ tsan ngan dang / spos ngang ldan dang / tog dang tog dkar dang / 'dod pa dang / nye ba'i 'dod pa dang / mu
218a6(rgyud): khyud dang mu khyud brgyad // de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang / ba lang bdag dang / b+ha ra d+h+wa dza
218a7(rgyud): bsod snyoms len dang / pi len da'i bu dang / 'phags pa sgra gcan zin dang / 'phags pa 'od srung chen po dang / 'phags pa kun dga' bi zhes pa'i nyan thos chen po de rnams dpa
218a8(rgyud): bar/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// rang sangs rgyas rnams dang nye bar rang sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po rnam
218b1(rgyud): kyi gnas su'ang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du/ kun nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o// byang chub sems
218b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang lte ba can gyi chu la gnas bzhin du lha dang mi'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / d+ha
218b3(rgyud): nuskA ri ka dang / baR+Shi ka dang / in+d+ra ba ra'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa tshad chen po phung po chen por gnas pa ri rab tsam gyis me tog gi pur mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya zhing
218b4(rgyud): 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / 
218b5(rgyud): lha dang mi'i mar me mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phragayid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mchod par bya'o// de bzhi na du gtor ma dang / bdug pa dang / lha bshos dang / mchod
218b6(rgyud): pa dang / bsnyen bkur la sogs pa yo byad lha dang mi'i nyer 'kho rnams dbul bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer mngon par 'phro bzhin
218b7(rgyud): pas bdag nyid dang phyogs thams cad kyang kun tu snang bzhin par bsgom par bya'o// sgom pa po bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu/ tshangs pa'i bsod rnams kyi 'bras bu thob bo// nges
218b8(rgyud): bapar byang chub mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de lta bu sogs bsam gtan rnams// 'jig rten skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// 'byung po kun kyang legs pa dang // sngags pa
219a1(rgyud): rnams la phan don dang // de tshe bsam gtan dang po'i gtso// sngags pa kun la phan don du// sems can rnams kyi phyir gsung so// de nas thub mchog bdun
219a2(rgyud): pa yi// dkyil 'khor rnam par brjod par bya// thub pas dang po gsungs pa yin// gnyis pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang // gsum par yang ni de las gzhan// dang por mchog gi dngos grub ste/ 
219a3(rgyud): bar ma la ni de bzhin gzhan// chung ngu la ni phran tshegs 'grub// thub pa mchog gis nges par gsungs// de bzhin ras ris bsam gtan ni// thu bo bar ma chung ngu ste// thams cad sdig pa
219a4(rgyud): 'jig byed pa'o// de las gzhan yang mkhas pas ni// bas ma gtan rnam pa rab bsgrub bya// bsam gtan de la rab gnas na// sngags rnams de la 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar
219a5(rgyud): 'dod pa'i cho ga bshad// zlos pos bsam gtan bsgom sa nas ni// sngags kyi mchod yon der phul nas// ji lta ra bde bar gshegasu gsol// chu tshogs de las bsgral na/ 
219a6(rgyud): ni/ de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro// gnas ni sngon du nges bstan par// cho ga mthong bas legs zhi bar// de la sngags pas gsang sngags bzlas// sngar las ji ltar brjod pa bzhin// rang gi
219a7(rgyud): lha ni spyan drangs pa// der ni sngags kyis gshegasu gsol// de nas bdag nyid de bzhin nyid// grogs po rnams ni bsrungs byas nas// dge ba'i las kyi de nyid shes// cho ga'i las la
219a8(rgyud): dga' zhing 'dud// rnam pa sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis// gang zag mchog la kun bstod nas// rang sngags sngags kyis mgon po dang // nyan thos rang rgyal bsre ru dang // byang chub sems
219b1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' che// 'jig rten gsum po rjes 'dzin bzod// de nas gsang sngags bzlos pa'o// stan de la ni slar langs nas// thag ring gnas su song nas ni// phyi rol rlung gi rnam par
219b2(rgyud): spangs// snabs dang mchil ma rnam par dor// bshang dang gci ba'ang de bzhin// nyon par byang du kha phyogs shing // mtshan mo lho ru khang lta'o// sngags zlos pos ni nam yang ngor// don
219b3(rgyud): rnams bsam par mi bya'o// der ni rang las byed gsungs pa'i// sngags kyi 'azlas pa mi bya'o// rab sdigs 'gro ba mtshan sogs kyi// de ches snang nyer 'dug ste// dag pa'i chu yis nye reg bya// 
219b4(rgyud): ma'i gos mtha' chur gzhug bya// sa yi phung po bdun nyid/ kyis// 'bad pas rkang pa bkrus byas nas// rab tu la/ 'dzag pa 'dun blangs nas// bshang ba 'dzag pa sum cu ste/ 
219b5(rgyud): gnyis ka'i mtha' la lag pa dag/ mchil mdor bo nyid da ni// snabs la'ang gnyis te de bzhin no// de nas 'bad pa sa nye reg bya// gnas la ring du song ba'i sar// de bzhin da
219b6(rgyud): tsam song nas ni// lam la sogs pa yangs pa ru// de nas gzhan gyi ci 'dod bzhin// lho phyogs mtha' yi phyi rol tu// chu dang g.yang sa med pa dang // de bzhin bye mas khyab pa dang // chu klung
219b7(rgyud): spangs shing ngogs kyang spangs// 'bad pas mi gtsang chu spangs par// gsang zhing shin tu spangs pa dang // bas mtha' ljongs ni spangs pa dang // rnam par dben pa'i sar song nas// sngags
219b8(rgyud): pas mi gtsang dor bar bya// zlos po dus ni shes byas nas// ji ltar 'dod pa'i shugs dog min// de nas dag pa'i phyogs song ste// bas mthar de bzhin bshang ba dang // bci ba'i bya ba
220a1(rgyud): byas nas ni// de ru lus ni ci bde bar// gnyis ka'am gsang g.yogs sbas pa dang // skye bo med pa'i sa spang bar// gsang sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya// de
220a2(rgyud): bzhin kho nar thams cad du// ri bo dang ni tshang tshong dang // bas mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' ba// de bzhin rgyal bso spangs pa yi// gdug pa'i sems can rnams bral bar// gsang sngag/ 
220a3(rgyud): rgyal po thams cad sgrub// rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i yul// skye bo gtsang sbra sprod la dga'// ma dang pha la gus pa dang // gnyis skyes rigs kyi sa dor ba ru// lha rnams dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ 
220a4(rgyud): gnas der yin gyis gzhan du min// nyams dga' skal lnga ngan shong rta'i 'gram// ya mu na nyid rab mdzes pa// sin dad+hA nar ma da bak+She// zla ba'i cha ni gtsang ma'i 'gram// kA be/ 
220a5(rgyud): ri dang dbyangs can nyid// chu klung chen po shI ta nyid// 'di 'a/ grub zhing gzhan ma yin par// stobs bcu ldan sra sa rnams kyis bshad// stobs bcu pa yis gsungs
220a6(rgyud): pa'i zhing // byang phyogs lam med ri bo dang // kha che dang ni rgya yul dang // bal yul de bzhin mang yul dang // rgya nag che dang li yul nyid// de dag ma lus grub pa'i zhing // byang gi phyogs su
220a7(rgyud): brten pa yi// gang yang ri dang chu bo yang // bsod nams yul du rab tu brjod// na sa dang gro ni za ba'o// gang du sems can snying rje ldan// de ru rtag par dngos grub 'gyur// dpal gyi ri bo brag
220a8(rgyud): ri cheb lho phyogs yul du gnas pa yi// dpal ldan 'bras bung mchod rten ni// sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel 'dzin// der ni sngags rnams bsgrub par bya// myur du las dang las rnamaso// 
220b1(rgyud): rdo rje gdan dang mchod rten che// chos kyi 'khor lo mdzes pa dang // gang du thub gtse zhi bar gshegs// der yang dngos grub blta bar bya// lha las babs pa'i mchod rten ni// sa bak+She dang cho
220b2(rgyud): 'phrul che// ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog dang // lum pa'i tshal du 'khrungs pa der// gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal bas bstod cing rab sngags pa'i// bya rgod phung po'i ri der
220b3(rgyud): dang / de bzhin brag dang bsil ba'i tshal// me tog zhes bya'i grong mchog dang // de bzhin rtag tu kA shi'i grong // bcom brlags ka n+ya kub dzi dang // sa steng grong ni 'phags rgyal dang // mchod
220b4(rgyud): rten de bzhin yangs pa can// rtag tu sa steng mi thi la// grong dang grong khyer gtso bo rnams// gang gzhan rgyal ba yang dedag 'byung // rab bsngags bsod nams yul dag tu// 
220b5(rgyud): de tsha rnams su ni dngos grub sgrub// 'di rnams las gzha na yul rnams ni// grong dang ljongs dang ri bo dang // gan sa dang grong mchog gtso bo ni// 'o ma'ama'ang ba tshul
220b6(rgyud): bsten pa// der ni rnams dbe na rjes 'jug cing // bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' bar 'gyur// gnas ni bla gab med pa dang // rtag tu khang pa stong pa ru// sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'o// sngags
220b7(rgyud): rnams rjes 'thun las rnams ni// sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus su// sngags bzlas yang dag 'dod par bya// bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson// sngags rig gtong ba dag la
220b8(rgyud): goms// tshul khrims spyod cing shin tu brten// 'byung po kun la phan par dga'// sngags kyi spyod pa la dad pa// brtul zhugs can gyis sngar bzhin bzlas// gtsang ma'i yul dang gtsang
221a1(rgyud): swa can// kla kro rkun ma spangs pa dang // dmyal bar ni// der ni bskal ba chen por gnas// dam tshig snang ba bral ba'i phyir// dmyal ba mi bzang mun pa ru// byis pa'i skye
221a2(rgyud): bo 'tshed par byed// dam pa'i chos la smad pa dang // mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa deng // ye shes byis pa'i ngo bo'am// rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal can/ gi pi 'argya po brnyas byed pa// 
221a3(rgyud): bzang dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// de phyir sdig pa mi bya zhing // log par smra ba'ang smad pa yin// dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa dang // log par lta ba smad pa yin// de phyir rtag tu dang gyur
221a4(rgyud): nas// gsang sngags cho ga rtag tu bsten// bden par/ smra zhing chos shes pa// sems can rnams la rtag/ tu phan// sngags shes sngags ni bsten par byed// de
221a5(rgyud): yi dngos grub nges par 'gyur// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yis// las ni rnam pa sna tshogs byed// las rnam sa bya ba rnams kyis byed// rtag tu phan pa'i bya ba yis// 
221a6(rgyud): bya ba'i las dang yang dag ldan// de la rtag tu grub par 'gyur// bya ba'i don dang don kun phyir// las don rtag tu bya ba'o// bya ba'i don du bya min gang // bya ba'i las la sbyar bar bya// 'bras
221a7(rgyud): bcas nyid kyi bya don gyi// bya ba nyid du rtag tu bya// bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid// bya ba las 'bras rtag tu'o// 'bras med 'bras bu nyid 'gyur zhing // 'bras bu nyid kyang rtag tu 'bras/ 
221a8(rgyud): 'bras med 'bras bu bcas pa nyid// thams cad nyid kyang 'bras bu bcas// rnal 'byor sngags ni bsgrub bya ste// yang dag sbyor dang bral ba yang // bral dang yang dag ldan smra'o// bsgrub
221b1(rgyud): bya sgrub byed med par ni// de la grub pa yod ma yin// grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang // grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin// sngags kyi dngos grub ma grub pa// sngags ni sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu// 
221b2(rgyud): byed par 'dod pa de las te// 'dod pa'i las ni byang bar 'gyur// las min las ni thams cad la// las kyi rgyud ni mi bya'o// sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i// las ni mtha' dag brtsam par
221b3(rgyud): bya// brtsams dang rtsom pa'i 'dud pa yi// las nyid brtsam par mi bya'o// bya ba ma brtsams sngags rnams ni// lus can kun la 'grub mi 'gyur// sems can kun rjes skyong ba yi// thub pa'i
221b4(rgyud): gtso bos sngon gsungs pa// gsang sngags smra bas bstan ba yi// rgyal ba'i sras kyi yang dag sdom// sgrub po sngags ni kun shes shing // rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la tshig
221b5(rgyud): sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin// lam ni byang chub rgyur gyur pa// sngags kun nyid ni sgrub par byed// ri/ ge pa mnyam par 'gyur ba yin// de ni ring por mi thogs
221b6(rgyud): paras mkhas pas dngos grub 'gyur ba yin// 'byung po thams cad zhi don du// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsgrags// gsang sngags tshul gyi lam 'dis ni// mya ngan 'das grong
221b7(rgyud): 'gro ba yi// de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam// chos don thams cad rdzogs par byed// de yi mthar thug dpung gnyen ni// dang po gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid// de bzhin 'dir ni lhun grub tu/ 
221b8(rgyud): 'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub thob// sna tshogs las dang chos shes pa// sngags rnams byed par 'gyur ba yin// tshul khrims bsam gtan rnam thar rnams// 'di rnams mdor
222a1(rgyud): bsdus thob pa yin// dngos grub don kun sgrub byed pa// rgyal ba gtso bos gsungs pa yin// gang zag rkang pa'i don thob pa// dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang / 
222a2(rgyud): de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin gtso// tha mas rgyal srid rgyu yin te// lha men lha yi 'jig rten gyi// de bzhin de rnams bdag po ni// sngags pas thams cad thob par 'gyur// bya ba 'bras/ 
222a3(rgyud): bcas byed par 'gyur// gtsang sbra'i kun spong yang dag ldan// tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag tu dga'// sngags rnams kun tu gsungs pa yin// de na sa sngags pas sngags bzlas
222a4(rgyud): bya sngags pa 'byor pa 'dod pa yis// rnam po sna tshogs la ras byas te// de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang // tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin// tha mas long spyod 'phel ba yin// bar
222a5(rgyud): mas gong ma'i lus can nyid// mchog nyid kyis ni ldang ba nyid// zlos pos rtag tu thob par byed// sngags pa/ sa bzlas mthar ngal bso zhing // ji srid dus su brtag
222a6(rgyud): par bya// bzlas pa'i dus la bab pa na// der ni bsgrub pa bya ba yin// de bzhin las rnams sgrub par byed// de la rtag tu bzlas pas skyes bu rang gi sdig pa zad par byed// sngags pas
222a7(rgyud): ldan pas sngon las kyi cho ga gang byas pa skye ba brgyud pa rnamasu grub par gnas pa de// de bzhin du las tshogs la rnyed par 'gyur ba de skyes pas sngag bzlas pas/ slar yang sngags zlos pa
222a8(rgyud): bo'i sdig pa zang ba'i don dang // las de 'joms shing sngags grub par 'gyur te// de bzhin du mchog dang // bar ma dang tha ma'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa dang bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus pa
222b1(rgyud): zad par byed cing / skye ba brgyud pa rnamasu gang bar byas// sdig pa de thams cad 'jig par byed de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas pas/ lus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis/ 
222b2(rgyud): rgyan pa dang / thub pa rnams kyis gnas pas dga' ba dang // yon+dan thams cad kyis grags par 'gyur ba dang // gnod sbyin gyi khang par gnas pa'i rgyal po nyid dang // rtag tu don thams cad kyi
222b3(rgyud): dngos grub kyang thob pa dang ldan no// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa
222b4(rgyud): ba'i rtog pa las/ ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byam ste/ dgu pa rdzog so// / de nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan
222b5(rgyud): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems
222b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig/ khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rje su spong ba sems can mtha' dag gi don la brtson pa/ sems can rnams gang gis bzlas par bya ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang / gang dang / 
222b7(rgyud): ldan pas bgrang bar bya ba'i bgrang phreng gi cho ga/ rgyud thams cad kyi thun mong gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga sngags thams cad kyi cho ga de legs par nyon la/ legs par yid la zung shig/ 
222b8(rgyud): bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das leg so leg so// bcom ldan 'das bdag
223a1(rgyud): cag la rje su brtse bas nye bar blangs nas rig pa'i sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / dam tshig la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang / sems can thams cad
223a2(rgyud): kyi don gyi phyir yang de bka' stsal du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs la 'di skad ces bka'
223a3(rgyud): stsal to// sems dpa' chen po rnam par dbye ba rgyas par bshad par bya'o nyon cig/ gang gis sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa/ sems can gyi don thams cad sgrub
223a4(rgyud): par byed pa de gang zhe na/ dang po re shig/ sngagasu 'gyur ba/ ni/ na maHsarba bud d+ha ne/ a tsin+na d+hA ta/ rU pi nAM/ tad+yau/ ra thA/ oM ku ru ku ru sarba ar+tha sA d+hA ya/ sarba duSh+Ta bi mi ha ni/ 
223a5(rgyud): ga ga nA ba la ba/ bi sho d+ha ya swAhA// rig pa 'dis bgrang / phreng thams cad la las bya'o// spang ba dang / dbu/ gas pa dang / blang ba dang / rgyu ba la sogs pa'i las rnams
223a6(rgyud): bya'o/ dang po bgrang 'phreng shing la ni// lan grangs sum cu rtsa bdun du// de yis mngon par bsngags byas nas// brtul zhugs can gyis bsrung ba bya// mtshan mo gcig tu gnyid log
223a7(rgyud): nas/ der ni rmi lam brtag par bya// mi ma yin gzugs kun rdzogs pa// mi sdug lhag par mche ba gtsigs// sngags pa la ni nges smras pa// bcom ldan sems pa ji bzhin lod
223a8(rgyud): sgrub po po rangs langs nas ni// shing de ru ni 'gro bar byed// mi sdug gzugs ldan gtsigs pa che// rmi lam du yang ma mthong na// sngags pas shing debor bar bya// de nas gzhan du 'gro
223b1(rgyud): bar gyis// dang po ru rak+Sha yin te// de las gzhan pa dbang po'i shing // bo de tse ni 'dod pa'o// gzhan yang 'bras bu 'byung ba yi// shing la 'dzegs pa'i legs rdzogs pa'i// grogs dang lhan cig
223b2(rgyud): 'dzegs par bya// grogs po med par gyur na ni// rang nyid de la 'dzegs par bya// steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su// 'dzegs nas phun tshogs brtul zhugs can// de la rtag tu bag yod
223b3(rgyud): pas// steng gi yal ga'i 'bras bu blangs// steng gi sa la legs sbyar bya// steng gi mchog gi dngos grub du// gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin// bar mar dngos grub 'bring po ste// tha ma
223b4(rgyud): la ni 'og ma'o// srog chags rnams kyis ma smad pa'i// 2da bras bu de rnams yang dag blangs// nub kyi yal ga la/ das thob pa// rdzas kyi rgyur ni bsgrub par bya// byang gi gnod sbyi/ 
223b5(rgyud): mo la sogs// lha rnams lhan cig 'gugs par byed// dgu ga pa'i bya ba bshad pa ni// kun gyi don du zhi phyiraro// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyeng dang // mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams
223b6(rgyud): 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed// 'byung po thams cad rgyas pa'i phyir// 'bras bu dang bcas las rnams ni// ma lus spyod pa byed pa'o// shar gyi phyogasu yal ga dang // der gnas 'bras bu 'byung ba
223b7(rgyud): rnams// de bzhin 'bad pas byas gyur na// tshe ring po yi don gyi rgyu// rtag tu sngags kyis dngos grub 'bras// rnam po sna tshogs byed pa yin// gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yi// yal ga lo mar rab
223b8(rgyud): ldan pa// sems can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed// de na zlos po 'bad pas spang // lho ru rten pa'i yal ga la// 'bras bu gang du yang dag brjod// phyogs des gdung dbye dgra rnams kyi// srog ni
224a1(rgyud): 'jig par byed pa yi// bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu// de ni zlos pos 'bad pas spang // 'og tu 'phyang ba'i yal gar gnas// 'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa
224a2(rgyud): lha ma yin dang ldan pa yi// sa yi 'og tu de rnams 'gro// de rnams 'bras bcas phreng ba ni// blangs nas yang dag rab bsgrags pa// 'og tu 'gro ba'i 'khri shing la// de nas de ni sa 'og 'gro// de ru rab
224a3(rgyud): tu zhugs nas lha'i// bde nyid zlos pos deng 'gyur ro// lha min bu mos yang dag ldan// de ni bskal par gnas par byed// bgrang phreng 'bras bu kun blangs nas// de nas zlos pos bzlas pa bya/ 
224a4(rgyud): lhan cig srung ba byas nas ni// de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro// de nyid ring po'i gnasu ni// gtsang ma'i phyogs der sdug/ das pa ni// de bzhin rtag tu 'dug par bya// bgrang phreng skyes pa sbar
224a5(rgyud): bar bya/ brtson pas bgrang phreng 'bras bu blang // de nas kun tu yang dag sbyang // der ni phreng ba dbug par grags// gsu ma bdun brgyad dang gcig dang ni// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu
224a6(rgyud): sngags shes der ni spang bar bya// rtag tu snga ma'i sngags kyis ni// brgyad dam bdun du bzlas byas pa// de nas de ni dag par 'dod// pad+ma'i rtsa lag legs brjod pas// bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu/ 
224a7(rgyud): yis/ sum 'gyur lnga dang ldan pa yi// brtul zhugs can gyi phreng thag bya// sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgyu// 'bras bu phra mo bzlum por bcas// rtag tu srog chags bu ga med// yan lag
224a8(rgyud): mnyams ma smad pa// mdzes shing kha dog sdug pa dang // bug med cing gas pa med// ring bu zlum po ji bzhin pa// de bzhin ru rak+Sha dang ni// bo de tse dang in+d+rak+Sha// 'bras nyid rtag tu lung thang
224b1(rgyud): mdzesas 'bras bu dam pa 'am gang gi tshe// sngags pa mchog tu brtson pa yis// 'bad pas bgrang phreng ba rgyu bar bya// gser ram yang na dngul dag gam// nor bu shel las byung ba dang // mu
224b2(rgyud): tig dung nyid mu sar// byi ru yis kyang bya ba ste// phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs bya// gzhan yang rin chen las byung ba'i// bgrang phreng bzang po bya ba dang // sa las byung ba'i ldum po yi// ril bus bgrang
224b3(rgyud): phreng can dag ni// mnyam par gzhag ste srang bu brgyu// gzhan yang ril bu 'ga' zhig gam// 'bras bu'am khams las byung ba yis// ku sha'i rtse mos brgyus pa yang // zlos pos 'bad de/ 
224b4(rgyud): bya ba yin// brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu lnga// lnga bcu 'di dag pa rar ma yin// sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa yis// bras bu'i tshang rnams brgyu bar bya// stong rtsa brgyad pa nyid bya ba// 
224b5(rgyud): phreng ba 'di ni thu bo yin// phreng ba/ rnam pa 'di bzhin ni// sngags pas rtag tu brgyu bar bya// / de nas rgyus te sngags rnams ni// phyi mo gsum mam gnyi
224b6(rgyud): nyid dang / rgya lcags las byung gdu bu dang // de bzhin gser dang dngul dag dang // de nas zangs byung gdu bus kyang // phreng ba kun nas brgyu bar bya// de nas mtha' ru yang mig bya// de la rim gyis dgo
224b7(rgyud): par bya// 'bad pas mdzes par dkri ba bya// sangs rgyas ma lus bzhugs par ni// yongs su gsal bar byas de nas// dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin// sbrul gyi gdengs ka'i rnam pa bzhin
224b8(rgyud): yongasu bkris pas rgyan pa yin// mu tig ngo shal rnams mtshungs shing // mgul rgyan rnam par sprul pa'o// de nas 'bab chu dge ba'i mthar// dri ma med la khrus byas nas// go rims ji
225a1(rgyud): bzhin khrus byas te// chu yig nas la ldang bar bya// de bzhin brtson pas nye reg bya// bgrang phreng srang bu blangs nas ni// ba yi rnam lngas rab tu bkru// sa yi bye mas rab klu/ 
225a2(rgyud): nasarbagatsang ma'i gos la dri bzang gis// rjes su nye bar byugs pa dang // rab tu bsngags pa'i kha dog kyang // tsan dan dkar po gur gum dang // 'bad pas dron mos bkru bar bya// de bzhin
225a3(rgyud): gnyis ka 'gro bar 'gyur// ji lta'i gnasu song nas ni// gang du ras ris bar ba ni// rgyal mchog thub pa'i gtso bo ni// shAkya seng ge mi yaM mchog/ ston pa'i gzugs brnyan de bzhin du// 
225a4(rgyud): sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can// mchod pa de yi spyan sngar dgod// de dang nye bar bzhag nas ni// de tshe de yi spyan snga ru// // dam tshig la gnas stong rtsa brgyad// son pa 'am brgya yang
225a5(rgyud): gcig tu ni// brgyad dang bcas pa bzlas byas naso// nyin mtshan bsnyung bar gnas gyur nas// bdun po'i thub la phreng ba dbul// snga ma de bzhin zlas bya ba// tshad nyid de dang
225a6(rgyud): mnyam par bya// de nas phreng ba yongs su bzlas// mtshan mo de nyid du 'khod do// ku sha ting ba'i sa gzhi la// sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya// rmi lam gang dang gang mthong ba// dge ba'i rmi la/ 
225a7(rgyud): mthong na ni// rmi lam nges par bstan pa yi// dngos grub de yis bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas nyan thos bse ru rnams// gal te rmi lam mthong gyur na// sngags pas 'bras bu bcas par
225a8(rgyud): 'grub// nges par de yi cho ga bya// dge slong gzugs dang bram ze yi/ gzugs bstan sna tshogs mdzes pa mthong // gal te rmi lam de mthong na// phreng ba dbul bya de bzhin du// sngags kyi don
225b1(rgyud): kun sgrub pa po// de bzhin gdon mi za bar 'grub// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen rjes
225b2(rgyud): kyis rtse ba'i rtog pa las// ras ris par ma'i cho ga rab 'byam las bcu pa bgrang phreng gi cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
225b3(rgyud): shAkya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal
225b4(rgyud): pa sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u rdzo/ gas pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang / sbyin sreg gi las ra rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa'i sgrub pa yod de// me la nye bar spyod bI/ 
225b5(rgyud): khyad par gyi cho ga las gang du rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can rnams rab tu sbyor zhing gnas par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ rig pa'i sngags kyi chog sogs
225b6(rgyud): chen niHtad+ya thA/ oM tiSh+Tha ha ri pid+ma le/ hiM rak+Sha di hi da dA pA ya hUM phaT phaT swA hA// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa// 'dod pa thams cad ster ba'o// 
225b7(rgyud): dang po re shig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas pas mar gyi bsregs blogs gsum me la sbyin sreg bya ste me lha spyan drangs par 'gyu ro// de bzhin du rab tu sbyar te/ zhi ba can dang / rgyas
225b8(rgyud): pa can dang / drag po'i las rnams la yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro// mya ngan med shing zhi don du// khyad por brlan dang bcas pa nyid// mtho gang 'am ni khru gang tsam// sor mo gsum du'ang mtho/ 
226a1(rgyud): ba yi// snams pa'i rnam pa rab tu shes// cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin// bug med cing ser ka med// de bzhin ne co'i bshog pa 'dra// ljang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam// kha
226a2(rgyud): dog nag po spang bar bya// srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spang // bu ga med pa'ang yang dag sbyin// gzhan yang kha dog mchog min pa// tha ma'i chos kyang spangs pa'o// de rnams skam dang rlon
226a3(rgyud): pa'ang yin// de yi tshe yang brtsam par bya// ma rul yon po min nyid dang // shin tu ring ba'ong spang bar bya// de nas me thab byas nas ni// kun nas zur ni bzhi pa ru// 'og nyid du ni 'bad pas bsko
226a4(rgyud): khru bzhi pa'i tshad dang ni// khru gsum khru ni gnyis pa dang // de ba bzhin nyid du khru gcig pa// rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang // bye mas legs par sbyar ba de// de nas pad 'dra'i kha
226a5(rgyud): khyer ni// kun nas dkyil 'khor rnam pa'o// yang na 'bad pas zur bzhi pa// 'dab ma gsum du bya ba'o// zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can// 'di'ang yang dag bsgrags pa yin// mngon
226a6(rgyud): spong la ni sa dbus su// rdo rje bya zhi rtse gnyisu// rtse mo gsum du bya ba yin// me thab rgyal khru gnyis re// gtsang ma'i phyogasu de bzhin bdar// chu klung 'gram du de bzhin sprad// bstan pa
226a7(rgyud): gcig gi phyogs rnams dang // dur khrod khang pa stong pa ru// sbyin sreg legs par brtsams par bya// de bzhin ri bo'i rtse nyid dang // rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang // de bzhin nyid du dgon pa che// gang
226a8(rgyud): yang sgrub pa'i phyogs rnams ni// gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa dang // sbyin sreg las ni thams cad la// de rnams gnas su gsungs pa yin// khru gang tshang du gnas pa yi// ku sha'i khres
226b1(rgyud): la nyer 'dug nas// der ni sngags shes khyad par du// sbyin pa sreg gi ni las bya'o// gnas de nyid durab gnas pas// myur du ngos grub the tsom med// shar dang byang du kha phyogs pas// zhi ba can da rgyan
226b2(rgyud): pa bya/ lho ru ngag po'i las rnams te// de ni sngags pas spang bar bya// shar bltas zhi ba'i dngos grub ste// rgyas pa can yang byang du phyogs// de yis sngags ni dus rtag tu// rig pa'i bzlas pa brtsam
226b3(rgyud): bar bya// bil ba arga slak+Sha dang // n+ya gro d+ha yis rgyas las bya// mngon spyod shing ni skam po dang // tsha ba skyur dang rnon po rnams// de dag thams cad spang bya ste// thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bka'// 
226b4(rgyud): zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can// rlon pa'i shing gis rab tu shis// de bzhin drag las la shing skam/ tshwa ba sgyur dang rnon po/ dmas// yam shing de rnams med na ni// shing la de rnams rtag
226b5(rgyud): byad rtse mo gnyis su rtag pa bya// sngo dang snum dang 'dra ba dang // rma bya'i mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa'i// rnam pa de lta'i ku sha yis// khor yug tu ku sha ni// rtag tu 'gram par bya ba
226b6(rgyud): ni// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can// mar gang dang ni mtshungs paso// de bzhin rtag tu skam po'i rdzas// sdig pa'i las ni bya ba ste// 'dir ni rgyal ba mchog gis bkag/ dri med chu ni dag pa la// rtag
226b7(rgyud): tu srin bus spangs pa yi// de nas kun nas bsang gtor bya// g.yas phyogasu ni bskor byas te// brtson pas me ni sbar bar bya// cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya// gtsang ma'i rtswa yi rtsa ba yis// sgron me
226b8(rgyud): tshad dang ldan byas nas// de nas khu tshur brtsams byas nas// 'bad pas me ni sbar bar bya// kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste// rtag tu gos kyi mtha' kyang min// sham thabs bla gos mngon par spang // gos
227a1(rgyud): gzhan gyis kyang lag pa yi// rlung gis nyer bar gzhom pa la// mngon par dga' bas ma yin no// gtsang ma'i rlung yang de bzhin gos// nor bus kyang ni rlung yab bya// 
227a2(rgyud): rlung ni yang dag 'byung ba 'dis// me ni mnyam par byas pa la// sngags shes pas na me sbar bya'o// sbyin sreg don du mnyam gzhag pas// de nas g.yas pa min pa yis// der ni bsang gtor byas nas
227a3(rgyud): ni/ der ni ba yi mar gyis ni// bsregs blugs gsum ni sbyin par bya// de nas kyang ni phyag bya ste// sangs rgyas kun dang skyob pa dang // rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po la// de nas ci 'dod phyag
227a4(rgyud): bya'o// de tshe me yi snying po yi// sngags ni lan brgya bzlas po yis// brtson ldan dri zhim me tog gis// rtag tu me ni/ spyan drang bya// sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas// gnas
227a5(rgyud): la mkhas pas gdan dang gnas// sngags des dbul zhi nga gzhan gyis min// zho dang mar du bsres pa dang // sgra nga rtsi btags pa'i yam shing ni// de las lan gsum smin
227a6(rgyud): bsreg bya// rgyas pa'i don du sngags dang las// kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba yis// 'khrugs pa der ni nges sbyar bya// skom pa tshim par bsam par bya// zhi ba'i las dang rgyas pa can// de la
227a7(rgyud): gsang sngags rig pa yis// lha yi gzugs ni dga' ba'o// mngon spyod las la thun mong pa'i// nges par 'byung ba'i lha rnams las// gzhan pa'i gzugs ni blta bar bya// rim pa ji bzhi/ 
227a8(rgyud): me thab 'dir// ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dang // mar la lan bdun yongs bzlas pas// de tshe sman drang rnam pa der// ji ltar slar yang spyan drangs pa// lhag par gnas pas gnyis ka gnas// 
227b1(rgyud): yam shing rdzas dang bsres pa dang // mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam bstan pa// de bzhin nyid du zho bsres pas// stong ngam 'bum gyi tshad dang ni// brgyad dang brgyad du'ang rtag par bya// de bzhin sngags
227b2(rgyud): pas rig pa bzung // lan re bzlas shing me la dor// 'bar ba'i me yi phreng ba dang // de bzhin me lce gcig gyur pa// zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin bsreg bya// dri ba med la'ang rgyas pa can// du bca
227b3(rgyud): drag po'i las rnams ni// rgyal bas smad cing spangs pa yin// me ni kha dog ldan gyur na// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sbyar// zhi ba can la kha dog dkar// rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu bsngags
227b4(rgyud): gal te me dkar sbyin sreg byed// de la sngags rnams 'gru/ rab par 'gyur// de bzhin rtag tu kha dog dkar// rgyas pa rtsa na gyis dngos grub 'dod// nag po du ba'i kha dog dang // ser skya
227b5(rgyud): yang ni sdig pa can// kha dog rnam gsum rab bsgyur bas// dngos grub rnam gsum 'di dag yin// gzhan pa'i dog sprin mdog gam// slar yang bstan pa'i sa steng der/ 
227b6(rgyud): sngags pa de la dngos grub med// de lta'i kha dog 'dra ba'am// rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog can// me ni 'bar ba de mthong na// slar yang las rnams brtsams par bya// phyir zhing bzlas pa bya ba
227b7(rgyud): yin/ gal te sngags ni grub gyur na// las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis// slar yang sbyin sreg la rab 'jug/ gshegs gsol spyan drang nyid la ni// me yi sngags ni brjod par bya// sngar ni rab tu
227b8(rgyud): rtag pas kyang // dkyil 'khor 'di ni gshegasu gsol// spyan drangs pa yi las rnams ni// de nyid du ni las rnams kyang // de nyid kyi ni bya ba yin// me yi spyod pa de bzhin gzugs// ras ris
228a1(rgyud): kyi spyan sngar brtsam// der ni sngags rnams 'grub 'gyur bar// sngon gyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i las rnams ni// thas
228a2(rgyud): cad de nyid du bya'o// gzhan pa'i las ni bya ba ste// sdig pa'i las ni khyad par du// gang du rgyal mchog gis smod dang // 'jig rten 'gal dang smang rnam so// ldang dang 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / 
228a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang // de bzhin mngon shes lnga dang ni// 'jig rten lha nyid ldan pa 'grub// rtag tu ras ris la brtson shes// sbyin sreg las la mkhas pa ni// sa yi 'og gi bdag
228a4(rgyud): po'am// yang na bar snang spyod pa 'gyur// sa bla'i lha dang gnod sbyin nyid// rtag tu gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gugs/  rgyal srid bdag po nyid dang ni// yul dung yang na grong nyid dam/ 
228a5(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin dang lha min nyid// sems can thams cad dang /  du byed// 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed// sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid che// byang chub sems dpa'
228a6(rgyud): sems dpa' che// sa bcu la ni yang dag brten// sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs byed na// sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos// sde dpon bdag po de bzhin du// khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug da
228a7(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad kun dbang byed// de bzhin nyid du mi bdag nyid// 'byung po thams cad dbang don dang // yang na sa steng rgyal po mnyam// de bzhin rtag tu las kun la// thams cad sbyin
228a8(rgyud): sreg gis ni bya// kun nas kun tu brtson ldan pas// las kun yang dag bsten par bya// de ched nges par bsgrub par bya// dpal don las ni mchog yin te// bar ma nyid kyang sgrub pa
