369a8(rgyud): gis rgyal po dbang du 'gyu ro// 'di ni cho ga gzhan te dgra mngon par ma lhung ba'i rkang mthil gyis mnan pa'i rdul yongasu blangs nas glang chen sdong po'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas g.yas pa lnga
369b1(rgyud): cig shos kyi lag pa blangs nas lan cig yongasu bzlas pa'i bsregs blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin bsreg bya ste// zla ba gcig la rgyal po dbang du 'gyuraro// 'di na cho ga gzhan te rgyal po
369b2(rgyud): rkang 'thung gi shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar rgyal po la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin bsreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/ zla ba gcig la sa'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro// 'di ni
369b3(rgyud): cho ga gzhan te thog mar yang ljon pa'i rgyal po'i shing gis me sbar nas sra rtsi pog dang lan tshwa lhan cig pa la mar gyis bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad lhag pa'i stong phrag cig byas na sa'i dbang po
369b4(rgyud): bgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// 'di ni cho ga gzhan te ma blang das pa'i ka ra bI ra'i me tog dmar po btags nas gzugs brnyan byas te rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams nas ral gris gtub
369b5(rgyud): cing gtub cing ka ra bI ra'i shing gi me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya da bya/ zla ba re re la gzugs brnyan srang sum cu so drug/ pa bya'o// de nas rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni me
369b6(rgyud): tog dmar po dang lan tshwa phan tshun bsregs te btags nas srang brgyad kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams nas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas shing
369b7(rgyud): byas pa de bzhin du zla ba gcig la nyi ma re re la byas na sa'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro// 'di ni cho ga gzhan te ske tshe dang / ud pa la sngon po bsres te btags ba srang bcu drug gis gzug kyi gabug brnyan
369b8(rgyud): byas nA mnan te seng ldeng ko bo dA ra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas mgo bo nas brtsams te ral gris gtubacing gtub cing zla ba gcig tu sbyin bsreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste nyi ma re re la'o// de nas gzugs
370a1(rgyud): brnyan cig ni rgyal po'i 'bangs bzhin du kun tu spyod par byed do// cho ga gzhan 'byung ste rgya mtsho las byung ba'i tshe dang / lan cha bsres te ka ra bi ra'i me tog dmar po dang
370a2(rgyud): gtags nas gzugs brnyan rdzogs par bya ste shing gi rgyal po'i ye shing gis me rab tu sbar nas rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams te mtshon rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
370a3(rgyud): bya'o// nyi ma so so la gzugs bsnyan re re mnyam zhing mnyam pa re re'o// rgyal po glang po bzhin du bka' bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni mya ngan med pa'i me tog yungs
370a4(rgyud): kar dang / nag ge sar bsres nas ko me dang / nA b+hA sa dbatags pa srang bcu drug gis gzugs brnyan byas nas/ gzugs brnyan gyi mgo bo nas brtsams te lag pa g.yon
370a5(rgyud): pas mtshon rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing de'i shing kho nas me rab tu sbar te stong phrag brgyad brgyar sbyin bsreg bya'o// gzhan rnams g.yas pas nyi ma so sor zla ba gcig tu gnas
370a6(rgyud): te nyi ma gung la gzhan rnams ji ltar 'dod pas 'bangs bzhin du myur du dbang du byed do// cho ga gzhan ni so ma rA dza'i 'bras bu dang bsres pa'i dri'i rdzas rnams thams cad btags pa srang ba
370a7(rgyud): drug gi gzugs brnyan byas nas 'o ma can gyi yam shing gi sa me rab tu sbar te lte ba nas brtsams nas rkang mthil la thug gi bar du ral gris gtub cing gtub cing sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas man/ 
370a8(rgyud): bo nas brtsams te slar yang sbyin sreg zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor byas na rgyal po ci bgyi dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// 'di ni cho ga gzhan bla na med pa ste tsan dan dmar po dang / lan tshwa dang
370b1(rgyud): mnyam par 'gro ba rnams btags bsrang nyi shurtsa lnga gzugs brnyan byas nas nyi mas so'i snga dro'i dus chod la tsan dan dmar po'i shing gi me la rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams nas ral gri rnon
370b2(rgyud): pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// las 'di ni lag pa g.yas pas bsregs blugs dbul zhing g.yogs kyang ngo // zla ba gcig rtsam la rgyal po'ab
370b3(rgyud): bzhin du bka' bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung tshwa dang yang dag par bsres nas btags par bya'o// de nas srang nyi shu rtsa lngas gzugs brnyan
370b4(rgyud): byas nas phyi dro'i dus chod la yang dag par shes pas gzug das brnyan so so re re pA lA sha'i me la gzugs brnyan gyi/ rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams te mtshon rnon pos btub
370b5(rgyud): cing gtub cing sbyin sreg brgyad brgya'o// las lhag ma 'di ni dang po dang mtshungs par de yang zla brtsam la rgyal po bka' bsgo brje su sgrub par byed pa ci bgyid 'gyu ro// 
370b6(rgyud): cho ga gzhan ni ba lang gi gcin dang gnas dang / grog mkhar gyi sa dang sbrang rtsi mnyam par 'gro ba yis/ srang nyi shu cha'i gzugs brnyan bskyed nas zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so so la lan
370b7(rgyud): gsum du nyi ma gung la shing gi rgyal po'i sreg za rnam par gnas pa la gzugs brnyan gyi rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams nas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
370b8(rgyud): bya'o// 'bangs bzhin du 'gyu ro zhes sgrub thabs 'di rnams ni dus thams cad ston dang / dpyod dang / so ga dang / dgun gyi dus chod la yang rab tu sbyar na mtshungs pa med pa'i
371a1(rgyud): nor chen po 'di rnams rtag tu nges pas thob bo// de nas so ga'i sgrub pa 'byung ste/ rigs dang kha dog 'thun pa'i zho dang mar lhan cig pa kar bi ra'i me
371a2(rgyud): tog dang / gcig tu byas te btags nas srang sum cu'i tshad kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas nyi ma snga dro'am phyi dro ba lA sha'i yam shing gis me sbar nas gzugs brnyan gyi g.yas kyi mgor
371a3(rgyud): bzhag nas rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams te lag pa g.yas pas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin bsreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// zla ba gcig la rgyal po dbang du 'gyu ro// 
371a4(rgyud): cho ga gzhan ni yungs kar dkar po dang / gur gum bsre sa te legs par btags la srad bu bcu pa byas na das 'di 'di'i lhag ma sngar bzhin no// 'di la khyad ni lag pa
371a5(rgyud): g.yon pas gtub tsang gtub cing sbyin bsreg bya'o// cho ga gzhan ni rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa dang / nas dang 'gro rnams cig tu btags pa srang sum cu pas gzugs brnyan
371a6(rgyud): byas nas der khar tsha ba gsum gyis bkang nas zangs kyi thur me du sti ra'i me la bzlas pa byas nas rkang pa'i 'og nas phug ste spyi bor 'thon par byed do// de nas mgo bo'i g.yas gzhag ste/ 
371a7(rgyud): pa lA sha'i 'dab ma la rang gi ral gri'i sos bcad nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus chod la seng ldeng gi mer lag pa g.yas pas sbyin bsreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// zla ba cig la rgyal po jo srong
371a8(rgyud): 'tsho'i bar du dbang du 'gyur ro// zhes pa 'di rnams ni so ga'i dus kyi sgrub thabasu 'gyur ba rnams so// yang 'di'i dbyar gyi las rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te dbyar gyi dus chod la
371b1(rgyud): nges par sgrub par byed do// pu shel rtse dang / bA la ka dang / so so btsal dang / lan tshwa dang gzugs brnyan cig tu byas pa la nam mkha'i chus btags nas srang nyi shu rtsa lngas rgyal po'i gzugs
371b2(rgyud): brnyan byas nas g.yas pa nas brtsams te lag pa g.yas pas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing pA lA sha'i me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun
371b3(rgyud): mtshams la'o// zla ba cig tu'o// rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// 'di ni tshi ga gzhan te bu shel rtse dang / pri yang ku dang / TA pa Na dang / 'gyur byed rnams cig tu byas te na mkha'i
371b4(rgyud): chus btags nas srang sum cu pa'i rgyal po gzugs brnya/ na bya ste/ mgo bo nas brtsams nas lag pa ga dayas pas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing dong ka'i shing
371b5(rgyud): gos me sbar nas zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// 'di ni nges par mngag gzhug pa bzhin du kun tu spyod do// 'di
371b6(rgyud): ni cho ga gzhan te/ sardzi ka dang / 'o ma dang / nas kyi 'gyur byed dang / shu dag dang / sran ma mA sha dang / til rnams gcig tu bsres nas lus kyi chus btags te mi bdag gi
371b7(rgyud): gzugs brnyan srang sum cu ba byas te a mra'i shing gi me rab tu sngar nas zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la lag pa g.yas pas mgo bo nas brtsams te gtub
371b8(rgyud): cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// 'di ni cho ga gzhan mchog ste rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa dang sa la ma ltung ba'i ba byung cig tu byas nas/ nas
372a1(rgyud): kyi 'gyur byed lhan cig na mkha'i chus btags te/ srang sum cu'i tshad kyis rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas te phra ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la
372a2(rgyud): u dum ba ri'i shing gi me la lag pa g.yas pas ral gri rnon pos rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams te gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// zhes pa 'di rnams ni
372a3(rgyud): dbyar gyi dus kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rnams te 'di kho na la dngos grub nye bar 'gyur ro// yang 'dir gzhan 'byung ste dgun smad kyis dus kyi sgrub pa ni gang du dus cig tu sgrub par byed de
372a4(rgyud): 'bru'i phug ma dang / nas kyi tshogs dang / ga bi na dang / shu dag rnams gcig tu btags nas srang lnga pa bcu'i tshad kyi sa'i bdag po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas zla ba/ 
372a5(rgyud): gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshod la nim+bu'i shing gi me la nub tu mgo bzhag nas rkang pa shar du phyogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi mgo bo nas brtsams te lag
372a6(rgyud): pa g.yas pas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin bsreg stong bya'o// rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni a ru ra dang / skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu dang / shri bo sa ka dang / 
372a7(rgyud): kun tu ru ka dang / ba las byung ba'i mar rnams lhan cog btags pa srang sum cu'i mo bdag gi gzugs brnyan byas nas nub tu mgo bzhag te sngar bzhin du pa lA sha'i me la zla ba gcig tu nyi ma
372a8(rgyud): so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshed la me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// rgyal po mngag gzhug pa bzhin du rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga bzhin pa ru ra'i 'bras bu dang / nas
372b1(rgyud): dang / tsig seng 'dab ma dang / rtsa ba dang / bcas pa dang / til dang yungs kar dkar po rnams gcig tu byas te ba las byung ba'i mar lhan cig btags nas srang sum cus rgyal po'i gzugs/ 
372b2(rgyud): brnyan byas te mgo bo nub tu bstan nas sngar bzhin u dum ba ra'i shing gi me la zla ba gcig tu nyin zhag so sor sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// sa'i bdag po gdon mi za bar dbang du
372b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni rgya mtsho nas byung ba'i lan tshwa dang / bu ram dang / sU ru ra'i 'bru rnams dang / yungs kar dkar po cig tu byas te yang dag par btags
372b4(rgyud): ba srang sum cus rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas te mgo bo nub tu'o// sngar bzhin du 'o ma can gyi shing gyi me la zla ba cig tu nyin zhag so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus
372b5(rgyud): tshad la me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rgyal po bka' bsgo ba rjes su sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni rgya tshwa dang / rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa dang / nas
372b6(rgyud): dang / til dang / bu ram rnams gcig tu byas te ba'i mar gyis kun tu btags pa srang lnga bcus rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas nub tu mgo bo bzhag ste sngar bzhin du ji ltar mngon
372b7(rgyud): bar 'dod pa'i dus chod la zla ba cig tu nyi ma sor sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad brgya'o rtag tu mngag gzhug pa bzhin du nye bar 'gro'o// zhes pa 'di rnams ni dgun gyi dus kyi sgrub pa rnams
372b8(rgyud): grub par byed pa'o// de nyid la'o 'di rnams ni mchog gsang ba'o// zhes pa ste slar yang rig pa 'dzin par gyur cig/ gsang ba'i sgrub pa la sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i dus can gyi dngos grub
373a1(rgyud): g.yo bar byed de/ ji skad gsungs pa'i dus nges par gyur pa so ka la sogs pa rnams la las byas pa'o// de nas gang gi rgyal po 'di rtag tu kun tu bcings par 'gyur ro// 
373a2(rgyud): dngos grub nyams pa yang med de/ las gzhan dang lhan cig te yod pa'o// yang cho ga gzhan ni grub pa gang gos 'pho bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de rnams ni sems can gyi bye brag las
373a3(rgyud): sam cho ga med pa'am 'byung ba nyid las sam/ dbang po ma tshang ba nyid las sam/ slob dpon gyi man ngag med par rang gi rig pa gzung ste ston pa'i bka' so sor 'brang bas mang po mi shes
373a4(rgyud): te bla ma dam pa med pa las sam/ nus pa dang bral ba las sam/ rdzas ma mthong bas rtog pa'i dkyil 'kho dar gyi slob dpon la phul ba dang / bla ma dam pa sbyin pa'i
373a5(rgyud): 'osu gyur pa la bdag nyid shes pa med do zhes ma zhum pa/ dang ldan pas rtogs pa yang med cing mthong ba yang med par las chen po'i sgrub pa rnams shes par byed pa bsod
373a6(rgyud): nams ma yin pa smra ba tshul khrims 'chal pa'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma yang rung ste rang gi bslab pa'i mtshams zhig
373a7(rgyud): pa pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba la zhugs pa 'am/ byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba 'am/ mtshams med pa byas pa 'am/ slob dpon la brnyas pa 'am/ mchod
373a8(rgyud): rten gyi gnas la rdog pas brdzis pa 'am/ slob dpon gyi grib ma la 'goms par byed pa'am/ theg pa chen po la yang brnyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
373b1(rgyud): sdang bar gyur pa 'am/ lha thams cad la brnyas pa ste/ nyes pa 'di rnams kyis las gzhan byas pa de yang dag par byas pa ma yin rnam pa gzhan du byas par 'gyur ste/ de dngos
373b2(rgyud): grub dang bral ba ni de nyid kyi cho ga las 'das pa'i phyir// gang la la 'di rnams byed pa de'i dngos grub de skad mA gcig la 'jigs par byed de rig pa cung zad bzlas pa ni dus gzhan du kun
373b3(rgyud): tu gnas te gang yang sgrub pa'i dus can gyi dngos grub ma yin pa de 'dir 'gyur ro// slar yang rig pa 'dzin pa gang zhig gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i cho gas rgyal po'i rkang rjes kyi sa la bar skabs
373b4(rgyud): 'dir brgyad brgya'am snga brgyar bsregs thugs dmar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg byed do// de nyid du/ thams cad du byed pa'i rgyal po ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
373b5(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// 'khor los bsgyur ba la yang ji skad gsungs pa'i dus kyi sgrub pa la nges par dngos glu ba med par mi 'gyur te dngos grub nyams par yang mi
373b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas yang sems dpa' chen po stong phrag brgyad ci yang mi gsung bar gnas par gyur to// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob/ 
373b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug skye bo du ma'i nang du lhung ba dge ba'i spyod pa'i mchod pa chung ngu de stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te mngon
373b8(rgyud): bar phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal te sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' chen po de la'
374a1(rgyud): skad ces smras// sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can thams cad la kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal
374a2(rgyud): po gsungs shig/ sems dpa' chen po gsungs shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom zhing 'dzum pa'i bgegs dang bral bas
374a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la kun tu lta zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la smras pa/ gang khyod snying rje chen po don dam pa
374a4(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba/ lhan cig pa'i rgyud thams ca da kyi rjes su son pa gang yin pa 'di rnams ni lha dang bca das pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod pa bya bar 'gyur te mchog tu tshul
374a5(rgyud): khrims 'chal pa yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyurar ro// lha thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad kyi dpal yang gang la la bcom ldan 'das
374a6(rgyud): ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / shes par 'gyur ba dang / kha ton byed par 'gyur ba dang / 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang / sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod
374a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / glegs bam du bris nas rang gi khyim du 'jog par 'gyur ba dang / nyal ba'i dus dang / mal nas ldang ba'i dus su mgo la 'jogs par 'gyur ba de'i bung
374a8(rgyud): khrol chen po thams cad yongasu spangs te longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro// tshe ring po nyid du yang 'gyu ro// mdor na gang yang bdag gi rgyud ma lus pa shes par 'gyur ro// sems
374b1(rgyud): dpa' chen po de lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin las sogs pa thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ro// de rnams 'dis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba des na bshad par byed do// 
374b2(rgyud): nas sems dpa' chen po skad cig la ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom zhing rab tu 'dzum pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ bcom
374b3(rgyud): ldan 'das 'od dpag med dbul bzhugs pa/ mnyam par gsung ba pad+ma'i phyag can/ lha'i lus chen po/ lta bar mi dpogs pa'i sku/ sems can thams cad kyi grol ba/ 
374b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lte ba gang cung zad rtog/ par nus pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma spro/ lam yid la byas te sangs rgyas thams cad la rab tu btud te
374b5(rgyud): rin po che'i pad+ma la nye bar 'dug ste smras pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / sgrub pa so so dang / byang chub sems dpa' so so'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems
374b6(rgyud): dpa'i myu gu rnams la nges par pham pa dang / bde ba'i ched du sangs rgyas nyid kyi thabs mkhas pa'i bya ba gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i ched dang / sa dang por
374b7(rgyud): so sor thob pa'i cheng dang / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i ched du ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bsod
374b8(rgyud): nams kyi tshogs chen po rgyun tu nye bar bskyed pa/ de bzhin kho nar bsod nams kyi mthus sems can rnams kyi gong du yongasu bsngags pa'i mtshan bdang pos rgyan pa/ 'khor los brgya
375a1(rgyud): ba'i rgyal por skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs gang gis sngon byas pa'i las rnams kyis de bzhin du bya ba yang rtag tu rang nyid 'khor los sgyur ba de
375a2(rgyud): yang dbang du bya ste sngon brjod pa'i las rnams kho nas so// de las kyang sa thams cad pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par ma dad pa rnams rab tu
375a3(rgyud): dang ba nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bar yang 'gyur ro// yul gyi dpon po 'am/ ji lta bu'i bsod nams des sems can rnams kyi gong du rgyal po byed du 'jug go// nye bar longs spyod
375a4(rgyud): yongs su longs spyad pas bya ba yang rab tu byed do// / de yang gal te sngar brjod pa'i las kho nas des 'bad / nas du 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po dang blon po la sogs
375a5(rgyud): pa'i sems can rnams dbang du byed pa'i sgrub par 'gyur/ te ston dang / so ga dang / dbyar gyi dus rnam su nges par sgrib par byed do// rgyal po'o blon po dbang du/ 
375a6(rgyud): byed pa la ni de'i rkang pa'i rkang rjes kyi rdul dang / ske tshe mnyam par byas pa zla ba cig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshad la dus cig tu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga
375a7(rgyud): gzhan ni sna ma'i me tog dang til bsres pas sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni dur b+ha'i myu gu dang lhan cig pa'i ske tses zla cig tu sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du/ 
375a8(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni sla'i sa bon rnams pa shI dang / kakA kA ma dang / phyi ma rnams lan tshwa dang bsres pas zla ba cig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la sbyin
375b1(rgyud): sreg stong phrag brgyad pa ste dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni til dang adzun me tog bsres pa la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad kyis dbang du 'gyur ro// 
375b2(rgyud): cho ga gzhan nim+ba'i sa bon rnams dang tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i mdun na 'don dbang byed par
375b3(rgyud): 'dod pas ske tshe la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad zla ba cig la ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams nas brtsams nas dus cig tu sbyin sreg stong phrag
375b4(rgyud): brgyad byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan ni sra na ma tsa med ka la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stongaphrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro// cho
375b5(rgyud): ga gzhan ni irbu da'i tol mar gyis sbyin sreg bya ste sngar ba/ zhin dbang du 'gyur ro// de rnams thams cadal dong ka'i yam shong gi me sbar la sbyin sreg gam/ 
375b6(rgyud): lA sha'i me la yang rung ngo // bram ze dbang du byed pa la 'o ma can gyi shing gi me la sbyin sreg zla ba cig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams nas brtsams nas dus cig la sbyin sreg
375b7(rgyud): stong phrag brgyad byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i yungs kar seng ldeng gi shing gi me la sbyin sreg byas na sngar bzhin dbang
375b8(rgyud): du 'gyur ro// rje rigs dbang du byed pa la 'bras sa lu'i zan zho dang lhan cig pa a mra'i shing gi me la sbyin bsreg bya ste/ sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro// dman pa thams cad dang
376a1(rgyud): du byed pa la cher ma can gyi yam shing gi me sbar nas ske tshe dang / dug dang nam+bi lhan cig pa'i sbyin sreg zla ba cig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la brtsams nas dus cig
376a2(rgyud): la stong phrag brgyad byas na de dbang du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'dir 'byung ba ni thun mong du mchog dang / 'bring dang tha ma sgrub pa'i las ni yungs kar dkar po stong phrag brgyad gang bstan bya'i
376a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du byed pa la tal gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro// nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la yungs kar dkar po la mar dang / 
376a4(rgyud): zho dang sbrang rtsis btags pa'i bsregs blugs bdun sbyin pa sreg bya'o// gang bstan bya nyi ma gsum la dbang du 'gyur ro// gzhon nu ma dbang du byed par 'dod pas ram
376a5(rgyud): gna'i me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis 'phags pa spyan ras ga/ zigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// / spra tshil las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas bdag nyid
376a6(rgyud): kyi lag par bzhag ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na gang bstan pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar me tog dkar po brgyad brgya dbul bar bya ste/ gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur// 
376a7(rgyud): dung dang / gla rtsi dang / shu dag dang gi bam dang / rgya spos rnams cig tu byas nas btags par bya'o// stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas 'di gtungs pas sam// 
376a8(rgyud): gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// bram ze mo dbang du byed pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar ril ba'i myu gu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// dur khrod du lan bdun
376b1(rgyud): bzlas pas bud med gang la skyes bu gang gis mdun du 'dug nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas pas dbang du 'gyur ro// sor mo gcig pa'i shing blangs nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags te
376b2(rgyud): gang dang gang kun tu 'gugs par byed pa de dang 'du 'gyur ro// me tog brgya ba stong phrag brgyad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dbul bar bya'o// 'di la me tegacig
376b3(rgyud): blangs nas bud med la bltas nas bskor bar bya ste 'ong bar byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro// 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing phyogs gcig tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas grog mkhar gyis las
376b4(rgyud): byung ba'i nor rgyas kyi bu byas nas de la nye bar 'dug ste/ ji srid g.yo bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 8/ de lta bus grub par 'gyur ro// nor rgyas kyi bu bdag nyid
376b5(rgyud): ma sha bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba sbyin par byed do// 'das pa/ dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i don ston pa ra byed do// 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing sku gzugs kyi
376b6(rgyud): mdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas longs spyong so sor rnyed do// zla ba cig tu bsod snyoms bza' zhing dkar po'i bcu gcig la mtshan mo cig tu smyung bar gnas pas sku gzugs kyi spyan
376b7(rgyud): sngar mchod pa chen po byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / sku gzugs kyi zhabs dag la 'jus nas ji srid du sku gzugs g.yo bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ 
376b8(rgyud): g.yos pas gang mthong bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// yid kyis gang bskyed par byed du'i jug go/ lo sdong drag lngar 'cha bar 'gyur ro// 
377a1(rgyud): gang gar zhugs te 'bum phrag cig bzlas par bya'o// phyi nas de srid du sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar bye ma la byung ba'i mchod rten byas nas sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma cig
377a2(rgyud): tu byas te sbyin bsreg bya'o// klu thams cad 'ong bar byed do// gang smras pa de thams cad byed do// ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas til mar gyis btags
377a3(rgyud): pa'i tsan dan gyi zhogs ma'i sbyin sreg bya ste gnod sbyin 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gang smras pa de thams cad byed do// nags su ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas sbrang rtsi dang pi pi ling cig tu byas
377a4(rgyud): pa'i skyon sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste rig pa 'dzin pa tham sa cad 'ong bar byed do// bka' bsgo ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// shing cig tu rten cing 'brel par 'gyung
377a5(rgyud): ba'i stong po can gyi mchod rten rab tu bzhugs nas 'bum phrag bzlas par bya'o// 'bum yongasu rdzogs pa na gso sbyong can gyis gzugs kyis rnam pas byang chub shing
377a6(rgyud): las byung ba rtse gsum mtshan nyid dang ldan pa byed du bcug nas stong phrag rdzogs pa'i skyon bsreg bya ste/ zla ba nya la dri bzang pos rab tu byugs nas ras ris la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa
377a7(rgyud): byas nas lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ mtshan thog thag du bsgrub par bya ste/ ji srid 'bar gyi bar du'o// 'bar bas 'byung po'i bdag po gnyis pa gdul dka'
377a8(rgyud): 'dul ba po sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa'i lha chen por 'gyur ro// rgya mtshor zhugs te 'bum bzlas so// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa gang 'dod pa'i klung
377b1(rgyud): mthong bar byed // nor bu rin po che yang 'di la rab tu rtsal// de blangs pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ klu'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyuraro// 'am dang
377b2(rgyud): nas zan za zhing 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o// de nas gso sbyong can gyis las byed pas zangs kyi snod byed du bcug nas cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nyal 'bru dang sman thams cad kyis/ 
377b3(rgyud): yongasu bkang bar byas nas ras ros kyi spyan sngar so sor bzhag ste/ ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de dang lag pa bcug nas gang 'dod pa de dang de 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 
377b4(rgyud): snod bzang po'i sgrub thab so// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o// phyi nas zla ba nyal nor bu'ams las byung ba'i mchod rten byas te/ 
377b5(rgyud): de nyid du ras ris byed du bcug nas cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nya la 'bru dang sman thams cad kyis yongasu bkang ba byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar so sor bzhag ste mchod pa chen
377b6(rgyud): po byas nas bzhag pa'i nor bu 'am/ sa las byung ba lag pa g.yas pas blangs te skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug la ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// yid bzhin gyi nor
377b7(rgyud): bu 'chang ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o// cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nyal mchod pa
377b8(rgyud): sna tshogs pa byas nas mar me'i phreng ba yang rgya cher byas te lag pa g.yas pas rgyal mtshan gos dkar po 'phyang ba bzung nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// rgyal mtshan gyi rig
378a1(rgyud): pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gro'o// cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nya la ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma
378a2(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam la dri bzang pos dri yi so sor byugs nas dri zhim po'i me tog phreng ba bkris te lag pa g.yon pas gzung nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste ji/ 
378a3(rgyud): srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa de ru 'gro bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod ma'i gzhon nu
378a4(rgyud): ma rab tu mdzes pa legs par khrus byas pa rgyan kyis brgya dran par byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar 'byor pa/ de'i mchod pa bya ste/ lag pa g.yon pas rab tu bzung
378a5(rgyud): ste g.yas pa ji srod de dang thabs gcig tu 'bar bar gyurapa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// ji lta ba bzhin du thabs gcig tu rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// mtshan
378a6(rgyud): ma gcig pa'i steng du lag pa gzhag nas ji srid 'khor rnams mi mthong ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// ma mthong ba na sems can thams cad 'ongs nas grub pa gsum po thams cad
378a7(rgyud): sbyin par byed do// zla ba gzas bzung ba'am/ nyi ma gzas bzung ba na bab bla byang chub shing gi 'dab ma'i nang du btums par byas nas dbang phyug chen po'i lha khang du ring bsrel
378a8(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ji srid du ba 'thul pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// des thog le byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing rgya mtsho'i 'gram
378b1(rgyud): du'am nga drung du thun gsum du stong phrag bzlas par bya'o// mtshan mo bdun du rgya mtshar gnas dpa'i rtol rnams mthong bar byed do// ji ltar 'dod bablang bar
378b2(rgyud): bya'o// mon sran sde'u za zhing ri bo la 'dzegs nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// mtshan mo nyi shur ri bo la gnas pa'i gser dang nor bu rin po che ston cing smra bar byed do// 
378b3(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya'o// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i dogs sam shing gi 'gram du zla ba gcig tu nyin mtshan du bzlas par bya'o// thams cad chu klung gi 'gram du mthong ba
378b4(rgyud): byed do// ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya'o// skyes pa dang bud med dbang du byed pa la sol bas sa la gtso dgas brnyan bris te/ de'i steng du nye bar 'dug nas sdong
378b5(rgyud): phrag brgyad nyin zhag gsum thun gsum du bzlas par bya'o// dbang du 'gyuraro// rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i gos 'dod pas me tog dkar po yongs su mnyes
378b6(rgyud): pa rnams la lan cig yongasu bzlas pa'i chur gzhug par bya'o// mtshan mo bdun la gos rnams rnyed do// ba'i mar la stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa tsam gyis skal pa bzang por
378b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bzlas pas brtan pa dang g.yo ba rnams khyad par du 'pho bar byed do// lcags las byung ba'i mdzub gang tsam gyi ral gri blangs nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i
378b8(rgyud): mchod rten du ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas mchod pa rgya chen po bya ste/ a shwat+tha'i 'dab mas g.yas nas bskor te ral gri rab tu bzhag nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par
379a1(rgyud): bya'o// de blangs pas 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur te rol pa 'dzin pa stong gis yongasu bskor ba rig pa 'dzin pa rnams thams cad kyis shes nas bar gyi bskal par gnas
379a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o// sngon spyad pa byas pas nag po'i brgyad pa'am/ nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la ras ris la
379a3(rgyud): mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dge 'dun gyi bstan pa can nam slongs mo zos nas dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i ldong ros blangs te des ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du sa la pad+ma 'dab brgya
379a4(rgyud): pa bris nas pad+ma'i 'odab ma la nye bar 'dug ste nyi ma so sor ji srid dus zos nas pad+ma gyen du 'gro ba de srid du bzla nges par bya'o// pad+ma'i 'dab ma la nye bar 'dug pa'i
379a5(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa nyi shu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i gzhal med khang yang 'byung ngo // de nas de'/ khor dang bcas pa de gzhal med khang la 'dzegs nas
379a6(rgyud): 'phur bar byed do// de yang pad+ma rin po che du mas rgyan po'i lha'i gzhal med khang du 'gyur ro// bar gyi bskal par 'tshe bar byed do// bde ba can du yang 'gro zhing slar yang 'od
379a7(rgyud): bar byed do// lus tha dad 'dod pa dag tu skye ba so sor rnyed do// stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i chus shing skam po la gtor na me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs
379a8(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// chu klung bskams par zhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya ste chu skye'o// chu klung rgyas par 'dzag par bzlas na thang du 'gyu ro// rgyal po 'am rgyal po
379b1(rgyud): blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog rnams nag po'i brgyad pa la stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o// lan tshwa'i bsregs blugs kyang stong phrag brgyang
379b2(rgyud): sbyin bsreg bya'o// nges par rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// de nyid kyis brgyad pa nas brtsams te ji srid bcu gcig pa'i bar du gi bam la thun gsum du brgyad brgyar bzlas pa des
379b3(rgyud): thig le byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// khye'u 'am bu mo dbang du byed par 'dod na gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar yungs kar stong phrag brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o// gnas kyi thal
379b4(rgyud): ba blangs te gzugs brnyan byas na gang gis ming nas smosab de dbang du 'gyur ro// gtsang ma'i don du ba'i dmar blangs te zla ba gzas bzung ba'am/ nyi ma gzas
379b5(rgyud): gzung ba'i dus su zangs kyi snod du bcug nas ji srid dngos grub rnam gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'gro bzhin pa la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// du ba
379b6(rgyud): 'thul bzhin pa la bcud kyis len no// 'bar ba mi snang ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur/ arga'i me tog 'bum gyis sbyin bsreg byas na dong tshe 'bum sbyin par byed do// 
379b7(rgyud): sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste dong tshe brgyad rnyed do// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar 'bras sA lu dang / 'bras thug po che la mar gyis btags pa'i
379b8(rgyud): sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dong tshe lnga brgya rnyed do// sngon spyad pa byas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// dong
380a1(rgyud): tshe sum brgya rnyed do// gzugs brnyan stong phrag brgyad bya'o// dong tshe brgya lhag par rnyed do// rigs kyi bdag po dang rigs kyi bdag mo dbang du byed pa
380a2(rgyud): 'dod pas// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar arga'i yam shing gis mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brkyang bya'o// rig pa'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro// 
380a3(rgyud): rig pa'i bdag po nyid du byed par 'dod pas sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du dur b+ha'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste/ rigs kyi bdag po nyid du 'gyuraro// 
380a4(rgyud): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dbang du bye dad par 'dod pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar arga'i me to/ dag stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o// mtshan mo bdun du
380a5(rgyud): 'dod cing don du gnyer ba'i don gang yin pa smra bar bya'o// rtag tu bzlas pas nor rnams rnyed do// ras ris kyi spyan sngar gu gul gyi ril bu'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
380a6(rgyud): bya'o// gser stong rnyed do// sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zlab cig tu kun tu ru'i bdug pa'i sbyin sreg stong bya'o// gter so sor rnyed do// sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar arga'i
380a7(rgyud): shing gi yam shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// dong tshe stong rnyed do// dgra bo dbang du byed par 'dod pas gso sbyong can
380a8(rgyud): gyis thun gsum du gzugs brnyan gyis spyan sngar pA shA'i me la ske tshe'i bsregs blugs stong phrag brgyad bya'o// dgra bo dbang du 'gyur ro// zla ba cig gos dus la rgya skyegs
380b1(rgyud): kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'bras sA li dang / thug po che'i skyon sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste thun gsum du kAR+sha pa Na brgya rnyed do// 
380b2(rgyud): 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing 'bum bzlas par bya'o// sngon spyad pa byas pas nag po'i brgyad pa'i nag po'i bcu cig pa la skyes bu'i ro ma nyams pa blangs nas bkrus te rgyan gyis brgyan pa dag
380b3(rgyud): mar blangs pa'i 'dod ma'i gzugs kyis cha byad 'dzin pa byas nas dri dang me tog dang bdug pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod de rkang pa g.yon pas brang khar yang dag par mnan nas spyi
380b4(rgyud): bor yang dang yang du rig pa bzlas te thal lcag gis bstsu dran par byas te langs pa de srid du'o// langs nas/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ston par byed do// 
380b5(rgyud): de nas rgyal gyi lugs las byung ba'i ral gris bsnun par bya'o// dngul dang gser gyi rang bzhin du 'gyuraro// de nas mi 'dod do zhes brjod par bya'o// 'dod
380b6(rgyud): pabyin cig ces so// de nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu skrag par byed do// de blangs nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ yid ltar mgyogs pa'i bar gyi bskal
380b7(rgyud): pa'i bar du gnaso// dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas nyin mtshan du myang bar gnas pas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bor zhugs nas zla ba tsam me ma kha'i tshad kyi sna ma'i me tog 'bum
380b8(rgyud): rab tu 'bab par bya ste/ yul gru bcu rnyed do// dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du pad+ma 'bum dbul bar bya ste gter skrag ma rnyed do// 
381a1(rgyud): sngon spyad pa byas pa de nyid chu klung du zhugs nas sna ma'i me tog 'bum dbul bar bya'o// mthar til nag po'i sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o// yul gru ri ba dang bcas
381a2(rgyud): pa bcu rnyed do// mya ngan med pa'i shing la sran ma tsa med ka'i tshad tsam gyi rol bu byas nas sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg byas
381a3(rgyud): na gang cung zad tshol ba de rnyed do// a pA mArga'i ye shing la cho ga 'di kho nas gser stong rnyed do// mya ngan med pa dang / De De ka bsres la a pA mArga'i dang / tan tu gsum gyis
381a4(rgyud): btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal po'i bu mo dang ba tsun mo rnyed do// rgyal po rnams blon po dang bca das pa dbang du byed par 'dod pas sku gzugs kyi mdun/ 
381a5(rgyud): du mya ngan med pa'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas zla ba ga cig tu mya ngan med pa'i me tog rnams kho na zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
381a6(rgyud): bya ste rang gi khyim du gter mthong ba 'gyur ro// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du sked pa'i tshad kyis chur zhugs nas me tog brgya pa 'bum dbul bar bya'o// de nas me tog brgya
381a7(rgyud): pa la stong phrag brgyad yongasu bzlas nas gang gis bsnams pa'am mthong bar byin na de dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed par 'dod pas zla ba
381a8(rgyud): gcig tu se che zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du 'gyuraro// gang brjod pa de byed rgyal po'i nye bar dbang du byed pa la sku gzugs kyi sgra
381b1(rgyud): sngar ske tshe zho dang sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig pa rnams dang / de nas kyang li ta dang lhan cig pa dang / de nas kyang sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig pa rnams zla ba cig tu thun gsum du ji ltar gsungs
381b2(rgyud): pa'i rim pas brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i mdun na 'don na dbang du byed par 'dod pas mar dang lhan cig pa'i 'bras yos kyi sbyin sreg bya'o// rgyal
381b3(rgyud): rigs la 'o thug dang bsres pas so// rje rigs la 'o ma dang lhan cig paso// dmangs rigs la til mar gyis gtags pa rnams kyiso// gsum po thams cad la lan tshwa'i
381b4(rgyud): sbyin sreg gis// yugs sa mo la ma sha'i sbyin sregs gi so// sems can thams cad la tsha'i til mar gyi das btags pa'i til rnams dbang du byed do// thams
381b5(rgyud): cad la zla ba gcig tu pA la sha'i me la sbyin sreg stong phrag pa rgyad pa'o// gtsang mar gyur pas nyin mtshan du smra bar gnas te gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar bil ba'i yam
381b6(rgyud): shing gos me sbar nas bil ba'i sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o// gter mthong bar 'gyur ro// mtshan mo nyi shur 'o ma dang / nas zan za zhing pA la sha'i me la yungs kar dkar po'i
381b7(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya ste nor rnyed do// 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing 'bum phrag lngar bzlas pa bya'o// de nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu thun gsum du yungs kar dkar po la mar gyis
381b8(rgyud): btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste nar mi chun gang du 'dod pa der ltung bar byed do// zas bzhin spang bar gnas pas yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o// rgya gar gyi
382a1(rgyud): gnod pa nye bar zhi bar byed do// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar mtshan brgyad du bol ba'i shing gis me sbar nas til gyi sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o// gter mthong
382a2(rgyud): bar byed do// yang na dbang phyug nyid rnyed do// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te zla ba gcig tu pa lA sha ser me tog brgya pa
382a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o// ji ltar 'dod pa'i nor rnyed do// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ba lA sha'i shing gos mes rab tu sbar nas zhi dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis
382a4(rgyud): btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// yul gru bcu la spyod pa rnyed do// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar da dkar po'i tshes cig nas brtsams te 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing
382a5(rgyud): pad+ma 'bum dbul bar bya'o// gter snyed do// yang na da bang phyug rnyed do// 'di rnams kho na ku mu da'i cho ga ste/ rgyal po la gang tshol ba de rnyed do// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan
382a6(rgyud): sngar bil ba dang til phan tshun bsres pas 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// gter mthong bar byed do// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas pri yang ku'i
382a7(rgyud): zhogs ma rnams zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i bol ba'i me la 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar nyin mtshan du spang bar
382a8(rgyud): gnas pas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te pad+ma zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa 'bum gyis sbyin sreg bya'o// dbang phyug nyid so sor rnyed do// ras ris kyi spyan sngar
382b1(rgyud): 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o// de nas bu ram gyi ye shing sor cig pa'i tshad 'bum phrag gsum sbyin sreg bya'o// ras ris rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur ro// me tog chun po g.yo bar byed/ 
382b2(rgyud): pab dang / de nas rgyal rigs so sor rnyed pa'am yang na gang yid kyis bsams pa'o// skyes bu chen po dbang du byed pa la gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar
382b3(rgyud): gyis btags pa rnams zla ba cig tu thun cig la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// dbang du 'gyur ro// yul dbang du byed pa la gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar ka ra bi ra'i me tog la zho dang / 
382b4(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// / yul so sor rnyed do// yul gyi dpon po byed par 'dod pas dong ka'i me tog la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis
382b5(rgyud): btags pa 'bum phrag gsum sbyin sreg bya'o// yul gyi rje bor 'gyur ro// pa lA sha'i me la'o// sde dang zha byed par 'dod pas gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar kun da'i me
382b6(rgyud): tog la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste sde dpon nyid rnyed do// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar ba lA sha'i me la btang bzung gi me tog la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis
382b7(rgyud): btags pa stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg bya'o// yul gru'i rje bor 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar ka ra bi ra'i me tog la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg
382b8(rgyud): 'bum phrag gsum byas te cod pan gsum bcings par 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar nyi ma so so la mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams nas ba
383a1(rgyud): te de nas arga'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas dri'i til mar gyis btags pa'i shing gser gyi phyi ma mtshan gang tsam gyis stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// rdza ba drug
383a2(rgyud): gis rgyal srid so sor rnyed do// ma skyes pa'i longs spyod skye bar 'gyur ro// lo gsum gyis rgyal srid chen por so sor rnyed do// cho ga 'di nyid kho nas lcags las byung ba'i phye ma'i
383a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya ste lo gsum gyis mtshon cha bcings par 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di nyid kyis gur gum gyi bsreg blugs dri'i til mar gyi btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// nor gyi bdag po
383a4(rgyud): chen por 'gyur ro// dri thams cad kyi bsregs blugs dang / mar gyis bsregs blugs 'bum sbyin sregs bya'o// ji ltar 'dod
383a5(rgyud): pa'i gnas su dpon po byed do// yang na ji ltar mngon par 'a/ dod pa'i yul so sor rnyed do// ba lA sha'i me nyid/ la ga bur gyi bsregs blugs mar gyis btags pa 'bum
383a6(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya ste rgyal po dga' bar 'gyur ro// pA lA sha'i me la sbyin sreg tsan dan gyis yam shing dri'i til mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// yul chen po'i dpon por
383a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gser gyi ngang tshul gyis bsregs blugs 'bum pA lA sha'i me la sbyin sreg bya'o// sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// a ga ru'i yam shing
383a8(rgyud): la mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// pA sha ka'i yam shing la dri'i til mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste nad chen po nye bar zhi bar
383b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// nim+ba'i 'bras bu la dri'i til mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste/ gang 'dod pa'i bcings pa de grol bar byed do// rgyud mtshungs pa'i mar blangs te 'bum
383b2(rgyud): mngon par bsngags te 'thung shig mchog tu yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// arga'i ma la arga'i me tog dri'i til mar gyis btags pa 'bum sgron sreg bya'o// sems can thams
383b3(rgyud): cad kyi gnang chen por 'gyur ro// de rnams thams cad ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du sbyin sreg bya'o// me tog gam 'bras bu la lan bdun
383b4(rgyud): mngon par bsngags pa byas na de gang la byin pa de dga' ba dar 'gyur ro// gso sbyong can gyis dkar po'i bco de lnga la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du sa lam
383b5(rgyud): lhung ba'i ba byung gi dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te dri dang rme tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas gzugs brnyan gyi spyan snga u dum ba ra'i shing
383b6(rgyud): gis me sbar nas zla ba cig gi dus cig la tsa ru bza' zhing tshangs pa'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// bram ze dbang du byed pa la gzugs
383b7(rgyud): brnyan gyi mdun du zla ba cig tu 'o ma'i sbyin bsreg bya'o// dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar tsa ru'i sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// 
383b8(rgyud): rje rigs dbang du byed pa la nas dang zho bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg bya ste sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro// dmangs rigs dbang du byed pa le nas la dri'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin
384a1(rgyud): bsreg bya ste sngar bzhin du 'gyur ro// gzhan rnams la gzhan gyis mi thub pa la dug gis btags pa'i sbyin bsreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro// dgra la bltas
384a2(rgyud): nas bzlas pas 'jigs par 'gyur ro// brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa'i chus rig pa lan cig mngon par bsngags pas sam/ lan bdun mngon par bsngags
384a3(rgyud): pas kyang rung ste rgyal po'i pho brang du ngag 'dzin par 'gyur ro// dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du seng ldeng gi me la gu gul gyi ril bu mar gyis btags
384a4(rgyud): pa'i stong phrag brgyad thun gsum du sbyin bsreg bya'o// gang 'a dadod pa de rnyed do// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du 'o ma dang nas zan bza' zhing 'bum zlos shig de nas bu
384a5(rgyud): ram gyi yam shing sor gcig pa'i tshad 'bum sbyin bsreg bya'o// cod pan gsum bcings par 'gyu ro// ril/ bu sgrub par byed par 'dod pas/ dong ka'i me tog gi ge sar
384a6(rgyud): dang / nag ge sar dang / tsan dan dkar po rnams cig tu byas nas rgya shug gi tshig gu'i tshad kyi ril bu bya ste mi mnyam pa'i lcags gsum gyis dkri'o// dang por zangs kyiso// de nas dngu
384a7(rgyud): gyis// de nas gser gyiso// de nas rol bu za ma tog tu bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i spyan sngar ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du nyin mtshan du spang bar gnas pas zla ba gazla
384a8(rgyud): gzung ba na mchod pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas mdun du bzhag ste ji srid kha Ta khaT zhes sgra sgrogs pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas cig lung ston pa'i lha la dbul bar bya'o// gan/ 
384b1(rgyud): rnams g.yog po rnams la sbyin par bya'o// bla ma'i bla mar gyur pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o// de nas de rnams rin gyis nyo bar bya'o// gang gang gi tshe bdag
384b2(rgyud): nyid kyi khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mchog sgrogs par blta bar bya'o// lo stong phrag bcur 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// gzugs rnyan gyi mdun du ka dam pa'i me tog la zho/ 
384b3(rgyud): dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste gang bsams pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te smyung bar gnas pas na ga ge/ 
384b4(rgyud): sar gyi me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste gos cung zad rnyed do// gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du sna ma'i me tog la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i stong phrag
384b5(rgyud): brgyad dbul bar bya'o// sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'di kho na nyid ku mu da rnams kyis rgyal po dga' bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po dbang du byed pa la
384b6(rgyud): thams cad du tsan dan gyi phye ma la btags pas zla ba cig tu sbyin bsreg bya ste rgyal po dbang du 'gyuraro// bram ze dbang du byed pa la ku ru NA ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin bsreg

384b8(rgyud): bu mo dbang du byed pa la yu thi ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o// zhes pa 'di rnams gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du be ka ma ka ta'i yam shing gi me la sbyin bsreg bya'o// yugs sa
385a1(rgyud): mo la be kaM ka ta'i lam shing mar gyis btags pa'i skyon pasreg bya'o// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gzugs brnyan mo spyan sngar lan bdu mngon par bsdu
385a2(rgyud): pa'i gi bi gi thig le byas nas rgyal po'i khab du 'gro bar bya'o// thams cad dga' bar 'gyu ro// gdong la brgyad brgyar yongasu bzlas nas rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro bar bya'o// thams cad dga'
385a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du sngon du myu gu rnams la mar gyis btags pa pA la sha'i me la sbyin bsreg bya'o// mtshan mo bdun gyis pha rol zhi bar 'gyu ro// bdag nyid zhi ba la pA
385a4(rgyud): la sha'i me nyid la thun gsum du mar dang lhan cig pa'i'o dam la sbyin bsreg bya'o// mtshan mo bdun gyis zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du zangs kyi snod du mar ban/ 
385a5(rgyud): na nyi zla gzas bzung ba'i dus su gtor ma'i cho ga byas na sa bzlas par bya'o// snod g.yo bar byed do// mar yang grub par 'gyu ro// dpral bar thig le bya'o// skye bo thams cad
385a6(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyu ro// mthung shig yid gzhungs par 'gyu ro// nus pa byed pa la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dngul dang zangs kyi snod du ba las byung ba'i mar
385a7(rgyud): bzhag nas chags 'bum zlos shig/ de nas gzas zin pa'i dus su bsgrub par bya ste grub par 'gyur ro// 'thungs na nus pa rnye te la gyogs pa dang / lding ba dang / mchod
385a8(rgyud): pal sogs pa nus par 'gyur ro// mar de nyid kyis lus la mngon par byugs nas mer rab tu zhugs na mi 'tshig go// chu la rab tu zhugs na thams cad tshul rkang pa mi dbying bar
385b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lag pa la mngon par byugs na lugs tshig pa nyams par byed do// pad ma'i rtsa ba za bar byed cing gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du ldong ros blangs nas lag pa kha sbyar gzhag nas
385b2(rgyud): ji srid gza' las grol ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// des thig le byas pas srog chags thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di nyid kyis mA sha cig khar bcug ste ji srid myu gu byung
385b3(rgyud): ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// myu gu'i phye mas dbang du byed do// pha rol 'gugs pa la myu gus rnam par snang bar byed do// ldong ros sgrub par 'dod pas gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du a

385b5(rgyud): par byed par 'dod pas 'o ma can gyi shing gi lam shing ni sa me rab tu sbar nas 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing rno/ dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i stong phrag brgyad

389a4(rgyud): seng ldeng gi phur bul lan bdun bzlas pas sa la birkob dar bya'o// dgra' ma mtshan cha thams cad gnon par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pan
389a5(rgyud): thams cad la tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu la brgyad brgyar mdza na par bsngags par byas nas gsang gnasu gdags bar bya ste/ 'khrugs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 
389a6(rgyud): 'gyed pa rnams rnam par thar gnon par 'gyur ro// dug thams cad dang sngags rnams la chu la lan bdun bzlas pa sbyin bsreg bya ste dug med par 'gyu ro// nor 'dod pa gtsang
389a7(rgyud): mas gos gtsang ma bgos te nyin mtshan du myang bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar kun tu ru'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o// rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba ston par byed do// stong
389a8(rgyud): phrag bdun bzlas pas dngul sbyin par byed do// thams cad dbye ba la thal bso// longs spyod don du gnyer bas chu klung 'dus pa 'am steng khar gtsang ma'i phyogasu ras ris
389b1(rgyud): bzhug su gsol nas bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg brtsam par bya'o// pad+ma la zho dang sdang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o// yang na 'bum phrag gnyis// de nas 'dod pa thams cad
389b2(rgyud): thob par 'gyuraro// sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gsum gyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gsum gyis rgyal srid so sor rnyed do// sbyin sreg 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis
389b3(rgyud): nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyu ro// gang blangs pa de rnyed do// na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / mi snang ba dang / phur bu rab tu 'jug pa la sogs pa byed do// dur b+ha la mar gyis btags pa
389b4(rgyud): 'bum bsreg par bya'o// nyi ma bdun gyis rgyas par 'gyur ro// zho dang sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// mtshan mo nyi shu rtsa gcig
389b5(rgyud): gis rgyas par 'gyu ro// dong tshe stong rnyed do// bu ram la rab tu bzhag par bya ste dgra thams cad rengs par 'a/ gyur ro// ba byung gi dkyil 'khor byas nas srad bu gsang
389b6(rgyud): paba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste gu gul gyi bdug pa phul nas sngags bzlas par bya'o// gal te 'tshon srad bu gar byed do// mi 'tshon gar mi byed do// ba byung gi
389b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa byas nas me tog dang bdug pa phul te der gnas pas bzlas pa bya'o// dgra rnams la lan bdun yongasu bzlas nas sa'i gnas su gdab bo// byang stems
389b8(rgyud): thams cad med par 'gyu ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la dbyug pa la yongs su bzlas nas der 'phangs par bya ste/ gnod pa med par 'gyur ro// rjed byed 'jug pa la a
390a1(rgyud): ba mar rga'i yam shing gis me sbar nas til nag po dang ka ra bi ra'i me tog dkar po sreg pa'i sbyin bsreg bya'o// brjed byed kyi gdon nyams par byed do// gdon
390a2(rgyud): thams cad la srad bu nag po bcing bar bya'o// ye 'grog dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / brtsog shu dang / khyi rngo gcod pa las dkar po ste sems can thams cad la
390a3(rgyud): gnod pa med par 'gyur ro// nyi zla gzas bzung ba na smyung bar gnas pa byas nas til mar la yongs su bzlas te/ til mar gyi gdong la bskus nas dgra'i khyim du 'jug par bya
390a4(rgyud): ste byams pa'i semasu 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di nyid kyis so sor 'brang ba brgyad brgyar mngon pa sngags par bya das nas lag pa la bcings pas g.yul du 'jug par bya
390a5(rgyud): ste gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// dus nyid du langs nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du la 'khor byas nas chu khyor ba gsum po re re la lan bdu/ 
390a6(rgyud): yongasu bzlas nas btung bar bya'o// yid kyis brjod pas btso bar bya ste ji srid du chos kyi bar du'o// de nas zas kham dang po la lan gsum yongasu bzlas nas dus ma yin par
390a7(rgyud): brgyad brgyar bzlas pa byas nas de bzhag par bya'o// las kyi sgrub pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// ngag kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur te nyi ma re re la shu lo ka
390a8(rgyud): 'dzin par byed do// de bzhin du nyon mo bdun du tshul lan bdun bzlas pas so// ldong ros a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums par byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji srong
390b1(rgyud): dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de sring du bzlas par bya'o// gzugs brnyan gyi spyan snga sa pa marga'i lam shing snang phrag brgyad kyis skyon pasreg bya'o// rgyal ba rgyal ba'i dran
390b2(rgyud): po dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// 'o ma 'thung ba'am/ lo ma za ba gso sbyong can gyis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du 'bum phrag gsum zlos shig/ de nas
390b3(rgyud): nag po'i brgyad pa 'am/ nag po'i bcu gzhi pa la til nag po stong phrag brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o// kaR+sha pa Na stong rnye // gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar gu gul gyi/ 
390b4(rgyud): ril bu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gang 'dod pa'i skyes pa dang bud med dbang du 'gyuraro// gu gul gyi ril bu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byos shig/ 
390b5(rgyud): skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// yang na rgyal po'i pho brang du ngag 'dzin par 'gyuraro// shu dag khar bcug ste ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du
390b6(rgyud): gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dro bzhin pa la dbang du byed do// du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'bar bas na mkha' la 'gro bar byed do// 
390b7(rgyud): ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas nag po'i brgyad pa nas brtsams te pad+ma 'bum sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// tsan dan dmar po
390b8(rgyud): las byung ba'i sor bcu drug pa la bzo bo gso sbyong can gyis shing gi dbyug pa byed du gzhug go// de nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar nyin mtshan smyung bar gnas pas 'bum phrag gsum
391a1(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// zla ba nyal mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas shing gi dbyug pa lag pa g.yas pas blangs te ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas
391a2(rgyud): par bya'o// dro bzhin pa la smra bar bya ba 'dod pa thams cad myur du smra bar 'gyur ro// dub 'thul bas mi snang bar 'gyu ro// 'bar bas na mkha' la 'gro'o// ras ris la
391a3(rgyud): gos dkar pos kun nas g.yog par byas nas ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'khor stong dang bcas pa 'phur bar byed do// ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'o ma dang nas
391a4(rgyud): zan za zhing mi smra bar ku sha bting ba'i mal stan la tshes gtso dag nas brtsams nas ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du 'bum phrag bcu drug bzlas par bya'o// u dum ba ra'i yam
391a5(rgyud): shing gis stong phrag brgyad sbyin bsreg bya ste nad thams cad sel bar byed do// de la lcags las byung ba'i pad+ma sor drug pa 'am/ brgyad pa byas nas ring bsrel
391a6(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugasu gsol nas dus gsum du yongasu bzlas par bya'o// 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya ste phyis mchod pa rgya chen po byas te mtshan mo
391a7(rgyud): gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar pad+ma gzhag nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de blangs pa tsam gyis 'khor dang bcas pa skra li zhing 'khyil
391a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// yid kyis bye ba zlos shig 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang cung zad bsams pa ma tshang ba med par phun sum tshogs so// phyogs gang du 'gro ba der bong ba la lan
391b1(rgyud): bdun bzlas pa byas nas 'bang bar bya ste gdug pa thams cad gnon par 'gyur ro// gos la mngon par bsngags nas bgo bar bya ste/ bya ba rtsom pa thams cad la thogs pa med
391b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gdong la kun tu bya bas na smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// dug rab tu nyams pa ldang du 'jug par byed do// 'byung po'i gdon grol bar byed do// bgegs mthu med
391b3(rgyud): par byed do// khyim du ras ris bzhugasu bcug na khyim gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// so ba'i phung por bzhugasu bcug na so ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'dab mar bzhugasu 'jug
391b4(rgyud): par byed na de'i dngos grub du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yon tan brjo dad pa gzhal du med pa skye'o// de nas zhi ba can byed pa dar 'dod na zho dang sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i dri zhim po'i
391b5(rgyud): me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mchog tu/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// rgyas pa can la til dang 'bras thug po che dang / mon sran sde'u dang / mon sran gre'u la sogs
391b6(rgyud): ba rnams zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btag pa'o ma can gyi shing giyi shing gis me rab tu spar nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mchog tu rgyas par 'gyuraro// ras ris kyis sam ras
391b7(rgyud): ris med pas kyang rung ste/ gso sbyong can gyis skyabs gsum yongasu bzung nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed do// stong phrag bcu bzlas par bya'o// de nas zla ba nya la zla ba gzas bzung
391b8(rgyud): ba na 'dod pa can thams cad la gtor ma byin nas nyin mtshan du spang bar gnas te mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyu ro// khyad par thams cad ra
392a1(rgyud): / gis len par byed do// kun nas byabs pa tsam gyis 'tsho bar byed du 'jug// tshul lan bdun bzlas pas bsngags par gyis shig/ kun tu myur bar 'thungs na rangan
392a2(rgyud): gnasu 'gyur ro// gdon dang srog chags la yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg stong gis lha ma yin gyi phug gi sgor da ltar rab tu bzhag nas nges par gnas pas 'bum bzla bar bya'o// lham
392a3(rgyud): yin gyi bu mo nges par song nas rab tu 'jug par byed do// dor rab tu gnas pas gang tshol ba de rnyed do// gang du 'dod pa der kun tu gnaso// rgya mtsho'i 'gram du ras ris so sor bzhun
392a4(rgyud): nas ras ris la 'bum bzlas pas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yang rang gis gnas su rjes su 'jug par byed do// de la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rtsal bar bya ste/ de blangs nas
392a5(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad la spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin ga shegs pa'i zhing du spyod par byed do// bskal par gnas shing thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu mas
392a6(rgyud): bkal ba'i skud pa la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas mdud pa byed do// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// chu klung ngam/ chu
392a7(rgyud): gling du bsod snyoms za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o// mi snang bar 'gyur ro// tsa ru za zhing chu klung 'dus par 'bum zlos shig/ mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mi snang ba
392a8(rgyud): thams cad kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyu ro// yang dag par sdom pas lhung bzed lag pa g.yas pas blangs te skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug la ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji srid 'bar bar
392b1(rgyud): gyur pa/ de srid du bzlas par bya'o// rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// bskal par gnas shing rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag byas par 'gyuraro// lhung bzed dang khar
392b2(rgyud): sol la sogs pa rnams la cho ga 'di nyid kyiso// nyi zla gzas bzung ba na dge slong gis bsgrub par bya ste thams cad 'di nyid kho nas bya ste bskal par gnas shing tshangs par spyod cing
392b3(rgyud): thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod do// ba lang gi gcin dang / nas zan za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o// yul gru brgyad so sor rnyed do// pu
392b4(rgyud): sa'i lA ka'i 'dab ma rnams kyis sdig pa dang / sdom dang / dug thams cad 'joms par byed do// 'bum phra/ ngag gnyis bzlas pas sbrul gyi mche ba'i dus kun tu 'joms
392b5(rgyud): par byed do// sna ma'i me tog gi gnasu 'gyur ro// mal+li ka dang / ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang so so gan+d+ha ti ka la sogs pa rnams zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar
392b6(rgyud): gyis btags te thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig rgyal po dang rgyal po'i blon po 'am/ bram zer mdun na 'don yang rung ste mtshan mo bdun gyis dbang du byed do// 
392b7(rgyud): rig pas nyams pa la gur gum gyis gro ga'i 'dab ma la bris nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du brgya bzlas par bya'o// tho rangs gang bar
392b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas pa grong ngam grong khyer du thor cig der sems can rnams shing bzhin du gnyid log par byed do// ji srid nyi mam 'char gyi bar du'o// bung
393a1(rgyud): med dam skyes pa yang rung ste dbang du byed par 'dod na phyogs gang na de'i khyim yod pa'i phyogs der kha bltas te mtshan mo stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas na rmi lam
393a2(rgyud): du mthong ba sbyin zhing nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// tshu la lan bdun bzlas pas mche ba can thams cad kyi mchu bcing bar byed do// gter bcing ba la yang seng ldeng gi phur pa la
393a3(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas gter gyi gnasu grwa bzhi gdab bo// gter bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas chu la gtor
393a4(rgyud): na gtum po rnams kyis nya 'joms par mi nus so// se pha li ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyi das shig mi snang bar byed do// rta'i spangs la lan bdun bzlas
393a5(rgyud): pas bdug pa sbyin par byed do// sbal ba 'joms so// / me tog gam 'bras bus kyang rung ste lan bdun bzlas pas sbrang bu 'jom so// dbang du byed pa la rgyal
393a6(rgyud): po'i sgor so shing za ba la so shing sbyin pa dang / 'bras bu sbyin pa dang / dri sbyin pa'o// sa gzhi bcing ba dang / chom rkun bcing ba dang / mche ba can thams cad rengs pa dang / 
393a7(rgyud): gtan pa gcod pa dang / me rengs pa dang / dug 'dren pa dang / dug 'pho ba dang / dug bcings pa dang / 'byung po dbang du byed pa dang / 'kha' 'gro ma'i gdon las dgrol ba
393a8(rgyud): dang rims mngag pa dang / bdag nyid srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / ro langs spong bar byed pa dang / drug tu 'jug par byed pa dang / mtshams bcing ba rnams la yang
393b1(rgyud): bzlas pa tsam gyiso// mi snang bar 'dod pas shing sha tI be ri'i rtsa ba la stong mngon par bsngags pa byas nas lag pas chings shig mi snang bar 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi spyan sngar bzlas
393b2(rgyud): pa byas nas phyi nas me tog brgyad pa dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa blangs te/ zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin bsreg bya'o// ji srid rtsa ba'i rin gyi tshad du byas pas
393b3(rgyud): brgya 'gyur gyi rin rnyed do// de nas zla ba gzas bzung ba na byang chub shong gi 'og tu dri dang me tog dang / bdug pas mchod pa byas nas ldong ros srang gcig blangs te/ a shwat+tha'i
393b4(rgyud): 'dab ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag nas lus rnam par bya/ tsam nas bzhag par bya ste skad cig de nyid la de ste ste rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
393b5(rgyud): thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// lha'i rna ba dang yod ltar mgyogs pa dang nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mang du 'dod par
393b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa brgya phrag gis yongasu bskor bar 'gyur ro// gi be sgrub par 'dod pas 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing 'bum bzlas par bya'o// zla ba gzas bzung ba na lo
393b7(rgyud): ma bdun pa'i 'dab ma'i steng du phyin nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gi baM rnam par dor nas ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas bsgrub par bya'o// ji srid 'bar bar gyur paro// 
393b8(rgyud): thig le byas na rgyan gyis rgyan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro// lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// mig sman grub par 'dod pas/ so so ba'i ram na srang gcig
394a1(rgyud): blangs nas mes gdungs bzang por byas nas mig sman gyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ zla ba gzas bzung ba na chur rab tu zhugs nas ji srid grul bum du gyur pa de/ 
394a2(rgyud): srid du bzlas par bya'o// skad cig la bcag pa tsam gyis gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa rna rgyan dang cod pan 'chang ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa
394a3(rgyud): rnams kyis mi gnod par 'gyur zhing 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar byed do// lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do// pad+ma 'am u da pa la 'bum sbyin bsreg bya'o// gser stong so sor
394a4(rgyud): rnyed do// pa lA sha'i yam shing 'bum sbyin bsreg dbya'o// gser stong rnyed do// mtshan mo gsum du smyung ba dar gnas pas 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing bsgrub par bya ste/ 
394a5(rgyud): rgyal po dbang du byed do// 'o ma can gyi shong gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas nyi ma bdun du yungs ka8dkar po la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa
394a6(rgyud): ma bdun nam/ bdun gnyis thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig/ lhag par rtogs pa dbang du'ong // rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed pa la arga'i shing gos me rab tu sbar
394a7(rgyud): nas nyi ma bdun du yungs kar rgyal po'i sbyin sreg byas nas dbang du 'gyur ro// rigs bzhi dbang du byed pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar nyi ma bdun du thun gsum du til nag po dang zho dang spang
394a8(rgyud): rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di nyid kyis til gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ sems can thams cad
394b1(rgyud): dbang du byed do// arga'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig gser srang brgya rnyed do// shing pi nA ka'i sbyin sreg gyis shig skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// tam+b+ha la'i phye ma
394b2(rgyud): 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shog cod pan bcings par 'gyur ro// phyag g.yas pas mig nad sel bar byed do// rims kyis btab pa la ku shas phyags paso// gzhon nu mes bkal
394b3(rgyud): ba'i srad bu la brgyad brgya bzlas te chings shig skal pa bzang por 'gyur ro// arga'i shing gos mo rab tu sbar nas tol stong phrag brgya ston sreg gyis shig/ gza' ba mi zad pa
394b4(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bru thams cad gnas gcig tu byas nas stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'bru thams cad mi zad par 'gyuraro// shing waT 'ching ba can gyi
394b5(rgyud): sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rdzus zad mi shes par 'gyur// sbrang rtsi can gyi shing stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis ni ga/ nor skye bar 'gyu ro// ldong ros dang pa bla dang / cu gang
394b6(rgyud): gcig tu byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags par bya ste byang chub shing gi 'dab mar bzhag nas zlos shig/ de nas nges gi waM grub par 'gyu ro// bung
394b7(rgyud): med dam skyes pa gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// 'bras yos kyi bsregs blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig ji srid nyi ma bdun gyi bar du'o// bgegs med par 'gyuraro// 
394b8(rgyud): ras ris kyi spyan sngar dong ka'i me tog 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rnam par btags pa'i gos bye ba bcu gnyis rnyed do// zan dang zho lhan cig sbyin sreg gyis shig/ ji srid 'tsho'i
395a1(rgyud): bar du bza' ba ma tshang ba med pa nyid du 'gyur ro// mar gyi bsregs thugs stong drag sbyin sreg gyis shig/ grong rnyed do// bye ba bzlas pas 'khor brgya dang bcas pa'i
395a2(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bu med dam skyes pa dbang du byed par 'dod pas gu gul gyi rol bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas nas sbyin bsreg bya ste ming smos pa de dbang
395a3(rgyud): du 'gyur ro// shu dag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas nas khar bcug na smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// lam du 'bum zlos shig bza' ba dang btung ba zhim po gang blangs pa/ 
395a4(rgyud): rnyed do// 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shog/ dpal dang ldan dpar 'gyur ro// til dang 'bras thug po che rnams mA sha dang lhan cig stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 
395a5(rgyud): gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed do// sin+na bA ra'i me rab tu sbar nas brtsos pa thams cad kyi phud kyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ ji ltar grub pa dang / bza' bzang mi shes
395a6(rgyud): par 'gyu ro// gang 'dod pa'i cod pan bcings pa rnyed do// nim+b+ha'i me tog 'bum gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// ma nyams pa'i 'bras sA li dang thug
395a7(rgyud): po che rnams sbyin sreg gyis shog/ grong rnyed do// mya ngan med pa'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas lha'i bsreg blugs 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig/ bu mo gang don du gnyer ba de so sor rnyed do// 
395a8(rgyud): ras ris kyi spyan sngar a ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs te 'bum bzlas so// de nas yul de'i rgyal po bka' bsgo ba byed par 'gyu ro// slongs mo za ba'am tsa ru za bas gso sbyong can gyis
395b1(rgyud): 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya ste sa'i rgyal srid so sor rnyed do// 'o ma dang nas zan za bar gyur pas 'bum phrag brgyad bzlas te pad+ma dkar po 'bum dbul bar bya'o// kun nas rgyal
395b2(rgyud): srid so sor rnyed do// dur b+ha dang byi ru stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg byas na tshe ring por 'gyu ro// yungs kar dkar po stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig nad las grolo// 'o ma'i
395b3(rgyud): snod kyis a ma'i 'dab ma stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// pri yang ku'i snying po tshad gang yin pa 'bum sbyin sreg byed pa tshad do'i
395b4(rgyud): dong tshe rnyed do// 'o ma'i bsregs blugs stong phrag ba rgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nad grolo// bza' ba dadon du gnyer na bza' ba'i sbyin srog gyis shig/ ri'i rtse
395b5(rgyud): mor 'dzegs te slongs mo za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o// mthar mtshan mo gsum du myu nga bar gnas pas a shwat+tha'i shing gi me rab tu sbar nas
395b6(rgyud): til la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i mtshan thog thag tu sbyin sreg gyis shog/ rgyal por 'gyu ro// til dang mar gyi sbyin sreg gos thams cad sgrub par byed do// sbra
395b7(rgyud): rtsis sbyin sreg gyis shig skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gzi brjid dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig zhi bar 'gyu ro// 
395b8(rgyud): zho'i sbyin sreg gyis shig rgyas par 'gyur ro// ri'i rtse mor rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po can gyis mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten bzhugs nas pad+ma
396a1(rgyud): / stong phrag brgya phul cig/ rgyal po 'am/ yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// las rnams grub par ma gyur na yul gru brgya rnyed do// rgyal po dbang du byed pa dang / kun nas
396a2(rgyud): 'jug par byed pa la zla ba gzas bzung ba na pa ser skya'i mar zangs kyi snod du 'jog tu bcug nas zangs kyi thur ma le ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur gyi bar de srid du bzlas par
396a3(rgyud): bya'o// lbu ba 'byung bzhin pa la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'bar bas na mkha' la 'gro'o// sngon spyad pa byas pas dkar
396a4(rgyud): po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du me tog phur ma dang bla re yongasu bre ba byas nas dri zhi dam po'i dris mtho gang gi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor byas nas/ 
396a5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dri dang / me tog gi mchod pa bya sa nas gtor ma dbul zhing mar gyi mar me stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o// de nas zla ba nya la skyil
396a6(rgyud): mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste/ ji srid gang du baM g+h+ra sta ni ta zhes pa'i sgra thos pa de srad du bzlas par bya'o// de nas myur du mtshan ma skye bar 'gyur te/ me tog gi chun po g.yo
396a7(rgyud): ba dang / mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang / 'od zer 'byung ba dang / ras ris 'gul pa ste/ 'di rnams mthong nas gang sgrub par byed pa de 'grub te sdig pa zad par yang 'gyuraro// 
396a8(rgyud): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dbang du byed par 'dod pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo bdun
396b1(rgyud): tu thun gsum du seng ldeng gi sol pas me rab tu sbar nas lan tshwa dang til dang yungs kar rnams zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shog/ dbang du/ 
396b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// chu dang / thal ba dang / yungs kar gang yang rung ba la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas phyogs bzhir thor cig dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas par 'gyu ro// 
396b3(rgyud): ras ris kyi spyan sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma phul nas mchod pa rgya chen po bya ste pad+ma 'dab ma'i gi wang bzhag nas skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug ste ji srid dngos grub rnam
396b4(rgyud): pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dri gzha ngan pa la sems can thams cad du byed pa dang lo stong du 'tshe bar byed do// dro bzhin pa la lo stong du 'tsho bar byed
396b5(rgyud): cing dpag ched stong phrag du 'gro zhing de nyid du 'ong bar bya/ da do// grub pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhing / yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang / yid kyis bza' ba
396b6(rgyud): skyed par byed do// de nas 'bar bar byed pa ni nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog ltar snang ba/ lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa/ sga li zhing tshe bskal par gnas pa rig pa 'dzin pa brgya
396b7(rgyud): stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor nas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do// sngon spyad pa byas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar cho 'phrul gyi zla ba'i phyogs la dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos
396b8(rgyud): lan gsum brjes te thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzla so// ji sr-i zla ba nya'i bar du'o// mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung par gnas pas snam sbyar bsgrub par bya ste dri thams cad kyi
397a1(rgyud): rab tu byugs te mar me stong phrag brgyad sbar nas skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste dri rnams kyis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas/ de'i steng du snam sbyar bzhag
397a2(rgyud): ste lag pa g.yon pas gnan nas ji srid du 'phur bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'phral du shing ta la'i tshad du 'phur bar byed cing gnas pa tshad 'di nyid kho nas sangs
397a3(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas blang bar bya'o// blangs pa tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyu ro// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / na mkha' lding dang / 
397a4(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mdun du bdar nas phyag bya das par 'gyur zhing ci bgyir yang 'gyu ro// rtag tu snam sbyar la yongasu bzlas par byed pa ni de'i tshe sems bskyed
397a5(rgyud): pas gdugs pa'i sems de las lhung bar byed do// yid kyis slar yongasu bzlas pas ldang bar byed do// mar sar las byung ba'i nor bu byas nas a shwat+tha'i 'ad
397a6(rgyud): ma bzhi la bzhag ste/ ji srid dro bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sos ma reg par zo cig zos pa tsam gyis gang sems par byed pa de thams cad skye bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa
397a7(rgyud): mang po dang / skyes bu bcu'i stobs dang / lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do// sngon spyad pa byas pas zla ba nya la ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ring
397a8(rgyud): bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas ku sha las byung ba'i ral gril sa shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun la bzhag nas khu tshur gyi mdzub mos
397b1(rgyud): blangs nas ji srid du 'phro bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de blangs pas na mkha' la 'gro bar byed do// sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par 'gyu ro// thal bas me'i
397b2(rgyud): ba'o// chus sam gseg mas phyogs bcing ba'o// rang bzhin can gyi mig sngun blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas mig la bsku bar bya ste/ skye ba thams cad dga' bar
397b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mig sman dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / shu dag dang / pad+ma'i ge sar dang / gi baM dang / nag ge sar dang / gla rtsil stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pas kun byugs
397b4(rgyud): shig thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// lan tshwal lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mngon par bsngags pas gang gi khyi/ dam du mngon par phyogs pas 'thor bar byed na nyi ma bdun
397b5(rgyud): gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro// khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas na gang gis khrus dang / 'thung ba ra byed pa de dbang du 'gyu ro// bdag gis mthong ba la nyi shu rtsa
397b6(rgyud): gcig bzlas pas ji sring mthong ba de dbang du byed do// gu gul gyi sbyin sreg 'bum gyis rgyal rigs so sor rnyed do// ud pa la dang / kun mu da dang / pun da rI ka la sogs pa rnams 'bul
397b7(rgyud): bar byed bzhin pas ni gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed do// zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mtshan cig par mchod pa byas nas lus kyi g.ya su tsan dan dmar
397b8(rgyud): pos dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas lag pa g.yas pas dkyil 'khor mnan nas 'bod bzhin pa'am ji srid dkyil 'khor sa nag por skyes pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// lag
398a1(rgyud): pa grub par 'gyur ro// khu tshur bcings pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gtsug pud sgrub pa la dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas ji srid mtshamasu gyur pa de srid du
398a2(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// de nas gtsug pud la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba ni ji ltar bsod snyoms ster ba pas mthong ba de'i tshe grub par 'gyur ro// 
398a3(rgyud): nyi ma dang po la slongs mo gcig go/ de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du'o// bsod nams dang mi ldan pas kyang 'grub par byed do// zla ba gzas bzung ba na 'o ma la yongasu bzlas nas
398a4(rgyud): 'thungs shig bcud kyi len chen por 'gyur ro// ba shadaka'i yam shing gi bsregs blugs brgyas gang 'di dad pa de dbang du byed do// ral gri la brgyad brgyar mngon
398a5(rgyud): bar bsngags te/ phug gam/ lha'i khyim gyi sgo ru ba/ zhag par bya'o// sgo glegs lugs la mngon par 'dud pas sgo dbye bar byed do// lan cig bzlas pas
398a6(rgyud): bdag nyid srung bar byed do// 'o ma'i bsreg blugs kyis bu med dbang du 'gyur ro// yid kyis grub pa'i gsang sngags rnams rengs par byed do// gsang sngags thams cad phye
398a7(rgyud): bar byed do// lha ma yon gyi bu mo dbang du byed do// dri thams cad kyi bsregs blugs rgyal rigs kyi bud med dbang du 'gyur ro// lha de dri med kyi sbyin sreg gi brtul zhugs pa dang
398a8(rgyud): rab tu byung ba dbang du 'gyur ro// snying kha dang / lag pa brgyar bzhugs nas zlos shig/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad 'gugs par bye'o// mgo
398b1(rgyud): la lag pa bzhag nas brgyad brgyar zlos shig/ sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa dang / sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed do// bil ba la yongasu bzlas nas byin na sems can thams ca
398b2(rgyud): 'gugs par byed do// lha'i lus kyi g.yasu dpag tu med pa bzlas par bya'o// bud med dang skyes pa dang / khye'u dang rgan po yang dbang du 'gyur/ thal ba la lan bdun mngon par
398b3(rgyud): bsngags pas go char bya'o// sems can thams cad kyis mi phyed do// chu la brgyad brgyar bzlas pas yan lag rnams la sbyin du chug gcig nang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur// nyin mtshan
398b4(rgyud): du myang bar gnas pas seng ldeng la ral gri byas nas nag po'i bcu bzhi la blangs nas dur khrod du ji sring da'abar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// blangs pa des
398b5(rgyud): thogs pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ral gri'i rig/ pa 'dzin pa sgra li zhing 'khyil ba che bskal par gas pa rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mang du 'dod par
398b6(rgyud): 'gyu ro// yang na nyi ma dang zla ba gzas bzung ba na sngon spyad pas byas pas tho rangs langs nas ras ris la mchod pa byas te slongs mo'i zas za zhing yon dang bcas pas dngos grub
398b7(rgyud): rtsal bar bya'o// de nas ngag gi las rab tu 'grub par 'gyur te dur ba dang byi ru la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btag pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'ching ba rnam
398b8(rgyud): grol bar byed do// bdag nyid mchog tu byed pa la gi bang la stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas dpral bar thig le byas te rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin na mchog tu bsngags par 'gyuro// blangs
399a1(rgyud): pa dang brjod pa yang ngo // bu mo dbang du byed pa la sna ma'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ bu mo rnyed do// 'di nyid kyis rnam par rgyas pa'i bud med rnyed do// rims
399a2(rgyud): thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / phyag rgya thams cad kyang ngag des byin pas grol bar byed do// dug thams cad gso bar byed do// gdon las thar bar byed do// ngag nyid kyis
399a3(rgyud): las rnams ni glang po bzlog par byed do// tsher ma bzlog par byed do// chom rkun dang dmag sde rengs par byed pa dang / mtshon cha rengs par byed pa dang / shing rta rengs par byed pa dang / me rengs
