424a3(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong du ma byung ste 'od zer de rnams kyis gang ga'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang bar byas par gyur to// dmyal ba pa'i sems can tha~Md kyang
424a4(rgyud): skad cig de dang / yud tsam de la sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar gyur to// gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rnamasu bcom lda na 'das de rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
424a5(rgyud): dbang phyug la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ leg so lag/ so// sems dpa' chen po chen po smros shig/ mthu chen po sems can sdig pa can thad dkyil 'khor du dbang
424a6(rgyud): bskur ba smros shig/ gang gis de lta bu de rnams phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa rnamasu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongasu
424a7(rgyud): bskor ba dang / lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' spun ras gzigs dbang phyug la legaso zhes bya ba gnang ba dang / sa chen po ri dang / nags dang / phug tu bcas pa 'di rab tu g.yes// 
424a8(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol
424b1(rgyud): ma'i sngags bshang bar brtsamaso// dang por re shig bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpo na dam tshig mthong bas slob dpon dang mtshungs pa'i rjesu gnang ba thob cing dang pas
424b2(rgyud): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa sems can rnams kyi stobs dang / stobs ma yin pa shes pa/ ser sna med cing g.yo sgyu med pas nag po ni nga mi sbom/ hacang mi phra ba dri ngan pa med
424b3(rgyud): bas dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa/ mdzes pa/ snying stobs dang ldan pas sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / 
424b4(rgyud): snying rje dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa/ sems can gyi dge dngas pa dang / bsam pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dang ba/ cha mang
424b5(rgyud): po mngon par shes pa/ gsal zhing gsal bar smra ba/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la bya ba/ rigs gsu ma gang yang rung ba'i rig pa la sogs pas sngon du bsnyen pa
424b6(rgyud): byas pa/ phyag dang dkyil 'khor gyi rab tu sbyor ba shes pa/ mchod rten gyi las byas pa/ ha cang mi rgan byis pa dang / rigs dma' bar skyes pa ma yin pa/ gnon zhing lang 'tshe dang ldan
424b7(rgyud): pa dang / tshul bzang po'i sgrub pa pos gsong ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// zheso// de nas 'di lta bu'i slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga brtsam par bya/ 
424b8(rgyud): ste/ nus mang 'dul nyes mi yin pa// dkyil 'khor yang dag rab sbyar bya// rmongs pa'i sems dang chags can la// dkyil 'khor bstan par yang mi bya// gang zhig bslab la yud tsam pa
425a1(rgyud): lhag par grol ba'i lus can des// mtho ris thar pa yang dag 'grub// yid kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni rjes zhig pa'i
425a2(rgyud): dngos grub dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur// byang chub rtsa bar rig thob pa'i// sems de las ni yang dag brtsam// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ 
425a3(rgyud): rab tu ngang ba'i sems can rnams// bdag nyid kho nar rab rtogs bya// de la bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor bri// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis// stobs kyis sngon 'dul mi
425a4(rgyud): lus cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la// grong dang grong khyer grol rdal dang // ljongs rnamasu ni byang shar gyi// phyogs kyi cha ru mchod yon byin// sa yi mthil du de ji ltar// sa phyogs
425a5(rgyud): sngags la sngags 'gyur ba// snum zhing ljon shing me tog bza nga // 'bras bus yang dag mang po can// rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa'i phyogs// dkar dang ser ba'i sa gzhi
425a6(rgyud): la gyo mo 'ong ba gseg ma bral// rnga bo che yi sgra dbyangs dang // lam gyi bzhi mdo dur khrod dang // lha gzhan yongasu bzung ba dang // shis cing sdug bsngal rdzogs spangs la// gang du kun
425a7(rgyud): nas rgyang grags lnga'i// tsha du chu klung steng ka dang // mtsho phran chu bo rab 'bab pa// ljon shing mchod rten lha khang dang // me tog nyid ni dus rgyun tu// shani tu rgya chen yang dag ldan// cho 'phrul
425a8(rgyud): phyogs ni gang rung la// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma yi// dkyil 'khor slob dpon sa phyogs der// nyi ma gung la song nas ni// ral pa gcig ma'i snying po yi// mngon par mdzes pa'i wa

430b1(rgyud): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis rgyan pa dang por bris shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi gzhogs gnyi su phye ma ser po dang pad+ma ge sar phan tshun bsres pas gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnams kun

430b6(rgyud): phung po dang / 'jig rten gsum pa'i phung po dang / mtha' yas phung po dang / bsod nams phung po dang / lha'i phung po zhes pa 'di rnams g.yas kyi gzhog su nye bar bzhugs pa'o// g.yon du 'di lta ste

430b8(rgyud): ba dang / 'od zer dang / 'od zer chen po dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od zer dang / bkod pa'i 'od zer dang / dkar ngo'i 'od zer dang / pad+ma'i 'od zer dang / bkod pa'i gtsug tor dang / bdud bzhi'i rnam par

436a8(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mtshungs pa skad cig de la bde ba dang ldan pa dang jisri du 'phur bar bye'o// sems can thang dbang du 'gyur zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyu ro zheso// de nas sgrub
436b1(rgyud): pa gzhan dang las chen po thams cad 'byung ste 'bum bzlas pas las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyu ro// 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig
436b2(rgyud): pa thams cad lhag ma med par zad par 'gyuraro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas bsod nams thad mngon du 'gyuro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi dngos grub thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs
436b3(rgyud): pa lags pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa lngas bzlas pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mngon du 'gyuraro// de nas phyag rgya chen po ni mchod rten stong phrag
436b4(rgyud): brgya byas nas mthar cho gas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams// cang byon nas snying khar rab tu 'jug par byed// de nas byang
436b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' so so rnyeng // de nas zhal du rab tu 'jugapar byed// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug so sor rnying // ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad du 'gyur ro/ 
436b6(rgyud): thog mar brjod pas gzhan gyi grong dang grong khyer srung ba dang / mdzes par spyad pas thams cad bya'o// 'bebs pa la tsan dan gyi gdug pas gdon 'beb so// shI ri ShA'i me tog gis sam
436b7(rgyud): can dbang du byed// dri bzang po'i me tog gis sems can thams cad rengs par byedado// sa dkar pos bud medo// dri zhim po'i me tog gis chom rkun rengs pa'o// yungs kar dkar po'i
436b8(rgyud): sbyin sreg gis ringags dang bya reng so// yungs dkar dkar po gtor bas mig 'phrul ston par bye'o// rma bya'i nu mas rmi lam ston par byed// dus gsum du bzlas pas rmi lam ngan pa
437a1(rgyud): 'joms par byed// til gyi sbyin sreg gis sems can thang nges par bye'o// bya gag gi bshog pa'i sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du byed// rnal
437a2(rgyud): po 'khyil pa'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gis 'dod pa thams cad dbang du byed// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas mtshan mo brgyad
437a3(rgyud): smyung bar gnas pas bzlas pa bya'o// de nas 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchog dbang du byed pa la bud med kyi dbang bo spu'i sbyin sreg giso// bu mo
437a4(rgyud): dbang du byed pa la yang // don gzhan la yang sbyin sreg dang bcas pas spyan ras gzigs dbang gi mdun du nyi ma re rer dus gsum du bzlas pa bya'o// ral pa gyen brjes
437a5(rgyud): kyi rgyud phyi mar las chen po thams cad kyi rgyu 'phrulo// de nas sems dpa' chen po de ting 'dzin de nyid sgom pa zhin du khro'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i mnyam par 'dzin
437a6(rgyud): pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungaso// khru lnga pa dang sgo bzhi dang / sgo khyud rta babs nges gnas pa// phyi rol pad+ma'i rnam par bya// de nas kun nas grwa rnam su 'ang // de ni legs
437a7(rgyud): par bsams byas nas// nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// sngar brjod snying po 'di yis ni// zlos bzhin 'di ni srung ba dang // dkar po dmar po ser po dang // nag po ljang ku tshon sna lnga'i
437a8(rgyud): phye ma 'jam po rnams kyis ni// sgrol ma'i rig pas mngon bsngags pas// bsgrub bya bcom ldan 'das ni bya// khro bo'i rgyal po mdun du ste// g.yon du ral pa gcig ma bya// g.ya su
437b1(rgyud): 'dam skyes phyi rol gyi// sgo khyud snying por ji rigs grub// yongasu 'dod pas rdo rigs bya// dri yi phye mas yongasu byang / khu tshur stobs po che// gang du 'jig rten gsum cho ga/ rdo rje
437b2(rgyud): 'chang chen 'dod pa yis// 'das pas rnam par thami par 'gyur// khu tshur rdo rje khu tshur bcas// de ni g.yas kyi sgo khang du// stobs po che ni rab bzhag nas// nya yis mgrin
437b3(rgyud): par stobs po che// nub phyogasu ni bya ba'o// g.yas kyi phyi yi sgo khang du// de bzhin dbang phyug chen po bya// de la mdung gi phyag rgya dgod// ji 'dra'i u ma bri bar bya// lho yi grwa
437b4(rgyud): gnyisu bya ba// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o// nub dang byang gi grA rnamasu// log 'dren phyag rgya rdo rje'o// byang gi grwa gnyis rnamasu ni// mkhas pas rig rig spyan pa bya// shar
437b5(rgyud): gyi grwa cig rnams ni// ma mo tshogs kyi phyag rgya dgod// b+h+r-i gi ri Ti log 'dren bcas// de nas ji ltar 'byor/ pa yis// tshogs ji bzhin lha rnams mchod// khro bo stobs/ 
437b6(rgyud): chen sgrol mas non// bzlas pas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// ka re bI ra ta la ni// blangs nas rang gnas smyung gnas pas// mkhas pas byang gi sgo khang du// gtsang ma gang du rab 'jug
437b7(rgyud): bya/ blo dang ldan pas spyan drang bya// khro bo'i rgyal pos thad nas// ji ltar rig pa'i cho ga yis// tshar btso rje su 'dzin pa'i mchog/ gdon dang lus kyi las rnams ni// de nyid du ni nges
437b8(rgyud): par bya/ tshar bcad dam tshig bde ba 'dri// gdon 'pho byed dang za byed dang // gang zhig la la gsod pa dang // de bzhin sgrib pa sbyang ba dang // sems can rnams ni thad nyid// bsgrub thabs
438a1(rgyud): bya dang 'khrul 'khor ni// ji 'dra ba yis bya ba dang // mkhas pas las ni stong dag dang // gdon rnams bod par byed pa dang // rang gi rigs dang gzhan rigs
438a2(rgyud): kyis phyag rgya nye bar mtshon par bya// 'di yi dkyil 'khor thad nas// 'byung po'i tshogs la sogs pa kun// de nas gtor ma bdug pa sogs// rgyas pas mngon par mchod byar gyis
438a3(rgyud): de yis gdon mthong de mchod bya// phyis kyi dbang las dul ba thob// skye bos btung ba sprin sreg la// sogs pa rnam par gzhom par bya// shi Sha lAn can blangs nas// gdon thob pa
438a4(rgyud): ni 'pho bar bya// srin po rnams kyis byin pa'i 'chu// mtho dra ba de 'dra'i mtshon rnams dang // sha za rnams la ri bo nga can// mig mi 'dzum par 'dzag pa yi// 'jigs pa mthu
438a5(rgyud): na sna tshogs pa// kun tu rnam par lta bar byed// skem byed/ gdon gyi rnam 'gyur gang // nus dang dpung pa brten/ pa yi// dgra bo rnams ni thams cad du// lha dang mtshon cha'i
438a6(rgyud): bya ba ni// pad+ma byed dang ral pa dang // dbyug gu bgrang phreng 'jigs pa'i gnas// ril ba spyi blugs mi thub nyid// phyag rgya bram ze can zhes bshad// rtse gsum kun dang zla phyed dang // ral pa
438a7(rgyud): mig la sogs pa dang // khyu mchog sgra dang drag po dang // dbang ldan rnams te bdun du grags// shik+ta gdengs ka ba dan dang // khyim bya de bzhin rma bya'i mjug/ phyag rgya gzhon ma can bshad
438a8(rgyud): 'khor lo dung dang be con nyid// ral gri phub nyid na mkha'i lding // mag nyid phyag rgya khyab 'jug bshad// che ba sprin ni lha chen po'i// bum pa gtun shing de bzhin du// ngang pa'ang g.yon gzhogs
438b1(rgyud): phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya la hi ri dkar bshad// nam gru rnams dang gtor zan dang // rgan po gtum po mthong ba ni// nam gru dkar po rnams kyi rgya// rang gi gzugs nyid mthong ba ni// mdangs 'phrog
438b2(rgyud): rnams kyi'o lhung bzed dam// gdegs par byed pa grol ba'o// de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste// byed pa thams cad dge ba la// shing cig gam ni dur khrod dam// khang sto/ 
438b3(rgyud): gtsang ma cha sgo med pa'i sa gzhi mthong nas sgrub pa po khros pas sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te re kha gsum der bya'o// kun nas khru bzhi pa la dang por
438b4(rgyud): thal ba'i re kha'o// gnyis pa ri'i btsag gi'o// gsum pa dasol ba'i phye mas rab tu 'bad pas bri bar bya'o// byang ngam nub tu yang sgo cig bye du bzhug go// sgo'i dbusu
438b5(rgyud): yang lha chen po lag na mdung thogs pa bya'o// snum bu'i nang du sangs rgyas bden par rma du byung ba'i bdag nyid can bya'o// sangs rgyas g.yas kyi gzhog su sgrol mas non/ 
438b6(rgyud): parnam par dgod par bya'o// g.yon tu dpa' mo chen mo stobs mo chem ral pa cig ma bzhag nas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku rgyab tu dgod par bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / 
438b7(rgyud): de bzhin du 'jog po dang / dpa' bo chen po stobs kyi rgyu yang dgod par bya'o// de bzhin du pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / dung skyong dang / rigs ldan stobs po che'i nang du mngon par brjod pa'o// 
438b8(rgyud): lhang rnams ni 'khor dang bcas pa snam bu gang bar dgod par bya'o// 'di zad nas ma mo'i tshogs rnam par med par bya ste dpa' ldan ma ni rnam bu'o// sgo ru spre'u dang / rA dang / bum rnam yang sgo'i spyan
439a1(rgyud): pa ra ba yi yango // nag po'i brgyad pa la lha rnams lto 'phye chen po las ma 'das pa yang dag par mchod/ stong phrag bzlas par bya'o// shes rab can// 
439a2(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po grub par 'gyur ro// rims dang gdon thams cad las 'byin pa dang / rtsod pa yang rnam par 'joms par bya'o// rang gnasu 'jug// de nas gsang sngags 'di yang
439a3(rgyud): rtag tu bzlas pa'i gu gul gyi chu'am ku shas gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can dang / mngon par mdzes pa can nyid spyad pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rab tu byas par grub ste/ 
439a4(rgyud): thams cad 'joms pa sgrol mas non pa gang yin pa de ni gas/ rang ba'i sgrub thabs kyi dkyil 'khor/ de nas yang byangachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom
439a5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'a dedi skad ces gsol to// bdag gis mngon par shes pa ste de
439a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la mngon sum du thos pa de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i snying po ral pa gyen brjes kyi rgyud phyi mar
439a7(rgyud): sems can gyi don gyi phyir dang sgrol ma'i mthu bstan pa'i phyir dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i snying rje bdag gi bshad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ byams pa smros shig/ 
439a8(rgyud): namaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ ma hA pu ru Sha bi Sha b+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ma hA s+sa ma prAp+na mai tre ya many+dzu shrI badz+ra pA Ni prab+h+r-i tI b+h+yo ma hA sa twe b+h+yaHde rnams la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das
439b1(rgyud): rapags baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi snying po 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa sems can thaMd kyis mi tshugs pa srid pa'i las rnam par 'joms par byed pa brjod pa/ 
439b2(rgyud): bgyi'o// sat+ya tha ngan he bo d+hi satwA/ ma hA sat+kA/ he ha le/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ pa ra ma mai tri tsit+ta hi ta tsit+ta kA ru Ni kA mAM/ ga ma bi ya ti/ ma hA bi ya ti/ dU du ru/ d+hu ru tsu len+tu
439b3(rgyud): bal na ma ste stu/ sar+b+ba satwA/ b+ha la dra ta/ ha ra ha rihiH ri bA ha na nA ba/ b+ha bA ma ba/ tu rud+ha ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ sun su ru/ supra shA si/ bA ma la mAn+ti/ Ar+ya a ba la~M Ni hr-i rA pa/ ze'adzin
439b4(rgyud): dzaT+Ta mu ku TA bi la mu t+pa la mA la/ ba la ma la ma la/ ka2dkal/ ma la/ ha la ha la~M/ hu~M lu hu lu/ ni nA dmahA bo d+hi sa twA na ma te ru/ ku ru ku ru/ hri nga la/ ma nus ra

439b6(rgyud): ba'i snying po ste/ nyi ma sa ser po rangs langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor byas te dri dang me tog la sogs pa mngon par bkram nas de nas lan bcu gsum brjod par bya'o// de nas
439b7(rgyud): nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar bye'o// zla ba drug kho nar byas pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yid kyi shing rta yongasu rdzogs par bye'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan
439b8(rgyud): ras gzigs dngang phyug gis smras pa/ gal te mtshams med pa byas pas kyang ma grub pa na de'i tsheng mtshams med pa byas pa dang / bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus par
440a1(rgyud): gyur cig zheso// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces
440a2(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes skyes pa bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtogs pa chen po'i rgyud phyi mar 'dzin pa tha~Md kyi rig pa sring mo bzhi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug bzhin pa/ sangs
440a3(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par gzigs par gyur pa/ rtog pa bzhir skyes pa/ thung ngu'i gzugs can/ na mkha' la 'gro ba/ sa 'og dang mi snang ba dang / ro langs dang / 'thab rtsod pa
440a4(rgyud): rkang pas rab tu bgrod pa dang / rgyas pa can dang / mngon sgro da can dang / dbang du byed pa dang / bskal pa bzang po de nyid rab tu sbyin pa po tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang
440a5(rgyud): phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa las bzlog pa/ rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid can gyis lhag pa'i cha khyim du skyes pa/ kun tu ston par byed pa/ sangs
440a6(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mkhyen pa'i mthu'i don gyis ched stong phrag pas kyang stong phrag brgya po des kyang lan cig gzhom pa tsam dang / dpe tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i yul
440a7(rgyud): 'jig rten du ma'i 'byung gnas rang bzhin du gnas pa la ltos nas ral pa gyen pardzes kyi rgyud phyi mar bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rje su sgrub pa 'di rnams gsungs pa
440a8(rgyud): ni bcom ldan 'das yid dbang du gyur pa dngos grub rab tu brtsol bar mdzad par gyur to// tad+ya thA/ na mo a me tA b+hai la/ nam Ar+ya.a pa lo ki ti shwa rA yA/ b+ho d+him tA ya/ oM dza ye sahA/ 
440b1(rgyud): ma zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ na mo a mi tA bA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ oM bi dza ya swA hA// rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'o// tad+ya thA/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki Nashwa
440b2(rgyud): / ya/ oM a dzi te swAhA// mi thub ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ oM a pa ra dzi te sA hA// gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'o// zhes pa de lta bu sring mo/ 
440b3(rgyud): bzhi'o// lA pa ming po ni/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ aR+She te/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ oM ki ni ki ni sarba ta thA ga tA ud+b+ha ba shAn+te/ ba ra de/ ut+ta ma ta thA ga tA ut+sAb
440b4(rgyud): hUM phaT swAhA// ming po gtum bu ru zhes pa'o// sngag das kyi rgyal po yongasu bsgrags// mdor na nga rgyal can rlom pa// phyi mi'i rgyud kyi las rnams ni// ji lta ji ltar rab
440b5(rgyud): sbyar ba// de lta de ltar sgrub par byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rang gi rdzu 'phrul yang dag par bstan par 'dod pas/ stan las langs nas bcom ldan
440b6(rgyud): 'ongs shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te rang gi rdo rje yang dag par bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te byang chub
440b7(rgyud): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smra so// byang chub sems dpa' bdag kyang rtog pa'i rgyal po rgyud phyi ma 'dir bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mthu kun
440b8(rgyud): tu bstan pa'i don du 'jig rten pa thad kyi mchod rten rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjesu spyod pa sbyin par bgyi'o// de la rje su yi rang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
441a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe mchog gi grub pa dang / mchog gi las byed pa tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams kyang khyad par du 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'phags ma
441a2(rgyud): sgrol ma'i rje su spyod pa pos gang rtul ba las byung ba 'di rnams rigs dang / pha rol gnon par byed pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
441a3(rgyud): dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso// phyag na rdo rje gsungs shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso// phyag na rdo rje snyoms
441a4(rgyud): par zhugs pa de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu snang bar byas// de nas phyag na rdo rjes phyag gi sor mo rab tu brkyang ste rdo rje rab tu 'jom
441a5(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje dmar po dang / rdo rje mthar phyin dang / rdo rje nag po ste g.yon pa'i phyag las byung ba 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gno nu'i spun rnams
441a6(rgyud): de nas de rnams bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
441a7(rgyud): gzho nu'i spun lnga po rnams la leg so zhes bka' stsal te/ sems can rnams bsod nams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / dngos grub sbyin par byed pa sgrol ma'i rtog par don chen po sbyin pa phyag
441a8(rgyud): na rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba pad+ma'i phyag la sa jus tu gyur pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor gsungs par gyur to// gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lngalda da // ji srid thu ni brgyad kyi bar
441b1(rgyud): nor 'dod pa yis khru cig ste// bu 'dod pa yis khru gnyis// dgra nyams byed pas khru gsum mo// bzlas pa nyid kyis khru bzhi'o// lnga pa dngos grub zang la// brgyad pa mkha' la
441b2(rgyud): 'gro ba yis// sa 'gadon dang 'bab chu dang // rgya mtsho dang ni dngos grub gnas// khyim du'ang rung ste gtsang ma yi// gzhan du g.yogs par byas pa dang // las la shis pa gang rung gis
441b3(rgyud): thig gis dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// gru bzhi pa la grwa bzhi pa// sgo bzhi rta babs rgyan gyis brgyan// dkyil 'khor cha gsum byas pa yis// steng gi cha ru bcom ldan 'das/ 
441b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas pad+ma'i gdan gnas pa// chos ston par ni// mdzad bzhin pa// g.yasu spyan ras gzigs dbang // phyug/ tshangs pa'i dbyug pa spyi blug phyag/ g.yon du'apha
441b5(rgyud): ba phrug rdo rje// rje'i phyag gam de gzhog su// khyab 'ju gdung dang 'khor lo ste// be can phyag na 'khor lo'o// dbus kyi cha ru grul zhol// gru yi sreg shing sgreng ba'o// dang
441b6(rgyud): por rdo rab 'joms dang // sgyu 'phrul dang ni tum bu ru// gnyis par rdo rje khu tshur dang // rgyal mar bcas pa'o gsum pa ru// lus dmar dang ni rnam rgyal bcas// bzhi par rdo rje bsags
441b7(rgyud): mtha' dang // mi thub mar bcas lnga pa ru// lho nag gzhan mi thub dang bcas// ljang ku dkar po dmar po dang // ser po nag po go rims bzhin// lha rnams dgod par byas nas ni// dkar po'i
441b8(rgyud): gos dang dkar po'i rgyan// be con rdo rje gtun shing dang // gzhu dang ral gri mtshon cha phyag/ dbusu zla nyi pad+ma la// lha rnams mngon sum dgod par bya// gru yi 'og tu me dang ni// chu yi gter ni gaH
442a1(rgyud): par byu/ dung dang nya dang chu srin gyis// rnam par rgyan pa'i shar dang lho// rlub dang byang du dbang po dang // gshin rje chu lnga lus ngan rnams// banon pa bcas/ 
442a2(rgyud): shing phyag brgyar bcas// legs par dkris pa'i bum pa ni// dri yi chu yis yongasu bkang // yal 'dab kyis ni nye bar mdzes// gru rnamasu ni dgod par bya// 'dir ni bum pa lnga pa ni
442a3(rgyud): rin chen gyis rgyan 'jam pa yi// gos kyis mgrin pa dkris pa dang // sa ha ka ril yal mdab kyis// kha ni dgab par byas pa dang // gdugs sgreng me tog phreng ba sbyangs// shar gyi sgo ru dgod par
442a4(rgyud): bya/ dkyil 'khor phyi ru rgya mtsho bzhi// dung dang pad+ma la sogs kyis// ri yi rtse mo yis kyang bya// rgyal mtshan rnams la khrugs bla re bres// in+d+ra nI la gser dang ni// dmu dang drang
442a5(rgyud): dang khrugs rnams kyi// phye mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// lha yi me tog bdug pas bdug/ rnam pa sna tshogs gtor mas mchod// dus kyis non pa'i me tog 'bras// byig
442a6(rgyud): gser sna tshogs rin chen dang // bza' ba phyi rol gcal du dgram// ri bo'i steng du rab 'jug bya// snying po phyi mas spyan drang sogs// las rnams kun dang gshig su gsol// de nas gang gis
442a7(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum// dad pas byang chub sems bskyed// bud med skyes pa gzho nu yi// bsnyen gnas byas pa gos kyis ni// gdong ni nye bar bcings pa yis// dam tshig gis kyang mnyan par gyis
442a8(rgyud): dbyigs dang gser gyi me tog gis// lag pa yis kyang dor bar bya// de ni gang du lhung gyur pa// de yi rigs 'gyur de nas ni// gdong phye lha rnams bstan par bya// sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyang
442b1(rgyud): gyur// yang na sbyin dang mtshan mo ru// dkyil 'khor de mnyes par 'gyur// de nas gzugs pa rnyan 'byung ste/ a shwat+tha dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang / yudum par ni ba can dang / tsu dang / tsam pa
442b2(rgyud): dang / na ga ge sar gyis rgyas pa can dang / bil ba dang / a riSh+Ta dang / ko Sha yis mngon spyod ca no// dbang du byed pa dang skal pa ngan pa rnams la bad kan mthar byed dang / shasma lI dang / dIr+b+ha
442b3(rgyud): bad+ha'o// smyo bar byed pa la tsan dan dang / mya ngan med pa'i shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / myos byed rnam so// skal pa bzang po nyid la as+thidat+ta las byung ba rnam so// las zad pa la gser las byung
442b4(rgyud): ba'o// rgyal srid 'dod pas ni dngul las byung ba'o// zang des ni skal ba bzang po'i che du'o// lugs las byung / ni mngon spyad cano// nyams par byed pa la tsam pa kadang
442b5(rgyud): nag ge sar dang / ba gu la dang / a ti muk+ta ka'o// nor 'dod pa yis ni sna ma dang / yu thaM ka dang / mal+li ka dang / myos byed dang / gser shing dang / mA li ka rnam so// skal/ 
442b6(rgyud): pa bzang po 'dod pas ni pad+ma dang / ku mu nga'o// zhi ba can la ut+pal dang / so'u gan+d+hi ka'o// rgyas pa can dang gzhan la yang dri bzang po can gyi me togo/ rgyas pa can gang la dris dman pa'i
442b7(rgyud): me tog go/ mngon spyod can dang nyams par byed pa la sogs pa la ni tsan ngan la sogs pa'i dri 'phrogs pa'o// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / skal ba bzang po nyid la de
442b8(rgyud): lta bu'i bdug pa lag pa sbyar nas snying po'i sngags 'di rnams kyi las bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+DA badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma shru tuR+ShA b+ha gi nI nI/ na mo de ba tum+bur
443a1(rgyud): sA g+hA ha ya/ dzan+ta ni/ dzam+b+hi ka ra ti a mi traM/ sA b+hi ni/ sU bi ka roH/ mi tra mo ha nI/ mo hI ka ro tra mi tra/ an+t+ra ni/ in+ti ka ro d+ha mi tr-i/ dza ye A ga ts+tsha badza ye A
443a2(rgyud): gats+tsha dzam+b+ha ni A gats+tshastam+b+ha ni A gats+tsha/ ba li ba li/ puSh+paM/ rU pa/ a pa hA ro/ pra ti grih+Na thA/ sa ma yA yu pA lA yA thA/ su Tu Tu su sma badz+ra b+hany+dza ni ya sAhA/ rig pa 'di ni stong phrag brgyad cu/ 
443a3(rgyud): rtsa bzhir 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / phug tu rab tu 'jug pa dang / gter 'pho bar byed pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa nyid dang / mig sman ldong ros sgrub pa dang / dbang du byed pa/ 
443a4(rgyud): dang / nyams par byed pa dang / gzhan rab tu 'joms pa dang /  rang gi yul so sor skyong ba dang / dug dang / pho nya dang /  nad 'go ba dang / mche ba rab bsnams la yang dag par gnas
443a5(rgyud): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor ba cing ba dang / khros pas rgyal po'i khab rab tu sgrub pa ste de lta bu la sogs pa'i las gzhan rnams kyang rang
443a6(rgyud): gi 'dod pas bsgrub par bya'o// sring mo bzhi'i snying po rdzogaso// // de nas slar yang dkyil 'khor gsungs pa/ khru bzhi pagru bzhi pa sgo
443a7(rgyud): bzhi pa/ kun nas rta babs kyis rgyan pa/ gshini rje dang chu lha dang / lus ngan rnams bzhon pa dang bcas mtshon cha dang bcas pa'i sgo skyong dang gsum byed du gzhug/ byang gi rab tu thob
443a8(rgyud): par bya ste cha gsum byas nas steng gi cha ru bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'o// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje yang phyag g.yon pas rdo rje dang g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ kun nas 'bru babri bar bya
443b1(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i g.yon du rdo rje lcags kyu lcags kyu lag na thogs pa gzhan du rdo rje lugs sgrog lugs sgrog lag na thogs pa/ thams cad kyang ri'i rtse mo la yang dag par
443b2(rgyud): gnas par bya'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs la brten pa'i lha chen po chung ma dang bcas pa/ khyu mchog dang bcas pa yang dag par dri'o// gzhan rnam pa gsum rim gyis mtshon cha dang / gnas
443b3(rgyud): dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// b+h+r-i gi re ti dang / nag po chen po rnamaso// nub tu mi sbyin dang / tum mi sbyin dang / tum bu ru dang / 'od srungs dang / sna tshogs bshes gnyen
443b4(rgyud): lag pa rnams ril ba spyi blugs dang chu snod phyag na bsnams pa'o// khron pa dang srog shing sgreng ba dang / ta ta stu bri'o/ nga // stod g.yogs ljang ku can lag na be con thogs pa cod
443b5(rgyud): pan gyis rgyan pa phyag na tog skyong ba bsnams pa/ rna ba la/ rgya skyegs kyis rgyan pa'o// rgyal ba dkar po phyag na rdo rje thogs pa/ stong g.yogs dang smad g.yogs cano// rnam
443b6(rgyud): par rgyal ba lus dmar po phyag na gtun shing thogs pa/ gos dmar po'i stod g.yogs can/ gser gyi kha dog can gyi gzhu phyag na bsnams pa'o// gzhan gyis mi thub pa na nag me gos
443b7(rgyud): khra bo'i stod g.yogs can/ gos nag po'i sham thabs can phyag na ral gri thogs pa gru la zhon pa'o// de nas zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / lha rnams dang / nang du pad+ma rab tu gtor ba bri bar bya'o// 
443b8(rgyud): byang gi sgo ru log 'dren chen po g.yas kyi gzhog su chu bo rab med khor yug tu rdo rje dang / dung dang / lang dang / dpal be'u rnams kyang kun tu bri'o// de ltar thams cad yang dag par bris te
444a1(rgyud): nas ji ltar 'byor pa'i gtor ma dang / thugs pa rnam pa lnga lnga dang / bza' ba rnam pa lnga dang / kuny+tsa mang po dang / bza' dkris pa'i bag ban dang / dza mU li kang/ 
444a2(rgyud): zho dang bur dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi ji ltar rigs pa dbul bar bya'o// chu'i bum pa bzhi ji ltar 'dod pa'i yal mngab kyis kha bkab pa dang / bum pa dri'i chu thams cad kyis yongasu bkang bas
444a3(rgyud): bon thams cad sman zad dang yal mang ba dang / gos kyis mgrin pa dkris pa/ dbyig dang / gser dang rin po che rnams dang / phal mngab kyis brgyan pa'i bum pa rnam pa lnga lnga rnams dang
444a4(rgyud): phyi ru rin po che rnams kyis mngon par bkram pa'o// de lta bu dal sogs pa'i bkra shis pa rnams byas byin bzlas pa dar bya'o// de nas sngon du slob ma rab tu gzhug par bya ste/ 'di
444a5(rgyud): las gzhan pa'i sngag su 'gyur ba ni// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nan/ shuN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA ya k+Sha se nA pa ta yai/ namats+tshatuR+Sha gi nI nAM ma ma dza yA ya/ mA he ti swAhA// sngags 'di rnam
444a6(rgyud): par brgyad kyis sems can thams cad dbang du byed// me tog dang / yungs kar dang / lan tshwa dang / chu dang thal bas dri med nyid sun 'byin pa'i tshe byad kyis kyang // na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam sh+tsaH
444a7(rgyud): badz+ra pA Na me/ ma hA ya k+Sha se nA pa tA le/ na mo bidza yA ya/ ha/ d+ha/ li/ kumA ra ni biny+tsa mu kher Te sha sma nAM// rig pa 'di 'bum bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur// de nas la
444a8(rgyud): byi gyi gnas lugs 'i 'apo'i shing blangs nas mtshan mo gsum du srung bar gnas por gyur nas ga du mchod rten ring ba sel dang bcas pa de sing nas bum pa bzhi pa thams cad pa
444b1(rgyud): dang yal mdab kyis kha brgyan pa bzhag par bya'o// de nas ku sha bting zhing bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor lugs gsum bcings pa'i phur bu 'am rkang pa g.yon pa lag pa g.yon pas mnan
444b2(rgyud): te dzi si du lag pa mi snang bar gyur pa de sri du bzlas par bya'o// lag pa btang bar yang mi bya'o// de nas phur bu de dgon par gangab par bya ste/ phur bu khyim du 'byung // cho ga 'di nyid
444b3(rgyud): kyis btab nas phur bu rkang pa g.yon pas yang dag par mnan nas dbang du gyis shig/ grong khyer 'jig pa'i lag pa btsi ra bas phyag rgya thams cad dang / dug byas pa rnams kyang 'jom
444b4(rgyud): par byeda'o/ skye bo'i nang du yang gdab par bya ste thams cad du 'gyu ro// gzhan la yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las rnam ngas byeda'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma shruN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA
444b5(rgyud): yak+Sha se nA pa ta ya/ na mash+tsa ta sr-i NAM/ b+ha gi nI nA/ na mastaM bu ru / sar+b+ba ba ha s+ya/ ma hA kaR+Sha s+ya/ pi tsi bi tsi/ a mu kA ya / b+haR+sha pra pa tAn+na swA hA// nag po'i brgyad pa'am nag po'i bcu
444b6(rgyud): bzhi pa la mtshan mo gsum du spyang bar gnas pas sngags 'di thod par khrag gis bri bar bya'o// stong phrag brgyad du mdo pa shes byas nas tshul dor bar bya'o// rnam pa thams cad pa'i ngag tu
444b7(rgyud): 'gyuro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma shUN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma shru ta sri NAM b+ha gi nI nA/ na mo dzam+b+ha ni/ tsA Tu tsATu/ tsAT tsA Tu swA hA// rig pa 'dis rgyal gyi zla ba la
444b8(rgyud): mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'og tu na le shaM gsum khar bcug ste/ stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// de nas ni le sho cig khrir rab tu bcug ste gang mig mi 'dzums par lta bar byed pa de dbang du/ 
445a1(rgyud): 'gyuraro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma shUn+da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma ha yak+Sha se NA pa ta ye/ nam sh+tsa ti sr-i NAM b+ha gi nI nA~M/ na ma stum+ba ru ma hA sAR+sha/ bA hA ya/ na mo dza ye bi dza ye a triH
445a2(rgyud): a pa ra dzi te swA hA// rig pa 'dis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas nag po'i brgyad pa'am nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas gos gtsang ma
445a3(rgyud): bgos nas mar me dang rgyal mtshan dang phreng ba lag pa phul te mchod pa rgya chen po byas te chu rang nyid kyis blangs nas zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste thun cig tu bzlas par bya'o// de 'thungs shing
445a4(rgyud): khrus byas nas cho ga de nyid kyis tho rangs dge 'dun gyis bstan da pa'i slongs mo zlo nA de lta bu brgyad zlos shig/ de nas/ phyogs bzhir rig pa'i gnas rnams kha ru rab tu 'jug par
445a5(rgyud): byed thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma shUN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ nam shru ta sraM t+yA b+ha gi ni nA/ tan+ti mi li mi li sAh+ma// rig pa
445a6(rgyud): 'dis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te lag pa g.yas pas khu tshur byas nas nyi ma bcu gsum du bzlas par bya'o// dug dang mche bas shi ba thams cad slong ba 'jug par byedado// khu chur
445a7(rgyud): gyis gdon rnams 'bebs par byed// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma shrutrA badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa tA ye/ na ma sh+tsa ta sr-i NAM b+ha gi nI nA/ na mastum+ba ru/ sar+b+ba ma hA ya/ su Tu su Tu baH
445a8(rgyud): pra b+hany+dza Ni ye swA hA// sngags 'dis pa byung gi dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa byas nas der bA sha ka'i yaM shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig/ nag po'i
445b1(rgyud): brgyad pa nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga pa'i bar du'o// gang 'dod pa de 'gugs par byeda'o// 'dis kyang khros pas rgyal po'i pho brang rab tu bsgrubs par bya ste kun tu rgyu rab tu zhug/ 
445b2(rgyud): nas de la sol bas mngon par bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// de nas khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya rab 'chang byed// dge ba'i/ 
445b3(rgyud): lag pa las kun la// las gang cung zad bya ba de// kun la lag pa g.yon sbyar bya// mthe bong can la bzung ba yi// phyag rgya lha yir yongasu bsgrags// bsdigs mdzub can
445b4(rgyud): ni gnod sbyin la// dri za la ni gung mo ste// 'byung pon dmas la ming med// klu la lag pa mthe'u chung // sri na po rnams la mthil du'o// dbyug pa'i phyag rgya yi dag
445b5(rgyud): rnams phyag rgya rnam pa brgyad du bshad// mthe bong rdo rje rab 'joms pa// bsngags mdzub rdo rje bu tshur te// gung mo rdo rje lus dmar la// mthe chung nag po'i yan
445b6(rgyud): lag can/ mthe bong tu mU ru zhes 'di// rang gi gzugs kyis rang rang la// phyag rgya lnga po rnam par dgod// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob bcom ldan
445b7(rgyud): 'das shAkya thub pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po can sems can tha~Md la phan par mdzad pa rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po ral gyen
445b8(rgyud): brjes kyi rgyud phyi mas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i tshe du ji ltar bya ba stan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
446a1(rgyud): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu leg so// des na gang rig pa 'dzin pa dkrus bzhin pa rig pa de rjesu dran par byas nas rigs med par khrus bya ba dang / rnam par dben
446a2(rgyud): pa'i phyogs ma yin par bzlog pa nyid de rnams ni lus rtsub pa dang / stobs chung bar 'gyu ro// gang lam du 'gro ba grong pa'i chos kyis gos pa rnams la yid kyis bzlas pa byed// rtag tu sems/ 
446a3(rgyud): g.yo ba dang / nang mang bar 'gyuraro// gang yang yang nas yang du rig pa thun mong du 'pho ba dang / gnas ma yin pa rnams la rab tu sbyong bar byed pa dang / sbyin sreg dang bral bas bzlas pa byed
446a4(rgyud): pa ni rtag tu don nyams pa dang / grogs nyams par yang 'gyur// gang zhig slar yang rig pa 'dzin pa rang gi rig pa la ba dernyas pa byed pa dang / lha la spyod par byed pa ni log par 'dren
446a5(rgyud): padang skrag par bye'o// rtag tu 'jig rten dga' bar mi 'gyuraro// rtag tu yongasu brnyas par 'gyuro// rtag tu yang rig pal dzin pas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang ra
446a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyis gsungs pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams me tog dang bdus spos las sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya bkur stir bya'o// dam tshig med pa dang srog gtsad
446a7(rgyud): par byed pa dang / sngags byed pa dang / dge slong ma sun 'byin par byed pa dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / tshul dang bral bas dge 'dun gyi rjes la yo su la spyod pa dang / 'bru'i chang dang / bcos
446a8(rgyud): pa'i chang la yong su 'gro ba dang / dge slong ma dge slong mi gsod par byed pa dang / zas la rkang pos rdzi bar byid pa dang / dam tshig med par thobs pas rdzi bar byed pa dang / 'thar bar byed pa dang / dam
446b1(rgyud): tshig med pa shi ba mthong nas 'gro bar mi byed pa dang / dam tshig med pa dang / dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la phyag rgya dang / sngags sbyin par byed pa dang / de la'ang dam tshig med par sman rkang pas
446b2(rgyud): rdzi bar byed pa dang / dam tshig las nyams par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha gzhan rnams la yang dri med nyid kyis 'gom par byed pa dang / dam tshig med
446b3(rgyud): par dung dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum kha gdengs dang / be con dang / mdung dang / rdo rje dang / phub dang / gzhu dang / gshol dang / gtun shing dang / mnga' dang / mdung thung ngam/ glang po che dang / 
446b4(rgyud): mchog dang / bong bu dang / phag dang / shar b+ha dang / seng ge dang / phyagag dang / rma bya dang / ma he dang / rnga mo dang / ngang pa dang / mi dang / lha'i bzhon pa dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs pa
446b5(rgyud): rnams kyang 'gom par byed pa dang / sna tshogs byed pa mthong nasarkang pas gnon par byed pa dang / rnam pa gzhan du lon/ par 'dren pa dang dngos grub ster bar mi bye // bza' ba'i
446b6(rgyud): cho ga yang 'dir til dang / sha dang / parA Ta dang / dzaM bu li ka dang / nya dang sU pa li ka mang po dang / til gyi thug pa dang lha bshes dang / dri med nyid bza' ba yang spang bar bya'o// lha'i dri med nyid gnon pad
446b7(rgyud): pad+ma gnon pa dang / chu la gnas pa dang ldan pa dang / ud pa la gnon pa dang / nags kyi bdag po gcod pa dang / rtsa ba 'byin par byed pa yang spang bar bya'o// rig pa rje su dran par byed pa nyid kyis rtag tu
446b8(rgyud): gos gtsang ma dgos pas bya ba thang la bstan pa nyid dang / gzhan rig pa'i cho ga thams cad la mchod par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis slar yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams
447a1(rgyud): la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po khyed rnams nyon cig bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rig pa'i yi ge rnams thabs dang bcas pas bde blag tu sgrub par byed
447a2(rgyud): pa sems can tha~Md la phan pa ral pa gyen brjes kyis rgyud phyi mar yid kyis grub pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ g+hA ni
447a3(rgyud): g+hu ni la la la sid+d+ha sid+d+ha/ pa rA kra ma swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA su ta swA hA// sar+b+be shru Ar+ya a ba lo ki te swA hA// 'di ni 'phags pa zla ba ma zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i nu mo ste wa
447a4(rgyud): thams cad byed pa'o// sgrub pa pos rtag tu gtsug dud bci rab dang / phyag rgya bcing ba yang bya'o// bgegs thang rnam dpar 'joms par byed pa'o// de la 'di ni tho rangs langs
447a5(rgyud): nas gtsang mar gyur pas dkyil 'khor byas nas me tog la sogs pa gtor te lnga brtson pas brkyang brgyar bzla sa par bya'o// mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par bye'o/ 
447a6(rgyud): yang na gang 'dod pa de dbang du byeda'o// de nas dkyil 'khor du N+ye tA dzi ka rab tu gtor nas gang 'dod pa de slong par byed par 'gyuraro// bklags pas grub pa gang yin pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs
447a7(rgyud): par bya bar 'gyuraro// yang 'dir rnam grangs kyi gtor 'dir de dag cig tu reg pa de dran par bye'o// de nas gshed byed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shing gi me rab tu sbar te dar chen
447a8(rgyud): pos bskor la ji ltar skyes pa'i khrag gis sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun pa la 'jigs pa'i nga ro can gyi gshed byed mtshan mo phyed nas lang bar bye'o// yang dag par bsngags pas ji/ 
447b1(rgyud): lhur brjod pa'i gnasu yang byin gyis brlabs pa sbyin par bya'o// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i byin gyis brlabs pas ji ltar bde bar mngon par bde bar byed// de nas gnas kha cigatu/ 
447b2(rgyud): mi rnams 'chi ba dang / gnas kha cig tu me 'bar bar mthong ba dang / gnas kha cig tu lugs sgrogs bcing ba mthong ngo // de ltar gshed byed rnam par rgyu bar byeda'o// de zhi ba'i don du
447b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pad+ma stong phrag brgya dbul bar bya'o// mchog tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// dgra rnams bskyed par byed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shing gi me rab tu
447b4(rgyud): sbar te yungs kar dkar po la te la nag po'i til mar gyis pa tags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'dabar bye'o// de nas rims kyis 'dzin par 'dod na dur
447b5(rgyud): khrod kyi me la dur khrod kyi thal ba stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg rgya sa shig/ rims chen po 'dzin// zhi ba'i don du chu la brgya rtsa bzlas te mgo bor sbyin par bya'o// rims la
447b6(rgyud): grolo// mgo bo zung rngus 'dzin par 'dod na pa byung gi gzugs brnyan la mi rus kyi phur bu la stong phrag brgyad bzlas la mgo bor phur bus gang po// mgo bo zug rngu chen pos 'dzin no// phur bu bton
447b7(rgyud): pas zhi bar 'gyu ro// dbang po la btab na ma ning du 'gyu ro// bton na tha ro// snying khar btab na gzer chen por 'gyu ro// gton na tha ro// seng ldeng gi phur bu sha dang khrag gis btags
447b8(rgyud): pa srang bus dkris pa la brgyad brgya bzlas pa mi rus kyi phur bu'i mgo bor gdab par bya'o// dgra'i sgor btab na tho rangs 'bros par byed// ji srid phur bu bton par ma gyur gyi bar
448a1(rgyud): dug du'ang gnas par mi bye'o// rgyal po skyed par 'dod na lha chen po'i khang par song nas lha la dug dang khrag gis byugs te sha chen po'i bdug pa dbul bar bya
448a2(rgyud): nim+bu'i 'dab mas kyang mchod par bya'o// de nas dug dang khrag dang / skye che rnams cig tu byas nas brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig/ brgyad brgya dang pos rang gi sha'o// gnyis pas me
448a3(rgyud): togo gsum pas btsun mo'i 'khoro// bzhi pas mtshon cha chen po'o// lnga pas glang po che'o// drug pas ha ste/ khro bo chen pos dkris pa'i laso// blo bzang po nyid nyams par byed
448a4(rgyud): 'dod na ni mA'i shing gis ma sbar nas nim+ba'i lo ma dang / dur khrod kyi thal ba phan tshun bsreg pas bsreg blugs sto/ phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skad cig la nyams
448a5(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// de nas lkug par byed par 'dod na ka sa ma ya'i gzugs brnyan byas nas zangs kyi phur bu la brgyad brgya bzlas te dgra bo yid la byas nas kha la phur bu gdab pa/ 
448a6(rgyud): bya'o// lkugs par 'gyur// phur bu bton na tha ro// mngon spyod can rdzogaso// ma bsgrubs par las rnams 'byung ste so shing la lan bdun bzlas nas bza' bar bya'o// ma blangs par
448a7(rgyud): bza' ba rnyed// brgyad brgyar bzlas nas mgo bo la byugs pas skye bo tha~Md dga' bar 'gyuraro// gos la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas gon na skal ba bzang por 'gyuraro// mig sman
448a8(rgyud): la mngon par bsngags nas mig la bskus na khro bas dkris pa rnams kyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyuraro// lam du zlos bzhin pas song na chom rkun rnams kyis 'joms mi nu so// sor mo la
448b1(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas pas mche ba can thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// gseg ma la brgyad brgyar bzlas nas chu la gtor na tshul rgyu 'thang rengs par byed par 'gyuro// bcings pa lam
448b2(rgyud): 'gag pa la bzlas na tha ro// ka ra bi ra'i lcug ma la lan bdun bzlas pas dkyil 'khor du nye bar byugs nas sa la mtshon cha sbyin par bya'o// gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar byed do// 
448b3(rgyud): khyor ba'i tshu la bsngags nas steng du gtor bar bya ste dus ma yin pa'i char rengs par bye'o// thal ba la brkyang brgyar bzlas na thal ba 'debs par 'gyur ro// lcags kyi phye ma rdo'i ra bar 'gyur ro// 
448b4(rgyud): sgrol ma gsum gyis me'i ra bar 'gyur ro// bil ba'i 'ang/ dab mas bil ba'i ra bar 'gyuraro// brgyad brgya rab dazlas pa'i chus chu'i ra bar 'gyu ro// mdor bsdus na btsa
448b5(rgyud): ldan 'das gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga sa ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed// rig pa bsgrubs pa las mtshams med pa las grol nas byang
448b6(rgyud): chub kyi sems rnying // oM ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha/ a na ba lo ki te mur+d+ha ni te dze rA shau hUM/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ dar bing ra/ tshinA tshin+da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA// gzi brjid dang phung
448b7(rgyud): bor rnam bshad de/ 'dab ma chung ngu'i rgyab du gnas par bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gyi rgyud chu ngu las bris pa 'dab ma so sor la rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ gzhonu
448b8(rgyud): mas bkal ba'i srang bu la ras byed bcug nas sam/ yang na dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa ste ji ltar rnyed pa'i ras kha tshar ma bcad pa skra dang bral ba la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can dbang po
449a1(rgyud): ma tshang ba min pas kha shar du phyogs pas ras rnams 'phrul la bzhag ste de'i mdun du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad
449a2(rgyud): dang khyad par du bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma spyan drang bar byas nas ana'i shing gis me rab tu sbyar nas yungs kar dkar po la mar gyis btags pa la ral pa cig ma'i snying pos ras ris kyi spyan
449a3(rgyud): sngar khru bzhi pa'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig ras ris 'dri bzhin pa na bgegs med par 'gyuraro// de nas tshes grangs dang byed pa dang rgyu skar dang yud tsam dag/ 
449a4(rgyud): bal snang sar par bzhag pa kha dog ma 'dres pa shin tu so sor ba tags pa'i kha dog kyi chus sbyar nas pa lang gi spu'i pir kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi shing ni sna tshogs
449a5(rgyud): pa'i gnas rab tu bsngags pa/ bya'i tshogs skad 'byin pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang mtshungs pa bya'o// deng zhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med 'drir gzhug par
449a6(rgyud): bya'o// chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis rgyan pa'i sku/ mdzes par snang bzhin pa'i lus/ gtsug tor nas 'o
449a7(rgyud): zer chen po gser gyi kha dog can 'phro ba/ pad+ma dkar po la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yon gyi gzhug su dkar po rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa kha dog lnga pa'i gos
449a8(rgyud): kyi stong g.yogs bgos pa/ phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o// gzhan du rgyu skar me bzhi la 'phags pa dri ma med pa 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ bcom ldan
449b1(rgyud): 'das kyis g.yas phyogasu thams cad dkar po// gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ ral ba'i tshogs dang phyag na ril pa spyi blugs dang / dbyug gu'i shing bsnams pa/ mchod phyir thogs/ 
449b2(rgyud): 'dzag pa la 'byung ba/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ mchog tu skyes pa/ sgrub pa po steng du phyug brkyang ba phyag bzhi pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mthi gang gi chang la 'phags pa drim
449b3(rgyud): meng par 'gro ba cung zad mngon par lhags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das las cung zad dman pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de'i g.yas kyi
449b4(rgyud): gzhog su pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/ gser dang rin po ches rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i lus can cing pan gyis rgyu na ba/ rnam par bkra ba'i gos 'gos pa/ rin po
449b5(rgyud): che'i stong g.yogs can// lus cung zad 'dud pa/ bcom ldan 'angs la lag pa kha sbyor byas pas ud pa la sngon pa yongasu gzung ba phyag mchog tu skyes pa dang por btso/ 
449b6(rgyud): ldan 'das la rtog par byed bzhin pa'i sgrol ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de'i 'og tu pad+ma'i mtsho bya'o// de nas rtsa ba'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyog su 'phags pa spyan
449b7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug bya'o// g.yon du 'phags pa dri ma med par 'gro ba'o// gzhan du bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i g.ya su klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas mgo bo bdun pa/ phyag na pad+ma'i sdong
449b8(rgyud): bo bsnams pa/ zad dkar ba rnam par bkra ba'i gos dang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par rgyan pa/ 'drar gzhug par bya'o// g.yon du klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sngo bsangs/ phyag na pad+ma'i sdong bu
450a1(rgyud): bsnams pa/ 'di 'dra ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi gzhog su rtsa dang nye bar dkar mo rgyan thaMd kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rin po che
450a2(rgyud): stod g.yogs can rin po che dang / tsang+ga/ ka/ phyag na bsnams pa/ pus mo sa la btsugs pa'i lha mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i g.yas kyi gzhog su rtsa ba
450a3(rgyud): dang nye bar 'khod pa'i thad dkar mo gzho nu'i gzugs can rgyan tha~Md kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ thal mo kha sbyar du byas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma dang / bcom ldan 'das la nges par
450a4(rgyud): rtog bzhin pa'i bde ldan 'drir gzhug par bya'o// 'phag sa pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du sgra dab pa po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lta bar gyur pa gos
450a5(rgyud): dkar po'i stong g.yogs dang / smad g.yogs can/ dbyi bas dang rnam pa'i khyad par ji 'dra ba pus mo gnyis bcu gas pa log pa spog phor thogs pa bya'o// lha'i bu rnga bo che bcu
450a6(rgyud): bar byed bzhin pa bya'o// sprin las glog dang bcas pa bya'o// phyogs bzhi dang phyogs bral du yang bya'o// g.ya su ras ris kyi steng du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu me tog 'thor bar byed bzhi/ 
450a7(rgyud): pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// steng du zla ba dang nyi ma rgyan tha~Md kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// steng du dung dang / rnga bo che dgo/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.ya su
450a8(rgyud): nag mo gsus pa 'phyang ba rgyan thams cad pa mche ba gtsigs pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ ge zhes bya ba'i lpags pas dkris pa gtsug pud la thod pa'i phreng ba 'phyang
450b1(rgyud): rdob la rab tu bzhugs pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can/ phyag bzhi pa g.yas kyi phyag gis dgra sta yongasu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pa'i dang pos khrag gis yongasu gang ba'i snod/ 
450b2(rgyud): phyogs dang ldan pa'i lus la smin ma dang skar ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba byas pa/ sen mo chen mo ring po can/ glang po che'i lpags pas stong g.yogs pa/ byang chub sa
450b3(rgyud): dpa' chen po'i bka' rab tu nod par byed bzhin par gyur pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i srin mo 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de ltar ras ris 'drir bcug nas gtsang ma'i phyog su dag pa dang skyong ba dang / 
450b4(rgyud): tshad ma nyid kyi yan lag rnam par spangs pa/ rin po che dang chu klung gi 'gram mam/ gzhan du yang rung ste/ gtsang ma'i dgan du'o// de nas du ba 'thul bas ni dbang du byed// gang thab
450b5(rgyud): gcig gsang sngags byed pa de'o// lha thams cad gsal bar byed par 'dod pas dkar po'i brgyad pa yang rung ste/ las brtsams par bya'o// gtsang ma'i sa'i phyogasu gzhu'i
450b6(rgyud): tshad kyis thang la yongasu byug par bya ste/ de'i dbu su so phag bzhag par bya'o// phyogs bzhi rnamasu sa las byung ba'i rtsa ba dang nag po med pa'i chu'i bum pa bzhi la brgyad brgyar bsngags pa bka/ 
450b7(rgyud): par bya'o/ bzhon mas bkal pa'i srang bu tshon sna lnga las legs par bkris pa'o// dri zhim po'i phye mas dkyil 'khor byas phyogs bzhir chang dang sha med pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// 
450b8(rgyud): dri bzang po'i me tog gi mchod pa bya'o// gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo// zangs kyi snod mar gyis bkang ba gzhan nas 'gram gyi phye ma rnams la nye bar gnas par bzhag par bya'o// shar du mngon
451a1(rgyud): par phyogs pas phyi rol tu dkyil 'khor du ral pa cig ma la mchod pa dang / gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// de nas sa ljang ku blangs nas gos dkar po cig 'chang ba
451a2(rgyud): byas te ji sridadu rkang pa gnyis kyi bar de srid bya bas par bya'o// de nas mar gyi snod kyi steng du ku sha des dor bar bya'o// de nas mar chung ngu de la galte dri ma dang sen mo dang skra mthong na gang dang gang cig tu/ 
451a3(rgyud): bya'o// ji srid rang 'dod pa dang smra ba lhag par skyes kyi bar du'o// de nas bum pa re re blangs te zlos bzhin pas bzhag par bya'o// spangs pa'i snod nges par gnas pa byas nas sangs rgyas dang
451a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md la phyag bye du gzhugo/ 'di la yang 'di'i sku mnye sbyin par bya'o// pri yang ku dang / na ga ge sar dang / sbrang rtsi can dang / du ru ka rnams cig tu byas nas lan bdun
451a5(rgyud): mngon par bsngags pa byas te bsku bar bya'o// ba'i mar dang bsres pa'i bza' ba mchog bza' bar bya'o// nad me da par 'gyu ro// gzhonu mas bkal ba'i srad bu sngon por btsas
451a6(rgyud): pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas bcing bar bya ste mig gi nang zhi'o// mgrin pa la bcings na skyugs pa sel bar bya'o// srad bu 'di nyid kyi ras yug 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o// stong/ 
451a7(rgyud): phrag brgya du mngon par bsngags pa gyad kyi lus la bcing bar bya ste/ g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// khru bzhi pa'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te bcom ldan 'das ma la dri bzla
451a8(rgyud): bo'i me tog gis mchod pa byas nas pa'i mar gyis sgron me dbul bar bya'o// de nas byang chub shing gi me sbar nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i sra rtsi
451b1(rgyud): bog gi bsregs blugs thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sre kyi shig nyi ma bdun la gang 'dod pa de'i nang yun ring por nye bar zhi bar byed// bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed par 'dod
451b2(rgyud): pas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram cig gis blangs nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i seng ge dang / stag gi mdog can gyi bgegs rnams nyi shu rtsa gcig lhag pa'i brgya bya'o// 
451b3(rgyud): nas nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas gtsang ma'i phyog su khrag sgrub par byed pa nye bar thogs te las brtsams par bya'o// de'i 'og tu phyogs bzhir
451b4(rgyud): rgya skyegs kyi lo ma la 'dug pa'i bgegs rnams bzhag par bya'o// bgegs rnams kyis dbu su bgegs chen po log par 'dren pa bzhag par bya'o// lan cig mngon
451b5(rgyud): par bsngags pa'i tshe na sna lnga'i phye ma de rnams kyis thog ma/ ra dkyil 'khor bdun bya'o// me tog dmar po dang dring / mar pos mngon par mchod par bya'o// phyogs bzhir mar
451b6(rgyud): mar me dbul bar bya'o// rgya skyegs kyi khu ba phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma stong phrag brgyad tu mngon par bsngags pa'am brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa'i
451b7(rgyud): srang bu dmar pos bgegs thams cad la g.yas bskor du dkri bar bya'o// de nas bgegs kyi rgyal po chen po bcing bar bya ste/ de rnams kyi dbu su u dum ba ra'i yaM shing gis me rab tu sbar
451b8(rgyud): nas bgegs bcing bar bya'o// zhes brjod nas swA hA'i yi ges be'u'i lci ba la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i mtshan mo stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig de nas sgrub pa po de'i
452a1(rgyud): bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thang bcings par 'gyuraro// rig pa thams cad sgrub par byed bzhin pa na bgegs med par 'gyuraro// de rnams ni de rnams kyis bya bas pas
452a2(rgyud): log par 'dren pa chen po cig tu bzhag nas bgegs rnams thams cad la me tog thams cad dbulo// srung ba thams cad kya // bdug pa ni log 'dren chen po rnams la ka ra bi ra dmar
452a3(rgyud): po dang / tsan dan dmar po dbu'o// bgegs thams cad dang nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad la mchod yon dbulo// log par 'dren pa dang bcas pa la gu gul dang mar bsres pas mchod
452a4(rgyud): yon dbu'o// de nas lte ba'i tshad du dong brko ba dar bya'o// der so so so sor bcug nas slar yangs pa'i sar bya'o// de ltar rig pa 'dzin pa'i bgegs thams cad
452a5(rgyud): med par 'gyuraro// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod nyan du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas
452a6(rgyud): nas u dum ba ra'i yaM shing gis me rab tu sbar te tshangs pa'i yaM shing gis thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig/ nyi ma brgya phrag cig gam/ nyi ma brgya phrag gnyi su tsa ru
452a7(rgyud): bza' bas yid gzhungs par 'gyuraro// khru bzhi'i tshad kyis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te 'o ma can gyi ye shing gis me rab tu sbar nas 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ bram ze
452a8(rgyud): dbang du 'gyuraro// tsa ru'i bsregs blugs gyis shig rgyal rigs dbang du 'gyur ro// zho'i bsregs blugs gyis shig rje rigs dbang du 'gyu ro// nas kyi bsregs blugs kyis shig dam
452b1(rgyud): rigs dbang du 'gyuraro// thams cad bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i don du nyi ma brgya phrag cig/ dgral bltas nas bzlas par bya ste rengs par 'gyuraro// mA sha ka'i yam shing no dang
452b2(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa rnams thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gang la ltas nas bzlas pa de la su mi rung bar 'gyur ro// chul lan bdun mngon par
452b3(rgyud): bsngags pas dug thams cad sel bar bye'o// dug thams cad la 'dod pas byab par bya'o// zhu mkhan gyi ril bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas mig dag par bya ste/ mig
452b4(rgyud): nang nye bar zhi bar bye'o// byis pa gdon gyis zin pa la srang bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas ba da cing bar bya ste/ grol bar bye'o// nad pa la bcing bar bya ste/ 
452b5(rgyud): gdon thams cad mthu med par 'gyu ro// thal ba la/ lan bdun bzlas pas dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o// bu mthon pa la til mar yongasu bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste bde ba
452b6(rgyud): btsa' bar 'gyuraro// rmongs pas mngal gyi dus tshed la 'das pa la khrus byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i mar la lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas btung bar sbyin// bza' ba mchog/ 
452b7(rgyud): dang ldan pa bza' bar bya'o// bu skye bar byed// de nas bu mo mang po can gyi lam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig thal ba debum pa bzhi chus kun tu bkang nas brgyad brgyar mngon par
452b8(rgyud): bsngags pa dkyil 'khor du gsum bzhag par bya'o// skal pa bzang por 'gyuraro// 'di'i du 'chi ba yang mdo/ shu dag la brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas te lag pa g.yon la bcings na smra ba
453a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyu ro// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog thun gsum du stong phrag sbyin sreg gyis shig/ phyogs cig la yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'a
453a2(rgyud): gzho nu mas bskal pa'i srad bu la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas nas mdung pa bdun bya'o// lag pa la bcings nas brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug mthu med par 'gyur ro// de nas
453a3(rgyud): mi bzad pa'i sbrul gyi mche ba'i dug la swA hA'i yi ge'i bar du khyor ba'i chu blangs nas brgyad brgyar bsngags te btung ba sbyin par bya'o// dug nyal ba yang slong bar byeda'o// de nas ma langs
453a4(rgyud): na phyogs bzhi rnamasu mngon par bsngags pa byas te/ btung ba sbyin par bya'o// 'jog pos kyang mche ba'i du dge slong bar byed// stan gan+ti ka la lan bdun mngon par bsngag
453a5(rgyud): pa la byug pa sbyin par bya'o// ma bcings par ya nga de nyid skam par byed// tshor ba med par bye// yam sa kyi nye bar 'tshe ba rnams la grong ngam grong khyer gyi dbu suman
453a6(rgyud): mo phyeng nus ba lang gi lpags pa'i tshad kyi thang la nye bar byugs par bya ste/ dkar gsum gyi gtor ma byin nas dri dang me tog lag pa'i gtor ma byin te lo ma'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nasa'o// 
453a7(rgyud): ma'i bsregs blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma gsum gyis grong gsum gyi dang / nyi ma bdun gyis khang pa'i yams nye bar zhi bar byed// de nas nye bar zhi bar ma gyur na 'dir
453a8(rgyud): nyi ma bdun du bad kan mthar byed kyi yam shing gis me sbar nas ak+Sha'i til mar gyis btags pa'i 'bras yos stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma gsum la 'phral gyi yams nye
453b1(rgyud): bar zhi bar bye'o// thal bar 'gram bcings te zlos bzhin pas gang mthong ba de dga' bar 'gyuraro// gang ma bsgrubs par yang bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris kyi spyan
453b2(rgyud): sngar 'gyu ro// cho ga gzhan ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar zla ba nya la gzugs brnyan la dang por nag po'i phyogs la mchod pa rgya chen po bya ste/ 
453b3(rgyud): arga'i yam shing gis ma sbar nas zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pas thun gsum du mdzub mo'i tshad kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad ji srid bco lnga pa'i bar du gyis shig/ de nas
453b4(rgyud): grub par 'gyuraro// de lta bu'i sbyor bas stong phrag ga sum bzlas par bya'o// stong phrag gsum du bzlas pa bya/ ste las gzhan rnamasu 'gyuraro// 'dis sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas
453b5(rgyud): grub par 'gyu ro// de nas rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i// blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma la mchod pa byas nas byang chub shing gi yam shing la ing+ga
453b6(rgyud): nga'i til mar gyis btags pa thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdun la dbang du 'gyuraro// cho ga 'di nyid kyis grul bum dbang du 'gyur// til btags pa stong phrag
453b7(rgyud): brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'byung po dbang du 'gyu ro// dur khro du ro bsregs pa'i dum bu can stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ sha za dbang du 'gyu ro// waTa'i shing gi yam shing
453b8(rgyud): stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gnod sbyin dbang du 'gyuraro// bal gyi bsregs blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'o thug dang tsa ru dang til gyi thug pa rnams kyi sbyin sreg
454a1(rgyud): kyis shig/ rigs pazhi nga du byed cing dbang du 'gyuraro// gu gul gyi ril bu song drag brgyad sbyin sreg kyis shig/ lha chen po rje su 'bang ba'i gdon pa
454a2(rgyud): du'agyu ro/ mtshan mo gtsang mar langs nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg dang bzlas pa gyis shig/ phyogs cig la 'ching ba las grol bar 'gyuraro// zlabs 'ching ba chen po la
454a3(rgyud): gregrol bar byed// til dang piN+Da ka'i sbyin sreg gis khro ba nye bar zhi bar bye'o// yang na til gyi sbyin sreg giso// gos 'dod pas dur ba'i myu gu'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ gos zung brgya
454a4(rgyud): rnyed 'thun mongs pa'i skyes bu dbang du byed pa la go be traM g+hi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ sbrang bumachu rings kyi mchu bcing ba la sa li'i 'dab ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ stag
454a5(rgyud): gi mchub cing ba la gi ra ki rI ka'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ se ga'i mchubacing ba la si ha karti ka'i sbyin sreg gyis ga/ sbrul rnams la nag ge sar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/

454a7(rgyud): bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lus dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o// ma grub pa sgrub par bya'o// gzhan gyis bsgrubs pa yang rnam
454a8(rgyud): par 'jom par bye'o// klu la sogs pa'i gdon rnams la phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba la sogs pa bzlas pa nyid kyis bye'o// mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du cher
454b1(rgyud): ma'i sbyin sreg kyis shig/ dgra bcom par byed// nimA'i yam shing cha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ mtshan mo bdun gyis skye bar 'a
454b2(rgyud): skra las khyad par du phung bar byed pa la a riny+dza'i ya shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skyes pa'i sha dang / smyo byed la rtag tu bzlas par bya ste/ zad phyir ldog par mi 'gyu
454b3(rgyud): gi baM la lan nyi shu rtsa cig yongasu bzlas nas thig le byas te rgyal po'i sgo ru dang / shu dag la stong phrag brgyang mngon par bsngag par byas nas lag pa la bcings nas gang blangs pa de rnyed do// 
454b4(rgyud): gdon 'bros par byed pas mi'i rus pa blangs nas sor brgyad dpa'i tshang byas nas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa ga don gyi gnasu gdab par bya ste gdon 'bros par bye'o// me
454b5(rgyud): tog dang dri dang 'bras bu la sogs pa brgyad brgyar mngon par ba sngags par byas nas gang la byin pa dang bang du byed do// rig pas bgegs rnam par gzhom pa'i don du sang ldeng
454b6(rgyud): gi yam shing gi stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg yo// nyi ma gsum nas bgegs med par 'gyuraro// de lta bu la sogs pa'i thabs thams cad bye'o// thams cad du gso sbyong can gyi
454b7(rgyud): ras ris kyi spyan sngar bsgrub par bya ste ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o// stong phrag blangs nas g.yas kyi g.yog su gzhag ste re re la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas mel
454b8(rgyud): sbyin bsreg bya'o// bar skabs 'dir ras ris rab tu 'gul bar byed pa dang / mar me'i rtse mo 'phel bar byed pa dang / na mkha' la lha'i rnga bo che'i sgra sgrog pa dang / dri

455a3(rgyud): 'byon par byed// 'phags pa spun ras gzegs dbang phyug gi sku las 'od zer byung ste rnam par 'pho ba'i 'od zer de rnams kyis sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas thams cad

455a5(rgyud): sgrub pa po pus mo gnyis btsugs pas shar du bzhag pa'i rnam rgyal bum pas mchod yon dbul lo// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa

455a8(rgyud): cad kyi dngos grub bam/ mi snang ba nyid dang / sa chen po'i dbang phyug gam/ gang blangs pa de rnyeng// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gang 'dod pa der yang 'gro/

459a8(rgyud): phyi nas zla ba las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor phyogasu lnga byas pa zhes pa brtags pa ma yin pa la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas rang gnasu bzhag par bya'o// 'di rnams byab pa'i thab
